Title: Cycle
Synopsis: A Short story that was written for the 5th anniversary.

Title: Of Corporate Core Competency Plans, Capitalistic Synergized Growth Projections and Lethal Target Market Analyses.
Synopsis:
Shortened title: Core Competency Plans
Also, THIS IS ON INDEFINITE HIATUS!
Felicia is determined to never let a single aspect of her life slip from her grasp and some stupid teleportation accident is not about to stop her. Winn is trying very hard not to die for reasons his master archmage Talmanael keeps forgetting. A small gem is gleefully waiting to be fed while stuck inside a six-sided prison.
Do any of these things have anything to do with each other? Did the author plan anything this time or is he just writing by the seat of his pants, as usual?
This is my submission to the RoyalRoad Fifth Anniversary contest and NaNoWriMo 2018. Read at your own risk.

Title: Green Dawn
Synopsis:
A Short story submitted for Royal Road's five-year aniversary competition. 
  Even if the world changes people will stay the same whether they are good or bad. But maybe as the world about us gets darker and darker we'll have more reason to find the light... I'm probably just talking nonsense now but that's what I believe - Dawn Wellford.

Title: Money Rules The World
Synopsis:
In a game-like world of beauty and magic in a time of peace and happiness, there is a boy with no name, no family, no money, suffering from malnourishment and dehydration in a dark alley as he looks to the sky for the last time he wonders why the gods had forsaken him.
He promised himself if he somehow made it through this or if he had a second chance he would live life his way and rely on no one but himself but not to rule the people or kill the gods he realized in his final moments that all that mattered in life was Money.
As darkness clouds his vision he is greeted by a voice.
"Want to make a deal?"

Title: The Yellow Bards
Synopsis: This is the story of Darren O'Daveran. He set out for a weekend camping trip with friends and instead found himself the target of a hunt by a band of magical creatures in the backwoods of appalachia. Little did he know that he was to inherit a legacy of law, lore and lascivious intentions that were centuries in the making and might make him wish he chose the stewpot instead of asking for help that night.

Title: I would do anything for love...
Synopsis:
When genius is married to madness, when there is nothing to lose but everything to gain, can destiny be changed? 
A short story in a planned universe, maybe I'll do more with it.

Title: Music System
Synopsis:
Saturn Vanya Emerson is a musical genius who ended up in prison through an unfortunate set of circumstances. The universe felt pitty that he youth once again couldn't fulfil his talent and granted him a gift to fulfil his potentil. This is his story. 
Sorry about the crappy synopsis and crappy name for the novel. To be honest I really couldn't think of a good name to call the novel. 
 
Music Playlist for the novel,                 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7_acUgMyEtVGHfIU5vKCH2dGXYFm-tIh                 when ever a new song is introduced into the novel the song will be added to the playlist. If I mention a specific song then it'll added to the playlist. If I don't mention a specific song then I'll add a few of that type that I personally like.

Title: A.R.I.A.S.: A New Beginning
Synopsis:
War, one of the few things that never changes in our world no matter how much we try... There was a war with the colony on Luna and it ended with a tragedy that signalled the end of humanity's warlike tendencies. Instead now wars are fought in VR games, teams instead of armies. 
Arthur Tian spent 5 years of his life playing he Mecha war game 'Moonflare' rising to the number one player under the name 'All-Bounder' and becoming a legend in VR Gaming circles. Now 5 years after 'Moonflare' ended, having given up his gaming he's roped back in to try the newest VRMMO Wargame 'Worldscape' a world with 'Infinite Freedom' According to the developers. Will he rise back up to the top to help the earth who has lost every tournament for the last 5 years?

Title: Story of a Killer
Synopsis:
Damon Jaeger had always known he was different. Yeah, he was more talented than others his age and even older. Yeah, he could learn things and remember them after a few glances. But he knew he was even more different.
He was a Killer. He wanted to hurt people. Or at least he wanted to.
Damon finally let loose and hurt a group of people who he felt deserved it. And because of that, an Organization found out about his knack for violence and killing, and they wanted to recruit him.
Join Damon as he gets trained to become a Killer and tries to stay himself along the arduous journey.
(Author Note: Grammar may or may not be quite shit, so please go easy on me. Also, the story may come across as edgy, so sorry about that. Oh and I don't own the cover photo either, I picked it up off of Google~)

Title: HELM.ONLINE
Synopsis:
“We all die but not all adventurers truly live” 
Helm.Online, a Virtual Reality Massively Multiplayer Online game boasting “Grounded Virtual Realism” and “An Immersive Reality Unlike Any Other”, takes the world by storm, becoming a resounding international success. H.O creates a virtual world unlike any seen before, where players aren’t just simple adventurers. They stand at the forefront of a war against primordial, cosmic beings known as The Nevermore who seek to break the inhabitants of the virtual world. 
Kazim is fed up with hearing about the hit game. Having played many games in Virtual Reality, he writes off H.O as another boring addition to a quickly oversaturating market but the phenomenons’ constant media barrage eventually stimulates his curiosity and he finally joins the millions of players in the fight against The Nevermore. 
There, Kazim discovers Helm.Online’s unforgiving and random nature and immediately struggles to find his footing.
But, with the help of three new friends and an impending in-game event, Kazim just might find a way to keep the game from kicking his ass and have some fun while doing it.
*This is the story of Kazim's journey to the maximum rank in a virtual reality game that's trying to be as realistic and immersive as possible. Nothing more, nothing less. No harems or anything like that. 
*Feedback, bad and good, is always appreciated. I mean seriously, tear my story to shreds. Its my first story and It helps me grow and get better. This is a hobby but I have a lot of fun writing my own stories and reading stories created by others. Thank you
*Chapter every week, they may be out sooner than that

Title: The Merchant of Death
Synopsis:
A Genius Psychopath from Earth transmigrates into the body of Tony Stark which completely changes the fate of the Multiverse.
AU Dark!Tony
This novel will follow both The Cinematic and Comic Verse.

Title: The Heretic Legion
Synopsis:
Cover Art: Undead Master by Changling Assassin. 
Located at:
http://fav.me/dbm60ex
Used under license Creative Commons attribution non-commercial 3.0 per bottom right of the linked page. 
 
Summary:
Just the story of a necromancer and his eventual army.
Currently, the only major thing of note is a pretty fleshed out magic system. No set list of spells or specific incantations. Just rules similar to the laws of physics, within those laws you can do whatever is possible.
 
 
 
Updates:
I work Sunday thru Wednesday and updates tend to revolve around my scheduled days off. Currently, I release content as I feel it's ready for release because that's what I myself would prefer from an author.
Warnings:
This story is graphic.
blood/necromancy magic that requires self-harm to use. 
explicit descriptions of sexuality. (though fairly tame outside of the marked chapters, at least compared to said chapters)
and is generally darker in tone.
If you're concerned you might start to read only to be turned off by these elements.
See
7. Teetering on the Edge for an example of the graphic nature of violence or
9. Explicit Content for a fairly self-contained example of the most explicit of the sexual content.

Title: Try Me!
Synopsis: Reincarnation story with a little bit of twist.

Title: A Penguin's Celebration
Synopsis:
Tim the Penguin plans a celebration for the 5th anniversary of his restaurant before trouble sets in.
 
Story submitted for RR's 5th anniversary short fiction contest.

Title: Super Soldier not Super Hero
Synopsis:
Book 1: Follow Emily as she awakens to become a Super Soldier in the army and follow her through her training and first tour of duty. The first book is complete and it's staying up on RR.   400+ pages and 46 Chapters.
Book 2: Finds Emily behind enemy lines trying to survive against an impossible army.    On-going and follows the events of the first book eight months later.
Reader beware this is a rough draft and that means that the grammar is going to be ...spotty.  I will go back and edit chapters at a later date. I am working on getting a better editing program. If you spot grammar errors don't be shy and tell me. It might take a while for me to fix it as I am busy writing and working my full-time job. I promise you I will fix it though and I deeply appreciate those who point out errors that I can fix. 
Cover Photo by Piotr Wilk on Unsplash  
 Updating every Monday.
If you like this story check think about checking out my other web novel Digital Marine.
If you have any extra cash laying around and you feel like supporting the story you can donate here at Patreon or PayPal. Patreon donators have options to read unedited chapters before anyone else can read them if you can't wait for the next chapter.

Title: Hell-Bound
Synopsis:
December 1st 2018. It started off simply enough, but then the clock struck twelve, and the sky bled into red.
Tick Tock, Tick Tock little humans... try to survive.
The sky turns red, a voice whispers into the minds of all who hears it, and strange demons invade the world for one hour before retreating.
The humans are then given an ultimatum by Chronos, the being who had somehow conquered Hell and kicked Lucifer off of his throne.
Become strong, enter the Dungeon and its one thousand floors, reach the bottom, and kill Chronos before he kills them.
Arthur Clive is one such human, who wishes to enter the Dungeon and kill Chronos for the death of his parents and younger brother... luckily for him, he's not alone, his friends willing to help him become strong and kill Chronos...
Though he has to wonder... why is it that he possesses two Animae compared to most adventurers and their singular Anima?

Note: The rewrite of this is named Einherjar, and is being uploaded on this site.
Also note: trying out using Adobe Sparks to make quick book covers, the current one was the efforts of a few minutes so meh... plus it does slightly fit... kind of.

Title: Swords And Magic
Synopsis:
It all started when I was five years old I had just come from school when I found the house in a mess my dad was arguing with some guy I couldn’t understand what they were saying but what I saw next left me gasping for air, “find the Chest you must find.” With that he vanished without a trace, my mind was in a turmoil and I could not comprehend what I had just seen but they had made a grave mistake to kidnap my Dad, if only I knew what I was up against I could have taken a different path but that was eleven years ago and the time has come to unveil my wrath, oh my name is Tony, Tony Dart.
participant in the NaNoWriMo Royal Road challenge

Title: Uploaded Fairy: The Family Of Lost Purgatory Girls
Synopsis:
Author Note: Before you read, this isn't your typical Isekei. The MC spends half their time being completely curb stomped. So please don't whine if the MC isn't Op.
Nadine is an slacking student, who has recently broken up with her girlfriend. Initially she wanted to continue building her robotic dog. But the next morning, her mother dies in a mysterious accident. Taken to a boarding school to live the rest of her teen years, torn between dating her old sweet heart and establishing a new life, she knows the life she wants to lead is not here.But when she runs away from the boarding school on the floating city, the only way to hold her hand to keep her from falling is her old lover. Stuck in a world where teens build robot dogs to fight to the death, she comes to understand that not everyone lives like aristocrats. They hold onto the false promise of a better life.Compounding the stench of death and cockroaches, the corporate state forked the source code from an old war time simulator. This simulator reworked into tailored experience in a fantasy world, specific to the desire of individual gamers. When Nadine finds her sexual desires to much to handle, she is about to give up gaming.A dream-scanner, whose been watching her play all this time, has given her one last chance: she has the opprotunity to fix that apocalypse she's created that ruined the lives of the game world fairies. Who has her own mixed loyalties. And she keeps telling Nadine, "It's not really a game."

Title: World apocalypse
Synopsis: No one could have really said how it would all end, but I guess we were pretty close...

Title: Rebirth of White Mountain Rose
Synopsis: Hakuya Mei was a normal highschool girl with friends and family. Thrust into a world of super power, she was treated as and outcast for not having any super power. Desperated, she took the over from a shaddy organization to become a lab rat in their experiment to give super power to a certain individuals. Unfortunatly, life wasn't a kind misstress.

Title: Withering Under the Moon
Synopsis:
What does one have to do to grasp the concept called happiness? Was it to sacrifice one aspect of you to gain much more or to deprived one to gain it?
This story does not bequeath a thrilling adventure that explores the world or to defeat a nemesis. This story is nothing ambitious for action and fighting that stimulates and drives a person to move. It's just a story of a lone boy who became a girl in a world unknown to her.
She wishes nothing but a happiness that was snatched from her by fate. She wishes nothing but a role to play; big or small. She wishes nothing a small fraction of satisfaction life can offer. She doesn't want to fight for her fate or to defeat someone. She just simply desire to give her self the smallest value for someone who is alive for the second time around. 
For her, living aimlessly is punishment; death is a cruel salvation for escape; a sense of value dictates your existence measure.Note: It is another genderbender. There is nothing profane or sexually explicit about this novel. It will only run for 5-7 chapters.

Title: Film master
Synopsis: Some people say that he is a young genius, and some people say that he is an arrogant fool. Some people say that he is a playboy, and some people say that he is a peerless man... The film critics love him, the fans are crazy for him, the female stars want to approach him, the theater owners are more like him as God... look at his The list of works, both Oscar-level literary classics and phenomena-level commercial writing, he always leads the trend of the film. A Chinese-American devotee who studied in Harvard West Lake Middle School, wakes up in time and embarks on a glorious thorn road to save his family and pursue his dreams. Ye Wei, a film master is on the rise.

Title: Slender man
Synopsis: This is a story about a man named Mr. Kyran Coates who went to a forbidden town called Dustgate.

Title: Heavensborne: The Fall
Synopsis:
A thousand years have passed since the fall of man on Earth - and the rise of man on Mars.
With humanity all but lost on its mother planet, buried in the ashes of The Last War, the forgotten Martian colony has long since achieved self-sustainability to blossom into a city of millions.
When they find evidence of civilization blooming on Earth, they hurry to send young astronauts to explore the old, new world.  It is there that Einstein's fear was realized - humanity has returned to the dark ages.
Stef, a VR gamer with an out-of-fashion love for history, finds himself stranded off the coast of France with his comrades. Together they thrust themselves into the world of kings and queens, medieval politics, cults and ancient warfare.

Title: Minglings [stub]
Synopsis:
Without any previous indication, all the televisions, smartphones, and radios start broadcasting a message recorded by the government leaders of the world. In it, they explain a horrible tragedy that is about to befall us. Our earth will blend with what is considered to be the primary dimension after having been apart for an unknown amount of time. The merger will not only affect the world, but also the beings on it, and humanity must mingle with other species or die out. Everybody will need to determine the other-dimensional race to pick. The world leaders have known of this for many years and have tried preparing people by creating popular fiction, games, and movies. These are nothing more than guides of what is about to happen.
 --
Edit: Book 1 is live on Amazon and Kindle Unlimited now, so I had to remove most of that. If you have kindle unlimited you can read the edited version for free there! Book two is still being released here.
Edit 2: The book garnered little interest here, making updating it something I've been doing less and less up to the point of not at all. However... book 2 is done, edited, and released in December. Book 3 is on my patreon and book 4 is on a temporary hiatus to be picked up again next year.

Title: I Was Reborn Just To Be Killed?
Synopsis:
I used to be a simple 23 years old student. No particular achievements, living with my parents, no girlfriend.
If there was one thing I liked about my life, then it was writing and reading novels. Regrettably, I was too half-hearted (and maybe not talented enough) to make a living this way.
Despite all of that, my life was a comfortable one, or so I thought.
Little did I know that one day, after falling asleep on my desk, I would die. I have no idea if it was a heart attack or something else, but I should have died back then.
Now, the problem at hand. I’m glad to have discovered that death isn’t the end of the run, but I don’t have time to be happy about that.
Was it about four years ago that I awakened in a different world, in the body of the eight-year-old me? Anyway, after I was declared as a ‘Scourge-Class’, I somehow managed to survive up until now and I’ve understood a few things about this weird world that I’m in.
In brief words, this world appears to have a setting that is a mix of all the stories which left the biggest impression on me in my past life. That includes the ones I read, wrote, and even the ones I had only daydreamed about. However, that’s not the most important thing at the moment.
Right now, I’m going to attempt the craziest thing I’ve done in both of my lives.
We’re going to escape this damned place and from the Scourge-Class, we’re going to become Disaster-Class.
The friends whom we lost in those four years… we are going to avenge them all.
 
[participant in the NaNoWriMo Royal Road challenge]

Title: Dark dungeons of dread and horror
Synopsis:
A short story for submission to:
Royal Road Countdown Event #2

Title: Not Another Isekai RPG Story Alternate
Synopsis:
The story ends at Alternate Route Finale. Ch 2-2 and on can be treated as Extra Chapters.
I still hadn't edited that one and it's low on priority. I may come back to it if I'm in the mood.
Most of the portions of the story will NOT focus on the skills, stats, grinding or battles. More about the dialogues (or the internal monologues) and the MC interacting with the world (or glitching, if you name it.).
...
With parts of his memory lost, Takeshi, a 25-year old lazy office worker was transported to a game world. Using his casual knowledge on video-game mechanics, join Takeshi's journey as he discover more about the world, his companions and himself. (only if you're interested though.)
My personal review: from ch-2 on expect a lot of perversion going on. It can be pretty weird, like the MC want to be a girl and Y*ri other girls, Fut*nari folks, Traps, the mention of t*ntacle monsters and some lulzy display (like shoving a morning star up someone's b*tthole in retaliation).
In here, the MC will discover new things as he kept on exploring and trying different stuff. This story will mostly be character-driven. Explanations about the world and its mechanics was kept to a minimum.
The MC's on the shameless side with not much real-life common sense (maybe) and he's (probably) not righteous at all. The other characters can be pretty weird as well.
It won't focus on romance.
Well that's about it.

Title: Magician Endeavour
Synopsis: In a world that is coming to an end by the hands of destruction, one surviving magician remained. He, who is an old mage that had lived a very long time, entered into battle against the forces of evil in order to stop their destruction of his world. However, he fails and the world ends, but he makes one final contract with a great entity for a chance to save his world. Thus, his spirit is transported into the past to reborn in a time when the end of everything had yet to began.

Title: A Plant's Ambition
Synopsis:
Oliver's a plant. What more could it ask for?
 
Disclaimer: The cover is not mine I acquired it from https://www.deviantart.com/migu9/art/Flower-Creature-Vayla-484977217 and changed a few aspects.

Title: Tales of The Walled City

Entry for RoyalRoad's fifth anniversary competition. 
Intended to be continued as a series.

Title: Reincarnated as a Little Mackerel Tabby
Synopsis:
This is my submission for the RR 5th Anniversary contest. "Write a story with the themes of rebirth, celebration or fantasy that is up to 750 words."
Since the theme of the 5th anniversary contest has to do with the invasian of the cat nation, I thought I'd write a story about a guy who reincarnates as a cat. Hope you enjoy.

Title: The Demon King Who Wants to Die Again
Synopsis:
The heroine finally made her way into the demonking's throne room and pointed her holy sword at his face.
“Demon king Azzoron! I, the hero of the holy kingdom, challenge you into a duel! Today, I shall cut you down and purify this world which was tainted with your sin!”
The demon king Azzoron, simply stood up and opened his arms wide.
“Very well, quickly come and take my head. I’m already tired of this world.”
<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>
This novel is just a short, one-shot story. I may made it into a proper novel in the long future, but don't give it too much hope because I already have another novel on going: The Dungeon Of A Forest God.

Title: Old Ghost's Stories
Synopsis:
I've met them on the old road to Murntmur.
Who I am, you ask?That's not relevant. I'm just an old ghost. Nothing interesting about me.
I got curious, so I followed them.
Who are they?Follow my story, and you'll eventually know.-----------------------The word from the author:It was completely on a whim that I decided to do this one.I won't mark it "interactive", as I'm not taking suggestions who should go where, but should you have any questions to the ghost, feel free to ask, and I'll make sure he answers.
I'm being erratic as hell, so please don't blame me for inconsistent releases.Also, I'm a newbie, so I will really appreciate any words form you which will help me improve.Thanks in advance and welcome to the story.

Title: Living in Allverse with Spirit (Don't Read)

The character is super OP or not.

Title: The Great Escape
Synopsis:
I created this to not distract the cat nation. Don't worry cats, this won't distract you at all. In fact, no cats are allowed to read this.
Only Penguins allowed!
But if a cat breaks my rules and reads this, then make sure to read to the end! That is the punishment for all cats.
 
This is a collection of my short-stories that I have submitted for various contests. (currently two)

Title: The Dungeon Boss's Favorite Game - A Virmo Story
Synopsis:
Kragathor is the final guardian of the world’s deepest dungeon. He is an immortal pinnacle of existence that is otherwise known as an ancient dragon. And he is terribly bored. His sole source of amusement comes from scrying on the adventurer teams that are in the upper levels of his dungeon.
Through spying on adventurers, Kragathor hears of a new magic item, called a Virmo, that allows one to project their mind into a fictional world in some sort of grand-scale game.  Recognizing these Virmo games as a potential diversion for his endless boredom, he orders a minion to infiltrate the nearby town and acquire some of these games. Once the minion returns, he logs into a game set in a world that runs on the twin magics of ‘science’ and ‘technology’, and embarks on his new journey as Bob, the Level 1 Human with no class.
 
Release Schedule:  As I wrap up the end of the first major arc, I will publish the chapters as they're completed.  However, as I transition into the next arc, I will go with a two or three times a week release schedule, since I will be splitting time between this story and Chimera.
 Discord Server

Title: Leopard Geckos
Synopsis:
A brief look at the life (and death) of a fantasy creature.
*my submission to the 750 word max October 2018 contest.

Title: Excerpt from "A Smuggler's Chronicles"
Synopsis: This is a short story fresh out of my novel-in-progress.The novel itself centres around the misadventures of a steamship captain named Smug, idealistic yet grumpy smuggler who cares too much for her own good.It's an amalgam of science fantasy and coalpunk, it's still in the works and I can't help but love my messy characters so much.

Title: Building a nation and make its citizen happy
Synopsis: I just going to enjoy the life in another world

Title: Day After Day, Night After Night
Synopsis:
Day after day, a new life I live. Night after night, this new life I leave.
 
My submission for the Countdown to the Fifth Anniversary story contest. This is my first story ever, but I hope that some of you will enjoy this nevertheless

Title: Frost Iron Forge
Synopsis:
A young man is transfered into the fantasy world of his dreams. Now this young plucking adventurer must overcome several obstacles, from figuring out what class he wants to be, to seducing the white haired elf girl he just met, to finally defeating the looming threat of the Demon King himself. Together with a loyal band, this man sets off to accomplish the ultimate power fantasy! 
 
2000 years later, a young rebel rises up against a tyrant as the world falls deeper and deeper into a millenium long ice age. Markus is concerned with only one thing, defeating the Supreme One, and setting people free from his reign.
 
This fiction is a little thought project playground I just write for fun. Warning to any new readers, it's not a typical power fantasy isekai story. Although I do plan on writing power fantasy stuff later in the fiction. I hope atleast a few of you would enjoy my writing. 
Updates every two days.

Title: Samsara Overlord
Synopsis:
All souls return to River of Resurrection. It is this river you will always end up in at the end of your journey.
The River of Resurrection has one duty, and one duty alone. To erase all of your memories and send you on to your next life-- that is depending on your Karma.
Feng Shui is back in the River of Resurrection for the second time, and why the hell does he have memories of his last two lives.

Title: Drugo's revenge
Synopsis: Scientists create a machine that is able to siphon souls from soulspace into bodies in the mortal world. They might however have underestimated the plans the soul has with its new body.

Title: Endless Freedom, Flying above the Clouds
Synopsis:
One day a young boy a saw an eagle flying.
Inspired he too wished to experience the freedom of flight.

Title: Raven Fall
Synopsis: Thief, con-artist, smuggler extraordinaire, Raven is up for any job, as long as the right amount of coin is given. Abandoned as a young child in the poor district known as Ratsgrove, the art of stealing has been her life. She steals for personal gain and only wants to expand her wealth. However, her robbing spree ended when she was finally caught and arrested. She was sentenced fifty years to the maximum security prison that is St. Marie. With numerous failed attempts to escape, Raven lost hope for freedom until a man of great wealth came to her with a proposal. “Steal what has been stolen from me and our reward will be freedom.” Raven now plays a dangerous game of prey and predator, but will the hunter win or will Raven fall?

Title: The Dungeon of Grey
Synopsis:
The world of Tandus is facing a crisis, although no one knows about it except the Gods. In order to deal with the impending crisis the Gods of Tandus decide to "borrow" 100 rather unique souls from the cycle of reincarnation, turn them into dungeons and let them loose upon the world with barely a limit or restriction for reasons (literally) only God  knows.
What could go wrong?
 
 
This is my first novel, I can't guarantee regular updates due to a busy schedule and even then I can't gurantee their quality because It's my first novel but i'll be trying my best so try to enjoy reading the trainwreck waiting to happen im writing here.

Title: Anna-Marie With Her Shotgun
Synopsis: A heads woman wants to pursue a career as a writer, but is forced to abandon the craft do to familial obligations. When she is forced to choose between betraying her father's trust quitting her job, and pursuing a life of blood shed and tears executing the innocent, it takes all she has to not give into her basest desires.

Title: In the Sun's Light
Synopsis: This is for the Royalroad anniversary contest.

Title: Re:Dive
Synopsis: A short oneshot for RRL's anniversery contest!

Title: "Without You". Reincarnated as a Troll Alternative. 2018' NaNoWriMo
Synopsis:
Having reincarnated in a post-apocalyptic medieval world, an unlucky Earth teenager finds himself in the body of a Troll. Hiding in a poisonous meadow, he is attacked by adventurers hired to slay him.
After winning by a paper-thin margin he succumbs to his troll instincts and commits taboo. By doing that he receives a special ability and the universe splits into two parallel realities.
In one of them he treads a path that takes him closer to the light and his former human side.
But that is another story.
What if the ability he received was one that pushed him further away from what is human?

Title: The Twin Lands
Synopsis:
Join our heroine Enru on her journey in a world where humanity lives in perpetual light and warm while their enemies, the spider beings called Araxin, live in perpetual darkness and cold. Just because they live in the darkness and cold though doesn’t mean the Araxin want to stay there forever however, and this time their bid for the Southern half of the continent looks to be shaping up worse for humanity than ever before. Every ten years the planet nears its second sun in such a way that the Northern half of the continent warms and thaws and the Araxin enter a period of explosive growth, before always attempting to assault the humans in the South. Through events that you will need to read and discover yourself, sixteen year old Enru ends up vital to the survival of humanity, but can she succeed? In a world full of humans, dragons, giant intelligent spiders, trogs, behemoths lurking in the deep, magic, politics (can’t forget the politics) and more, what wonders await you? 
NOTE: This is my very first attempt at writing ever. Not just my first attempt I am showing people or my first attempt that went anywhere, but my first of any kind. I welcome constructive critisism and I know my grammar is not always the best. If something is majorly bothering you please leave a good comment or review on it rather than just a 0.5 rating and saying I suck. 
NOTE2: The main character will be gaining power that is, if used correctly, well above the standard for her race however I plan to implement it in such a way that she does not end up being crazy over powered and able to end every fight at her whim. She will struggle, she will lose sometimes and there will be loss along her journey to save her race. There will be no harem and I am unsure if there will be any sex scenes or even romance as this is my first story and I am not confident yet at being able to write that properly. So if you came here for the standard royalroad super OP guy that flies around having sex with every female character he meets, this is not that. 
Update Frequency: As this is my first story and I am still in the early stages, I cannot say how often updates will be. I lead a very busy life and this is a new way for me to relieve stress. I hope to be able to put out a few thousand words every few days at the least. 
Enjoy the story!
 
PS. Cover was found on the website thedailybell.com, they did not source where they found it. I rotated and resized the image.

Title: Young Winston's Birthday
Synopsis:
Short Story
I wrote this for Royal Road's 5th anniversary contest in October of 2018 (closing on Halloween).  I didn't hear about the contest until a day before it was due, so I wrote this in a bit of a rush.  The rules stipulated "themes of rebirth, celebration or fantasy", and had a limited or 750 words.

Title: A Shadow on Your Heart
Synopsis: A girl finds herself in a strange and unfamiliar land. She must find out how to get home, with only her shadow to keep her company.

Title: The Vessel of Crystalline Valley
Synopsis: A thirteen-year-old girl's destiny is to become a vessel for the Goddess of her village.

Title: The Magic Show
Synopsis:
A small surprise at a mundane magic show.
This is my submission for the 5th anniversary.
Feel free to leave any comments/suggestions etc. I'd be very happy to hear them!

Title: Constant combat
Synopsis:
Constant combat, that is David's life.
Every hour a new wave of enemies come to attack him, and each wave they get stronger, faster, and more numerous.
 
But there is hope, for every opponent he kills he gets points to spend in a shop.
 
He can buy weapons, magic powers, and many more assets at the shop to increase his odds of survival.
 
However, can David survive thousands of foes, with no rest no less?
_____________________________________________________________________________________________
If anyone wants to make a cover for this PM me, thanks!

Title: Returning
Synopsis: I just wrote this to win. But I kept writing this description until they allowed me to press submit. it took a while...

Title: Nathan's Birthday
Synopsis: Submission for the Fifth Anniversary short story contest.

Title: Apoch's Twilight
Synopsis:
"Reincarnated Into My Half-Finished Isekai VRMMO Tabletop RPG"
Once upon a time, there was a boy named Bull. Bull fancied himself something of a writer and game designer, and had half-created a homebrew roleplaying game for himself and some friends called Apoch’s Twilight. It was a perpetual work-in-progress, as Bull only wrote enough to fill in whatever gaps he needed to run the game for his friends.
Then one day, Bull was hit by a truck. Bull should have looked both ways before crossing the street.
Bull wakes up at a character creation screen, with an AI prompting him to create a character. The name of the game he’s creating a character for?  Apoch’s Twilight.
Say what?

I plan to update weekly, give or take, while staying a couple chapters ahead for my Patrons. Thanks for reading!
                                                                  -- Bull

Title: Mindcage: Descent to Tazahari
Synopsis:
The Atonement Program has finally commenced for Zeth, but his expectations of arriving into zenland — to meditate and hum with the birds and supposedly influence positive neuraplasticity and long lasting behavioral fixes — does not happen. He instead finds his sentience logging into a world and a game of the same name — Tazahari.
Most BIGs (‘Beyondly’ Immersive Games) have been quashed by Ambrose — the head capital and the center of Liberta’s political power — decades ago for the united territories’ endeavor towards utopia. Tazahari is just a game; not revealing it’s existence and advertising it dubiously as a rehab program is overkill.
More so when the welcoming party at Zeth and his fellow attonees’ arrival starts chasing them down and prepping them up for what he overhears as a procedure called ‘harvesting’.
Will he even be able to sign-up for the adventure, expectantly grind creatures, and fulfill quests. The grim end looks clear to him even before he's even started.

Title: Purrge
Synopsis:
Norsk Battleground, near Ciara Citadel, in Eisenhiem kingdom is the Last bastion of hope for the people of the Upperworld, as they fight against the invading demon forces from the Underworld with their hopes and lives on the line. Brave people, one by one sacrifice themselves to protect their loved ones.
The rallying cry made by the Allied Armed Forces commander,  the ruler of the Eisenhiem Kingdom, King Nobius made the people to struggle, not give up on hope and to fight back the demons… But with the dwindling resources of the Allied Armed Forces and the appearance of the Demon King Zamareous himself on the battlefield, the whole army came up to the brink of collapse, the king out of desperation then agreed to follow the ‘backup’ plan made by the head mage, which was to summon a Elder dragon on the battlefield to slay the demon king…
But something happened during the summoning...
*Grrr...oooeeaw*
And someone unexpected got summoned instead of an Elder dragon!
Will the people of this world survive after the failure of this ‘Backup’ plan?

Title: Guardian Sphinx
Synopsis:
Submission for RRL 5th Anniversary
Happy Anniversary RRL.
This is just a submission for the contest this is it for now and there might not be anymore.

Title: Unbridled: A Pathless Journey, A Hopeless Future
Synopsis:
Journal Entery 241 
Name: Marc Date: September 14th, 6
I'm running out of things to write in this fucking journal. Same shit happens everday here, we get up in the morning, train all day long and go to sleep. Its gotten even worse since Maxville stopped radioing in. Felix is working us to the fucking bone for no reason. I get that we have to be prepared for anything, but fuck this. I'm level 41. No one here is even level 30. If he really wanted us to get stronger we'd be out there fighting those fucks instead of hiding in this fort all day. Half the people here have never even seen the Rakeil. Felix defintely won't listen to any kind of reason though. Fuck probably thinks sticking his head in his ass will make all our problems go away.
Shits gonna hit the fan real soon. If only I could convince Sunny to leave with me. 

The Unbridled series is a collection of stories written by ManeReader that feature LitRPG elements. They are not connected to each other in any other way unless otherwise stated.  
Artwork owned by djari328

Title: Stone Of The Covenant ( Dungeon Story )
Synopsis:
This man, is the last of his kind.His world succumbed, the last glimmers of a brilliant martial civilization faded as he fled.He arrives in the magical world of Futhark, in the form of a dungeon heart.Confused, he must adapt to a new way of life using only his mind and knowledge of cultivation.In the uplands in which he takes refuge, the wind of change rises ..

Hello everyone, this is my first book and I am very happy to write it.The story is largely planned, with regard to the first narrative arcs and the conclusion at least.If you have any remarks on grammar I take them all, English is not my first language

Title: The Last Utopia: A Fantasy Dystopia Story
Synopsis:
On his 18th birthday, Brayden is tested for his magic powers, like all young adults in the utopian city of Astralis. Yet his dreams of a glorious future are crushed once he turns out to be normal... ordinary.
However, his hidden talents manifest only days later. As he explores his newfound powers and the city itself, he pulls away the curtain to uncover the city's true, horrific nature, as well as his own future.

Buy the full novel here: https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B082RC6G9W

You can also support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/hermitscave

Title: Alterea: The JoaT
Synopsis:
An average teenager is randomly transported into another world by the whims of a god. Given no reason and no goals to go for, he was forced to start fresh in the beautiful world of Alterea. Bringing with him his averageness and (probably) wise mind, he ventures forth to a path unknown.

This fiction was solely made for my own entertainment. Expect amateur writing and mistakes, as well as an inconsistent schedule.

Title: A small adventure in the fantasy world.
Synopsis:
Akrawit was reborn in another world as a noble. 
No special innate powers, no things given by god. Just a normal, slightly nihilistic boy reborn in another world and happened to retain his memories.

Title: Where Death can not go, a pussy she shall throw
Synopsis:
A young female wizard attempts to make a familiar contract with a cat, but thing go sideways.

Title: The Goat King's Wives Online
Synopsis:
A myhtical goat king with a bunch of wives from different races...
A drunk cat girl...
A villainous father...
That's quite a lot for our hero to handle

Title: RE: Trailer Trash
Synopsis:
In the year 2045, an MRI mishap transmits Tabitha Moore's mind back into her body in the past. Now it's 1998, she's thirteen years old, and she has to confront her long, miserable lifetime of failures—and once again being trailer trash—all over again.
...Or, does she?
Volume 1 is now available for ebook, audiobook, and hardcover!
/// A re-do story, everyone's guilty pleasure. Updates every month.

Title: Twilight Kingdom Night Nation (stubbed)
Synopsis:
[Twilight Kingdom, Book 1 is available on Amazon and Audible]
[Night Nation, Book 2]
Candle Enys is no longer human. But her soul belongs to a demon and she wants it back.
 To become whole she must travel to the land of the dead, and destroy the demon before it can destroy her. 
Along the way she will make new friends, new enemies and explore the roots of her draconic heritage. This new dragon will leave behind her, a trail of destruction, cake crumbs and broken hearts (just kidding there’s no romance only death). 
A dark fantasy with progression elements.
One chapter a day until its done. I will stop at the end of book 2 to contemplate my life choices and collect my braincells.

Title: I I wish I Knew How to Delete this
Hellion- A Tale of Revenge
Synopsis: Nekiidra was never meant to be born. As the first girl child from a lineage of male demon monarchs, she was supposed to be left for dead. But she lived. And now she has a chance to compete with her brother in a deadly battle for the crown of Hell. That is, until her beloved father, King Lucien is murdered in cold blood and Nekiidra is stripped of her title to become a prisoner and servant amongst the political fallout of the underworld . But Nekiidra has a secret within, unbeknownst to her that will help her save her kingdom, her friends, and herself. This is a story of betrayals. Of family. Of truths. Of redemption. And most important of all-revenge.

Title: The Legacy of the Lords
Synopsis:
To whom one can mention
To whom one can be
From whom can we see
We hold ourselves in contention
For there is naught but condesention
To have gone so far
To know what we are
We are the Lords
And this, is our forgotten Legacy

Title: Corpse
Synopsis: An highschool student (or at least he thinks he is) regains consciousness as his rotting corpse, he was one of the 85% of humanity who was turned into zombies. He doesn't remember his name and he doesn't remember his friends or family, however he still retained basic knowledge

Title: The Vacuous Stranger
Synopsis:
It was foretold that knowledge would bring the world to ruin. Hungry for insights, fuelled by pride and strife, mages of kingdoms developed new magic everyday, their destructive power knew no bound. The prediction proved correct, but in a way no one could have foreseen. The world was wiped out by a mysterious cataclysm of pure comprehension...
 
But life continued on. Nearly a century later, the order of old long gone, the names of the lands forgotten. In this new shattered world, a pair of twins discovered a Stranger with a big iron on her hip.

 


*participant in the NaNoWriMo Royal Road challenge

Title: A Grand Theory of Everything
Synopsis:
Aruse is a land of men, magic and war. It has been shaped through the eons by a strange phenomenon known as the Tide—a storm of golden clouds and violet lightning that sweeps across the world once a month. Drawing upon the mysterious power of this golden storm, the Tidecallers emerged, people with supernatural abilities that defied the laws of nature.
They could command the wind and waves, prophesy the future and warp through space. Yet, to fuel their powers, the Tidecallers must rely on the rain that falls with the Tide, a precious liquid called God’s Blood.
For access to this scarce resource, wars are waged. The fate of nations gambled. The lives of men sacrificed. With Tidecallers and all their destructive might, battles are only bloodier—and deadlier.
Dalle finds himself caught up in one such conflict, but inadvertently discovers the truth behind the Tide and its golden clouds, and the looming disaster that it beholds for mankind.
The flames of a millennia-old war are rekindled, and he must lead humanity to survive its coming descent.

Title: Technocide
Synopsis:
For several years now, humanity has known and accepted that we would be the cause of our own extinction. Thanks to all of the effort we've put into improving weapons to kill each other since the beginning of time, there was never any other way we were going to go other than mutually assured destruction.
Long story short, some people just don't know when to stop pushing buttons, pun intended, and the world has ended in fire. Human kind finally pulled the trigger and decided that 'You know what? Living kinda sucks, lets all die real quick.'
This story follows a young man named Lucas Cob who was born a few generations later as he attempts to find himself in the new world. The world that emerged from the fire, born anew.
[Participant in the NaNoWriMo Royal Road challenge] (PaInThNaNoWriMoRoyRoaCha ?)
{Cover is not permanant nor do I own the rights to the picture, If you are the owner contact me and it is gone}

Title: The Draw Of The Unknown
Synopsis:
Mia Campbell is your average introverted loner.  Not exactly satisfied with her life doing pretty much nothing of import, she's also not that willing to break out and make a change.  Until, without any preamble or warning, she is bestowed with a cryptic system that both grants her magical powers, and also operates on the logic of a card game.  Things begin to escalate from there.
**This project is a bit of an experiment!  For any given chapter, Mia's 'decklist' will be built by the community, over on our Discord server.  If you find this amusing, and want to participate in the discussion, as well as find the complete list of cards, you will be able to find the link to the Discord server at the end of each chapter.  Discussion in the comments is also encouraged and included as well. Each chapter and/or scenario will be intentional, but the cards used will be chosen by you guys.  And the draws made will be done via actual drawing of cards during the writing process, for bonus author street cred.**

Title: So I Guess I'm a Blood Mage
Synopsis:
[participant in the NaNoWriMo Royal Road challenge]
Born to a newly crowned King and a recently geas'd Queen in a fantasy world, the protagonist must stay afloat as he balances learning magic and fulfilling the hopes and wishes of his family. 
Honestly, I didn't do any prep for this story because I wanted to just write something for once instead of world building. Bear with me as, though I will try my best not to, I fall into tropes and cliches left and right.

Title: The Sick Boy And His Adventures In Another World
Synopsis:
Ken Kazuya was a sick boy, he would always be in the hospital or at home. But his life was changed, when he was sent to a Fantasy World.
Thus began the story of a sick boy and his adventures.

Title: Not a hero
Synopsis:
A wish granting demon find himself in the hero position.
This work more like an outline for a story than an actual story.

Title: Death's End
Synopsis:
Eventually all things must end, this universe once filled with life; bright and vibrant, must die.   Space must decay.  Time must stop.  All beginnings must end but one.  In the aftermath of reality's fall Death survives, and he finds himself alone in an endless, soundless, unchanging void and so he must consign himself to this never ending fate.  But then reality stirs once more and Death finds himself lying lost and alone in a city the likes of which he has never seen, a city of brass and smoke, iron and steam. He finds himself trapped in a world of swords and sorcery, that has never before known death. Of course all things must change. 
  What is this new world, where did it come from, and where is it going; the answers lie in a past long forgotten. Now Death must defy his nature, place himself and those he cares for at stake, and revive the secrets of the past.
[participant in the NaNoWriMo Royal Road challenge]

Title: Pact with a soul of hell.
Synopsis:
A gang leader in the year 2018 is sent to hell for 10000 years. In one day a prince with no luck or talent in combat is sent in Purgatory.Will the prince accept the proposal of the soul from hell?...............................................................................the cover is not mine:https://www.artstation.com/artwork/nEVwOI'm not a native speaker.if I receive negative messages about grammar, I'll stop!

Title: LOL
Synopsis: LoL

Title: Prelude to a quest for employment
Synopsis:
Niccolo had always dreamt of becoming an adventurer and all the fame and glory that went with it. As a young noble, he spent most time lying around and drinking, but when he hadn’t been doing that, he’d been practicing his swordplay. Now, he's finally out there in the world, together with a few companions that are motivated by more mundane and duller concerns, such as escaping poverty and famine.
Set in a faux-Renaissance setting, with more heroism, snark and magic and less realism.

Title: The Groundsman
Synopsis: Meet Cuff, aspiring composer and gifted pianist, and also the twenty-four year old so desperate for work he applies to be a groundsman, completely unaware the institute for magical persons is a very literal title.

Title: Advent of the Ascended [Dropped]
Synopsis:
Randall Wesson died, but rather than ascending to the afterlife his soul had been claimed by another. Theraius, the God of Bonds, Oaths, and Contracts has laid claim to the young man's soul. And why exactly does the God of Contracts want to claim him as an Ascended, an agent infused with the power of a God?
Randall may soon find out exactly how serious giving one's word can turn out to be.
Nanowrimo project.

Title: 21st Century Charlotte
Synopsis: Charlotte Corday reincarnates into the present day in the United States, and must deal with a unique political climate of political intrigue. Betty Henrietta chokes on a peanut, and explores the world of death. Catherine the "Goose Girl" is reincarnated into the present day, falling in love with her human who is a "butterfly catcher." And other short stories of War, Humanity, and Tragedy.

Title: Reincarnated into the Naruto world with the Gamer System
Synopsis:
After pushing a mother and her child from a speeding truck's way, I died.
But then I found myself floating in the abyss.
Turns out that the Administrator of the Multiverse has accidentally caused my death.
So as compensation, I was given the Gamer System in order to live my second chance of life in another world of my choice.
Which world did I choose?
Naturally, I chose the Naruto world.
[participant in the NaNoWriMo Royal Road challenge]
Author notes: This will be my very first try at writing a novel, and I am doing this for NaNoWriMo. Any constructive criticism and reviews are hugely appreciated. Note that this will be incredibly trope-y and crap, but I am looking to improve myself.

Title: Magic God Soaring Through The Universes
Synopsis: my stupid first fanfic that ive decided to write while bored. the dude while be reincarnated as itachi (very kewl right?) and go through different anime world and act tough confidently while slapping whoever dares to try him. please give me some feedback since i know i cant write at all

Title: Cat's Shift
Synopsis:
WARNING: This story contains nothing right now. Don't read it at your own risk and come back in a couple of months or so.
 
In this story our soon-to-be Main Character is an 18-years old lazy guy that likes to read manga and watch anime. Otherwise though he‘s a normal person. Kinda. Follow him on his journey after he got summoned as a hero in another world! Or did he now?
Release schedule: I hope I‘ll get one out at least every month, seriously.
(Heh, release...)
Suggestions and Comments are appreciated.
 
Formerly titled:
I'm basically a Slave with a Far Too Nice Master! ...Kinda
but really? That name's just way too long. Also, to whoever's reading this right now and understands what I'm about to say: Sorry to break it to you but no, it doesn't mean I'm finished soon. I am however working on it. Still. And also again. Might have taken a bit of a too long break this summer, don't ask me how that happened.

Title: Doomed To Be A God
Synopsis:
Before he was born, God already had his fate decided. 
"You will become the next God!" an old man in the divine realm said.
A child with average features was born, "Eh...? Why is he so ugly? Let me help you!" the old man began to create his masterpiece. 
His looks could destroy kingdoms and make the four beauties a joke!
His power was not something mere mortals could imagine!

Title: Esper:  Search for Power
Synopsis:
Dan Martin has a good life. He's respected at his job, and enjoys his work. He is close to his family, and they love and support him. With engaging hobbies, relative financial security, and freedom to learn and pursue his interests, Dan is happy.
 
So it's not particularly welcome when he's selected by an inscrutable and seemingly omnipotent System as a test subject. The downsides: All of this is insane and by any rational analysis he's gonna die. The upsides: Super powers, a cure for a physical disability that had limited him, and above all, so very much to learn (for as long as he can avoid dying). 
 
I am very much a beginner as an author, and any feedback or suggestions on how to improve would be deeply appreciated. Chapter releases should be daily for the first two weeks and sporadic after that as I use up my buffer. Please consider this work as a rough draft subject to revision and/or retcon.  It is not only my first attempt at original story telling, but at world building and RPG style system design.  The latter has been very difficult, even drawing  on the brilliant work of many RPGs and LitRPGs for inspiration.  Thank you to any willing to give a new story and a new writer a try!

Title: An Ent-Like Existence
Synopsis:
A weak little twig is wrapped up in circumstances far beyond its control, ascending from a simple stick to something much more. Despite this twigs low starting point, it has been given the potential to grow tall. The consequences of its creation will reach further than it's future roots may spread...
 
Please leave comments and a review if you've got time, I'd love for any critisicm, hopefully constructive, you have for me.
ENJOY

Title: I Summoned You
Synopsis:
Julia wanted revenge, but she didn't imagine she'd get a demon to help her with it.
Three girls worked together to cast a ritual, and summoned a demon to grant their wishes. Whether its peace of mind, the confidence to not be bullied, or revenge, the demon is willing to please. What matters afterward is the price that has to be paid. Not only by the summoners, but by the ones who have wronged them.
---
Cover photo by Mallory Johndrow on Unsplash.com
---
[participant in the NaNoWriMo Royal Road challenge]

Title: Energy
Synopsis:
A discussion of people, monsters, and the nature of reality, all with the scenic backdrop of a litRPG and violent death.
Anthony is your average, unassuming programmer that wakes up from a dream only to find the world he knew is gone, along with much of his memory of it. He is forced to fight for his life (badly) and try to help others (unwillingly) in a desperate bid for not only his own survival, but that of humanity as a whole. 
Join me on my first expedition into writing anything longer than a book report as I ramble endlessly and attempt to cushion the whole thing with exotic adventures in a game world.

Title: Soul Construct
Synopsis:
Since the beginning of the world mortals have had souls. Each and every one of them were once made by Phoria, goddess of life, even if they, later on, were twisted, corrupted, uplifted or outright destroyed. Phoria helped each of the other major gods to create their own people with their own souls; Talmaenna made the elves, Kaenig the dwarven people and Metritz got the humans. They each had their own flavour of souls, but it was still the same basic construct.
Aphiir, a minor god of inspiration primarily worshipped by engineers in the dwarven and gnomish communities is doing something new. He's creating his own type of soul - from scratch. Not because he wants his own race or anything but because he wants to see if he can't do it better. He is a god of crafting after all and what is a soul but a very complicated, living, evolving, and unique mana construct? 
***
The story will follow the soul after it's cast onto the mortal plane and as it tries to survive there. I dunno I'm not an experienced writer but I really wanna try and actually write something... longer I guess. I'll try this stuff out during november and hope to have a few chapters out a week depending on the week and how I feel I guess ^^ 
I write pretty slow too so the chapters probably won't be long but I'll try my best to give them some meat at least ^^'

Title: On the River
Synopsis:
A rich arrogant kid dies slipping on an icecube and is reborn in the body of a video game character. Hijinks ensue.
Failed attempt at Nanowrimo. The best laid plans~

Title: Skyclad
Synopsis:
Morgan Mackenzie had a very bad day. First at work, then at home, and then her bathtub fell through a portal to another world, with her in it. Now she's stuck thousands of miles from any sort of civilization with nothing but the bathtub and a lace puffball scrubby. But she learned magic, so that's sorta nice. Now if only she could find some clothes...
Cover art by SourMonkey and Tox
DISCLAIMER: This story has multiple characters and different points of view. Morgan is the main protagonist but she does not move through an empty world. This is a bigger story than just one main character fighting the monster of the week.

Title: Prompt-Fills: April 2018
Synopsis: A collection of scenes written from prompts, featuring a blue lady and a fox.

Title: Fate of Men; Strength of Spirit
Synopsis:
Tales of Monsters sweeping through nations leaving trails of devastation and the stories of those who would stand against the tide and become hero's are as old as time. All stories must come to an end however, and all hero's must die, that is the way things must be. So the gods decreed.
Lyra has always loved listening to the stories of her father's adventures. So when her father  the hero of the Midlands is on the last years of his life. Lyra decides to take fate into her own hands and go on an adventure to prove herself and to save her father, braving dangerous wilds and horrible monsters to find the one thing that can save her father from the cold grasping hands of death. Story will be a mass collection of shorts and differing perspectives because I just want to write. Yet don't want to make 20 different stories. 
“Enter by the narrow gate. For the gate that is wide and the way that is easy leads to destruction, and those who enter by it are many."

Title: Quest for the Elysian Fields
Synopsis:
Wünder is a fifteen year old, four feet tall lad who likes nature and loves discovering vistas every now and then. Elysia is a prim and proper girl who dreams of finding her prince charming one day. They live in the village of Delossus, and live an inane life bereft of excitement, but for the stories told by Mrs. Detroit.
One day, a miner wounds up dead in the Taitanus Caves, the place where Wünder's brother works. That incident leads Elysia, Wünder and his brother to an expedition into the depths of a mountain so colossal, that it has terrified villagers and noblemen alike about the possible existence of a certain god residing in its depths.
What they find instead is nothing short of the incarnation of tyranny, and trails leading to a certain legend - the realms long forgotten, not even a remnant of lores... The Elysian Fields.

Title: Planet Plume
Synopsis:
Theodore Harp was summoned to Mistelhan, a fantasy world of swords and magic. There, he played out the role of Hero, destined to save the world from the clutches of the terrifying Demon King. He experienced more than two decades worth of blood and battle before he stumbled upon a method to return home.
The following chronicles his adventures and misadventures on Plume, a modern-day world teeming with its own set of oddities and adventures.

Title: The Dungeon Traveler
Synopsis:
I spent most of my life trying to get by with whatever happiness I could, that included alcohol, food, and porn.My death was unpleasant and humiliating. However, death is something we all need to go through. A bit like a proctology exam; necessary but never anything one wants to go through while it's happening.However, death was supposed to be the end of it. Either way, the pain, suffering, and failures were supposed to be over. I was supposed to wink out, or perhaps take a trip to a lovely afterlife!No, I ended up as a small stone, strapped to a table, while a pimple-faced teenager rubbed my facets and told me how 'lovely' I was. Last time I checked, birth wasn't supposed to be as embarrassing as death!Life as a dungeon core isn't all bad. I like watching lizard love triangles and snooping on militaristic dwarves; though there is that issue where I'm trying to free myself from the entanglements of the Gods....ok, yeah that last one is a bit of a problem.
 

Completed and available on Amazon

Title: In One Piece as Zoro
Synopsis:
What is going to happen if a man whose life is so boring died, reincarnated with a system in the world of One Piece?
__________________________
