Synopsis: *DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED**DELETED*

Title: Roguelike C@T
Synopsis: A work in progress of a story of indefinite length.

Title: The Power of Principles
Synopsis:
He was unremarkable in every way until the moment before his death, where one well meaning action turned his entire existance upside down.
Damn the 'second chance' he got. This one will be one he writes alone.
A story about transmigration into a fantasy world guided, not by a higher power, but his own resolve.
Minor gore warning. It is a mostly a light hearted story of the glorious adventures of Kane. A hero, or a perhaps just an idiot? You decide.

Title: We reincarnated as a two-headed dragon!
Synopsis:
Kyle Lewis 25 years old, business man and Amelia Evans 18 years old, high school student otaku don’t know each other.
They both died at the same time and reincarnated as a two-headed dragon.
They now share the same body and must cooperate to survive in an unknown world.

LITRPG story with levels, skills...
 
Note:
This is my first novel.
Sorry for any mistakes. English is not my native language.

Title: Animated
Synopsis: A world where powers recently awakened. Johnathan had been sleeping when the event occured, and roughly 10 percent of the globe awakened to nascent abilities, ranging from the useless and the harmful powers, to ones such as invulnerability and the ability to cause earthquakes. Johnathan, one of the lucky (or unlucky) to awaken a gift, earned the power to imbue objects with life.

Title: Deal With A Maid and A Bartender
Synopsis:
Alicia is a nervous wreck. All of her friends are either going off to college, getting married, yes, you read that right, or living off their rich parents. She on the other hand doesn't know what to do with her life. College? Eh, maybe. Getting a job? That's her best bet, as her parents are not threatening her to move out, but expect her to by the end of the month. Parental care much?
Time ticking and her parents not seeming to care, she walks into a Maid Cafe and Bar with the possible attempt to apply. The Bartender offers to hire her on the spot, under one condition. After every shift, she accompanies him home. With the thoughts of rape, murder, even some sick twisted love fantasy going through her mind, she accepts out of desperation, and perhaps, pure idiocy.
Besides, she's gauranteed $2000 a paycheck. How bad could it be?
 
All feedback is greatly appreciated.
 
*This story may become 'Reader Interactive' hence the tag*

Title: To move Heaven and Earth
Synopsis:
After being reincarnated into the world of Nerrus, a place where people can use cultivation techniques left over from an ancient race that lived there before them to absorb a form of energy known as Mana a young man discovers that he isn't the only thing that his previous world and Nerrus has in common.
What mysteries will he uncover and how far will he go to move heaven and earth?

Title: The apocalypse happened and it was named- The system’s advent
Synopsis:
The world either ended or it began when the system came online. People can now be immortal and the laws of reality are intertwined with what the people of earth know as RPG game systems. All of this and yet it is only the begining. What is in store for humanity when everything they thought was just smoke and mirrors turns out to be as real as they are and far more deadly.
One man went back in time because of an event that shouldn't be possible to a place he had forgotten. For him it was a chance at redemption for a life he is ashamed of. It was a chance to make things right with the people he couldn't face before it was too late to say sorry. A changed man will attempt to defy logic that he doesn't even realize exists. He tried to be the dashing rogue and failed, he tried for the overbearing shield bearer and was worse than useless, he tried to be the rightous paladin and not even the dark gods would accept him. The only path left was the 'weakest' of them all. 

 
Ok so alot of you probably reading this are people who have read my previous works and I can only say 'thank you for your incredible patience' so much before it gets awkward but for those you who don't know this is my third story and no I haven't dropped the other two it's just that tragedy struck when I was writing them and I haven't been able to get my motivation for them back yet so I'm trying this as essentially a jump start to get back into the fight so to speak. I'm really hopefull that I can pull this story off the way I want it to be but only time will tell so here's to hoping, now let's get this show started.

Title: Green and Black
Synopsis: After dealing with the after-effects of a break-up, Uni tries to find comfort to heal her broken heart. With Noire too busy with work she tries to find support with another goddess which she considered as a second older sister, Vert. But unknowingly to her, she starts developing romantic feelings for the older girl. How will Vert react to these feelings? Only time will tell.

Title: Eh? I am Supposed to be Dead But Now I Get a Deadline !?
Synopsis:
Normally, the protagonist will get a new power or new role when reincarnated..
But what if there is no change at all? Instead, reincarnated as yourself with less memories??
 
 
This is my first story.. Feel free to give your opinion =w=

Title: Can't I just build things in a dungeon?
Synopsis:
A Danmachi(Is it wrong to pick up girls in a dungeon?) Self-insert Fanfic
The story follows me, the author, as I mysteriously end up in the city of Orario ten years before the begining of the story. Follow me as I try to figure things out and actually enjoy my life as an adventurer. Where the story actually focuses around exploring the dungeon rather than all the problems that happen around it. Canon will be thrown to the wind and in classic self-insert fashion the insert tries to save everyone.
But this time they fail.

Title: System: Gods' Gardener
Synopsis:
Our MC, Lucas Rankin dug a Hoe.
System: You have obtained the Hoe of the gods!
He obtained a plow that makes him dig a portal to another world! The world of Hearth! A world full of dungeons to hunt for seeds. Seeds! You heard it right, obtaining seeds and planting them. The plants they grow is something different too.
"Mandrakes? They only knew how he to scream, not to bite like this guys!"
"I'm god farmer of Earth, but what am I in this world?"

Title: The Records of Eternity: The Traveller of Worlds
Synopsis:
There probably won't be anything much for Traveller for the next while as I honestly don't have much of an idea of what the hell I plan on doing. While I wait for another spark of genius for this I want to get out some chapters for my other works, which I do have an idea of where I want to go. So instead of stressing myself out over this bottleneck, I will be focusing on other stories until I breakthrough.
The Traveller of Worlds is a tale that tells the adventure of the young Saxon girl Millie Von Augustine, though she has another name. Millie is the eldest child of the Augustine family, a noble family in the Kingdom of Saxony. Although being a woman she was barred from succeeding her father as head of the family. In addition, she has been treated rather poorly by most of her family due to her tomboyish personality. But one day as a youth, she met someone in the woods behind her house, and this encounter would forever change her fate.
 
Moving this to have a new chapter at a minimum of every three weeks as I have started another project full time.
 
The cover artwork was made by Nez Illust, check their page for more their stuff.
 
You can find more information on the universe of The Records of Eternity at https://recordsofeternity.wordpress.com/
I will also be posting any updates on how things will proceed and random other thoughts pertaining to the series on my website.

Title: West And Further
Synopsis: It's been a year since half the population had been culled with the virus, what was meant to help aid the balance of the population tipped it completely. Two complete strangers try to survive, but the emotional and physical stress will be more than they anticipated.

Title: Raxil's Resurrection Book 1 : Bloodlines
Synopsis: The god Armos holds tight on the reigns of Esturata, after centuries without opposition his grasp is firm. The banished and forsaken gods stir, slipping tendrils of power through into the material plane. Dragged into a world of monsters, magic, and steel, Raxil fights for survival.This is what happens when you find a seasoned RPG gamer who has wrecked it in hundreds of games,Has a natural penchant for violence, a discontent with his day to day mundane existance. Sprinkle some comedy and sexual content ontop, pour in a little gore, a splash divine flavoring and shake vigorously.

Title: The Wreck of the Onphanion
Synopsis: A Wizard recruits a Mermaid to help him locate a long lost shipwreck.

Title: Greyblood: Progenitor (A LitRPG Series)
Synopsis:
A Shipwreck. A Half-Orc battling for control of his mind. Things that go bump in the night. 

Fresh from the events of the Academy's end of year tournament, Half-Orc Lugor and his party are on their first official Guild assignment. Their mission? Aid in the creation of a new settlement on a recently discovered landmass.


 


Unfortunately, Lugor is finding out that nothing in life ever comes easy. Disaster strikes on arrival and there is no way to contact his mentor Maric for help. The expedition starts crumbling and Lugor must find a way to keep the new settlement from falling apart.


 


But Lugor has his own personal problems. His monster side is awakening faster than predicted, and if he doesn't become strong enough then the Orc soul inhabiting his body will seize control. With his friends by his side, Lugor is still confident that he can take on the challenges ahead of him.


 


That is, if the demonic beasts attacking every night don't kill them first.


This story includes the following:
- Half Monster MC- Game mechanics in a Fantasy world- Sword and Board MC - Crafting abilities like Enchantment and BlacksmithingUpdated every two or three days

Title: A Job for a Wendigo
Synopsis:
Long ago Wendigos settled in the cold north away from most other Beings. Their almost secretive nature often gives Beings the impression of deep spirituality. And then there is Yrsa. 
Flighty at best she lives in her deceased grandparent's RV in the middle of the desert. Taking up the job of a mail carrier she earns enough money to keep her lights on and not much else. When a fairy on her route causes her to crash it triggers a chain reaction leading up to her finding a purpose.

Title: DCO- Dungeon Core Online
Synopsis:
James hates his real life. He spends his days being bullied in school, and at home he simply reads and plays games. The only thing he has to look forward to is immersion. When he is immersed in the virtual world he can be whatever, whoever, he wants: He can escape the world that has thrown him away.
As such, when a new game, Dungeon Core Online, comes out, James is excited to play. He immerses himself as soon as he can, but when he is set to create his character he is instead offered a different choice. Now, James is the Dungeon Core and he suddenly finds himself wielding more power, with more options, than he's ever had before. The only downside... there are people in the real world who do anything, even kill, to gain the power of a Dungeon Core in the virtual world.
This is the Final Arc. The first 4 Arcs are now available as published novels. 
 
*Currently Updates Every Wednesday Starting Feb 14, 2023*

Title: Abyss: REbirth
Synopsis:
A city dies, a god grieves and a dragon is born.
A princess seeks adventures, and it finds her instead.
A thief seeks redemtion, his past pursuing him
A creeping darkness draws near, unnoticed.




Spoiler: Spoiler


Uploads will be fairly slow, as I am always tired.
I plan to upload at least once a month, but don't count on it. Just know that if there are no updates for like four months that does not mean I've dropped this, it just means I am working on it. Okay? Cheers, hopefully you'll enjoy this series.
Feel free to let me know if you spot a typo, actually please do, I have a hard time noticing them sometimes and will edit them.
 
Also, sometimes the synopsis with change to better fit changes I've made while editing the story regardless of if said change has been uploaded yet.

Title: My second chance is as Dungeon Master?
Synopsis:
One day, every human transmigrated and spread randomly from the earth into another world as games for a higher being.
When Elias suddenly wake up, he realizes that everything around him seems familiar. His master and his friends are still alive. Most importantly, he remembers everything that will happen in the following years.
He comes back to when every nightmare starts.
This time, he won't let them sacrifice themselves for him.
This time is his turn to protect them.

Title: The Calling
Synopsis:
The book:The Calling has been tolled throughout the Empire. Knowledge on the Calling is rare and the one man with answers refuses to give answers. Even what is known is shrouded by mystery and conjecture. Undeniable, however, is the upheaval the Calling will cause. 
 
Comment on Chapters if you want more to be written!

Title: Apocalyptic Trifecta
Synopsis:
S4M Protoype 0000, or Sam to his friends, is the commander of an elite team of clones, designed to be the perfect soldiers. He and his team have been trapped in an automated training facility, their neural networks perfectly replicated to move them from one body to the next in an endless cycle of training. For five hundred years.
The world above ended long ago, but the advanced technology that keeps them there has only begun to break down, giving Sam and his team a chance to escape the hellish conditions they were born into, and rejoin the world above.
The only question is: what do they find when they reach the surface?
For lovers of sci-fi and fantasy fusions, a supersoldier thrown out of time!

Title: Hybrid king
Synopsis: This is my remake of overlord volume 1 undead king made in to the hybrid king I'm only doing volume 1 this is a fanfiction about a man that is both vampire and werewolf and this from the originals as well about Klaus mikaelson that's the mc

Title: Transmigration: What Can't I Buy With Infinite Credits?
Synopsis:
Synopsis: Wesley was a young man with ambition. Growing up with no parents and nothing to his name, he vowed to succeed in life; gaining everything he’d ever wished for. Sadly, the world never worked the way you wanted it to. Just as Wesley’s business was taking off, he was gunned down in a restaurant he visited from time to time. That day, two thugs had gotten into an argument, and he just happened to be at the wrong place at the wrong time. Shortly after the ambulance arrived, Wesley had already breathed his last breath. 
 
*Welcome traveler 87671. Your trial period has ended. Choose your final method of existence.
-Transmigration 
-Reincarnation
-System Operative
 
‘’ F*ck that hurt! Got dammit man, two trials in and you're still pulling this shit? You couldn’t pull me out in a more peaceful way?’’
 
*Bro, can you pick one already? The other SO’s are watching that new rookie transmigrator, and she’s going buck wild in one of the apocalypse arcs. If I miss any of the good stuff, I’m upping the prices in your system shop. 
 
‘’Bullshit. Make me a Transmigrator, Reincarnator was the worst option out of all the positions you made me take a trial for.’’
 
*Are you sure? You’ve got quite the mouth on you so I thought you’d go for SO, and here I thought I’d gotten myself a new drinking buddy.
 
So like that, the most shameless transmigrator ever to exist made his debut.
 
Updates Schedule: Chapter a day for now.

Title: Beyond the Mask
Synopsis:
Lee Jae Hyun is a ghost singer. He is the voice behind the famous K-POP singer Kim Chun Ha. Following a successful tour, he was betrayed by his agency and died. However, he wakes up in another world. In this one, the music industry is strictly controlled, but this will not prevent him from doing everything possible to realize his dream of becoming a famous singer and touch people’ heart with his songs. However, fate seems to have other plans for him.
-----
\\!// Parental Guidance suggested due to occasional use of language, darker themes brought up and violence. The first volume is lighter but volume 2 and afterward are darker. \\!//
Chapters’ length: 1200-2000 wordsRelease date: Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday OR Sunday. (4 chapters/week)
Autor’s note: I mainly update this novel on Webnovel.com
Also, this is the first time in my life I've written, so be understanding if I'm not good at it. English isn't my first language so be kind with me. (I'm french) I accept constructive criticism. I hope you will enjoy the story and follow the adventure with me.
There will only be 4 chapters per week because I'm at school and have a life. (yes, I do) I also have to translate each of my chapters into English, which requires twice as much time on each chapter. It’s the maximum I can do for now.

Title: Xen's Chosen
Synopsis:
A young boy named Ezyk is the survivor of the massacre of his village, picked up by a wandering wizard and raised like a son, unaware of his lineage.
In his first year at the academy, those out to kill him for actions committed by his very soul will force him on a mad dash journey to save his life and unravel the conspiracy that threatens to destroy the world.100% fantasy, slightly less graphic than my others. Don't expect any stat blocks, though.

Title: Happiness System
Synopsis: I have awoken in a forest. I was confused until God texted me. Wait. GOD TEXTED ME?

Title: The Villain’s Bodyguard
Synopsis:
Meng Yin dies from a broken heart when her favorite character in a novel is killed. Waking up, she realizes that she is no longer in the same world. She is now a villain in a world of cultivation and danger.
 
*Release: 1 chapter/day - (however, I have a habit of writing more than one every once in a while)
*Picture does not belong to me.

Title: Wicked Enigma
Synopsis: During the forgotten times, human were considered the weakest race among the other 9 races. Despite being the weakest, humans prevailed for many years and even had their own kingdom. Their long years of enduring the other races' provocations pays off as a new emperor steps in the throne, the human emperor; Hitogami. One day, his Imperial Majesty himself unleashed a magic, a spell of the highest rank on the capital city if the dragon race, Zephiria, which was destroyed in an instant leaving nothing but a huge crater and ashes. The war ended one-sidedly with the humans glorious. This left the other with only fear towards this hairless monkey who destroyed the strongest race sole city. The Emperor took this opportunity and kicked the other race from the face of the earth to live in a mirror world while the remaining dragon race were exiled to their own realm. Only the fairies remains with the human in the real world. Years have passed and the humans have forgotten the war between the race and fought amongst themselves. The fairies can only witness the destructive magic being released again on two human city, Nagasaki and Hiroshima, whispering to themselves; "the next great race war is coming..."

Title: Coming of Aige
Synopsis: When four teenagers come into possession of the worlds first artificial intelligence, life get's complicated. Mouse is told that his father is dead- the victim of a tragic accident-but that doesn't jive with AI-63's recount of his recent escape from The System, nor the strange logs Mouse uncovers after hacking into Sieve Co's still compromised network. Follow this band of kids, some too smart, some to brave, and all too dependable for their own good as they go up against the behemoth of a corporation that fears the very tools it sets out to create.

Title: GAME HUNTER
Synopsis: He always loved reading about dark fantasy books, and epic movies with all there killing and gore he always thought that been born in a powerful family and in a different race was exciting. So he wished for that, and he wrote about it, and finally, after his death, he had his wish granted.

Title: The Female Perspective
Synopsis:
Aidan’s game review YouTube channel and affiliated blog were never going to be the biggest things on the Internet, but if you were a fan of MMORG or RPG gaming, you’d certainly have heard of it. His combination of knowledge of gameplay, the lore and (sort of) the technology behind it were nothing special. But the snark he brought to the table? That had won him a following. Not enough of a following for him to ever quit his job at the customer service desk of a payroll processing firm, but, eh, everybody needs a hobby.
And, oh, how these reviews irritated Game Devs. Elana Bancroft in particular. But astute business woman she was, she knew she needed his input for her next project, a revolutionary immersive MMORG, codenamed Wellspring, supervised and chaperoned by an AI developed by her father, the neuroscientist Peter Bancroft. She’d learn a few things. Oh, and definitely teach the guy a few. And daddy’s Data Algorithhm Virtual Immersive System (DAVIS) would help her. And while she was at it, her best friend Maribel. Sweet girl, but boy did she need some steel in her spine.
Everything was going swimmingly. Until DAVIS decided to get a few ideas of its own.
This work is likely best categorized as GameLit, with elements of LitRPG and traditional High Fantasy. Sexual content will exist by reference, but I plan on writing nothing explicit. Virtual genderbending will likely be the most risque element. Violence and virtual death will also obviously be involved in this work, but at no point should this element rise to the graphic or the gruesome. I hope to tell a reasonably believable story with humorous elements that an intelligent thirteen year old could enjoy. And that a parent could let them read with few misgivings.
The Female Perspective is being written as my entry for NaNoWriMo 2018. I can offer no guarantees as to when or how often update chapters will be posted; in fact do not be surprised if a week of silence is followed by a flurry of activity. And as a NaNoWriMo entry, please note that niceties of grammar, spelling and plot may at times be sacrificed on the Altar of Expedience, as in getting to fifty thousand words by November 30. I intend to post this work on both Wattpad and Royal Road and see what I see.
Finally, given that my knowledge of photoshop and affiliated products is close to nil, if anyone is interested in creating a cover for this work and I am more than willing to look it over, and if I decide to use it, to give credit for said cover here. In the unlikely event I were I going to commission a cover it would be Aidan, Elana, Maribel, Brian and Wolfgang standing next to each other staring into a pool of water, with Svanura, Brandagas, The Oracle, Volvara, and Balan reflected back. Not useful to any budding artist as a reference until the work is complete, but there you have it.
Needless to say, this work should be considered a DRAFT as it is posted.

Title: Realm of Noria [LitRPG series. Book 1. The Birth]
Synopsis:
For those who hunt for the best gems of the LitRPG genre. An impossible to miss new explosive release sure to catch the eye of all the fans of Sword Art Online and Log Horizon!  The Fate has to lead you to a stone dead! The body languishes in the captivity of the regeneration capsule; the mind is connected to the virtual game of the new generation. Well, you could take it, but a strange system error has deprived you of the connection with reality and outside help. Now for NPCs you are one of them, and for the players you are one of NPCs. There is the only chance to recover your body, crippled by the catastrophe. It is to survive in this superfluously cruel world! To survive here--you need to become stronger. But who could make you stronger but the 'Shadows', the most famous assassin guild in Noria? 'The Birth' is the first book by Paul Kite (real name - Pavel Korshunov) - one of the most popular Russian LitRPG series 'Realm of Noria'. Paul Kite is one of the top-rated of the new wave gamelit-author. He has created the story of Kraven, a person who accidentally became a captive of the virtual world and fought not only for his freedom, but also for his life.
The whole book is available on Amazon. Welcome! It's Kindle available!
https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B07L43CBC9

Title: Winter Dragon's Egg ( Hiatus - Rewrite )
Synopsis:
Unnamed World with Five Big Continents with each Continental Dragons slumbering beneath the earth.
The Vast Desert of Shahar of the Southern Continent.
The Rainforest and Swamps of Western Continent.
The Untamable Forest of the Eastern Continent.
The Habitable Central Continent.
And The Freezing Tundra of the Northern Continent.
~~~~~~======------=====~~~~~~
Find out and read more~
Note: and PS: my first time to write a story, so the base is still being literally made from the scratch. So forgive me if things doesn't make any sense.

Title: Absurd Mage in Another World
Synopsis:
Warning: [This Novel Does not take itself seriously. Some times it will. But this is for Laughs, so have fun.]
Michael lived his live with the [Dodge Everything] curse. Then God removed it for just a second causing his death. Now he is a Black Mage in another world and Earth. Using his comical behavior, smarts, and magic he will live his life.
Here's part of chapter 1
Hi, my name is Michael and I dodged everything in my life. The cops, the FBI, also when I dropped the soap, my harem too, which COULD HAVE HAPPENED. But sadly I dodged that incidentally too. But there was one thing that I couldn't dodge. That was Truck-kun. Yea the guy who reincarnates all those main characters in the light novels, yea that guy. But ya know, what maybe Truck-kun is a female, can't assume gender. If so, then Truck-chan is without a doubt a yandere. Whelp I got raped by that yandere Truck-chan you could say. Damn, my life ended by a yandere Truck. "WHAT THE FUCK, WHY COULDN'T I DODGE!!!" shouted Michael into the white nothingness.

Title: A Dragon's Lair
Synopsis:
This story follows the story of a vengeful Gold dragon Natherion and how he deals with tragedy and love, Unlike many monstrous stories this character will stay in his dragon form and if he turns into a smaller creature it will be the exception not the rule.
I will mostly be using D&D fluff for how dragons "work" and if will not be going into major exposition mode to explain every minute detail i will assume that you know much of what a dragon is and how they function.
We will be doing kingdom building, Epic duels in the sky, Massive piles of gold all the good stuff and yes even romance if our protagonist can find a loving partner.
(tough no lewd, writing dragon sex, is as weird to me at writing lewd about dogs fucking so no i'm good thanks)
18+

Title: A World to Keep Smiling for
Synopsis: A World to Keep Smiling for is a novel about fifteen-year-old Zorome, a teenager with a world of confusion. Zorome is cursed with what she calls "The Infinite Binding". This is made up of infinitely confusing situations, including that of what she calls mind transfer. This novel specifically involves a tale of her life.

Title: Door to Nowhere (On hold for a remake)
Synopsis:
The Door to Nowhere is a Contemporary Fantasy novel about an Art Student named Daniel who finds himself drawn to the world of Nowhere a world both exotic yet strangely nostalgic.  In his first trip to Nowhere, he narrowly escapes death and ends up back safe in his world, with the help of a fairy named Rosary. But he finds that something about this strange world calls to him and he goes back taking with him, Rosary and Emma. He goes there to try to take back the memories that are missing of this world, but his presence also attracts both friendly fairytale-like creatures and not so friendly malevolent monsters. Is the value of what he desires worth all that he could lose?
 
 (Note: R18+ This is the work of a very inexperienced author with a full-time job. Please expect an erratic release schedule.)

Title: Silverestia Chronicles
Synopsis:
Silverestia, a once amazing kingdom is under threat by the evil kingdom of Sheedhied. James Noah Smith decides to take matters into his own hands and stop evil and injustice once and for all. But James Noah Smith is not everything he makes himself up to be, and the path to victory is filled with wild twists and unimaginable horrors. He may have to learn a thing or two or even three if he truly wants to save his kingdom and be able to tell his tale back in his village.
This is his diary. Hear what he has witnessed and experienced first-hand.
Or maybe not.

Title: Cruciator: The Celestial War
Synopsis: When Senior Drama student Amaranth Graves embarks on a Class Vacation to Spain, the boy arrives in the land of the conquerors expecting to spend a summer sunbathing, visiting museums or frequenting discotheques. However, his vacations take an unexpected turn when he's attacked by a band of thieves and then, a platoon of gargantuan frost giants. Saved by three girls he never expected met during his first few hours in his mother's homeland, he unseals the past of his legendary predecessors and accepts his true calling as a Cruciator: the sworn successor of a legendary hero, and pledges to find out why the thieves wanted the weapon, the fabled sword Tizona, and intends to get to the sinister plot brewing in the horizon. Aided by three selfless female Cruciators and the famous goddess Artemis, will he be able to succeed in uncovering the conspiracy that had been set in motion nearly 800 hundred years ago? Or will Cruciatorkind succumb to the machinations of this infernal actor?

Title: An Extra-Ordinary Story about Ordinary People
Synopsis:
In a different world, a different reality, where ordinary people occasionaly have extra-ordinary powers for no particular reason, we follow a number of characters, trying their best to live in this strange yet normal world. We have our first character, a currently nameless but sentinent creature who happened to find himself in the body of a strange fungus after an unknown incident that robbed him of not only his former body but of his memory, as well. Secondly, we follow Smith, a high-standing man who doesn't even need to explain which Smith he is, on top of the world, yet human enough to meet said fungus. And thirdly, we have another nameless character, who is burdened by the ability to summon things that he doesn't want. A charming gang, who will (most likely) meet at some point. 
 
---
 
All and all, it's a twist on the common super-hero world, where all super-heroes have somehow dissappeared, but not the possibility for new ones. The series that feature the mushroom-dude are the 123 ones, the stories that feature Smith are the ABC ones, and the ones that feature our newest character, the summoner-dude, are the abc ones. Neat, huh?
Also, just a word of warning? The 123 ones are kind wierd, and you can skip the first few chapters and go straight to the ABC ones without missing too much. But I'd rather you didn't, since i really enjoyed writing them. In ABC and abc, the format changes to a more typical form, with proper grammar and stuff. So if you dont like the 123, I'd love it if you gave the ABC a chance :^)
Anyhow, I hope you enjoy it!

Title: A Bit of Everything
Synopsis: A collection of short stories/ poems made by me. Updates are sporadic.

Title: The Mastery System
Synopsis:
This is the story of Sam Underwood, a teenage boy from New Jersey. Through a series of strange events, he arrives in a different world with different rules. Sam must not only survive but also thrive as he takes on unique challenges. Join Sam as he learns and grows using the Mastery System.
#Author Note
First novel. Would appreciate the support!
Feedback and constructive criticism welcome.
Release schedule: Once a week.
Enjoy

Title: High Tides to Low Clouds (ft. Miss Catherine)
Synopsis:
A collection of short stories with differing topics and subject matter, set in a contemporary world with the usual here and the much stranger there. Each story is loaded with their own personality and tale to tell where. Between the highest tides to the lowest clouds, you never know what to expect from the next.
 You will also follow Miss Catherine, a bartender working at a bar known as "The First Base". What will she deal with?

Title: Gods Wish In Disguise
Synopsis:
Ryan, our protagonist wishes to skip detention and watch anime instead. 
He suddenly engulfs in a white room, and in the next moment, he was back home, watching anime.
How did his wish come true and why?
 
This is a story of our protagonist, god, enjoying himself!

Title: Little Thief Not anymore ~
Synopsis:
A girl that lives in the slums and is a thief to live. She needs to camouflage as a boy so it will be easier. She is caught quite fast in this story~But what will she do from then on?! That is what you will find if you read^^
The story is in a world that I created, It's a fantasy world, kingdoms, adventurers, etc. There is not magic, but there are monsters that sometimes appear and beast-people.
The chapters aren't long at first but its longer after some time.
It's my first work so I don't know if anyone will like it. xcDon't mind my grammar! I'm new at writing stories too, please don't mind it much as I didn't study English for that long, and I'm still studying. ;)

Title: LitRPG Zombie Apocalypse
Synopsis: Ryan a 19 year old Military Police Officer and his 3 comrades try to survive in the new and coming harsh world created by one claiming to be the God of Hard Work!

Title: Thousand Tales: Learning To Fly
Synopsis:
Wings, Immortality, and a War of Trolls
When aging pilot Andre nearly dies in an airplane accident, he decides it's time to upload. He has his brain removed and scanned into Thousand Tales, a game where ordinary players compete with the AIs and former humans who live inside it. He takes full advantage of his new digital life, becoming a high-flying pegasus and learning the magic of the sky. He's just in time for a strange little war. The digital world seems overly cute at first, but there's more going on than people leveling up.
Spells and transformation are easy in this world, but building a society isn't. Can Andre fight in a way that will get his virtual land taken seriously, and equip his new friends to make a difference in the world of humans?
This story is also available as a book at https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B071V9B4JX ! A complete version of this story is going to be posted here, but the Amazon edition is much longer. Want more free content instead? Try https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B01NCAER2M , a short story collection in the same world, or the preview of "Crafter's Heart" here on RR, or the version of "Crafter's Passion".

Title: Point Cultivation
Synopsis:
My thoughts become reality when I think them and when I un-think them they un-become reality!
I have become so powerful that not even alternate reality can stop me!
My name is Joe Mo and I become the best!

Title: The Girl with Scales and a Sword
Synopsis:
This is the story of a girl who ends up with scales and a sword. Yup. There you have it folks.
Slice of Life is the key intended genre. This is literally going to be a running commentary of a girls life, especially as it relates to adventure and action
This is going to be a continuous work, as I intend it to be a side project while I work on other books more decidedly, and I intend to rework chapters often, because I want this both to be a break from other titles, and a learning experience. I'm going to be trying to get a lot of people to comment on chapters so I can grow as a writer. So if you want to read, please do! and comment if you feel generous. Just keep in mind, releases will likely be veeeeery far apart.
(Note: I try to put out a chapter a month, though that doesn't always happen depending on school, work, and generally how well I'm doing, energy-wise)

Title: Building Home Book 2 - Rescue
Synopsis: After having created a small foothold in the new galaxy, Danni Jax is trying to recover the lost human military and colonists. With her team on Outpost Theta and some of the most advanced "borrowed" alien tech, she may find more than she thought possible.This story has lite LitRPG elements.

Title: Ms. CEO is His Bodyguard
Synopsis:
After a fateful encounter, the CEO of Xia Empire States, Xia Jiannan, thought that Wang Rouxi is just a normal employee working under the Wang Group of Companies. He did not know that the person he had mistaken to as a driver-bodyguard is the rightful heiress of the largest empire in the whole of China.
"Be my bodyguard. You cannot say no."

Title: The Saint-God Cultivator
Synopsis:
Exiled by the Liu clan after learning that he was an adoptive child, Lu Xun left the village where he grew up in search of the lost Ancient Dragons Relics that were left by his ancestor. 
With the memories obtained from the legacy of his Saint-God Sect, Lu Xun had sworn to avenge his sect members who were unfairly decimated.
"To unsheathe my weapon? Nah, I don't need it against weakling.""You dare to call yourself an apothecary? Let me teach you how to forge a pill.""So what if you are strong? Let's see how you deal with poison."
Author: I'm not an English native so I hope that my sentences don't seem too weird or hard to read for you guys (I hope you guys can point it out if you find any of them). This is the typical Wuxia Chinese novel that you can find on the internet.

Title: The Will of Stars (SWTOR Fan-Fiction) [Sequel]
Synopsis:
Ok, just wait.

 Haven't quit yet. This came out earlier than it should have.
 
Even Stars End. 
How much more do you need to know?
~Title --> Based off Vitiate's Speech.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A/N: First things, first, I would like to apologise. I made a terrible story, then an arguably even worse remake. Then, I quit Royal Road. So... Sorry? Uhh... Notes, below!
Yes, this is a sequel to an incomplete novel/fanfiction. One which I tried to do a remake of, but failed, not even in the spectacular way, as well... Anyway, it's been quite some time, and I stopped using Royal Road, due to the failure that the prequel of this was. (Stopped writing, cause I was so bad, :D)
Dabbled in a One Piece Fan-Fiction for a bit (and still do), which went better than this did. Also, in hindsight, 1000 words isn't long enough for a chapter. I do about now (excluding the first chapter/prologue/notes) about 3000-5000 words per chapter. Which is a good thing for this one, I guess?
I improved quite a bit, as well. Think of it as like a time skip. Not like the One Piece time skip, no, I didn't improve that much. More like the Naruto time skip, where Naruto came back from training with Jiraiya. 
Back to the point, this is a sequel which takes place four years after what I was going to write about at the end of the Corellia Planetary Arc. As I mentioned in the notes of "Eregis, Descent (I) Corellia", the Corellia Planetary Arc ending, would be very different, as it was the last Arc for the Volume.
I won't tell you what was meant to happen, as that would spoil it. 
Well, that's the end of the Synopsis. 
Final Note: This story will be taking a much more serious tone. Because, to be honest, my old story, didn't need the Content Warning Tags, except for Profanity. There will be somewhat detailed deaths, the same amount of profanity (Star Wars Profanity is weird), and as much sexual content, that I can create. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Summary: Following the events of Corellia, Shaange finds himself awaking from a four year slumber to a familiar and different Galaxy. People have changed, though not for the worse, not necessarily for the better either. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cover: Coming soon. 
Updates: Every 1-2 weeks. 
Chapter Length: 3000-5000 words. Not for the prologue, lol.
Content Warning: Profanity, Gore, Sexual Content.
Also contains mild Homosexuality. (Both Male and Female)
[You ever watch RWBY? If you do, then it's going to WhiteRose standards, but a bit more detailed and active. A bit more similar to Shounen Ai (Boys Love) and Shoujo Ai (Girls Love), I suppose.]

Title: The Banishment of the King
Synopsis:
A banished dragon. A boy. An epic tale begins.
How far can a dragon go to regain his lost respect?
The Vampires and the Werewolves are at war, and the kingdom of Sura despite being a neutral zone is increasingly becoming more supportive of the Werewolves.
Xuhn, a Suran, has always wished to see the fabled beast said to be sleeping under the Frozen Lake. When a man he saves turns out to be a vampire, and he becomes curious about the true identity of the newcomers to his village, Xuhn just might get a chance to fulfil his wish...
Note: This book is a second version of my A Dragon With Fur book

Title: Land of the Gears
Synopsis:
A story that rivals SAO in bad plot. It tries to hard to ne Nier and flops like its combat and game play aspects. Please don't nitpic on this. On a more serious not, the story is about a steampunk witch who creates an andriod.
Please read the demo and provide your feedback
 
teehee

Title: The Neko Girl And Her Handsome Prince
Synopsis:
Hitomi Kanazaki is a 17 year old girl, only she is no ordinary girl she is half cat half human a member of a race called "Catsune" Hitomi's life is a whirlwind of depression and despair, having been raised in slavery. years of being passed from person to person for use in ways that defy human decenecy has rendered Hitomi a mere shell devoid of emotion and feeling. 
After being deemed "Too much trouble than she is worth" Hitomi is tossed out onto the streets to die. Hitomi wonders the streets alone and completely numb to the world around her, simply waiting to die. 
However fate throws her a lifeline as one day she is happened upon by a mysterious man, the man takes pity on her and offers to nurse her physical and mental wounds back to health. This mysterious man is no oridinary man but a prince! 
With the help of the prince will Hitomi be able to find her place in life and in the world, or do the scars run too deep.

Title: Support
Synopsis:
A frustrated support main finds herself plunged into an apocolypse as a system descends upon the world. But to her fortune, or perhaps not, this very system was only just 'born' and needed power to boost its very first world take over. Eriasson, Deity of Healing, Protection, and Light gives it the power it needs in return for a single Harbinger to spread her word, in desperate need of new worshippers to keep her flagging religion, and herself, alive. 
Lillianne Clearwater, fortunate or not, simply wants to survive.

So, as you all have probably heard by now, the saying goes, 'If you want to read it, but can't find it, write it yourself!' So I did. Barely anyone ever writes healers. And I'm so incredibly tired of it! Sure, I like my super dps guy who trashes everyone else, but you know what? It can get incredibly repetitive. So! Here's my story about a healer.
Art by largo0407 on Artstation.

Title: My Necromancer is a Lich
Synopsis:
Necromancy. The dark, forbidden magic we all love. There isn't a man alive who doesn't love conjuring up wave after wave of Zombies, Skeletons, and other assorted dead ghoulies to send at their foes. Unfortunately for me, it seems like my life...has hit a bit of a snag. Perhaps I should call it unlife now? Regardless, I seem to now be inhabiting the body of a skeleton. Pretty cool right? Yeah, it's pretty cool. You know whats not cool? Being bound to a Necromancer who has no idea what the hell they're doing. If the giant rats the size of Pitbulls don't kill me, this idiot surely will! 
 
Cover art shamelessly stolen from google images and thrown into mspaint
Gonna try to pump out a chapter every 3 days, but ayyy you know how life is.

Title: A Book to Rule the World
Synopsis:
Welcome, Outsider, to my own little private world. I know, it's bad, it's filled with idiots and it's stupidly sexist. But it's my world, and I'm determined to shape it for the better.
We sell top quality jokes, cancer cliches and sometimes there are special offers of "Side characters with Personality" for only 999.99$. I know, it's a terrible deal because side characters don't have a personality by definition, so said every xianxia writer ever.
Anyways, expect a bunch of drama. I will tell you my story but beware, it's quite f***ed up and morally questionable.

Title: Through Might and Mind
Synopsis: The lone survivor of a now extinct family, a young man must learn to survive in a land filled with abominations of nature, political subterfuge, and a whole heap of cliches.

Title: Nihil
Synopsis:
Death is the end of a human life.
What comes after death is something only the dead would know.
Reincarnation? 
Heaven? 
Or nihil, nothing?
These are all possibilities after death.
This story is about a man who died, the world he went to and the things he did.

Title: Shatterpact
Synopsis:
Currently on Hiatus while undergoing edits/tweaks.

All Celia wanted was to make tasty sandwiches for a friend's baby shower. When her cooking endeavors summon a demon in her kitchen, Celia thinks sending him back to his home will be the end of their story and that she'll be able to return to her mundane life. Unfortunately for her, getting him out of her head isn't so easy, and she isn't as normal as either of them thought.

Title: Creator World
Synopsis: God wanted the world to be fair, give all equal chances to become strong. He left behind monoliths that we call skill creators all around the world leaving One rule.The good, The bad, The young, The old, any and all who wish to use these monoliths can Ming yu an orphan since 7 years of age doesn't remember what happened to his parents but remembers he had them, they taught him to hunt and live on his own. Two years later he decided to cultivate, no one can say he's a genius or a hard worker but he is determined to go to a cultivators academy for that he needs money.He hunts all morning and sells the food he cooks to the villagers for money.This is the adventure of Ming yu and his friends as they travel through the nine realms creating, destroying, fighting, love, hate, and destiny

Title: Rebirth Of The Coward
Synopsis: Something

Title: Bleiz
Synopsis: When the illegal testing facilities ships more than one-thousand animals, an illness breaks loose on board ship, infecting even the healthiest of animals. They tried to find a cure for cancer but got more than they ever bargained for.  Follow Bleiz, the Grey wolf. watch as he encounters an unlikely friend and embarks on a dangerous journey to try and escape the rabid animals. Is there a cure, who knows?

Title: Infinite Battles
Synopsis:
Within the myriad of mysteries of the Arch Plane, there exist a tower of immeasurable floors. It is rumored that at the very end of the tower, existed a grand and majestic door inscribed with ancient markings.
  It is said entering the door, one would find a new world. It is said that entering the door, one would obtain power beyond measures. It is said that entering the door, one would find treasures birthed alongside the Universe.
  These are but a drop within the ocean of rumors circulated throughout the millions of years. Everyone believed that their truth will never be revealed, and that the mystery will never be resolved. That is, until now.

Title: Bloody Hell
Synopsis:
Alan Maxwell has one exceptional talent. He can read peoples body language and micro expressions so well that, in many cases it's not hard for him to fake being psychic.
When a foreign agency decides that said talent would make him an exceptional spy, events quickly begin to spiral out of control. With enemies on all sides, and friends that will as soon kill each other as his enemies, Alan will have to put his skills to the test in the ultimate game of cat and mouse. ===I came up with this story in response to a question. I once asked someone why there weren't really any Yandere harems. I realize that the answer to that is 'everyone dies' but thats boring so... here we are. A story I came up with explicitly as an excuse to create a harem entirely out of obsessive psychopathic axe murderers. Or in other words -
"What happens to Bond girls when they disappear?"As a warning, there are sex scenes. Its tagged. I'll leave an authors note at the top of any chapter that has them if you'd prefer to skip it.

Title: Virus Evolution - War & Mutation
Synopsis:
When Eldritch entities and powerful worlds vie for supremacy in distant horizons. When its home planet is still in its infancy. When countless Extinction Events threaten its survival.
A small cell in the dark depths of the ocean. Can it survive and evolve?
And...for how long can it maintain its sanity?
Not everything is as it seems, and horror lurks in every corner of this distorted world.
"Veneration, adoration; despairing depredation. Felt it all in desolation; we must doubt our destination. Mounting dread as we ascend; carved regrets we can't amend."

 /!/Note that while I majored in biology, this story won't follow our theories of evolution precisely and takes some inspiration from H.P. Lovecraft and games such as Spore and Plague Inc..

Title: The Runesmith
Synopsis: A normal man decides to play an abnormal game and create a legend that will go beyond everything he ever thought he would be.

Title: Nightone
Synopsis: With the advancements of technology, mankind has been able to create a world within the virtual space, where all crimes committed have no repercussions on the person in the real world. Businesses and corporations use experimental and questionable means of security to protect their secrets and money. Nightone has become a safe haven for all one's desires and now two boys will test how much freedom can one truly have without repercussions.

Title: Area 51
Synopsis: Dylan is a janitor who works on the top secret military base Area 51. After a containment breach leaves him trapped hundred of feet underground, he must fight hostile aliens, monster, mutant abominations, with only his wit, skill and luck, oh and whatever prototype weapons he can get his hands on.

Title: Tales of Issac
Synopsis:
Time in its irresistible and ceaseless flow carries along on its flood all created things, and drowns them in the depths of obscurity, no matter if they are quite unworthy of mention, or most noteworthy and important, and thus, as the philosophers say, "it brings from the darkness all things to birth, and all things born  in the dazzling night."
But the tales of history form a stallwart bullwark against the flow of time, and to some extent slows its irresistible flow, and all things done in it, to not allow them to slip away into the abyss of oblivion.
Now, I recognized this fact. I, lithiel, the daughter of two royals,Issac and Katarina, born and raised in the dazzling night of  capital city of Nikae. As such i  was not ignorant of letters, and was well learned in Adrian, and was also not unpractised in philosophy; I Pursued the works of great philosophers  carefully, and have succesfuly enriched my mind with it. (I must let this out and it is not bragging but just statment confirming my value as a historian).
However, to resume - I intend in this writing of mine to recount the deeds done by my father so they should certainly not be lost in silence, or swept away in the current of time into the sea of forgetfulness, and I shall recount not only of his achievements and failures as an Emperor, But also the services he rendered to various Emperors before he received the sceptre.
Now I must begin my father's history at some definite point, and the best point will be that from which my narrative can be absolutely clear and based on truth....

Title: Genesis AI
Synopsis: In the year 2085 men have achieved Techonolgical perfaction with the latest models of software, technology pervided. So when a world renown scientist makes his latest invention public, at first glance everyone assumes it to be an outstanding breakthrough. The invention hes so interested in making public? A new AI model called Genesis AI designed to be as human like as possinle. Meant to take the stress of work, war and labor off of humans everyone jumps to the chance to invest in one. But for one reporter none of this seems right, as he believes that this will just lead to disastor. One day he walks down stairs to the smell of eggs and bacon cooking in his kitchen, and to his astonishment he notices an AI. A beautiful AI sent to him by the office he works for. What he or anyone else doesnt know is the great danger that have just befallen humanity as a mysterious virus attaches itself to a few of these new inhabitants of earth. The Virus Name Genesis. No one knows who created the virus or why, but they may have doomed humanities future. And they are all powerles to stop it. Humanitys only hope my be A journelist and his AI.

Title: The Reborn Runesmith
Synopsis:
We have all read stories about the reincarnated or portaled earthling going to the fantasy world and gaining a cheat and super abilities. This isn't one of those. The hero or villian here is just a smart guy who only gets to choose a few things like what he is and then given the ability to have mana. He doesn't even get to choose what kind of mana he gets it could be fire,water,air, etc. 
This world is different than ours. Gunpowder, medicines, and other things will probably not work or be availible. Who is to say that the beings of this new world will even have the same internal anatomy. These are all things our MC will have to discover. Just like our world you can be born with great genetics but if you are a lazy and undriven person nothing will come of it.
 
This is my first attempt to write. There WILL be mistakes. I am a mathmatician not an english major so be prepared for questionable grammer and spellings. One of these days if I enjoy doing this I will get me an editor who did english instead of math and science.

Title: Roalacia: FateBreaker
Synopsis:
“Listen properly goddess since you're asking for a synopsis, here I go...”
Witness the epic fantasy journey of Roa, the former ruler of Stygia who reigned for about 108 years and ultimately stepped down to prevent the looming civil war of his country. For some reason, He pulled a absurd stunt of faking his death to finally disappear from the face of the world and started a new journey.
“Nah this won’t do, the synopsis is so cliche Roa. Where is the fanservice?! The harem and lewd stuff?! those are what the readers are looking for.”
Oh freaking c’mon! They will get there as they read so shut it you perverted goddess. In any case, this isn't your generic dense protagonist story. They will know my life story and how I will destroy fate and single handedly…”
...Destroy the world.
“So more lewds?!”
“NO!”
 
-----
There will be no updates for a while. I will revisit this story when I have the time and ideas.

Title: I'm clueless in another world.
Synopsis:
I, Tsukasa Tsutsukakushi is your average, everyday seventeen-year-old high schooler. However, my simple life is suddenly turned upside down when I'm summoned to a fantasy world!
But by whom? And why?
There's no truck, I'm still alive and kicking, there's no shining magic circle either.
It just happened.
Anyway, my favourite manga hasn't finished yet and there's a remake for my favourite game, so I guess I should search a way back.
I mean, just how hard that will be, I'll possess some unique ability, right...?

Title: The Void Wars: Episode 1
Synopsis: Zeke's eye's slowly flickered to life. He had been passed out, who knows for how long? As he tried to regain his senses, he notices there issues with his vision, what looked like an icon you would see on a computers desktop was there floating right within his reach. Was he suffering a concussion or hallucinating? With the way his head, he felt as if it was both... That was when he heard the screams coming from outside his window. The screams catch his attention, and what does he see when he looks out? Zombies, and death. Zeke has woken up to the end of the world and thrust right into the middle of a survival game he is not prepared for and a system that seems bent on killing him at every turn. Nothing to look forward but the despair in this world, will have have what it takes to survive.

Title: This Troublesome Adventure
Synopsis:
In a fantasy world, recieving knowledge from 'our world: Earth' is normally an overpowered feeling.
But what if the knowledge is used differently? Does it always have to be things that tip the balance of the world?
A being stumbles upon this knowledge through chance and now how will they use the knowledge?
Probably for fun, I mean I would.
 
~*~
A story about odd characters/friends joining together on an adventure while solving problems in unique manners, instead of bruteforcing everything with magic... or do they?
Focusing on adventure, comedy, witty-ness and having some fun in general.

Title: The Gods Battle Royale
Synopsis:
Being a God doesn’t really mean much anymore, the Gods spent most of their day’s people watching on Earth.  Humanity doesn’t even believe we exist.  The strongest God that rules them all Zeus has forbidden interaction with Earth and just setting foot on the planet would cause great punishment for all Gods, this law happened after the Cuban Missile Crisis stirred by no other than Loki.  Zeus decreed that one more mishap would cause banishment and loss of power.
Of course they didn’t listen… 
 
I don't own the picture of the cover, it's from Age of Mythology.

Title: The Forgotten
Synopsis: What if someone close to you was erased from existence and you were the only person with a memory of them? That is the question brought before Psychiatrist William Branton by two separate patients of his. Each have eerily similar stories and are plagued by strange phobias. Is there any truth to what they say or are their stories best forgotten?

Title: The Nomads of Sol
Synopsis:
Part One: The Fall of Humanity
It was the beginning of a new age, after a century of constant war, mankind was finally at peace. Her colonies united under Earth’s military dominion, piracy was virtually extinct and the economy was thriving. Then mankind made its first encounter with an alien race, the Cathamari. First contact was a disaster, and three months later humanity was at war with an alien race. Two years have passed since then, and humanity is losing the war. Her colonies destroyed and most of her fleets gone, her last bastion is Earth itself. But hope is not lost as humanity is on the verge of completing her first ftl capable starships.
With these new ships will Humanity conquer the stars and beat back her enemies or is she doomed to fail and be a mere footnote in galactic history?
 
 
Part Two Rebirth Synopsis:
Over seventy years have passed since the Battle for Earth. The years since than have hardened the survivors into a resourceful people. Now with only a single small fleet at their disposal, they search the far reaches of space for a new homeland from which to rebuild their civilization and prepare for their eventual return to Earth. However will their resourcefulness be enough when they come face to face with their greatest foe, a menace so alien, that no one but themselves understand their motives? Or will they be destroyed, by an enemy far more powerful than themselves?

Title: THIS IS DEAD!
Synopsis: LOLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL THS IS DEAD!

Title: Depth
Synopsis:
On the night that the walls separating a universe from the tides of magic broke down nothing would remain untouched. Many were broken immediately. The rapid influx of magic something life had ill prepared them for. On the heel of that same tide came an interface. Different for every being, the interface was a tool to organize the chaos wrought by the newfound burgeoning power that swept the universe. Most had a chance to come to grips with their new reality as they began their lives in this new world. Some unfortunately did not get such a chance. This is the story of Varla. A women who begins her journey in this new world approximately 3.2 million years late. Join her as she awakes in this new world confused and alone. Will she survive? Will she ever discover that the world she lived in was 3.2 million years ago? Not much of that world remains after all, and this new one is dangerous indeed.
Note:
This is my first time writing, and to tell you the truth I'll probably be kinda dense with alot of the stuff, so don't hesitate to throw some smack downs. I'm hoping that will let me learn faster. Also I like ideas. Throw them out, seriously! I'm always looking at popular media, Star Wars being a prime example and lamenting on the missed opportunities and shallow world building. Here is my chance to see how hard it actually is.
Thanks for reading and I hope you enjoy!

Title: Heoltor
Synopsis:
Rodger Odastovic died. He was sure of that fact. But somehow he found himself summoned to another world and woke up with an intact body. But something had gone wrong during the summoning and both he and his fellow summoned felt that something was off...
 
Updates are sporadic, but the story will continue. This story will not end before a satisfying conclusion.

Title: A path of no return
Synopsis:
A new beginning, a new life.
What awaits our main character is a treacherous life.

Title: The Thaumatist Incident
Synopsis:
The towers fell over a century ago, and the Good King united the land. Under his voice the Thaumatists took the knee or took the sword. The University still stands, but for how long? 
This story is broken up into two parts.  Chronologically, the two parts overlap.

Part One
Emile, a girl with a Talent not seen since the good king's war as she tries to find help to save her beloved father from a cruel accident.
Julie, raised in a small farming village on her quest to become someone people will sing about.

 
Part Two
Wendel, a recent graduate of the University, an intense school that functions first as a police force to control the use of magic and secondly as an educational institution.
Demetrius, a servant at the school who loses his home and his safety.
 

Edits are ongoing.  Reviews and comments will only help the editing the process, and I am grateful for any and all input.

So, if you have been reading already, Jericho has been removed.  It's been brought to my attention that his chapters detract from the flow of the narrative.  They still exist, and are still going to be made available at some point in some way shape or form, but for the time being what happens with him and the king in Puissant city will be off camera so to speak.

As well as repeatedly search online for for how-to videos and information. I mean seriously how do people do this crap in movies and tv shows? Oh god that’s not supposed to be on fire. Shit. Title: Small Medium
Synopsis:
Chase Berrymore dreams of adventure, excitement, and getting the heck out of her pastoral halven village.But when adventure finds her, she'll be scrambling to save everyone of her family and friends from a decades-old conspiracy. Outmatched in almost every way, she'll have to use her wits, charisma, and a bit of divine favor to figure out the path to victory. But the odds are bad, and even with an Oracle's foresight, she can't save everyone. 
Even worse, she'll have to figure out ways to deal with the weird and nigh-immortal beings that call themselves "playas..."A litrpg romp with a very non-standard protagonist, set in the same world as the "Threadbare" books.
CLAIMER: My name is Andrew Seiple. I am a writer, and I both write this story and own the rights to it.
I will be posting this story on Spacebattles.com, SufficientVelocity.com, RoyalRoad.com, and my Patreon. I reserve the right to remove it from any and all platforms as needed to facilitate my sinister long-term plans. 
 
Cover art created by Amelia Parris, licensed per agreement.
 
UPDATE: This story will be removed shortly, in order to facilitate its release within the Amazon KDP program.

Title: The Slime Apocalypse
Synopsis: Riley is a normal, abnormally smart kid who happens to be obsessed with litRPG and game screen stories. Like any angsty teen, he wishes his life was different mostly that a game system would appear. Of course, the one day that his best friend Aaron, one of the only others who share his interests, is gone is the day that his wish comes true. With the advent of the end of the world, Riley must fight his way through hoards of slimes to get his best friend, to survive, and to learn about his class "The Ritual Mage".

Title: All Things Aside
Synopsis: A 18-year-old Teddy Boy, James Anderson, become a pupil of the Whitwood Institute after the death of his mother, obliged by his aunt who hopes that the strict rules of the boarding school will put him back on the right path. But James' hatred of authority only amplifies when his freedom get restricted. So he comes up with the idea of a game, a secret game that would draw him out of this new dreary life and force his new friends to break the rules of the school. The Big Hunt.  But soon, intoxicated by the wind of freedom that the game gives them, the Hunt becomes powerful, violent, unstopable. This is no longer a game. It's their life.

Title: Pint-Sized Prompt-Fills: December 2017
Synopsis: An anthology of super short scenes involving magical aliens and suspicious dragonflies.

Title: Spybreaker
Synopsis:
Wilhelm Necker boards a train headed to Paris from Berlin believing that by departing he can escape the all too heavy burden of the past. As a Colonel in Nazi Germany's Abwehr, Necker's debt to history is great: that he survived both the liquidation of the espionage agency and the Nazi terror is no small testament to his intelligence and his luck. Boarding the train amidst the October fog and billowing exhaust his departure promises to him a brighter future under foreign suns.
The past, unfortunately, refuses to be disposed and on the second day he meets a man carrying the same debt as he and a warning that they're being followed; that, far from escaping, they have fallen into the trap of a service legend in the Abwehr responsible for uncovering and destroying the lives of many a spy, a person known as the Spybreaker.

Title: The Forbidden Class
Synopsis:
Hatred. Lust. Power.
There are many reasons why the Forbidden Classes are chosen. For Katai, a young village Guard, the reason was simple.
Vengeance.

Schedule
I’ve not been able to write for quite some time now, so while I’m getting back into things the schedule will be nonexistent.

Story details
LitRPG - expect classes and skills and magic. Not a lot of stats/number-crunching though. There is slavery featured in this story, which a lot of people have been upset about. So here’s your fair warning.
Skill levels and progression inspired by Azarinth Healer. 
Let me know what you think, and feel free to give me some constructive criticism. Please be nice about it though!

Title: Cosmology
Synopsis:
As the name imply, my own take on the creation of the universe and the gods from the greek mythology.

Title: The Time Mage
Synopsis:
Kason Vale has lived in Selmore village all his life. Brought up in the shadows of the Blackwood, he has never seen much magic and is woefully lacking in knowledge of life outside the village. But that all changes when he begins his journey to Constantine's 4th College for the Arcane Arts, one of the most prestigious centres for magical learning in the country, where he himself is to learn the mystic arts!
What awaits Kason?
He doesn't know.
And as long as he gets to learn magic, he doesn't really care either.

Title: Felion
Synopsis:
We are not amused. Our eminent presence should be the envied focal point of high society. Our physique, a poet's muse, a paragon of sinuous grace merged with might, and of course, our allure, drawing the finest of lionkin to become our Pride. The capable young things should be content to groom our mane for hours on end. Such is the ministrations deserving of the greatest of a royal line. King of lionkin, the second to take the vaunted name of Kagrowr.
This indignity we have been subjected to shall not go unanswered. Even if our captor were a queen amongst deities, rather then the dregs of their ilk, our ire shall burn through nine thousand lives till it has been avenged. We shall not forever be bound to this parody of our flesh, and when we are unleashed, our...
"Fluffy!! Come down from there! If you don't Felix will get your treat!!"
...excuse us...our few remaining luxuries must be championed.

Title: A Bloody Game
Synopsis:
Eric Hunter, a boy who took a gamble with his life on the line, soon finds out that the pay off took a very different direction that he thought. Having just awoken from a pre-op only to find himself confused and all alone in a changed world and a hospital consumed by chaos he must do all he can to survive. In a new world where society crumbles and laws are merely pretty words on written paper, how will a boy who has been restricted his whole life live now that there is nothing to hold him back? When everything turns into a zero sum game of dog eat dog, they'll find that The Hunter is an all too willing participant, but he will soon find out that he isn't the only player of this game.
 
 
First story I'm posting and I don't really have a cool synopsis, sorry everyone, but this story is just another LitRPG apocalypse. I guess the only difference is that the main character isn't a hero. He's not here to save the world, he's not here to make friends, and he's definitely not here to save everyone. He's probably what the villains in other similar stories would be actually. Just writing for fun, advice or constructive critism is welcomed, writing style prone to change.
Warning: Incredible amounts of poor grammar, Gore, Profanities, Traumatizing content, and cliches(I plan to have multiple main characters, maybe this is too ambitious for my poor skills, but it seems like it would be fun to try, the other MCs won't show up until later on.)
The cover image isn't mine I just found it online. It's a piece by Stephanie Frey
This takes inspiration from a lot of great stories on here, but I find the beginning to be most similar to Blood Lust by DefinitelyNotJormlung. Starcraft and Warhammer 40k and survival world rpg by S_Conary will also influenced this (at least that's my plan if I ever get that far or finish this) Also please stay with me until chapter 3. I suck at starting stories, but have been told I get better as I'm further along.

Title: The Game of Gods
Synopsis:
Charles earns the ultimate surprise one morning when he awakens to discover the world has ended, or rather the gods of old were bored and decided to redesign how it worked. Everyone else got a nice little message that showed up their vision, everyone else woke up when the gods decided to make their decision known. Only Charles gets cursed by the gods, and only Charles gets a visit from one as well.
The Game of the Gods has begun and the monsters of old are returning to our world, and all it took was the death of half the world's population and counting.
Author's Note: This is my raw, mostly unedited text. I am using RR to test out this story as I'm writing it to get a feel for how the published and edited copy will be received. Certain sections of the story will be changed or added to when I publish it as well.

Title: Stormsinger
Synopsis:
Llyraien has lost everything - his home, his family, his birthright and his freedom. Now he is in exile and being hunted by the very same Council who took it all from him. He only has one anchor remaining in his life; Eona, the Mother of All. But Eona is ancient and her powers are not what they once were, and the darkness that has fallen in the citadel is threatening to destroy all of Tel'ar. Llyraien will have to fight - not just his own demons, but for his life, his world and his Mother.
Can Llyraien find himself again in exile and start to heal from his grief and loss? And can Eona regain her powers and help him claim his birthright as a Stormsinger?

Title: Lost Magic
Synopsis:
With magic all but lost, mage guilds are few and far between. The Sleeping Dragon guild, a lingering relic of the past, continues to operate any way it can. So long as the price is right, the talented individuals of this guild can handle any mission thrown their way, legal or otherwise.  
As a courier for the Sleeping Dragon Guild, Cross prefers things simple. He keeps to a tight (albeit rather lazy) schedule and does his best not to deviate from it. But things do not always go according to plan. When he crosses path with a young girl claiming to be a Spirit Goddess, he and his fellow guildmates are pulled into a dark scheme over a century in the making.

Title: Dragon Ball: The RPG.
Synopsis:
Being given the choice of a new life or just disappearing, Kaley chose the latter. Or at least that's what he tried to do. After an encounter with a bored divinity and an impulsive wish, he is reincarnated in the world of DBZ.
Everything seems to be against him, all because of that troublesome wish of his. Watch as Kaley struggles and tries to come to term with his new reality.
--------------------------------------------------
Just my take on how an RPG in the DBZ universe would play out if you were thrust into it.
Some heavy themes, tragedy and domestic abuse.
Lots of tropes, both Japanese and Chinese.
New at writing so constructive criticism and suggestions are very welcome. Grammar fixes are also welcome.
Warning! This will be a weak to strong fic, so no op MC in the start.
Enjoy!
*Disclaimer: I don't own any of the Dragon Ball series or any of its characters or images.

Title: Living a Long Life as a Legend
Synopsis:
Reincarnating into a game-like version of a medieval magical world was fine and all. A good blend of two enjoyable tropes. Lock wished he'd been born with a bunch of cheats sometimes, sure, but he could settle with being functionally immortal by abusing the system as well.

Title: The Rich Girl's Path of Domination
Synopsis:
Huan is an orphan street rat. But when she finds a card she can trade for any Cheat she wants, her fate will change dramatically!
"Unlimited Money!"
That is what she chooses, for money is the most powerful force in the world. Ancient Beasts? Mysterious Sects? Powerful Organizations? Who cares?! She will laugh in the face of the world itself with her neverending purse! Anyone who stands in her way will feel the true meaning of "being crushed to death by gold coins"!

Title: The Technic Master
Synopsis:
Retired Marine who owns a Tech/Arms company gets caught in a System Apocalypse while bringing home more product. Fortunately, he's read a lot of system apoc sci-fi and fantasy!
 
Note: the cover is a place holder. No idea who the artist is so if said artist wants me to remove it just drop me a message and i will. No questions asked.

Title: The Perks of Immortality
Synopsis:
This story will no longer be updated.

After living decades and dying hundreds of times, Kegan has learned that he has finally passed some test that the cruel spirit had given him. Now, Kegan has the ability to gain “perks” that can make his life much easier. He is looking forward to finally having an easy life with the new perks he has earned.

Rules to keep me honest for the perk system:

Spoiler: Spoiler


1. The purpose of perks is to help the MC live longer and do new things each life.
2. The perks can be unlocked by getting hurt or killed.
3. The perks can be unlocked by putting in a lot of effort that isn’t easily duplicated in a new life.
4. Perks are generally beneficial enhancements to the MC’s body.
5. Perk costs can be lowered with more impressive achievements to unlock them.
6. Perk costs can be lowered by repeated death or injury from something the perk protects against.
7. Perk costs are increased for quality of life improvements that don’t benefit survival.



I want to avoid one of the pitfalls I see for other LitRPG stories where the game elements barely relate to the story, or offer very little information. If people are skipping over and not reading the perks then I'm doing things wrong. So I promise to try and make the perks interesting, sometimes humorous, informative, and relevant to the story.Cover art by http://dertypaws.com/

Title: The Hero's Supplier
Synopsis:
Rick made new rules for himself every few days. But there was only one rule that he truly always followed- Don’t stretch your legs more than the size of your blanket. The way to success was by not drawing unwanted attention.
But when the Inter-planar wars began, Rick had no other choice than to survive, and for that, he had to give up his laid-back lifestyle.
"Still not gonna be a hero!” Rick vowed.
Superhuman strength, agility, ability to use magic, telepathy, all sorts of talents emerged.
As heroes began to emerge among the population, Rick decided to take up the mantle of being the man in the shadows.

Title: The Young Daoist (Book One: Filial Piety)
Synopsis:
The seal that keeps spirituals entity to enter our world is weakening. A young man who is born from a long lineage of a Daoist priest must face this danger. The long forgotten knowledge now becomes important. Can he prevent the seal from breaking apart?
Or will he choose to let the seal broken and flourishes in the new world, where the spiritual and physical merge into one?
 
“If one were able to perfect his filial piety and attention to fraternal duties, his spirit would be consonant with the highest virtue of the universe “ (Confucius, The Classic of Xiao)
