Title: The Dark Ages
Synopsis:
Lee Jae-Yong successfully found a job the next day after getting fired of his previous job thanks to his gaming companion, Kung Sung-Ho. Working now under Sung-Ho's father, Kung Sang-Chol, Jae-Yong started his intensive training before the official release of the virtual reality MMORPG game, The Dark Ages in two years.
Intending to become the best player within The Dark Ages, watch how Jae-Yong climb the ranking ladder as he helps Sung-Ho and his guild to reach the top.
This is his story, the tale of the once forgotten legend known as Shy, The Demon Emperor. 
 
Author: I'm not an English native so I hope that my sentences don't seem too weird or hard to read for you guys (I hope you guys can point it out if you find any of them). This is the typical litRPG virtual reality Korean novel that you can find on the internet.

Title: Your Typical Transmigration Story
Synopsis:
Otaku NEET is hit by truck and reincarnates into another world. You know the drill. 
 
One somewhat traumatic moment (getting hit by a truck) somehow completely rewrites his personality! 
 
A once-lazy, unmotivated, social pariah degenerate magically gains people skills, leadership skills, confidence, motivation, and becomes the hero of the realm! 
 
... right?

Title: The Place between the Horizon
Synopsis:
A normal studious guy living in the countryside living a normal happy life. He was a genius in academics, had lovable friends, recently even found a girl that he liked and even his family was loving one. Everything seemed fine for Sebastian Adams that is until one fateful day when he stumbled upon a rundown shrine and by mistakingly broke an old deity statue. 
He got cursed by the deity and his good life turned upside down which got him to live on the streets. He lost everyone that was close to him in a night. Since then he's started finding and struggling to lift the curse and get his life back to normalcy. But soon he met mysterious people who were not affected by his curse who also promised to help him out. Soon Sebastian gets to know the truth of the world and the perspective about the world. Journey with Sebestian to uplift the mysterious curse and the hidden secrets and mysteries of the world.

Title: [RE] System
Synopsis:
Feeling lost and frustrated after being falsely accused and executed.Connor was chosen and given away to the Spirit Rift, a fantasy world whereworld war II is likely to happen and he is tasked to prevent it. 
He is reincarnated not as a human but as a system.~[You have one minute left to occupy a being before your life is forfeited.]

Title: A Hero Returns
Synopsis:
War raged on in the lands of Thyderalis, a continent within the world of Dunia. For a thousand years, two factions desperately fought for control: the Kingdom of Damore and the Draconic Empire. If left unchecked, an unseen chaos will be unleashed, bringing an end to all life. This was all disclosed to Aren Damoder - a once revered hero centuries ago - through a vision. He handled this burden alone and failed all attempts to thwart the future.
As all hope seemed lost, another vision revealed itself: only a single person could bring an end to this conflict, forcing the lurking evil to slumber once again. The individual destined to change the world was a knight named Layette Hawkwood. She strives to be as great as the legends before her, only to struggle to uphold their “ideal” values.
Along with many companions and battles to come, Layette explores the idea of heroism and what it means to be a hero. Continuing on his quest, Aren will ultimately have to decide: sacrificing others for the sake of one or uphold his heroic beliefs.

Synopsis:
A Sci-Fi pen pal romance with a twist...  ;)

Title: I Don't Know
Synopsis:
The greatest existence in the universe can't decide between becoming the Hero that he was raised to be or to become the Demon King that he was born to be.
Unable to come up with a decision, he erased his memories and sealed his abilities.
Now it's all up to his clueless mortal self to make the decision.

Title: Kohane Hatoya's Smile
Synopsis: Kohane and Uki from the anime Anima Yell! panic in strange part town and get lost and abducted. Kohane turns her mind to steel. Has both dramatic and comic elements to it playing off of the tragedy of the situation and how Kohane responds to it. This is a healing story.

Title: Fiction, Legends & Folklore
Synopsis:
Synopsis.
 
As children we have all heard our own share of stories and legends passed down from one generation to the next. In our ancestors attempt to share with us how they once viewed the world. Our just a common saying or tall tell that may have become legend and told to children at night to make them behave.  In this book Legends and Stories Vol 0 we dive into common classics told for generations. Reworded and turned into enjoyable stories for the readers to enjoy.
 
 
In this Volume each story is an Actual legend or story such as godly locks and the three bears or Little red riding hood. Adopted as an original work of the author made into story shorts.
 
Warning: Some stories may contain blood, gore and violence.

Title: Rise of a Rogue Dungeon
Synopsis:
Following the unfortunate, or fortunate birth of a Dungeon, in the world Ilyeus where Dragons claim the skies. Titans wander the world. Drakes boast their majestic pride. Wyrms sleep beneath the earth. Humans, Elves, Dwarves, Beast-kin, and many other sapient races mingle amongst each other, for good or bad. Gods descend among mortals with their Divine Vessels. 
The Dungeon treads unrestricted by the links other Dungeons have. Down a path never walked by any other Dungeon in the world of Ilyeus.
Down,
A Path of Freedom!
A Path of Dominance!
A Path of a Savior!
A Path that would make Spirits shudder in fear!
But first, it must survive, expand, evolve, and create an army that would do its bidding.

This is my first time writing something like this, so if you see any grammar or spelling errors, pointing them out would be appreciated.
Any constructive criticism is also appreciated!
My update schedule is currently as I write them. So that means every time I finish writing a chapter, I will post it after it gets edited.
I also release a chapter of A Lone Automaton's Journey To Find Its Operator infrequently as a side thing.

Title: Under a Harey Moon
Synopsis:
All Jacob wanted was to be a Hunter. Then one spring day, at the end of the first hunt of spring, something happened tht would change his life and his plans forever.
This is my first story, so I appoligize now if it's rough. As such, it's possible I'll go back and make adjustments as I go. If I do, I'll leave a note saying where.

Title: Narcos India
Synopsis:
When cocaine and marijuana entered India, it got all of Asia hooked.
Brij Jadeja, a slum dweller who grows up to be the most wanted criminal in the world. Imagine that you are just 25 and you have so enough money to eradicate of the world's largest slum.Welcome to the world of narcotics, and believe me this world is twisted.
Welcome to this crazy nation named India.
Here for a ride?You got it.

Title: Observed Oddity
Synopsis:
A journey both foreign and familiar for our f#cking protagonist. He most definitely has cheaty abilities but that's not going to stop him from barely scraping by from whatever nonsensical activity is planned for the day. Using everything he can to his advantage will make it possibile to get what he wants. Exploring a new region excites his sense of adventure and greed for loot. Catching his own pokemon compels his fanboy heart to strengthen their bonds. Being an honest pervert gets him in trouble but at least he has more tact than others. Enjoy the story of Stevan as he stumbles around his second chance at life in the world of Pokemon.
A personal experiment with writing using a basic setting with my own additions to the experience as I would want it to be. A story for satisfaction rather than wish fulfillment hopefully. Pokemon. World transfer. Game elements. 18+ I do not own anything; this is just for enjoyment. Releases will be at random so that this feels like enjoyable writing rather than work so that I continue to feel motivated to write so bear with me.

Title: Ed Jones
Synopsis: A boy who wants to be a musician, but doesn't have the opportunity suddenly gets one right before him. Will he take it and live a life in fame?

Title: Void System
Synopsis: Arthur an unlucky guy, or lucky depends on how you see it, kills himself and is sent to another world so that he can participate in the gods games, will he be killed, tortured, humiliated? watch how our (un)lucky partner tries to overcome all of it with the help of the Void System.

Title: The Archon
Synopsis: When the forces of the Dark One threatened to overrun the Hallowed World, the six remaining Greater Gods called upon heroes from another world to face them. Beating back the tides, these extradimensional beings, now known as 'Archons', have since protected the Hallowed Land from the ever present threat of the Dark One’s return. So says the in-game lore of Archon Online, at least. A plot that’s a little on the nose for a VRMMO, but nothing all that unusual, right?After creating a new alt on the eve of a content update, PvP veteran Matthew Alloy finds himself transported to the world of his obsession, though not as he knew it. Thrust into the form of a level 1 Tinker, he (or perhaps, more accurately, she?) decides to retrace his footsteps towards becoming an adventurer, ready to climb back up the levelling ladder, carve out an existence that can afford to emulate his old life's creature comforts and maybe eventually figure out what's going on, when he gets around to it.But before all that, there's an adventurer's license exam he needs to take, all the way over in the capital. The journey there from Brightsteel Point took only a single scene transition in-game, so how hard could it be?

Title: It Comes For Us All
Synopsis:
Alex Is a bright kid. He’s just… different
What can be done?
Well, its nothing serious as of yet, but if this continues, we’ll be sure to have some options
So, nothing then
Mrs. Halladay please, be reasonable. Your son isn’t exactly ill
You’re just going to let this go on then?
Well… We will discuss more on… That
It
Hmm?
He calls it, It

Title: Per Mortem
Synopsis: A man who died during World War 3 from a crazed enemy doctor is reincarnated into another world... as a mouse. He quickly finds out, however, that he can transform into dead beings that he eats, even swapping out parts of them to enhance specific parts of his body. This is the journey of an insignificant mouse to the path of a Demon Lord.

Title: One Piece Apocalypse
Synopsis:
"Black Hole!"
"F**k, IT'S THE SADISTIC B*STARD AGAIN, RUN!"
Follow Flint with his Guild as they cooperate together to survive the One Piece cataclysm....

Title: The Crimson Mage
Synopsis: Orenda is a ten-year-old orphan who was raised in a colony of the far-reaching Urilian empire.  She's the only fire elf she's ever met, and believes herself to be the long-lost princess of the fire elf kingdom, which is said to have fallen in a single day and night under Urillian control two centuries before our story picks up.  When her magical powers begin to manifest, Orenda must navigate the world as it is now to discover the secrets of her past and chart her future.

Title: Tree Spirit
Synopsis:
The journey of a lonely Tree Spirit.
Unceasing laughter, happiness, and bliss played themselves before it... before...him? But alas, he was only but a spectator relishing in their delight, their warmth, their care. When they went, darkness ensured. But, maybe he would find a place he truly belonged? A place where he would be cared for, and a place that he could be ...happy?
...But firstly, I'm a male okay. A proud male tree spirit. No matter what you do, that won't change!
A Bl story... but mostly fantasy.
The romance is still far away...

Title: Huntsman: He Who Kills Monsters
Synopsis: What would it take for you to give up your humanity? Grimm are monsters that were once people faced with that question. They made the choice to give up being human, and became abominations masquerading as people, their hearts consumed by the desire to kill and inflict suffering upon humankind. Huntsmen are the professional monster hunters trained to exterminate Grimm. Their work is shrouded in shadow, and they are often as feared as Grimm themselves. Klaus Jaeger is a Huntsman, one who kills monsters. He walks a bleak path leading to inevitable tragedy and despair, but he continues down that path nonetheless, driven by the certainty that more blood lies on the path ahead. (Originally posted on Webnovel, I am moving this novel onto Royal Road)

Title: The 'Innocent' Assassin
Synopsis: I woke up and I had to shake myself awake. Did that all really just happen, Wait was it just a dream? Jumping out of my bed. Looking into the mirror. I looked the same. No cuts no scars. I felt relief but I was traumatized.

Title: I can't wait
Synopsis: A boy that always love Overlord always dream about it but what if that day comes what will be do

Title: Jack's Otherworlderology!
Synopsis:
"Hey there, It's me, Jack JobJob.
Welcome to my show, where me and my crew; Jim JimmyJams (action cameraman) and Lisa LilyLilia (Cute fun loving assistant) intrude on daily lives of random strangers from many of the worlds out there!
We will interview and document entertaining lives of someone or something! Perhaps a king and his royal family, an alien and his spaceship? a demon king and his monsters? a tomato and his farmer!
Who knows!
Submit your suggestions! Who do you want to be interviewed! We have the skills to go anywhere and interview anyone! Don't hesitate! come join the fun!"
~*~
A slice of life and comedy centred, short tales set in a interview/documentary format.
Mainly taken to be relaxed, fun, light hearted and Random.

Title: Three Keys
Synopsis:
The World Tree holds as many worlds as it has leaves. Three keys are all it takes to replace the stablilty of the nine regions with an apocalyptic war, and the possibility of total destruction.
The Asgar and the Jotun hold one key apiece, and the third key changes hands from possessor to possessor. But when one of the soldiers of the Asgar deserts, that key is lost. With two keys on the loose, whomever can assemble all three can control existence.

Title: Use magic to fight aliens
Synopsis:
A long, long, time ago, before America, before Greece, before Egypt, before Stone age, a war had happened on Earth, a terrible war that torn and scarred the life on Earth. Centuries had passed by since the ever-destructive war had ravaged the land and Earth finally recovered from death and destruction.
But as the wound slowly smothered away, all record of that war was slowly forgotten, the ancient buildings crumbled, scrolls turned into dust, and paintings on the cave faded and their walls rotted away. Stories of the war which had passed through the generations, suddenly never mentioned again until humans couldn’t even remember the bitter times when forces clashed which were way beyond their grasp.
And all of sudden, several giant unidentified flying objects, over 750km in diameter passed over Earth's moon and entered the orbit of the earth. Along with their arrival, all satellite communications were interrupted, technology destroyed, no more social media, no more streaming service.
As fear gripped the cities of the world, especially the millennials, and it became clear that a force of incredible magnitude had arrived on Earth. Its mission: UNKNOWN.
Meanwhile, Thorn Ketchup, an 18 years old university student was delivering a pizza when he hit a tall green man with a pointy ear and a blue screen suddenly appeared right in front of his faces.

Title: Yuri Sensei
Synopsis: This is a few short stories about Yuri teachers, starting with The Teacher and the Cosplayer

Title: ERA system.
Synopsis: "Deal with a devil and system to boot.how can things can go wrong". Just another isekei with inspiration from carefree path of dreams.Be ready for the Environmental  Reality Argumenting SYSTEM

Title: The Jungle Kingdom
Synopsis: Minty is a green, amphibious swamp girl who lives in the jungle. Now she must go on the quest to save the human King of her land from the evil Emperor who has usurped his throne. But there are many traps and terrors in her way! Can Minty overcome the Emperor's flesh eating lizards, pollution monster, and trident warriors? An inversion of the 'save the helpless princess' story.

Title: Horror Bites
Synopsis: Horror Bites is a collection of macarbre short stories and flash fiction. From oil rigs to spaceships and from drunken regrets to troubling realisations about the nature of reality, the uniting theme of these stories is their dark nature.

Title: I don't know how to delete a story.
Known Danger System 42
Synopsis:
The world has changed. Who will survive?
Jax had hardly a care in the world, life was good. Then the System hit and it hit hard and now it seems like there is only one way to survive. Kill or be killed. That is what life is like when everyone around you views you as a source of potential experience.
-
This will be a work in progress, it is also my first try. I hope to create something which everyone can enjoy. I have a lot of ideas and appreciate reviews and insights. If you have advice then please share. If you see mistakes then please inform me and I will correct them. I have gained inspiration from a great deal that I have read on RR and elsewhere.
Thank you.

Title: Freya
Synopsis:
When Freya woke up, she had no recollection of who she was.
She soon found out that she was a beautiful 16 years old girl and was of a noble family. Overwhelmed by questions of herself and the world around her, she decided to search for answers. To search for the truth.
Follow her adventures in unveiling magic, and most importantly: herself.

Title: Valediction
Synopsis:
One does not say no to a goddess lightly...
For the sin of my arrogance, I was cursed, forced to be reborn over and over again living life after life each short and brutal.
Once I was her champion, now, however, I am cast aside into the deepest pit.
No more...
I shall say my Valediction and rip my soul asunder to be born again by my own free will...
Author’s Note: Hey everyone this is another story about a man who winds up a woman, but he still likes women so expect some Yuri as well as explicit sex scenes... You have been warned lol...

Title: I'm Not The Dragon's Mom
Synopsis:
He was once an ordinary man from the 21st century. Now he’s the recognized mother of the notorious evil dragon’s son. He even has the body for the job.
 
Updates every saturday and sunday

Title: A way to be transported in another world
Synopsis:
A man who physically abused by her mother after he loses his father from a sickness.
Her mother detained after his little brother accidentally killed and left alone.
 The struggle in his life continues and then suddenly a tower appears to his country out of nowhere.
A tower that he dreams to live in.

Title: The Tracer
Synopsis:
Aria Selman's life was endangered when she awakened powerful inborn abilities due to a supernatural incident.
In order to survive, Aria joins an organization that manages the country's supernatural affairs from the shadows- the Cerberus.

Title: Life Is But A Game
Synopsis: There are things everyone understands about life. It's chaotic, messy, and most of all, it doesn't give a damn about what you want or need. Even in a world that would be considered fictional, this idea still holds true. Dropped into a universe of demigods and incredible monsters, one young boy has to face the fact that his wants and needs matter even less than they did before. (Young Justice/DC Universe Gamer SI)

Title: Reprise
Synopsis: Three princesses. Three curses. One adventure.Rapunzel's magic hair spontaneously grows back, Ariel regains her mermaid tail, and winter returns to Arendelle. One year after their most meaningful trials and triumphs, something has taken away what they worked so hard to gain. As they leave the safety of their own kingdoms, fate is about to drive these strangers together across oceans, over mountains, into the depths of the sea, and even through the river of time itself. But will their differences stop them before the curse can?

Title: I am a Dungeon Core
Synopsis:
I am reborn as a Dungeon Core.
Without any systems to help me.
I must survive in this fantasy world where dungeon cores are prized possessions.
So, If I wish to survive as Dungeon Core. I must kill other living beings.
That seems like the only option but I believe there is another way.
I believe I can survive without having to kill anything. 
I believe I can cohabitate with living things.
I believe we can prosper together if we work together.
I believe I can make this world bend to my will.

Title: Legend of Soul
Synopsis:
A boy dies one day trying to save a girl. A voice rang out to him saying he is what it seeks. What will happen to our dear protagonist? Only time will tell.
 
This is made for me to test out my writing skills. I have experimented with the tables and can't get used to them so I hope you can still enjoy my writing style. This is my first real time trying to write a real book. I may make this interactive later but that'll take viewers. 
Also, this will contain a harem, sexual times, and an OP main character later on. He will slowly become OP. I did not check this first chapter for errors so please bare with me. If you decide to comment a negative review, please tell me why it was bad instead of just saying it's crap. Tell me why it's crap and maybe even throw a suggestion! It helps, trust me. Anyways please enjoy! 
(The title is a W.I.P)

Title: Guild of Thieves
Synopsis:
For the past five millenia the Gods have competed for the throne of One True God. Humanity was the victim of their scheming and on the brink of extinction until the first thief stole from the Gods. Even until this day his legacy lives on, the Guild of Thieves. This is the tale of the end of thievery.
I am currently rewriting the chapters so you can expect two things, a boost in quality(hopefully) and a delay in chapters(unfortunately)

Title: KingAbbadon's Azalon - Continued
Synopsis:
This is the property of KingAbbadon. This will be wholeheartedly a tribute to the original, and I myself was upset when it was dropped into the dark void of hiatus. I will try to keep to the original as much as possible.

You can find the original 73 chapters of Azalon here.

Makoto Henderson, neither Hero nor Villain, he is but a human, neither good nor bad.
Putting on a facade every day, hiding his true thoughts and lying like we all do.
Not wanting to get shunned, not brave enough to voice his true intentions or ideas he is but another face in the mindless masses.
What is someone like him going to do whe he has the option to be someone else inside a Virtual Reality Game?
Is he going to be a Saint? Demon? Or just his pure and untainted self, not restrained by society and it's rules?
Azalon awaits!

Note: The cover is the best I could do with my artistic skills. 0.5/10

Title: The Happy Village
Synopsis:
Note: This novel is also posted on justlightnovels.com.
Surrounded by the beauty and grace of Mother Nature, there lies a little village. In serenity the villagers live without much worries except for their jobs and personal lives - after all, there seems to be no major problem at first. Everybody is happy, everybody is well. That goes the same for two girls, Neha and Sachen, who are friends since childhood, and who believe that they will stick with each other forever. But one day, the High Order of the Celestials announces that the gods are angry at the village due to the rise of sin and corruption. They will take extensive measures to ensure the village’s survival, though for the girls, things are not what they seem. A series of events will forever condemn the girls in agony and sorrow, and will tear apart their little hearts.

Title: Spellsword
Synopsis: In just moments the world he knew vanished. Replaced by one with very different rules and many routes to power. But will he survive long enough to get there, will humanity survive joining the system. Rules closer to the games he liked now rule everything.

Title: Wiseman
Synopsis:
An old man with incredible powers and a hidden secret grows tired of his peaceful village life and decides to travel the world in search of exitement and adventure.
 
First Story
I do not own cover art

Title: Allocation [OLD]
Synopsis:
Character-driven action/fantasy/mystery/litrpg.
The World is a cruel place. You must choose your Skills wisely to learn the truth that lies beyond the Five Territories of Man. The Territories are isolated areas shielded from a hostile environment known as the Mana Expanse. Humanity feels safe knowing that they are protected by the Boundaries from the horrors and monsters which dominate the world outside.
Yet on this day, a Boundary fails.
--------------------
Alan looked up through the crack in the wooden wall at a hazy sky. The morning sun was just peeking out over the horizon, lighting a world in which there was no longer balance. He watched thin wisps of clouds swirling in the breeze above his small town. The gentle mists moved with no intention, flowing in sweeping circles creating a thin veil yet to be burnt off by the red morning light.
Taking a deep shaking breath, Alan shifted his gaze down towards the corpses of everyone he had known. His heart beat faster as his eyes adjusted, the red light above meeting the bloody red scene below.
Was he the only one left alive?
--------------------
Release Schedule: once a month (minimum)

Title: BrightShine
Synopsis:
Mok'Tilarr
The name was familiar to Sylvan. Far too familiar. Sure, Sylvan lived in a world of magic, mystery, demon kings, dragons, kings, and castles, but he was alone.
Sylvan was alone because all he had to begin with was his brother, Salvo. However, one day Salvo was missing from their home with no explanation, all that was left was a drawing of a purple spiral surrounded by chains and a black obelisk, and the name of the gateway:
Mok'Tilarr.
This wasn't the first time Sylvan had heard of Mok'Tilar, his race, the "Mystics" were familiar with the legend. Mok'Tilarr was a gateway to another world, one that no one had ever seen or researched, because Mok'Tilarr was only a myth passed down by time.
But Sylvan's brother, his only attachment to his world was gone, and Mok'Tilarr was the only lead Sylvan had.
So, he set off to find the gateway...

Title: Of Ruin
Synopsis: Follow Almorous as he discovers his unique heritage as a Sheo-Algor. Witness his growth as a warrior, and his ability as a friend. Regard a sprawling world with many different factions and heros all vying for control. Discover a harsh continent called Althea, filled with Menacing marshes, graceful grasslands, and complex cities. Learn about lost cultures, and stories of heros far too epic for reality. Experience the named as they ruin it all.

Title: Graying Light
Synopsis: As mankind struggles to survive the new age, calamities descend upon them in turns. Gray Lux the director of Lux Corporation have paved the road for the new age and now they are helping mankind survive. Is Gray Lux truly what he seems to be?

Title: OPMC Harem Story
Synopsis:
OPMC wants a harem. He's got no personality, but he wants to have a harem anyway, like all the heroes.
 
So... desperate measures.

Title: The Bard from Barliona: The Renegades by E. Dmitrieva and V. Mahanenko
Synopsis: Barliona is back! OLD WORLD, NEW HEROES!What would happen if a professional rock musician joined a virtual MMO in search of inspiration among its gameworld? What would happen if she decided to play as a biota bard, a brand new race of humanoid flora as well as a new class? Whatever would happen, it would surely be fun…

Title: Towers of Heaven
Synopsis:
The edited version of book 1 is available on Amazon!
https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B07QH93BMR
One day, six towers appear on Earth. Each one stands hundreds of stories tall, and are invulnerable to all attacks. At the base of each tower is a portal, welcoming in all who dare enter it.
All sorts of magical monsters can be found inside the towers. Even magic and superhuman strength can be acquired. Treasure, too. The problem is  that the towers aren't a friendly place. Even worse, the towers sometimes release waves of monsters to attack Earth.
In the year 2083, there are only a hundred survivors. All of them possess strength beyond normal. They challenge the final floor without regard for their lives. By some miracle, they manage to beat the final floor at the cost of their lives. There is only one survivor.
As a reward for clearing the tower, he is granted one wish. He decides to go back in time, to before the towers arrived. His goal? To prevent humanity from being wiped out.

Title: The Tiger Lily Mistaken for a Weed
Synopsis:
The life of Fei Mei is an arduous one, but although he was cut away from his own clan, can he still rise above it all and become one of the strongest in this universe of Cultivation and so much more? Is Fei Mei really nothing but trash, an emotionless boy whose father had disappeared a year after he was born, and his mother died at birth? These are questions that no one else but Fei Mei can answer.
This was been influenced by Wuxian, Xianxia, and Xianhuan genre of novels, along with Western Magic and Ideas.

Title: The Cursed Collector
Synopsis:
Woojin Han a bounty hunter who everyone considers as the joke of Kubai City,
Ends up in a bounty-hunt that goes horribly wrong when he encounters a man with a strange ability.
Han must seek out those of a similar kind who are named as the Cursed by the masses.
The Cursed hold powers that defy the laws of his world where Elementalists and Summoners exist.
It is a world entering the early industrial age with beings known as calamities wreaking destruction wherever they pass.
On top of that, the humans are at war with creatures from the sea and the mountains.
In this struggle, can Han save the cursed or will they all perish to a lie?
--------------------------------------------
This light novel is also being published through word press @ https://cursedcollector.home.blog
Twitter handle - JCDB18 @JCDB181 
Official Facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/thecursedcollector
It is a co-authored by Jay & Charles

Title: Grim Path
Synopsis:
Restraint has always been a part of Richard Winslow's life. Fighting dark compulsions that gnaw away at his morality and conscience day in and day out. 
Struggling against himself, he manages to function in society. Holding a job and supporting his ill father alone, Richard finds a sustainable, albeit strained rut to coast the rest of his existence in. Until the world rent itself asunder around him.
Suddenly thrust into horror beyond comprehension and no longer restricted by the laws of mankind, Richard finally has to fully confront his demons.
Will Richard overcome his desires? Or will he be consumed by them...
And become the monster he always feared he was.

Title: An Unfortunate Wish Granting Device
Synopsis: A nigh-omnipotent wish-granting device only wants to help people achieve their wishes. Unfortunately, people have a poor sense of syntactical choice, leaving much to be desired.

Title: Retired emperor
Synopsis: the youngest emperor in the world decided that he should retire and live like a normal high school student.

Title: Married to a grumpy kitty
Synopsis:
Arrange marriage is not a big deal, wait wait why my husband wearing a mask !!
Oh no, did I married to a weirdo or something else?
Thats the beginning of Sayo's newly married life with ......

Title: Three Colours
Synopsis:
Inspired by Bungaku Shoujo, taking three subjects and writing a story based on them!
Going to be written whenever I feel like it, purely for fun.
The tags are there because the stories can literally be about anything.

Title: Awaken
Synopsis:
Humanity has advanced from being creation to the creator. Despair, death, destruction, and depletion of resources soon follow pushing humanity away from Earth and into the stars. It eventually comes to pass that the old struggles resurface. War never changes. We will reap what we sow.
This work has also been uploaded onto Webnovel.com

Title: Bloody little Monster
Synopsis:
A young catkin finds herself stranded on an island without any memories of how she got there, or who she was before.
With a lack of humans in the area and monsters looking to turn her into a quick snack, she has to do everything in her power to survive or face being brutally mauled to death.
Thankfully, the strange System that she woke up with seems to be just the thing that can let her survive, and turn the tables on the monster, giving her the chance to turn the tides of survival and trample over the world with impunity.

Title: Fights and More Fights, Action!
Synopsis:
This story is about a 'person' fighting/competing. (may have self insert, but no harem)
This is hereby canceled due to it being awful, please check out my other fiction.

Title: Forged From Mortal Lands
Synopsis: Explore the cultivating and mortal worlds through eyes hardly written about and follow the main character Charlie through his unique experience and growth as he rises to the top of the cultivating world.

Title: Debt Star
Synopsis:
Have you ever wondered how the Earth got its debt?
Well, it seemed the Earth were making a debt to the United Star and Planet Federation. How do we pay this? Dollar? Yuan? Euro? Nope... there was this common currency on the space called Cosmos Credit.
Anyhow, with more than 40trillion cosmos credit as the earth monthly interest, the universal bank is confiscating Earth and we, the Terran needed to work for the United Star until we finally pay our debt.
But... there was no way they could take 7 billion humans just like that, right?

Title: A Raymond's Raven - (The Exploration of Magic in World War 1)
Synopsis: (Re-Write of Original Version)-----1917, the First World War. Witches and Magicians have been deployed from every warring nation and onto the battlefield called the Western Front. They take up their weapons of wands, staffs, and rituals to battle their own brethren under the crossfire of bullets, artillery, and mechanized warfare. And it will be told through the eyes of a certain Canadian Pilot in the pages of history, Raymond Collishaw of Black Flight.-----

Title: A New Age
Synopsis:
Humankind has had a long history full of darkness and flame, but just like the mighty pheonix we shall rise from our ashes.
It is only through the fall of heroes, the death of martyrs, that the common man may be inspired to rise to their levels and become a hero themselves.
This is the story of one such hero and his war to drag his nation with him as he rises to hange history.

Title: Level Up +2: Hero by Dan Sugralinov
Synopsis: A lazy and wussy ex-gamer, Phil becomes one of the few humans who receive a mysterious alien piece of wetware which allows them to see the world through an augmented-reality interface very similar to those used in a MMORPG game. Guided by its stats and messages, Phil begins to level up, gradually transforming himself and his life. He even opens his own business in order to help his friends and complete strangers who acquire a newfound respect for him, assisting him in his travails. As Phil continues on the road to self-improvement, guided by his own conscience rather than system messages, he tries to find out more about the mysterious third party which has bestowed such superhuman abilities upon him.

Title: Untitled
Synopsis:
While everything takes place on Gaia, what happens on Earth? Where is the advancement in human civilization? How much closer to the truth of their exists do the people of the world we call our home come?
Let's find out as the events that take place on Gaia, the cradle of the Earth bring it out of it's time stream and the possibility of taking a space ship to another habitable planet suddenly becomes realistic from Earth.
                                                                         
This is just a concept in my mind, not really for reader consumption anytime soon, especially the readers following the first three installations of my story. If I manage to writing the whole thing out it will probably be mainly a stand alone novel, but it will also definitely be the fourth book in what I hope will be the 'followers of the way' series.

Title: Travel between realms
Synopsis:
John Smith was taking the most important exam in his life, when suddenly  everything got very dark..
well this is going to be my first story.
I haven't fully figured the plot out just yet, and this is still very experimental so expect CHANGES.

Title: Voice of reason with a hint of insanity
Synopsis:
Follow the story of Joe and his sentien subconscious voice of reason through their journey around Wanderia. What should have been an average monday turns into an adventure not for the weak of mind. From giant man-eating tentacle plants to cults of potato worship there will be much to be experienced. The diffrent wielders of power and monsters fight everyday in a battle of survival all the while Joe is just starting wars, waking ancient city eating beasts and all such nonsense just because it seemed like a fun idea. The happy-go-lucky attitude of his will be tempered and changed somewhat along the grueling battles of body and mind all the while Svor makes snarky comments and terrible jokes.

This is my first story so becoming better along the way and all that. Not a native english speaker so expect misspelling to happen.

Title: Nine Realms VRMMORPG
Synopsis:
A man, no, a hero who fought for his homeland in another world gets sent to a parallel world to be reborn, with his memories intact as a bonus for the extra good karma he had. The thing is, both worlds have VRMMORPGs, and this man used to be the reigning champion on all leaderboards in all VRMMOs he played in. The one VRMMORPG he always played, was Nine Realms.
And now he has the advantage of knowing that VRMMOs base your ingame character on your real world body, and VRMMOs will only come out when he's 10 due to the timelines only differring in political peace.
Time to kick ass.

Title: THE DREVAN FAMILY
Synopsis:
Welcome to my humble abode, my dear readers.This novel is set in hunter x hunter world with our unique mc and his very craz... I mean unique family 
 I will try to update every month, but that could change if I had my own trusted e... editor or I was very excited about sharing my story with you. Oh and I am always excited????
*oh and this story doesn't have BL  or shounen ai or one of the main character turning to a girl. So be glad and rejoice for you finally found your heart desire.I don’t own hunter x hunter or black butler

Title: The Times Of Titanosia And Generations
Synopsis: One god said I am bored than he said let's create a system and reancarnate a genetic enginner to our world so he can buff our world species create new ones and wreak havoc hahahahahahaha!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Title: Tales Of The Dark Mage: New Moon| Part I
Synopsis:
Sora lost his whole world at the age of six. His powerful mage war-hero father was killed in battle, and weeks later his caring younger older brother died at the hands of the same killers. Sora's doting and formidable mother Maina, known as the "God of Mages," Maina sent her other three older children to Rowan Academy, meanwhile Maina could only entrust Sora to a royal mage family while she set out on a vengeance-fueled crusade.
There, the mournful Sora met Sophia Accordia, the only child of the Accordia’s. A prideful young royal yearning to become the 'Goddess of all Magic'. Sora befriended an abrasive but lonely Sophia, igniting purpose within his grief, he swore to help Sophia achieve her dream, becoming her loyal guard and right hand.
Under the strict tutelage of Master Benson's training, Sora and Sophia bonded deeply. On Sora's 8th birthday, he gained a grimoire containing the dark magic spirit Rin, who promised immense power - at a price.
As they relentlessly trained for nine years removed from his tragedy, Sora and Sophia attempted Rowan Academy's grueling entrance trials. If accepted, their journey to make Sophia the goddess of all magic would truly begin—Sora as her faithful protector and avenger, Sophia as his purpose and light. But first, they have seven days of intelligence and combat exams, if they prove themselves through Rowan's trials, then they shall be worthy. 
 
*Author noteI'm about to change chapters 1-30 since I didn't flesh out the mc enough or didn't give the proper backstory. 
Be ready for the first volume. Coming out sometime in 2024 or 2025. The first volume is going to be different in regards of the story and the style of writing. Looking back on the early chapters, I want to do things a lot different when I first created this story.
*Author Note This fiction is a participant of the WriTEr's pledge.

Title: Dawn Of Dragons
Synopsis:
On one normal day, the world began to change. What was known as impossible began to become possible. People created miracles.
Others rose above each other. The world began to evolve and new systems of control emerged from the chaos.
Despite all of this five figures rose to the top and were able to easily control the state of the world with their overwhelming power.
But soon, even they were not enough to protect the world from the great destruction that befell the earth, Dragons.
In the moment of death, Jonathan Reed finds himself in the moments right before the everything changed.
Determined, Jonathan sets out to change the fate of the world.

Title: Never-Were Heroes
Synopsis:
In the begining there were the gods, there was the darkness and there was a war; but I've suppose you've heard all of this before... Well that is not our story.
  The kingdom of Aramos stands at the border of the unknown, a stretch of mountains scathed by time, and riddled with horrors wrought from the delusions of madmen. Behind it lies the sea and the sky and a world of peace and beauty untamed fields of grass and wide plains of farmland, but the eyes of the human race never did stray far from those looming hills which pronounced doom for all whom they ensnared. But intrepid souls remained, those who would brave death and darkness in pursuit of knowledge and fame and fortune; those who peered into the unknown unfraid, those who in time came to be known as adventurers. Soon this new cast of men and women founded a city; Helbos, they built it from the ground up; high stone walls, vast markets and paved roads leading out across the nation. They became a new frontier, humanity advanced forwards through the hills and the woods and the vallies, through lands capped by ice and reigned in fire and it was glorius but in the end the dream had to die. 
  The City of Helbos vanishes, the adventurers scatter, the unknown looms above them once more. The only clues to the cities destruction lie in the testaments of its people, in the blue moon that appeared that night to rain down death and the strange mage who called that light forth. Here a journey begins; and whether it shall lead to hope or despair it is one humanity must take together or face true anihilation.

Title: Soundless
Synopsis: Elijah wakes up one day to find himself in an irratible state, as he opens his eyes, the soft sun begins to feel like a scorching red giant and the sounds around him begin to pierce his ears continously. Eventually the pain subsides but Elijah has adapted a quirk, quirks or abilities thought of as myth to most of society has begun to intertwine with his everyday life. Sooner rather than later Elijah will learn the true manifestation of his ability, and exactly how much history it holds in his bloodline. Can he really retain a normal highschool life for any longer? A world unknown to him will slowly begin to seep in.

Title: The Great Serpent
Synopsis:
WILL BE REWRITE.
The mighty serpent that almost achieve peak and transform his self to become the mighty dragon died from betrayal and besiege of human peak cultivator. Just before the great serpent breathed it's last breath, He vowed silently "iam the little serpent if given a chance to reincarnate, ill never ever do something stupid again, who ever betrayed me ill fucking kill his whole clan, ill make that who want to betrayed me shudder from scared of the consequences". When he almost end his vow, something miraculous happen. a small portion of his soul sucked into a black hole.. where is this? Fuck iam not have a body!!, wtf iam a soull!!!!!.
 
(WILL BE REWRITE, SOON)
Year after year the little serpent soul wandering in universe, he saw many thing, The fall and the rise of an Empire, Planet that did not have mana but their people can destroy planet with what they call technology, Planet that have no life but have many resources, and many more. When one day he saw a planet that was bigger than he had ever seen, something happen, his soul suck to the planet. who knows what will happen to our liitle serpent!!. If he will repeat his mistake again???. So let just enjoy our little serpent journey. Tyty
----------#----#-------#------#------#--------This is my first novel and English is not my first language, so if there are some problem with my grammar or type. I am sory for that. And If you have suggestion, you can just PM me * tyty
Note : * Cover is not my creation, i just take it from somewhere..(^;^)
* Some character, kingdom or Clan Name may come from other novel, Manga or anime, if i can not think a better name. If you have a better idea just Pm me!!.
(WILL BE REWRITE, SOON)

Title: A King's Regret - Ravenchild
Synopsis: Alwnn is shrouded by the fog of war. Dracones Auryelin, former ruler of the imperial territory, is dead by an assassin’s blade. His mistress and child are missing, presumed slain. His sworn brother, Dracones Uthyr leads what little remains of their legion in a desperate defence of a far-flung, effectively abandoned territory against demons, magical beasts and men. The culprit of this disaster Vertigan, son of a former ally, has declared himself High King and renounced his father's imperial ties. Vertigan’s bid for power had hinged on two key points. The first was capturing Auryelin’s mistress, the imperial sorceress charged with maintaining Alwnn’s mystical protections, alive. The second was the trustworthiness of his barbarian mercenaries. His demon-worshipping, barbarian mercenaries. As all sides seek to attain their own goals a young sorcerer emerges from the cursed woods of Alwnn.

Title: I was Scum, now I am even more than Scum
Synopsis:
An evil martial artist who dominated the world dies and meets god who tells him to "do more". He is then reincarnated, but not in his own world, but in another.
A really LIT world.

Title: not a story
Synopsis: Nah
No longer writing this.

Title: The Island
Synopsis:
Dylon Philips was a run-of-the-mill Canadian university student taking the L.R.T. home like he did every evening. As he was engrossed in a binge reading the lastest lightnovel he had dug up on the internat, the lights went out and his world changed.
Going to be like the isekai genre but with a realistic dark approach. Expect quite a bit of death.
Hey I'm Blazalte and I'm giving writing a shot after being a reader for so many years. I'm open to all kinds of constructive feedback and want to improve as I go on. 1)Things to know, I am a student so I'll only release 1 chapter mon, wed, and fri for now. I may release faster on breaks but it depends on how fast I can write.2) I will release extra chapters (2-6 mon-fri respectively) if there is lots of interest from you guys, as a premiere special for the second week starting next monday.

Title: Two Illusionists (Short Story)
Synopsis: Renault Corellia is an illusionist who finds himself in the unenviable position of having to fight a duel to the death with another illusionist.

Title: Godling
Synopsis:
This is a story of a guy who one day comes home to find a program installed on his pc. He quickly learns that the program is just a game called godling that just showed up out of no where.

Fair warning to all of you;
I am not perfect, in fact i'm not even that good when it comes to writing.
I do it mainly because I enjoy it, I always love writing stories and sometimes I will post it like I will with this one.
My grammar could be better and my writing skills are so and so. 
I hope that by continuing to write I will grow as a writter so I would really appreciate it if you could point out my mistakes so that I can learn from them.
This story will be pretty laid back as I suck at action, but that doesn't mean I won't try to add any.
Release schedule is 2-4 chapters a month with each chapter about 1000 words give or take.

Title: JoJo’s Bizarre Tournament Arc (JJBTA)
Synopsis: Due to the power of an enemy stand, Josiah Joestar and his friends are forced into a death tournament, one in which only one remains at the end. Will they be able to stop it before the tournament ends, or will they be forced to fight amongst each other for survival? Or will they even be able to win their fights in the first place?

Title: Living My Life In Another World
Synopsis:
Huh~ I died? Kay~
Huh~ Reincarnation? Kay~
Huh~ I'm different? Kay~
Huh~ It's a forest? Kay~
Huh~ I'm strong? Kay~
Huh~ I can sleep? Kay~

Title: Dragon Road
Synopsis: Thomas was your average college guy, having trouble with his ex, still questioning his choice, of course, having doting parents on an almost always functional family, having average grades and problems in his life.Until he saw one strange thing, one that would change his fate forever.He saw one door... Mostly first-person narrative, sporadically updated, Inbox or comment my errors or feedback.

Title: Schwarzesmarken '86
Synopsis:
3 years after the dramatic conclusion of the Stasi coup attempt, Theodor Eberbach, who had made a new life for himself in the United Kingdom, returns to mainland Europe following rumors of the survival of Katia Waldheim as humanity is pushed back to a few strongholds by the BETA.
 
Originally written for Muv Luv threads on a certain imageboard, I'm posting it here so I don't lose it. Don't expect me to finish this as it has been around 2 years since I worked on it and I am working on an original writing project, but some feedback would be appreciated.

Title: The Labyrinth Chronicles
Synopsis:
The Labyrinth is the most famous & dangerous dungeon in the world. Attempting to conquer this vast underground stronghold is a quest fraught with peril. Escaping alive requires combating lethal monsters, evading devious traps, and navigating its convoluted maze.
With its entrance at Skypiercer's base the dungeon ascends the world's tallest mountain in a winding network of tunnels until the core chamber - the mountaintop lair of the fearsome Minotaur King. A truly monstrous foe, he has slain countless intruders. Surviving his ruthless onslaught after slogging through the dungeon is a task only the mightiest are capable of.
The Labyrinth is universally considered the sternest test of an adventurer's mettle anyone has ever seen. Thousands upon thousands have fallen attempting it; many powerful, veteran heroes do not dare to challenge it's greatest heights. Uncountable riches & everlasting fame await the first to prevail against the Minotaur King and complete the Labyrinth!
 
Cover picture credit to Rendory [Minotaur Gallery Here]

Title: Before:After
Synopsis:
Descriptions are yet to be reuploaded!

AN: I will reupload the chapters bit by bit and evaluate this project.

Title: Abyssal Fortress girl in another world
Synopsis: Because of an accident, God ended up sending some people to another world. As with all bad luck, our protagonist is sent to another realm/dimensions and consequently dies by being crushed under severepressure. After giving an apology, god, reincarnates our protagonist in that realm as a creature with some cheat/boon. Without any choice, our protagonist reincarnates as a monster in another world.  After reading many LitRPG novels, I decided to write my own as well. English is not my native language so forgive me for my mistakes and I hope to improve as I go.

Title: synthesis
Synopsis:
In the year 2099, people have become obsolete thanks to the amazing AI known as Tobi. Due to global unrest, the world government decided to give the people new worlds to provide them with some semblance of purpose.
follow Jakub your bland copy and paste protagonist on his adventures, as he's dragged into the political struggles of the world of synthesis. will he be the hero the people need or the villain they deserve? find out next time on Dragon ball Z.
Author note: I think the last couple of times I tried writing I put too much pressure on myself to keep to a certain word count and schedule so this time I'm just gonna write what I feel like doing in a sporadic manner.

Title: cottontail hero
Synopsis:
Carlin Atlin, part of the notoriously weak light bunny tribe. But despite their famed gentleness and fragility, Carlin was quite different. He could be described in two words: mini satan. his excessive energy was both loved and hated by the tribe, bringing trouble, but also life and interest into the repetitive and boring days.
If only these days would've lasted, but then again, this story wouldn't be here if that was so.
 
author: okay. this is just gonna be super casual, and super whatever. hope ya have fun reading cuz I'm just gonna try to and have fun writing it. :D
couldn't find the artist name for the cover?

Title: Game of the Year
Synopsis: One day everyone in the world woke up with an game installed on their phones called [The System]. Most people like to play games on their smartphones to pass the time. Some who don't tried to uninstall [The System] but to their surprise it would not go away.

Title: The Awakened Dungeon
Synopsis:
The world of Fiore. A world of magic, mnsters, heroes, villians, and ... dungeons. Most dungeons are barely thinking creatures whose only purpose is to kill and grow. This dungeon is different. Blessed with sapience, it has the power to break its shackles, to be more than just a killing ground. Whether it will do so ... only time will tell
---------------------------------------------------------
Hello Everyone! This is my first novel, and I hope you all like it. I'm mainly doing this for fun, and I promise I'll see this novel through to the end! I've been recently reading dungeon novels and I thought I'd give one a try.

Title: Change My Heart, Change My World, Change Me
Synopsis:
Portgas D Ace is dead in the Marinford, or also known as the war of best, saving his little brother with a smile on his face. Even after years passed some people are still hurting for his death. Still wishing that he was surviving and continuing his journey in life. Some of them are young, some old. Some are criminals, some are civilians and.... Some are gods.
One of the gods is a god from Ethereas Dimension, where his people are magical but mostly illogical. He stumbled upon Ace's adventure by mistake, and took a liking to him. It pains him that he can't save Ace, when Ace needed him the most. So, when a ripple happened in his dimension, he takes the chance.
As one of his children is asking for a second chance, he grants it while used the ripples to take Ace soul, and let it to be born again in his realm. Hopefully this time, in his realm here, Ace's adventure will last long and long....

Title: Procession of the Shadows
Synopsis:
The Kingdom of Rong, a barren snow-covered land in the constant state of war, has no need for its youngest princess. Shuang learned from an early age that it was in her favor to be quietly invisible, though that didn't curb her wish to escape. When the son of the Duke--handsome, cunning, ruthless--takes a sudden interest in her, she begins to wonder whether she might not find love and freedom after all.
Her plans are derailed when her father agrees to marry her off as a bargaining chip to the neighboring prince, who, rumor has it, is handsome and just. But Shuang isn't ready to exchange one prison for another, and she plots her escape on her wedding day. Unfortunately (or not), she runs directly into the prince to whom she's engaged, who is every bit as handsome as rumored . . . And the son of the Duke isn't ready to give her up yet either . . .

Title: The Tower Knight
Synopsis:
This is a tale about a guy that dies, and then gets reincarnated into a giant knight.
Knox was a failure of an adult, getting fired from his job he reluctantly killed himself. After his death, Knox wandered into the afterlife and met Death. Death, in need of a test subject, transported Knox into a vessel(minion) that was located in a different world. Knox wakes up as a 10-foot tall giant inside an underground ruin. The world he was transported into was a world of magic and monsters, in return for Knoxes' life Death requests of him a small favor..."Conquer the world in the name of DEATH!"
 
    This novel was made on a whim and out of boredom so don't expect to much from me.

Title: Seeking the Pinnacle
Synopsis:
Gong Lu was the perfect prodigy. Born into the position of Crown Prince, he was able to speak fluently at two, and read the works of great scholars with comprehension at eight. At sixteen, his father died and Gong Lu conquered the three provinces soon after. He could concoct plots that spanned countries, and scheme the scales off a dragon. But below the surface, he was in agony. Gong Lu could not live the life he had to with happiness, and deep down, the genius regretted his intelligence. He detested the fact that he could scheme and trick, abhorred the ruthlessness that came with power.  And so, he died with regrets. Despite unifying the world under one flag, despite mitigating discrimination, poverty, and dissent, despite crushing all conspiracies under his unfathomable mind, Gong Lu's last words were: "If I could start again..."  And so he did. Gong Lu swore that in this life, that he would not scheme or fool. They said that tricks were useless before absolute power. And this was what he wanted. This was what he would achieve.
  Release schedule: One chapter every Thursday and Sunday, will likely post chapters late in the day.

Title: Sunshine Night
Synopsis: This is the story of a Locus Suria, a man satisfied with life.

Title: Transmitted into the world of Cultivation chat
Synopsis:
This is a fanfiction of the Cultivation Chat Group light novel. I do not own the character that might that can appear from the regular light novel.
 
I do not own the picture on the cover of my book. if you find it offensive can take it down
 
this is the first time I am writing a fan fiction light novel. I am still learning how to write so there will be a ton of major grammar issues.
 
I hope that you guys do not mind the grammar issue too much.

Title: The Queen of a Secretly Demon Kingdom
Synopsis: A lost soul perished earlier than her supposed time. She glimpsed at an Incomprehensible Being holding Incomprehensible Power. The Being stared back and offered her another future. Cowed by their power, she accepted their proposition. The lost soul finds herself in a new world of Darkness that is in need of Light. After descending down the planet, the lost soul wakes up in a new body, a stony-faced attendant saddling her with the responsibility of Queendom in the secretly Demon kingdom.

Title: fair maiden, dark mother.
Synopsis:
wanted to play around with the fairytale universe... but, well, my story kinda popped out of my hands somewhere along the way.
no idea how much ill write.

Title: Korean Grindfest Online
Synopsis:
“The most powerful monster in the area had just spawned right on my back. And I was unarmored. And without potions. And a priestess, possibly the most vulnerable class. And still level 1. CRAP!”
Over ten years after last playing the game, a young man is granted his teenage wish: to be transported into the realm of Korean Grindfest Online. Follow his path through an old reality as he strives to become level 120, after which he may return to the real world. Overly cute monsters that attack viciously on sight! Hands without separate fingers! Exponential EXP curves! Months of mind-bogglingly monotonous monster grinding! Huzzah!

Title: Just Your Average Dungeon... Or Perhaps Not - A Dungeon Core Novel.
Synopsis:
Hiiro Aragon, just your average mage in the terateium (tae-rate-ee-um) mages academy. That is, until something peculiar happens which may just change the world forever. can you guess it? yes, you probably can thanks to the title... *sigh* Let's just get to the point: somehow he becomes a dungeon. But how? And what will he do? And what happened to the others that got caught in the event? Will he be able to keep his new identity a secret? Even while attending school at terateium academy? Read to find out. 
This is technically my first story since my first one went awry and such, and it's only a shell of it's former 12 chapters with only the prologue now.
PLEASE NO TROLL REVIEWS! only put an honest review, as in many novelsIhave read here have such a low rating but are great because of our mortal enemies, the TROLLS!

Title: My own world
Synopsis:
Ever made your own fantasy world with your own rules?
What would you do if that world becomes your new reality? 
Edit. 
This is the first ever piece of fiction, I had ever written. I want any kind of feedback from the readers or authors. This will help me improve and prevent me from making the same mistakes in the future thanks.

Title: Kindling Stars [Hiatus]
Synopsis:
Rivka grew up on a backwater world that is part of a vast interstellar empire, ignored by even it's feudal overlords outside of yearly taxation. She has a loving family with important and prosperous parents, two younger brothers, friends and the promise of a glowing career ahead. Both of her parents are capable mages and she confidentially expected to inherit their talent, to become one of the elect.
Instead she Awoke as a dragon, tearing apart her school in blood and fire, the product of some far distant ancestor finally breeding true. She was faced with no real choice at all but to become a ward of the noble house owning her homeworld, sponsored by them yet sworn to their service whilst being hurriedly packed aboard a starliner and sent to the sector capital for 'proper education'.
Dragons are mighty and terrible, regarded with awe, strategically and politically important, but dragons do not run the Empire. She is also a sixteen year old girl who now needs to eat several times her own body weight in meat on a daily basis and is being driven by the urge to burn or consume all who 'thwart' her. She is being sent to an exclusive academy for the most capable scions of the nobility.

Title: Young Miss, Please Don't Run
Synopsis:
This story has been removed for editing. It will be published for sale in a few months. Unedited chapters are still available on my Patreon page for my patron to read-only.
Please consider supporting at
https://www.patreon.com/EngChinStories
------------------------------------------
 
  Li Hei Yi got betrayed by her husband and was killed by him. She died but came back again as someone else!
When she opens her eyes again, she is no longer Li Hei Yi, but the young miss of the Ba Family, Ba Yue!
“So, I’m a useless fatty, huh? Well, I’ll show you who’s the useless one. And for those that have hurt me before, get ready. Because I am back! I’ll get my revenge and by the time I’m done with you, you’ll wish you are dead.”
“Big sister, big sister, I’ll fight the bad guys for you! I can cook and warm your bed. Please don’t throw me out,” said the idiot 7th prince.
Who would have thought the idiot 7th prince is actually the owner of the underworld known as the Ghost King! The man that can freeze you with one look from his cold eyes. 
“Little Yue, you can only be my wife! You can’t run away from me.” Whoever hurts her will have to pay the price! Said the Ghost King.
“My lord, you don’t look too convincing saying that while cooking. And where are you going now?"
“I have to go feed my little Yue and then sneak into her room to warm the bed for her.”
As the great Ghost King happily leaves the kitchen, his guards are dumbfounded by their king’s action. They knew their king has a long way to go to chase after his wife.
 
This is my original story, please don't steal or repost elsewhere without my permission.

Title: Dys
Synopsis:
A new name, new system, new life, what could possibly go wrong? Everything, that's for sure.
Mistakes turned to regrets, regrets turned to loathing, loathing turned into something sinister. That's were I was currently was. Now, an opportunity arises amidst the cesspool of sin, my time has arrived.
My chance for fame and glory starts today.

Title: My Life as an Adventurer
Synopsis: My name is Loyd, I'm a villager, but I have a dream. Dream of becoming a famous adventurer and get whatever I want. To reach the dream I will try my best!

Title: Broken clockwork
Synopsis: It was never meant to be like this. Kaveh Fahraddin had always wanted peace. Haunted by his past, he tries to escape it, but the world won't let him. This is a tale of a haunted man, one who cannot overcome himself.

Title: Tales of Demons and Gods and Some Guy [TDGSG]
Synopsis:
Fanfiction of Tales and Demons and Gods by Mad Snail.
Lanny woke up one day in a fourteen-year-old's body in the world of Tales and Demons and Gods.  Nie Li has just come back for the third time and Glory city is still on the path to destruction.  Together Lanny and Nie Li may just break Nie Li's last record of fastest power up, and next time he stands before the Demon Lord it'll be as an equal opponent.
...Or, the fanfic may just be yet another self-insert OP OC (please do not steal).  Whatever I want some writing experience and I liked this story a while ago.  I'm just aiming to write this fanfic for fun, so come on in if you like.
Probably expect all the warning tags associated with TDG, Isekai, and fanfictions.  Comedy, Action, echhi.  Romance?  Sure, let's call it that.  Young masters getting face slapped?  Well, duh, I mean what else is the point?  
Light-hearted stuff, really.  No NTR or traumatizing or psychological stuff.  Maybe some psyche-outs (just to prove how evil the baddies are, you know the drill).

Title: Removed
Synopsis: Removed

Title: The Ascension Chronicles
Synopsis: Eidolos is a ruined world. Yet despite its sorry state, the Mortals live on, establishing villages, towns, and cities, forming Kingdoms and Empires. The industrial revolution is in full swing and Mortals are re-claiming the lands, and adapting to the new challenges of their changed world after the events of the Ruination.Renaud Nikolaevich Dimitar, has lived within the secluded Dimitar Estate his entire life, yet upon his tenth winter, it is time for him to attend the Imperiya Academia as is mandatory per Imperial Law and begin learning the Arts of Ascension so that he may be of use to his Country.But Fate has other plans, and the unveiling of a Conspiracy as old as the Ruination may upend Renaud's understanding of his Country and his World.

Title: Emperor of Blue Flower Mountain
Synopsis:
**NOT ON HIATUS! Updates are just slow right now!**
Once upon a time, there lived two great and mighty spirits on the mountain. One loved humans, the other hated them. When their differences could not be reconciled, they came to blows, and the human loving spirit was chased out.Now there is only one spirit on the mountain. He sits on the peaks, looking down on those below him. Disaster and death is his reputation, and it is well earned. He is the Fairy Emperor, the King, and no one dares disobeys him. But he is empty on the inside.For he is alone.When anger and jealousy take everything, only love can create something new. This is a story of hope, redemption, and second chances.----
