Mafioso Loco

Title: A new life in a strange world
Synopsis:
There is something to be said for being sucked into an inter dimensional portal, carried through rivers of time and space with such force that your flesh slowly disintegrates - only to be dumped in the body of a newborn.I, Edred Brant Aylmer, have been reborn.
 
All rights reserved by AaronRidg3

Title: Image Conqueror
Synopsis:
Before you read this, despite how the first chapter seems, this is a fantasy reincarnation novel. It is not a story about technological developments.
I will edit this synopsis, it is frankly terrible:
Life in a new world. A world different from the old world. A world where magic rules above all other things. A world where everyone can drive magic, can use the power of magic. A world where the only thing that limited your power was your ability to imagine, your ability to manifest your memories into a mental picture. The clearer the image in your mind, the more focused the magic, the more vivid the image, the more powerful the magic.
 
Old Synopsis:
Life in a new world. A world where magic rules above all. A world where everyone has the power to do magic. A world where the only thing that commanded magic was your memories. The ability to imagine them. The clearer the image, the more focused the magic. The more vivid the image, the more powerful the magic.
However, what if you were blind? There was magic that could fix blindness, but they could not control magic with the images made from magic. Even though new images could be formed with the eyes healed by magic, these images could not be used to invoke the world's law of magic.
Only one in all of history has broken this rule...
 
Cover Font is Argos MF.

Title: The Dual Cores - A Dungeon Core Story
Synopsis: James and Jessie are twins with opposite tastes. For example; James liked Science fiction, and building games, while his sister preferred fantasy, and fighting games. An accident happened and they died. they died together as one and ended up in front of the goddess of dungeons who separated their souls while keeping them together as the first dual dungeon.

Title: Mr. Vampire’s Wife
Synopsis:
A succubus who travelled to the human realm in search of a good prey meets a handsome young man with a majestic aura at a bar. She asks him for a night just to feel addicted to his taste!
They meet each other again after a month and became partners in bed, only to find out that the man was already married! What will happen to this newly found partnership?
 
Author’s note: This novel is a fantasy story that doesn’t really have that much of a fantasy aspect. It focuses on more of the MC’s life so please keep that in mind!

Title: Let’s Love!
Synopsis:
A sequel of “Mr. Vampire’s Wife”. The MC this time is Reika, Lilica’s daughter!
The twins arrived at the human realm and already found someone they’re interested in since the first day! Will this newfound love continue on forever?

Title: Wishing Flower
Synopsis: A story about a scientist and his little sister. The names used in the organization are codenames so only family members knows the members' real names.

Title: Somewhat of a reunion...
Synopsis: A short story about remembering a not-so enjoyable past.

Title: Synergist - Ascendant
Synopsis:
In a world of cultivators and mages, those with the title Synergist are king.
Flea was born an urchin, expecting to die young and broken. Fortunately, destiny had other plans for him. Granted the mysterious ability that called itself "System", he is afforded the opportunity to rise to the top. Will he fly or falter?
Follow our protagonist as he discovers his destiny. Expect great and terrible things from him and from his world.
----
I've finally decided to put proverbial pen to paper and submit something to this website. I'm new to writing, and just want to get the experience of writing something down. Expect a weird medley of comedy, grim dark(ish) and hijinks of some sort. I have no intention of ever taking the story down fromt the website, though I might publish it if I'm happy with the quality. I'm always open to constructive criticism and feedback!

Title: Vampire's Revenge
Synopsis:
"I had a dream. It was a very nice dream. I dreamt of my parents. Of my slightly overworked but always content father and of my ever helpful and beautiful mother. They were both very smart, very wise and very old. We had a picknick in the castel garden, among the rose bushes. I'm very greatful for everything my parents did for me and for the dreams that let me see there faces again. Never letting me forget why i do the things i do. As for those filthy, detestible, disgusting humans... Hmph... Let them come! Let's see them try to take me!"
The small girl with crimson eyes, pale and frail looking, no more than 8 years old said while hefting a huge, crimson, 10 barrelled rotary machine gun onto her shoulder as if it weighed nothing.
Carefully making her way down the mountain of corpses she slept on, she carefully tidied up her fine, black silk, gothick dress.
As her bare feet carefully stepped from one mangled corpse to another, her claws tapped the gun making clicking sounds. "Where should i go today? Continue West? Or maybe switch to the North? So many human cities and so much walking. I really should get myself one of those things they ride in."
-----
Not much, just something i threw together in my spare time. Bare in mind that I am waiting this on my phone and the autocorrect is more of a pain than it is helpful so if you see a word that looks out of place just post the sentence in the comments and I'll try to get around to fixing it at some point. 
Enjoy and see you on the other end.

Title: Lost to the Mist
Synopsis: The year is 1870, the Franco-Prussian War rages on, and a newly formed unit -14e Régiment de Cuirassiers- armed with the latest in weaponry and training are marching to join the rest of the Brigade in an offensive to stall the Prussian advance. However, as on the march they run across a strange grey fog, one that obscures all vision within. Despite the risk, they march onward, upon riding through the mist, all 1200 find themselves transported to a fantasy realm seeming stuck in the medieval ages. Having to lead this Regiment of elite cavalry is a young blonde haired man by the name of Luc Demoulin. Being a newly promoted Colonel and untested Commander, it’s up to him to protect all those within the 14th as they try to figure out where they are and establish something of a home in this new world they find themselves. To help in this effort are a small population of elves led by a beautiful elven woman by the name of Calondra, whom the 14th had saved from a life of slavery mere moments after arriving…

Title: DND Homebrew Shorts
Synopsis:
These are short stories for my homebrew DND campaign.
The campaign will be set 10 years after magic apocalypse. Technology quit working and people slowly became other races or abruptly changed the day of the second sun. No blue screens and limited magical items but players are allowed to scavenge for guns and supplies.
These stories will start off with the people who help create the backgrounds for my campaign but will work on other ideas eventually.

Title: Nello & Pastrache ~2nd~ :: (Another World Story of a WW2 Tank in an LitRPG Transmigration!)
Synopsis: (Inspired by 'A Dog in Flanders'). Once upon a Belgium Story, a certain Boy and his Dog were found frozen on the steps of a Church. In sympathy, the Goddess of Rebirth and Transmigration gave them a second chance to fulfill their promises to each other. Through many cruel cycles, they will finally meet again in a world of magic and fantasy... One as a struggling Half-Elf and one as a reincarnated Tank.Please root for them.

Title: Spirit Shifter
Synopsis: The story revolves around Miroka, an average high school girl who is interested in making friends with the class loner, Zef. Little does she know that she will soon get involved with the boy's supernatural work, exorcism.

Title: In Memoriam
Synopsis:
William has set himself a goal and in achieving it he will honour his Grandfather's memory. He doesn't care about his family, their politics, their goals.
William will become a delver and pit himself against The Dungeon and climb. Perhaps he will achieve glory and merits of his own. Or maybe he will die alone in the depths.
He doesn't yet know how things will go, but he intends to see his resolution through to the end. Earnest the Undying taught him to do things in full or not at all and William keeps that teaching close to his heart.

Title: The Warden of the East
Synopsis:
YOU HERETICS!HOW DARE THEE TOUCH THE GREAT WALLS OF THE BLESSED SAINT NI- oh hello there! Nice to finally meet you! My name is sir Eric Karlon, I fight for his holy majesty king Alexi- IF YOU TOUCH THE WALL I WILL HAVE A PIKE SHOVED WHERE GODS LIGHT DOES NOT SHINE!*cough* I FIGHT FOR HIS HOLYNESS ALEXIA LANBERDY THATS ALL!
We follow(at a distance)the story of Eric Karlon the most holy and mad of the four wardens of the walls and his page Peter Yoalf.We will see him try to reason with HERETICS!
hello! This is my first story and well me anglish is vry beid(my English is very bad)so if I get something wrong please tell me and if there is something that does not make sense or if the story is going downhill.Am BEGGING YA TELL ME!!!
 
P.S Pic is not mine so if its yours pls tell me in the comments or something I will take it down

Title: The sun and the moon; a tale of two protagonists
Synopsis:
After a heated battle for the right to a rare item, two famous female players find themselves suddenly transported back to the tutorial zone. Confused at first, they soon realize all their levels, stats and skills have been reset to those of a new character's. Strangely enough their inventory remained untouched and all legendary equipment have thus been preserved, but none of that mattered as being level 1 meant they could not overcome the level requirements to adorn them.
What was going?
As they continued forward they quickly find out that perhaps things were not the same as the game they remembered, or rather, it was exactly the same but 'different' in a way. Things have become more 'real', as if this was no longer just a game but reality. If that was the case, then even after the reset they still had one advantage on their side: they knew the game's story. Using that knowledge they will have to live on in this familiar yet dangerous new world.
This is the story of how two hated rivals- a fiery noblewoman and a frigid maid- are forced to join hands in order to survive. "Perhaps there are indeed two sovereigns in the sky... The sun and the moon."

Title: The Four Mental Opposers
Synopsis: Set in the fictional land of Exliciour, the story tells about four individuals; Craide Annieguard, whose sister, Annie, disappeared one night, stolen by the tides after raising her family's class, Mercury Oceanguard, the fallen princess who swore to fight and gain her family's respect against all odds, Herrisa Arrowguard, the coldest girl amongst all frozen-hearted girls after her family was ruthlessly annihilated by evil forces, and the last one, Runo Merchantguard, a mysterious child from a low-class family who seems to be a genius. The four meet upon arriving at Winshire Academy, a place where people from all around Exliciour gather to train how to bend both elemental forces and mental forces. The powers are divided to oppose each other, fire vs. ice, nature vs. poison, light vs. mist, heart vs. mind, illusion vs. reality, life vs. pain, etc. It is only there where the four realizes that they were all destined to meet upon finding out about the Four Mental Opposers, an ancient group that served under the rulers of the country, whose powers consisted of both Mental and Elemental types of bending. Upon learning of this, the four set out to find the power corrupting the land and ends up having to fight against the three ruling families.

Title: The Avatar of Death
Synopsis:
How would you feel if you suddenly lost all the meaning to your life? Your family, friends... Heh even the life itself.
But in exchange, you stumbled upon the biggest secrets of the entire universe. The powers long forgotten... The powers sealed long ago... The curse that's hidden within... Would you be ready to pay that price to get your revenge?  Mira did... and this is his story.
Authors note: This is my first Light novel so point out any mistakes. Thanks. I don't like mistakes.

Title: Deviation
Synopsis:
There is a place in the far off reaches of space. It is a lonely place in the barest portion at the edge of the universe. There are no stars or other planets for light-years. A region few have ever wanted to visit and fewer still actually have. If you were to visit you'd find and small rip in space-time leading to the most bizarre and out of place thing you have ever seen. A solar system consisting of five planets, all with life, all stuck in conflict, and all absolutely bursting with energy.
For some it seems like a paradise. A land of sword and sorcery? Why would anyone pass that up? That was the thought process of the freshly dead boy. This boy, like many before him and many after him, was trying to find the bright side. Things had finally been going right for him, good grades, new friends, and best of all a girlfriend when the entire world ended. No huff, no puff, just poof the end. At least being reborn into this world would be fun. That definitely sounded like a bright side to most.
Fracture, one of the five worlds in question, was massive and full of magic. It looked sounded and felt like it would be just another game, it even had prompts and levels. Piece of cake. Well that might be the case if Fracture was meant to be a paradise. The hottest fires forge the strongest swords. This fire has the habit of melting away oneself. A pixie clan searching for a new home, a boy who just lost his, a reality bending forest, and a bug that doesn't belong. All with an intense desire for power. Who will make it through the fire intact, and will they choose to be a hero, or will they join the long history of villains and monsters?

Title: Birds of a Feather
Synopsis:
What happens when a sheltered princess meets an unruly bird? Will they manage to break free of their respective cages or will they simply exchang one cage for another?
 
- Hi dear readers, I'm slow to update due to real life work reasons.

Title: 243 Wanderers
Synopsis:
My name is Karasuma Eiji, a boy abandoned by my parents, and getting picked up by your everyday ordinary drug dealer. And on one particular day, I got careless and got caught when I was delivering the package.
After that incident and spending some time in the juvenile and rehabilitation centre, and getting re-educated. By the time I reached the age to enter a high school, I finally had the opportunity to go out of the system and take my freedom with terms.
I must attend and finish the boarding school without adding a single bad record.  
But at the entrance ceremony, my world suddenly changed. The whole 1st-year student is summoned into a fantasy world in order to defeat the demons and become a hero.
However, why do I want to do that?
What's the benefit? Is it Money? Then how much? Is it Fame? Or just plainly returning home after everything was over?
What about our safety? Is there any insurance?
And what should I care? This isn't my world nor do I have any special bond with this world.

Title: Hero City
Synopsis:
Enjoy the first three chapters! Find the full story here on Amazon.
After recovering from an explosion that shook several blocks of his city, Police Officer Robert Kipp found himself paralyzed and stuck behind a desk. Even though he'd been recognized as a hero for rescuing and evacuating numerous families, he really didn't feel like one. An unexpected birthday gift from his son, ends up being the newest technology in Full Immersion Virtual Reality gaming, which allows him to log into Hero City, and use his legs! Here he can learn to be a true hero! But with this being his very first online video game, will he be able to adapt and stop the villains from controlling the city?

Title: The Earthen Immortal
Synopsis:
A nameless soul, living countless lives in countless bodies. 
What does it mean to be truly immortal?
And what do you do when your immortality reaches a limit?
Obviously, you get thrown into a new world by a mysterious force that governs your unique power.

Title: Malicious, Magical,  Malfoy
Synopsis: People often complained about a lack of birthright. Being reborn as Draco Malfoy meant I had the opposite issue. So many new things to take into account. Politics, magic, family traditions, the wizarding world and this odd new power that insisted my new reality was a game. What's a Gamer SI to do.

Title: Treasured Ascension
Synopsis:
The Black sheep of the Seren Clan. A piece of trash. Calum had many monikers as he grew up. He didn't care, he had his father, the only being willing to accept him as he was.
After the death of his father, Calum decides to embark on the path of cultivation no matter the price. This led him to the Demonic Saint sect where he encountered serendipity.

Title: The King's Dungeon
Synopsis:
The world of Praelium is a simple one. Wake up in the morning, get dressed, eat some breakfast, stare at the outside scenery and look at all the wild monstrosities that roam the landscape. Oh, and you can't forget the constant battle. Or the magic. And the guilds. Infact, Praelium really isn't simple. Everything is a constant battle to survive, as even in the most peaceful of cities, someone or something will always be out there, rooting for your demise.
And the thing that cheers the most for the immediate dissipation of your frail soul?
Dungeons. Areas of landscape that are unusual in every way. Vast deserts the size of planets, oceans of lava, you name it, a Dungeon can have it. But in this story? We aren't talking about any old, run of the mill, "Hurr durr, monster, battle, treasure!" type of Dungeon. We're talking about the Dungeon of a King. That's right, you heard me loud and clear.
We're following the Dungeon of a King, and its Master, Basileus, in their conquest to become Praelium's greatest, most hated. Praelium's most revered, most feared. Praelium's most adored, most scored. Praelium's finest Dungeon, the cream of the crop, the Dungeon of Dunegons, and the one that will rise above all!

Title: Dungeonovel: Without Creatures, Through Iron and Steel.
Synopsis: Dungeons are alive and much like most alive creatures, they have goals. Most of dungeons goals are simply to survive, while others want to research or try new things as a dungeon. Some enjoy building caverns and filling them with challenges so that sentient creatures can try to overcome them (<--- Much like a DM). The other aspect of dungeons that is normally overlooked is that dungeons can reproduce. Dungeons can make other dungeons much like a dungeon creature, however, for a dungeon to grow it must have its own area of influence. This means that when one dungeon make another, the new dungeon is placed either at the edge of the parent's influence or completely outside. Dungeons choose to reproduce mainly for survival, if it is to divide attention between two dungeons or to make one dungeon "safer" than the other. This is a story of one such dungeon, made on the outside of the parent's influence.

Title: Nyanya N. Nya
Synopsis: Top-tier poetry about catgirls. I don't really know what else to say. Not for people below a certain legal number?

Title: Exorcism 101: Where Love can Cure Ghost Possession
Synopsis: Exorcists are human beings who can get rid of curses given by restless ghosts to normal human beings. If a human received a curse, his or her heart will stop beating. That is why an exorcist needs to get rid of the curse by inducing emotions that can make their heart beat again. There are two ways to save a victim and one of those is by the means of...love.

Title: Young Saviour
Synopsis:
Disclaimer: This is an Original story written by me set within the world of Young Adversary with Kodyak comb's Approval and is a canon story. it will feature characters and storyline created by me and there will be little interference between my characters and Miko at least until the latter parts (unless we want them to fight earlier) and he will be no less important to the world then Miko.
Zuma is a young boy from humble origins, kidnapped when young to be transformed into the Ultimate Weapon, he escapes his fate but his adventure isn't over yet. Mundas, A world where god's, Demon's, Heroes and Beasts fight an endless war, he must now find his place within it.
Quetzalcoatl, Feathered Serpent of Aztec Mythology chooses him to be her Proxy and when fate rears its ugly head again, he will now learn about what it truly means to live in Mundas and how he can become more then Just a Weapon.

Title: Song of the Void
Synopsis: A great race faces extinction and tries to leave a legacy for the future. Young races building on the ruins of the old. What happens when one of the old ones wakes up and finds the universe changed? Will she try to find new meaning? Will she try to help the younger races or will she punish the grave-robbers for their sacrilege? Or will the eternal servant of her people try and finally find some happiness of her own?

Title: The Pulse
Synopsis: If we are reading books on this site, we all know that the world is boring, so we read to escape to another, just for a bit. But what if the world was interesting again?

Title: Folgore
Synopsis:
When humanity settled in the stars they hoped to finally turn a new leaf to their history of violence, however, the universe had other plans for them. After years of fruitless war when dozens of colonies turned to dust, Humanity created the Folgore, a special force able to turn the tides of war.
The story follows a young man whom accidentally was recruited in Folgore against his will.
-----------
If you are fans of Gantz, Halo, or Terror infinity, this story will appease you.

Title: Rebirth of Zeus
Synopsis:
What happens when the greatest god gets reincarnated as a game-loving human? An overpowered solo player! Follow Zeus as he conquers all his digital ennemies and swoons the gaming goddesses!
Short sypnosis but I didn't want to spoil the story. I'll try 3-5 chapters a week and, unfortunately, pretty short ones. This is my first novel so, yeah. Expect some mistakes and plotholes, I guess.

Title: Rebirth Of A Serial Killer
Synopsis:
A youth around the age of 16 is a normal teenager with hobbies like anyone else. Though, his hobby includes killing people and leaving White Roses on their bodies. After multiple killings, the news and the media decided to label him ‘White Rose’. 
 
Later, the police along with the government set out to capture White Rose. The police attempt to capture him multiple times but end up failing.
 
Finally, White Rose turns himself in but is later shot on the way to jail by a victim's father. White Rose wakes up in a new world in someone else’s body. His new body is named Zuhn Sheng and he is being hunted by every large Mortal Sect in the region because of his powers.
 
Follow Zuhn Sheng as he sets off on his journey to become stronger and explore his new profound powers, While sticking to his roots of being a skilled killer.

Title: destroyer of worlds Ye NIng
Synopsis:
Ye Ning died and is given 20 wishes by god. find out what he wishes for.
Mc is very OP, I mean too op.

Title: Celestica, a world of Sword and Magic.
Synopsis:
"Celestica, a world of sword and Magic" SImple and straight to the point is how the world is depicted. If one were to ask a person of a world without magic and magical races: they would immediately say "A world where I can finally live like that game I've played and dreamed about!". Rich in magic, magical races and equally magical monsters.
 
Ichiharu Hayato had believed that he was going to be immediately put back to work but instead of finding himself in that mirrored dimension, he had found himself staring up at the blue sky of a different world with no new orders. He was brought there, to rest his weary soul which contained not only blessings but also curses of deities and pathless.
 
Will he finally get his well deserved rest or was he being hired with no proper contract and no proper way of refusing?

Title: Visions of Nol
Synopsis:
Nol, a galaxy brimming with power and advanced technology, home to a host of unique races. As the galaxy enters another era of peace, turmoil beneath the surface may bring unexpected changes. This is the story of Nol. The galaxy, its people, civilizations, and events that shape and intertwine destinies. Follow stories of legends, of turmoil and salvation, of the mighty and the meek. No tale is too small to be told, as all, from planet breaking battles to the simple struggles of daily life, are Nol.
# # #
The Visions of Nol are short stories that depict the Nol Galaxy from a variety of angles. Through these stories, I hope to show a wholistic image of Nol. Each story will follow a new character, or will take place on a different planet, show different lifestyles, aliens, and tell different stories of individuals in Nol. If you get attached to a character, don't worry, because they'll probably pop up again somewhere in this web of interconnected stories.  In the visions of the Nol Galaxy, no story is too small to be told. 
 # # #
I am currently building a website to encompass all things Nol, check it out HERE
You can also check out the blog here: https://nolgalaxy.blog/

Title: Mysteries of the Q Files - The Deadly Dance
Synopsis:
Back in the game after a crazy Spring Break, the Q Files need Naomi and Trick to resolve a bizarre case. The teens need to infiltrate a school's prom. But this not just the greatest night of their lives, or the most awkward, it is a ticking time bomb. The authorities have been tipped off to a potential attack, but the message came wrapped up in symbols and hints to the Occult and the Realms. The gang must split up, leaving Trick and Naomi vulnerbale.
And that is where the fun and danger begin. There is something very wrong with this school and its prom, and it goes deeper than what can be seen on the surface. In this race against time and a bad playlist, Trick and Naomi are going to have to get out of their comfort zones and bust all the moves.

Title: Bogatyr
Synopsis:
The three immortal bogatyrs—Dobrynya, Ilya, and Alyosha—have existed for millennia. Thanks to their military contributions, Kievan Rus easily defeated its enemies and became the sole ruler of The Northern Wastes.
However, not all is good for the empire. Prince Vladimir, faced with a complicated situation, resolves to kill Ilya as a solution.
Ilya is reborn as Kitanda, a sickly peasant son of the Tanuri tribe, somewhere in the African savanna. His memories are gone. His destiny, however, remains unchanged. 

This fiction uses characters from Russain folktale but will take place in a different world and timeline. Don't expect accuracy. I only have a very basic knowledge of folktale, and I can't remember history to save my life. Have fun reading!

Title: The Atlas
Synopsis:
Follow the journey of the most recent wielder of The Atlas
 --------------------------------------------------
On Hiatus currently, looking at reworking this as I'm not too happy with it.
Everything so far will be compressed to a single longer chapter.
----------------------------------------------------
Short chapters, infrequent and chaotic release dates. Sorry. Doing his kinda for therapy.

Title: REDTIDE
Synopsis: With the razing of Derin's home, a new era dawned unbeknownst to the world - for Derin would stop at nothing, and pay any price, to exact his revenge. To return magic stolen long ago by a tyrannical king, to draw blood in the memory of his village, and to stop for nothing and for nobody, Derin would pick up the gauntlet and shoulder a responsibility never meant for one man - but at what cost?

Title: World Conquering System
Synopsis: A world much like earth, but with one difference magus and warrior families exist and hide in plain sight from normal people. Over the years the magus and warrior families have gone down in combat strength, but their influence has only increased. Born one day into one of the best magus families, the Griffins family, was twins. One twin, Grizwald, with high talent in all afinities for magic. The other, Ozwald, born with the negative talent in all afinities. Join Ozwald as he forges his path using his intelegence, hard work, and mysterious system to one day conquer the world.

Title: My Girlfriend is a Demon
Synopsis:
This story revolves around a shut-in otaku named Shiro Akashi.
When he was a kid, his father disappeared. Because of that, Shiro stopped going to school. In loneliness, he devoted his life playing games and watching animes.
One day, as Shiro woke up from his bed, he saw someone sitting on top of the table on the other side of the room.
That person, a girl with black wings, two horns and a tail, wearing nothing but a bra and her underwear, covered in a coat, hiding her face, appeared right in front of him.
This girl suddenly said that she will be Shiro's girlfriend
Will this encounter bring good luck? Or will he continue to waste his time watching animes and games?

Title: Swordsman X Healer
Synopsis:
With the collapse of the Domain of Demons along with their Lord, the survivors escaped and hid within the human society. They blended and lived well since their escape until two opposing factions were formed. The first faction opposed the state they lived in and said they felt oppressed. The other faction didn’t agree to their opinion. A war broke between them and exposed their secrets of hiding which caused a terrible witch hunt. It occurred throughout the entire land, slaughtering the demons left and right.
Decades after the slaughterous witch hunt, demons have gone silent or, might be, have been eradicated.
After a year or so, demonic creatures have risen from the wilderness, decimating villages left and right, leaving nothing behind. It repeatedly occurred until it got noticed. An expedition has been formed by the Trinity Kingdom to investigate the cause while the kingdom alerts all the villages, towns, and cities to increase their security levels.

Title: Did you only summon a hero
Synopsis: It's a tale about same old story of people summoning people from different world to help them defeat demons and other things like that but did demon are really evil did you always be summoned by good people or did you only summon good people who obey you if you summon them lets find out what really happen if you summon wrong type of person

Title: Blood Drinker
Synopsis:
What happens when someone dies? Obviously, they stay dead just kidding they reincarnate, sometimes they get to revisit worlds they have lived before sometimes new, so do good or bad deeds matter? No, it definitely does, chances of being reborn into what your desire increase, or if your bad into what you hate. Each life is supposed to be a learning process for your soul to make amends to fight for what you believe in. Some souls are tainted and they continue to taint themselves and the others around, so too does the opposite happen. Kindred souls are drawn together and they can bring calamity or salvation to their respective worlds. But what does this have to do with the story well, our friend Alexander is reborn into a world of magic but of course that’s not enough to mention him, no the true reason we will follow his story is because much like there are those who claim to remember their past life, he truly does have a head start in his case.
Author's Note: Thanks for taking your time to read my first try at writing. English is my first language, so please correct me on anything that sounds wrong. I'll try to write it once a week, sometimes more if I feel like I’m on a roll but please I hope this stays a pleasant experience for us both.

Title: Ethelcea
Synopsis:
A pale eyed devil who sought acceptance, a demon harlot's daugter who longed for meaning, and an exiled beast who fought for honor. History has known them to be a group of heroes who travelled far and wide to other countries, others have regarded them to be a most feared enemy who slaughter those in its way. With all titles and infamy passed on to them, the group has only regarded themselves as simple wanderers. Each searching for their own meaning, this is their story on how they fought, lived, and met.
 
Fair warning: This story is my take and a jab on the typical isekai/tensei trope with demon lords, heroes, and cataclysmic fate of the world rest in the hands of the saviors and some rpg game elements. If you are tired of these kind of tropes then feel free to skip this story, if not then I hope you enjoy my story.

Title: Blue Flames
Synopsis:
Summary:
Now named Artemis the former phoenix has been reborn as an elf. She had been imprisoned in darkness, left to die with no means to escape, but now she is back in a new body and a new world. 
Not having any goals she has to decide what she lives for. Knowing nothing about this world she has to learn. Born weak she has to become strong. 
She may not know how she got there but she won’t let this chance escape. 
 
 
Editor:
SleeplessOwl

Title: LiMB: ZERO DARK ASCENSION ARMA
Synopsis:
LiMB is a work of fiction inspired by webnovels such as "Re:Zero - Starting life in another world" and visual novels such as "Fate/Stay night" or "Sengoku Rance". 
Not unlike a visual novel LiMB has two main routes branching out from the the first chapter, with additional routes being added as the story progresses. There are also "ending routes", spinoffs or dead-ends that still need to be told. 
There is no recommended reading order, although a chapter in one path may shed light on another. 
When a choice appears in a chapter that choice will be branded as (R1), (R2) or (SR) for a special offshot ending. 
I hope you will enjoy this, more art will be added along the way // grunt

Title: The New Era Project
Synopsis:
Feng Ye, a freshman one step away from finishing his first year of university, had the unfortunate experience of encountering a distortion in space, thus, sending him into the void. Due to a fortuitous encounter, he had acquired a system and had found himself in an interesting developed world comprised of individuals with the abilities of the supernatural.
Feng Ye mutters as he looks at the huge influence he had created. "When I look back, I wonder.. since when did I become Mr. Nice guy?"
Nearby, Akeno chuckles, “Ever since you had decided to establish the New Era Project and became the president of the New Era Society, you have been doomed to take on the Mr. Nice guy title.”
With an eye roll, Feng Ye retorts, “Didn’t you know that nice guys finish last?”
Follow Feng Ye as he makes his mark in this new world while finding his way home. The beginning of the New Era. Feng Ye’s Era.
 
Discord: https://discord.gg/rdyPuhs

Title: You all Belong to Odin
Synopsis: Living on the street, without legs, without a future, without hope, a war veteran finds a new purpose when Odin visits him in a dream. When he wakes up, Odin and his ravens are gone, and reality is beating at his head. He is forced into a choice. Ignore a brutal rape or get involved in stopping it. By choosing to interfere he sets in motion a series of events that will definitely change the course of the world.

Title: So What If I'm Trash? Who Needs Cultivation?!
Synopsis:
Qing Shan Long. They say he isn't human. An escaped experiment from some government facility, a reincarnation of a saint, a freakish superhuman. Whatever he was one thing was clear. Be it Music, Martial Arts, Science, whatever he does he excels. He was a whimsical man. A great man. A man who craving for knowledge and excitement knows no bounds, whose collection of books and personal library would even make Alexander the Great green with envy. He donated to all manners of charities and funded many projects for helping the poor and disabled.
A self made man who single handedly founded one of the largest corporations in the world, Wen Qu Technologies, whose influences reach from vast fields of expertise. From objects of war such as the newest aircrafts, droids, and body armor; to life saving medicine and vaccines; to even the mundane such as video games and the fast food industry. A legendary example of determination and hard work. He was in his car being driven to a business meeting to disclose a deal that would help ensure the country could have access to clean energy and help reduce the pollution that has been plaguing his homeland for the past millenia when he was assassinated and woke up in a strange new world. How will Qing Shan deal with his new environment where the strong suppresses the weak? From the top of the world he suddenly finds himself free falling to rock bottom. Unable to cultivate, a weak body, and all but disowned by his family.
 
(For those who read comics and watch cartoons, imagine him as being Tony Stark, Richard Reeds, Jimmy Neutron, etc level of 'Genius'. )
 
My own spin on some familar tropes. Another reincarnation into another world story. The MC will take over the body of someone with a trash body that can't cultivate and will be hated and neglected by his family. Pretty typical so far right? Except there won't be some amazing miracle to heal our MC, there isn't some magical grandpa to teach him some OP thing which only his trash body can use, there isn't a hidden op bloodline, and he is not from a super amazing assassin clan or genius doctor. He isn't the chosen one, he's just a guy trying his best to make something with a crap situation. First attempt at a wuxia type story!
I like playing with common tropes, maybe adding a twist, to playing it straight as a classic. I have absolutely no idea where this is going to take me but please do give your input and I'll do my best so that everyone has a say in where our journey will go.
I'll admit the only knowledge I have of chinese history and ancient society is from reading light novels translated to english and some old dramas, so if I make some social passe just take it as because this is another world, not exactly an AU where magic and stuff actually exist. I'm also not actually Chinese and will basically using google to help me with names and other such, if I make a mistake please let me know!
(Even if you don't like the story or couldn't bare to get past chapter 1 please leave a comment so I can find out where to improve, thank you!)

Title: Trailblazer
Synopsis:
The story of a man who accidentally wrote another world into existence.
Everyone breaks away from their mundane daily life in one way or another. Our protagonist, an unfortunate consequence of circumstance, being no different, often escaped the harsh reality of life by writing stories of an alternate world of swords and magic. Though he recognized the difference between reality and fantasy, he could've never imagined what would happen, when the line between the two blurred as lightning struck down from the skies, and his escapism fantasy became all too real...
After he came to, he would soon learn that things in the other world aren't quite as he remembered them to be. The world he wrote of had become but a shadow of its former self.
Albeit hesitant at first, he sets off on a quest to find out the secrets behind the Trails, yet even then, he can't help but wonder... Can he really bring his world back to its old glory?
 
—————————— 
 
I have never written a story before in my life and now I'm doing so in a language I don't natively speak. Groundbreaking quality is probably not something to be expected, but I do my best to keep things readable.
With the necessities out of the way, both constructive criticism and other suggestions are very much welcome, and I'll do my best to take them into account when writing future chapters.

Title: Ruler of the Dead
Synopsis:
Yulian Smith has found himself in quite the predicament. Working his best to turn his father's dying business into a well-respected establishment and finishing his dream to craft the world's best sword was hard enough. Especially considering how his family legacy was a dying art. Few appreciate the beauty of a fine blade, most only using them to show off and was satisfied with cheap decorational knockoffs. What use are such instruments of war when any average joe could defeat a well-practiced master with a lucky shot from a gun? But those were the least of his worries when he finds himself in a new world and captured as a slave. Where lives are worth less than a loaf of bread and he must fight to survive, can he find a way to thrive in this harsh land?
Grimdark, tragedy, terrible things happening to villain and heroes alike. What's that? Adorable scenes of fluff? Just another trap to make the pain all the worst when events happen. Can one become addicted to pain? Keep reading and find out for yourself.

Title: My Book of scribbles
Synopsis:
Its a random book of thoughts and stuff, random things and just general weirdness.  I might do 1 chapter or 100 just don't expect to much.
I will update the tags as i go.
No chapter is related to another unless said so and the quality varies wildly
At less one is quite dark in tone... so yeah
You have been told

Title: Totaris
Synopsis:
Totaris, a world of magic, adventure and wonders. 
Yuri a mage makes his way through this world, searching for treasures and power only mentioned in legends or decaying texts. To complete a goal set by many, the path to immortality and ultimate power.  
What adventures will this young man face, terrifying monsters, large dungeons and other adventures. Find out in Yuri's journey through Totaris.

Title: After Life
Synopsis:
The full story is still on this site for free! But now you can purchase the edited/fully polished Kindle/Paperback version if you so feel inclined. https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B09P26HVDQ
Armageddon, everyone dies. Certain people called Ultrasapiens come back to life with superpowers. Who are you, what power do you have, and why? That is the question I asked of my friends. They told me their idea and I wrote them into this story. 
Feel free to leave a comment of your character's ability. I'd love to add them in! 
-
In the near future scientists have discovered a very real threat to the earth brought on by massive solar flares.  With anarchy spreading, the governments of the world have banded together in order to prepare for the worst. Building disaster vaults, and designating safety zones in order to protect lawful citizens and the world's elites. 
After a chain of catastrophic events beings known as Ultrasapiens, arise from the ashes of the old world.  In essence, they are a transcendence of human evolution fused with a primal will of instinct. These individuals are able to reclaim their physical selves, to pursue a road laid out before them by something bigger than us all.  
Struggling to piece together everything that happened, the Ultrasapiens learn that there is much more to the universe than ever thought possible.  They will discover the key role that they, and the Earth truly play for the future.  Two forces strive for dominance.  One encourages the will of natural growth, letting the universe flow to its own design.  The other controls with a forceful manipulation, shaping reality to a designed outcome.  Religion is met with science, faith met by truth, and fiction with reality.

Title: The World Where Fantasy Became Reality!
Synopsis: An Ancient being with infinite power was released into our world. He became The God of our world. He changed this world we know into the world of fantasy. Where magic is real.

Title: Hearthrow
Synopsis: Young Pointy hood sets foot in a foreign land disguised as a prison warden in order to help his master escape the prison where he is currently being held captive. He is to go meet up with a priest from a church nearby the prison who also happens to be the long lost brother to said master. Upon meeting the priest, a simple but detailed plan is briefed for Pointy hood to follow. Surprise! Something goes terribly wrong and it's bad and now poor Pointy hood must set off on a long outdrawn adventure and just read the prologue to figure out the rest.

Title: Undermind
Synopsis:
Saskia thought her life was finally getting back on track after the accident. Then she got trolled.
Now she's up a tree the size of a planet, and all who meet her either run screaming or attack on sight. If everyone would just calm down and stop trying to kill her for one moment, she might get a chance to explain that this has all been a horrible misunderstanding.
Contains light GameLit/LitRPG elements, but no number crunching.
Chapters average around 4500 words / 16 pages. Updated weekly.
Cover art by Ben J.

Title: Lone Star Over The Horizon
Synopsis: Over the millenias two gods reincarnated countless number of people and watched how are they fairing in worlds foreign to them. Now they decided to try such reincarnation themselves. Therefore they became Naruto and his twin sister Natsumi.

Title: Ignite (The Fireborn Chronicles Book 1)
Synopsis: When Alec was 15, he was forced to accept an implant made by the gods - a chip that granted random powers and the possibility to see everyone's status. Now, at age 20, his fledgling fire sorcerer ability enables him to get in the prestigious Drexus academy despite his poor upbringing.He was hoping to survive first term without lighting too many things on fire but overly flammable ancient books become a small concern when the academy falls under attack by the mysterious Reapers. Men only whispered of in fearful rumors who are looking for two special students and a letter that could change the world.Alec and five classmates are chosen to undertake a dangerous journey to seek help. Along the way through, they learn the truth about the chips. Can they use the truth to save everything or will it doom them all?

Title: Grandma, let’s form a party!
Synopsis:
Tired of reading about how badass your main character is, only to find out he's a hopeless lolicon.
Fear not! This fiction might just be the right answer for you.
If you like Rpg, MMO, and Milfs, you're in the right place. 
Follow Takano Ryuma, a perverted Otaku as he becomes a VRMMO legend, collects hot widows, their daughters and even their grandmothers in the process.
Warning: Fledgling author. Perverted author.

Title: The Sword That Lay By The Wayside (Dropped)
Synopsis:
EDIT: Dropped. See final chapter for explanation.
 
It started with a bang. Then came a rock. Then came a sword. Then came Its journey.

Title: Story of a dungeon lifetime
Synopsis:
Alex was an ordinary man, nothing extraordinary about him, just living a bland and repetitive life. Alex was walking home from a party and decided to take a stroll through the park, for no reason and died. This is the story of a man that got a second chance at life only to die again and get his soul transferred into a dungeon core.
 
P.S. I'm only doing this for some fun and to pass the time and the dungeon part of the story is going to take a while :)

Title: Sovereign Imperium
Synopsis: A simple man starts playing the first VR game avalaible on the market. Swipe left.

Title: Mytheology
Synopsis:
Ernest Coy is a rich young master. 
He wakes up one morning to a strange sight and an even stranger warning. It was a little angel bearing a heavy message: three months from now, calamity would befall Earth and from the ruins of modern civilization, the old world of myth and legend will rise. With nothing but exorbitant wealth and a cheeky celestial guide by his side, will Nest rise with the times, or is he destined to disappear amidst the tides of ever-churning fate? 
Open the pages to an apocalyptic story of mythic proportions!
Additional Tags: [Apocalypse], [Modern Day]

Title: Far Away & Long Ago
Synopsis:
Tomes of Lore are large enchanted vessels with no end to the amount of knowledge they can hold. Somehow, one of these tomes have been passed down over the centuries to a whole slew of people from across all eras of history. From the Homelands of Ainhaven during the time of the Dragons to as recent as the Rasgarian Prophecy in the land of Yeapes, the many authors of this tome contribute into painting a large and varied picture of events that have occured. Each of them adding their own style, perspective, and insight into the events as they unfolded for them.
Book I: "Chronicles of The Long Ago" by Symm NyliiBook II: ?

Title: The Lost One
Synopsis:
A stranger in a dark cloak creeped into the room of a small Elven child on one fateful day. Wyrran was playing with his sister one second, but the next he was gone. Stolen from the middle of their estate, and never to be seen again in Elven country. 
Years go by, hundreds of years, and Wyrran has grown into a man. His name has been changed to William, though his Master was put under the instruction to make sure he lost his memory from before the ago of 80, and from what Wyrran knew he had always been William.
After he has completed his training and he finished many various tasks William is sent on a job for the King of Trace. It was a confidential assignment, which was new to William in the first place, but never would he imagine that this one job just may be his last. 
*********************************************
Hey everyone! Author here (: 
This is my first time posting any of my works online, and I hope that you enjoy being welcomed into my world, as much as I enjoy creating it for you! 
I welcome any and all criticism, so long as it is actually something that can benefit my writing (not just random hating and nothing substantial). 
This story is edited by Nesryn and ArtemisArrow, my dear friends!
The cover of this book is not my property, and if you are the actual owner of the image and would like me to take it down please PM me (:
I am posting this to see if it generates any interest. If it does, then I will be planning on making more regular posts for chapters. I am intending this to be one book of a series, titled The Lost Royal. 
I intend to post, at this point, one chapter a week unless I get onto a roll! If this starts to accrue enough interest where I can start focusing solely on writing then more chapters will be released per week. 
Thanks for your interest, and I hope you enjoy!

Title: The Living Sun
Synopsis:
Sunny was your typical yellow sun brightly shining upon it's vermin infested balls of rock and gas, when one day a bored God decided to make him consious, naming him sunny.
I may or may not continue the story as I am not all that good at writing stuff, and I am pretty sure my grammar is terrible as I am a Brazilian learning English. If it goes well after the 5 chapter I will challenge myself to complete it.

Title: Level One
Synopsis: Your first adventure, your first time away from home. What allies will you make, what enemies will you face? Make your way through the beginnings of adventuring in Level One by Jessica Cole, the first installment in a branching narrative chosen by the reader.

Title: Fallen Throne
Synopsis:
I do not own the cover, and I have no intentions of profiting from it. Credit to Conor Burke, a great artist.
-
A tale entwined with the grasp of evil and crude vengeance. Stories told to scare children far and wide.A tale about the Dark King who started it all, the tale of endless chaos and the oh so miraculous group of heroes who ended such a diabolical terror.With his last dying breath, he swore that they will rue the day of his death, cursing the heroes for eternity.
Thousands of years have passed since his reckoning, reborn in a new body of countless sacrifice.Will he be able to grow his kingdom once more? Will he rise what was once fallen, or will he like all others, die yet another unforgiving death.
Bring forth the ascension of the Fallen.

Title: The Gods' Arena
Synopsis:
100 people are thrown into a world, bestowed wonderous abilities and powers and forced to fight for the Gods' entertainment. Some of the 100 are bad, some are good and there are some that are a bit of both.
Join Jason, who's one of the latter, as he fights to survive while also finding time to have fun doing so.
( Author Note: I'm gonna throw the Fanfic tag on this because it uses a lot of powers from Anime and other Media like Comics and TV shows~ )

Title: Last Day Of The Immortal. Dragon Heart (A LitRPG Wuxia) Series: Book 21
Synopsis:
Hadjar has seen everything that the Mortal Realm of the Nameless World has to offer. Beloved son, disgraced prince, brother, loyal friend, brave warrior, illustrious commander, murderer, traitor, devoted husband, monster... All these roles converge in Hadjar Darkhan, the Mad General. He has left behind songs and tales of courage and honor that have become the lament of the thousands who’ve met their end at his blade, their blood drenching the fields and valleys of the mortal regions. And he did it all so he could keep going, so his journey wouldn’t end before its time.
Hadjar now stands at the threshold of the Land of the Immortals, a legendary realm of epics. Here, he awaits his penultimate battle. What lies ahead? The path to the Seventh Heaven. And, for better or worse, all that this journey will both create and end. In the Nameless World, some things can be too horrid for anyone to dare and try to comprehend. But if anyone believes that this will slow the General’s stride or halt his sword, then... As has always been the case, neither demons nor gods, neither heroes nor villains, neither Time nor Fate can break the indomitable will of Hadjar Darkhan.Best Seller#1 in Asian Myth& Legend eBooks#1 Fantasy Adventure Fiction#1 Dark Fantasy Horror#1 Dystopian Science Fiction#1 Superhero Science Fiction

Title: The Search for Knowledge
Synopsis:
A meeting of five people to start a simple research endeavor becomes a grand adventure filled with magic, gods, and the unraveling of worldly secrets. Join Rox, Feera, Toley, Kara, and Sheeron as the hidden truths of the world of Chalice are revealed, along with plenty of action and comedy. What will be discovered? Find out in "The Search for Knowledge".
 
 
Author: Silence
Illustrator: Cookichuu
Editor: Plastic Saint

Title: Revenants in the Mist
Synopsis:
Ernin is a former adventurer who’s running out of options. His savings are dwindling, and odd jobs aren’t quite cutting it. 
Taking a job to guard a caravan, Ernin meets an old friend named Jost, who offers a warning not to get involved.
Brigands in carictured masks terrorize the mountainside, covering their attacks in mist. Some call them supernatural revenants, angered by some ancient wrong, others see them as highwaymen taking advantage of superstition.
Who are they and why have they appeared?

Title: Some heroes become evil so as to remain hero
Synopsis: There are some lives that are stained with darkness but they manage to remain good. Such is the case with a young boy named Xeron, who has a secret attached to him that will remain with him as long as he is alive. In a fantasy world where power is everything and the evil people can make use of the law, he stands against them.

Title: Splintered Destiny (re)
Synopsis:
Fragments trying to mend, broken entirely this destiny of all, diverted and convoluted. 
 
But mending as it should. as it once was.
 
All with finite possibilities, interlinking each and everything in a web of altered destiny.

Title: Henchman
Synopsis:
Ignored.  Written-off.  Underestimated.
Until a serendipitous accident shows Gus the secret of how supers get their powers.
Will it be enough to help this inexperienced henchman survive?
Marooned on a desert island with a malevolent force trying to thwart him at every turn, Gus must conquer each challenge he faces
Can he prove to himself, along with everyone else, that he's more than anyone thought he could be?
If he succeeds, history will be rewritten. If he fails...
 [participant in the Royal Road Writathon challenge]

Title: Goblin Progenitor
Synopsis:
Jon was finishing up another horrible date, one among many, thinking about how alone he felt now more than ever. When suddenly fate shined its bright headlights of Resurrection onto him.Lighting up a path to never feeling alone again! In a goblin horde!? As the mythical Goblin Progenitor!
 
I would like to apologize in advance for the first few chapters - as they are not super coherent in grammar or past present tenses. I try to improve as I go, the further chapters I feel are a lot better. I will keep striving to improve the story and fix things when the chance presents itself

Title: New Earth
Synopsis:
As the system initializes, the world shifts. Geography is rearranged and mixed, and levels and stats are instituted across the globe. One needs to adapt and face the trials and tribulations of this new world or goes down with the old.
 
**Authors Note**
This is a fanfiction of "The Legend of Randidly Ghosthound" by puddles4263. Go check it out if you haven´t already.

Title: We make our own friends
Synopsis:
Wars have been fought for centuries and the history of the Cynthian Empire is a bloody one, however there are no more nations to conquer, no more wars to fight and the empire has fallen into a time of peace and exploration. Aden was born at this time, never having felt the touch of war. He grew up in an orphanage, amongst many other children and whilst it was not a perfect life, it was not a bad or uncommon one. 
That was until he reached 15 and he discovered that he was one of the few to be born with access to their mana. Unfortunately for him, the test to see what type of mage he would become doesn't tell the Mages Guild what they want to hear and Aden finds himself exiled to the northern wilderness to find his own way.

Title: Night Gaunt
Synopsis: Meet Vanessa Blight a middle aged woman that works for a computer firm with a bunch of perverted co-workers. She has to deal with a lot of problems in her daily life. But just when life started to look up for her...she died. But that wasn't the end of her story.

When a brand new VMMORPG is released, Luke and his friend Alex are determined to conquer the game.
Endless is a game developed by the Lucky Day Corporation. It promises endless content thanks to it's omnipotent AI who functions as God inside of the game. Players are promised that anything they want to be, anything they aim to do will be possible. Endless is planned to be exactly what it's called Endless.

Title: Gura Gura no mi Cultivator
Synopsis:
Bored with his life, an otaku who isnt fullfilled with his current life dies to the great Truck-kun. 
But that isnt the end , he transmigrated into a xianxia world with the power of a devil fruit..
And not just any devil fruit, its the fruit of the strongest man in the world in one piece.
 
 
 
Ps. I just started being a writer, so if you have any reiviews, comments, or cirtiques then go for it. Ill take anything to improve my writing skills.

Title: Ascendant Archer
Synopsis: Humanity's greatest archer disappears without a trace. Abducted into a fantasy world with nothing but a normal looking bow and a quiver holding five arrows, Alexander must face those who would see Chaos reign.

Title: The Last Nightmare Dragon
Synopsis: Nightmare Dragons are known for their ferociousness and uncanny physical strength. They have not been spotted in Xephus in over 900 years. The last of them was reported to be killed off in the last race war between the Elves and the Humans. However one day there is an earthquake that shatters the top layer of soil and exposes a cavern that been frozen for centuries. In the center of this ice sheet is a juvenile Nightmare Dragon. Follow Kyte as he explores and dominates this new world.

Title: Accidental summon
Synopsis:
Something has gone horribly wrong, after his battle with Angelica Shirou was meant to be together with Miyu, but when a green portal appears out of nowhere and sucks him in to a different world what is he to do? Now it is up to Shirou to find a way back, by reverse engineering the spell that summoned him, if only he could get away from his annoying new 'master' and fellow summoned.
This is a fanfiction, It's been ages since I've been on this site and have only recently starting to choose to write again. I might start writing original works again, but its not likely since I decided to write fanfiction instead. 
Fate stay night cross over with zero no tsukaima

Title: Apocalypse on Endless Earths: Apocalypse How? A LITRPG Adventure
Synopsis:
Declan Mason is just an average guy who is about to pop the question to the woman he loves more than anything when his whole world gets turned upside down.  No, that's not right, it gets crushed, pulped, eviscerated, and apocalypsed to hell before he even realizes what is happening.  He suddenly finds himself working for an Extradimensional Entity that has tasked him with committing genocide on a daily basis.  As Declan's new job, it seems, consists solely of him eliminating alternate versions of his Earth.  Not content to just destroy, he vows to save the woman he loves one planet at a time.  Soon, he's up to his armpits in doppelgangers of his dearie, and he starts to get a clue as to why he has to destroy each world.  Just to complicate matters the Horseman, the person who held his station prior to Declan taking over, has decided it is up to him to stop the Entity's murder spree and has placed Declan in his cross-hairs.
       Apocalypse on Endless Earth's is seriously silly and actively adventurous.  Can one man learn to destroy numerous worlds in new and creative ways while simultaneously saving copies of the woman he loves?  Find out!

Title: Infinity
Synopsis:
700 years in the future, after all of humanity's doomsdays have passed, we face our final challenge. Welcome to Infinity. Welcome to hell. Welcome, to the future, of the galaxy. 
Sci-Fi, Fantasy, contains cussing

Synopsis:

hmm...

Title: Soturno - [PT-BR]
Synopsis: Uma linha tênue entre a ligação do mundo com o próprio sentimento mais obscuro que é guardado a sete chaves e que quando se chega na porta destes sentimentos, sons míseros aparecem de gritos de rancor e injustiça. Onde a verdadeira natureza humana é exposta para quem realmente deseja descobri-la...

Title: From Vampire to Paladin
Synopsis:
One day, when God was creating a new world, He decided to do things a bit differently. Rather than create the world completely from scratch, God decided to copy people and places from other worlds, edit them so that their existence followed the Laws of His New World, then paste them into that world. What follows is a tale of a new world, trickery, betrayal, redemption, and growth.
Hiatus for an undetermined amount of time.

Title: The Almighty Reality Manipulation System
Synopsis:
Chumong was a person who was unloved by fate. He lived a lonely life isolated from the rest of the world. His body was frail and sickly and he didn't know what it's like to be loved. His only escape were the many worlds hidden within books and the screen. However, he was given a new lease on life when he transmigrated into the world of the novel "Blaze Fantasia".
The only thing was... He was reborn into the body of a trash, Vincent, who was fated to be killed by the Main Protagonist of the novel. What will he do to survive? Would he avoid the Male Lead? Would he befriend the main character's of the original novel? Just what would Vincent do in order to live his new life?

Title: Arms Dealing In A Ruined World
Synopsis:
A great and distinguished human being once said that “We do not need guns and bombs to bring peace into the world, we need love and compassion.” But, what if you found yourself in a Lawless and apocalyptic world. Are Love and Compassions truly enough to bring peace or do we need to add a little seasoning of Guns and Bombs? 

Jonathan was originally a small weapons dealer that only cared about two things in his life, selling weapons, and women. Due to his profession as an arms dealer, he was always shunned by society and labeled as an evil being. However, on a fatal day, he was shot and killed by the same guns he had sold. Nonetheless, his journey didn’t stop there. 

Watch how Jonathan becomes a well-known weapons dealer and made the world a "better place" with the same weapons that most people despise in his original world after transmigrating into an apocalyptic world with an ultimate weapons system.

However, before that, he had to deal with a tiny little problem. Ohh God, why the hell did I transmigrate into the body of a hot smoky woman, but wait, why does my little "brother" is still here?

First of all the cover isn't mine and all the credits go to the owner. As you can see, this is a rewrite of a little project I used to work on years ago. English isn't my first language, so don't expect perfect grammar and shit. Also, the picture isn't mine and all the credits goes to the artist that made this amazing work of art.

Title: How i became tirant king
Synopsis:
Summoned into other world and offered title Great King. With every day he stays in this new world, Leo is finally seeing thing how they are in reallity. Will he accept this titile and what kind of man he needs too become to lead people.
This is my first light novel, i hope you enjoy it.
Note: im not native english speaker so im apologizing in front for my little bad grammar.

Title: Arain
Synopsis:
What would a person do after living for so long, enduring bloodshed and war? Finally obtaining peace, after living every day as they put their lives on the line for others? Arain, a Primordial Elf, had no idea how to answer that question, but with a limited lifespan out of the way, she idled her life as the years passed. Living a peaceful life as she so desperately wanted without worry, without having to re-experience the anxiety as reality hits her every time.
The world she was brought to, a world that was once young and in dire need of help, was able to finally stand on its own without the help of Primordial Beings. New races and people were born, easing the pressure that was placed on the Primordials, and eventually relieving them of it all. They were relieved of their duty, leaving many of them clueless on what to pursue. 
Some went out to the unexplored and dangerous world, braving the dangers as they explored the world they had fought for. Some had pursued a peaceful life, wanting to enjoy living as a normal being, to reignite the passions they once had put aside. Some had moved on to found their own place to belong, enjoying the wealth and power that their identity brought them. 
It was the Year of 3071 of the Human Era. Arain began to feel restless, as if something was about to be unleashed and bring out a storm that would disrupt her life, one that she had so heartfully wished for.
A new Era was about to come, and new heroes and legends are about to be marked in history.

Title: Reborn As His Favorite Butler
Synopsis:
The life of a butler is really hard.
 
His only purpose of his life was to serve and take care of the young miss of a prominent family, in the last moment of his life, he watched the little girl running away and his headless body lying on the cold floor.
He thought that everything was finally over, but life didn't let him go yet, life wanted to play with him a bit more.
.....
In an alley, a girl was crying and murmuring some strange words.
"Young miss where did you go?".

Background theme

This is the story of the man that find humanities place amongst the stars.
I am planning this to be multi layered. 
the Real world, The game world, the MC's personnel world. All different but the joins of the MC will effect everything

Title: I wanna be a hero! Beginning of the dark fantasy-
Synopsis: Arsh a villager boy want to become a hero who save the world just like in those fairytales. He starts his journey to become the hero but what awaits him is thorn path and cruel reality... Will he give up or will he become a hero? What will happen to his wish or will he lose to the darkness? Let's join him in his journey and witness his unknown adventures and deadly battles.

Title: Endless Journey: Infinite Realms
Synopsis:
After all the things that he had done in his life, Alex realized that it was already his time to die.
But a sudden encounter with a weird person will turn his whole life around.
And his life just became weirder after that.
"You are an Esper? Then come and taste my saber!""You are a Daoist? Then come and taste my fist!""You are a Genie? Well, can you grant me infinite wishes?"
Everyone shall witness Alex's rise on his endless journey!

Title: Aqua can be fine too!
Synopsis:

Cover Art done by Jacob Lee.

Title: Champion of Justice: A Dungeon Core Gambit Side Story (COMPLETED)
Synopsis:
[01/09/19 Update: Champion of Justice has become a #1 Amazon Bestseller in LGBT Fantasy Fiction. Thank you for your support!
The revised, complete version of this novel is available on Amazon and KU. The new version is 5% longer, and it has a new ending.]
 
She's HERE! Bobbi Nox was notorious for a committing a gruesome murder against a former employee; she was sentenced to rot in jail for the rest of her life. But in a divine twist of fate, Dike, the Goddess of Moral Justice, has come calling with an offer: become Dike's Champion of Justice. The target? None other than Markos Turloch, the person Bobbi had murdered!
To her astonishment, Markos had been reincarnated as a dungeon core and he conquered the Kingdom of Vessar. Blaming Markos for her incarceration, Bobbi agrees to help Dike free the kingdom from his tyranny!
Endowed with several divine blessings from Dike, Bobbi is sent to the world of Enwald as a Paladin! Finding herself in a game-like world, Bobbi must level up her character and become powerful enough to challenge Markos inside his dungeon. She must learn to work with the four gorgeous worshippers Dike has sent to accompany Bobbi on this holy quest. She must find a way to enter Markos' dungeons, reach his dungeon cores and destroy them.
However, during her travels, Bobbi begins to have misgivings about the mission. She clashes repeatedly with the worshippers, and strongly disagrees with Dike's sense of morality and justice. Thus, Bobbi entertains doubts over her suitability to serve as Dike's Champion.
Furthermore, the journey made Bobbi reconsider her action in murdering Markos Turloch, because his reincarnation as a dungeon core and the suffering he caused the citzens of Vessar flows directly from his murder. How could she take responsibility and make amends?
Will Bobbi Nox accomplish her mission to destroy Markos Turloch? Or will he turn the tables and make her life miserable again? Read Champion of Justice to find out!
Please note that this 57,000 words novel is considered a "Side Story" to the Dungeon Core Gambit series because it is told from the perspective of Bobbi Nox, a side character in Book One. The events of this book takes place between Book One and the upcoming sequel (forthcoming next year). This book is a harem dark fantasy with LitRPG/GameLit elements. In addition, this story contains profanities, heavy girl-on-girl action including violence and sex, enslavement, and other elements that some readers may find objectionable.

Title: Titans of Time
Synopsis:
Shoes, slave of Miranda Alexia Dawngrove, finds a secret passage beneath his Mistress's mansion. However, it leads nowhere. Not willing to believe that his discovery bore no fruit, Shoes uses whatever free time he has to chip away at the brick walls. He spends the week hoping that the tunnel is actually leading somewhere.

Shoes, slave of Miranda Alexia Dawngrove, finds a secret passage beneath his Mistress's mansion. It leads nowhere. However, Shoes discovers that the wall is damaged at one section. Someone was obviously trying to dig their way somewhere. Hoping he would find a way to escape, Shoes continues chipping away at the wall.

Shoes, slave of Miranda Alexia Dawngrove, finds a secret passage beneath his Mistress's mansion. There is a hole at the end of the corridor, which leads to a dark chamber. Brick walls, low ceiling, the room's only feature is a stone altar in the middle. It's not the escape route Shoes hoped for, but he is happy with his discovery nevertheless. The room could be a perfect hideout.

Shoes, slave of Miranda Alexia Dawngrove, finds a secret chamber beneath his Mistress's mansion. At first glance it seems to be empty, but he notices a straw mattress in one corner. There is a slave uniform on the makeshift bed. As he picks up the clothes, a small wooden figurine falls to the ground. Rough shape, amateurish carving; it's the exact copy of the statuette Shoes has in his pocket.

Title: Stasis
Synopsis:
Please check out https://stasisserial.wordpress.com/ for story
Peyton Williamson has always felt like he hasn’t belonged. In the idyllic City, everyone seems to know exactly what they’re doing and exactly who they like— except for him, of course. Being shipped to the Academy, the school all adolescents must attend to become full members of society, barely helps at all. If anything, the realization that the world he's spent his whole life in may be a fabrication for something more sinister only exacerbates his insecurities. Others around him find themselves becoming disillusioned with the City as well, doubting who they can trust and what they can do to keep themselves safe. When they're all ripped out of their homes and thrown into a territory ungoverned by the City's authority, they must learn their way through the wild lands, meeting the people who struggle to live on a day-to-day basis within it along the way. Over a series of events, they slowly unearth secrets about their society— and themselves— that may have best remained hidden.  (Updates every Wednesday and Saturday)

Title: One at the top
Synopsis:
A disable youth who brought ashes of his family to bury at the shore of sacred river, Muhury, a person whose story is ending...
But is it really ending though?

Anyway, I have been inspired to create this universe, it will most likely have multiple stories of my creations in here, hope you brought you imagination!

Title: The Lonely, Wandering Deity
Synopsis:
Yang Jing - Third Heavenly Prince and Heir Apparent to the Jade Emperor, the Supreme Lord of the Universe – is banished to Earth for his crime. Wandering on his own the Jianghu, he searches for a purpose and aims to heal his emotional wounds. On his journeys, he meets heroes and villains, happiness and sadness. Can he find what he is looking for in the Mortal World? 
(Xianxia story. I do not own the cover art nor seek any profit, all rights reserved to the owner.)

Title: Reborn: Souls
Synopsis:
Twins Mechi (Mac-eye) and Yarin (Yair-in) Vascellum are your average 15-year olds.  Well, almost average. Mechi, gifted with a photographic memory, has already graduated highschool and is currently helping his parents, Roger and Alexa, run the new family business.  As the business makes it through the first year of being open, and Yarin completes her freshman year in highschool, the family decides to take a vacation to their cabin retreat. All's well until the ride back home, the accident changed everything.
    Jump three years into the present, feeling the loss of their parents, the twins are thrown into changes far beyond their control.  The habitation of latent souls, immersion of angels, demons, and other unearthly characters, turn their worlds completely upside-down (with a few tornadoes thrown in).

Title: A Strange Meeting
Synopsis:
"A cold shiver went down Thibaut’s spine as the doppelganger looked up at him and said in a cold voice, “Today at 6-15 in the evening your life will come to its end.”
-Yes, this is a story of a strange meeting between a man and his doppelganger and a twist of Fate

Title: No Looking Back
Synopsis: The first time Lisa Sole broke a promise got her parents, the beta and his mate, killed which in turn got the alpha and luna killed. As time moved on, the former alpha's son, Merim Klude, took his rightful position and the Country Moon pack was finally getting back on track. However, things once again became messy as Merim rejected Lisa as his mate. Merim holds no grudge against Lisa; He just wants to protect her from the enemies that are once again coming for the pack. But his sacrifice will yield no reward as Lisa will never break her promise again. She will never look back.

Title: TypeOnline: Pariah
Synopsis: A retro gamer is forced by her popular younger sister to try her first VRMMORPG game.  Spitefully, she picks a joke of a class that people generally scorn and try to avoid for the most part, as it destroys drops, which, honestly, seems like a pretty bad game design choice.  With little to no knowledge of how the game works, after being separated from her sister with sinister forces at play, it'll take all of her luck, not usually very, quick wit, and pretty average people skills to survive.Has romance elements as well later into the story.Note: female lead trapped in a physically male body, this was upsetting some people when they expected m to f content.

Title: Memories of a Trained Killer
Synopsis:
Born to immortality, Belori Primirus was happy.  Born the second child to a loving father and mother.  In a family of immortals though living forever doesn't make you unique, but in a society of werewolves being born to the first and only child of the Prime Alpha does.  From a young age trained to be a warrior, for that was what the Pack was.  Warriors that fought for glory, violence, and of course money.
                In the course of history his grandfather was locked away in a hidden valley, that to this day no one knows the location of, the council killed everyone who knew of the valley.  So when they staged their coup his parents couldn't free him to comand their paltry forces to kneel.  They killed everyone he loved except his sister he swore a blood oath to protect.  Then they made him an assassin, killing anyone that broke their arbitrary laws for the Pack.  Now he has even lost his status as a warrior, relegated to teaching the councils Welps and training the recent additions to the Changed. Not for much longer for he is the last Pureborn and he will have his vengeance.

Title: Dungeon Sect
Synopsis:
An RPG nerd is reincarnated as a dungeon core- only to get dropped into a Xianxia world by mistake instead. 
  Probably not meant to be taken to seriously, more as an affectionate parody of both dungeon and xianxia stories. 
——————————————————
i am going to throw words at the page until it is a things i guess

Title: Truth is heaven's lie
Synopsis:
Within the 9 realms,
      In a place hidden from the eyes of heaven itself, there stands a figure with a single word carved on it's forehead:  'truth'
    Without a single speck of dust on it's immortal body, the being slowly raised his lips:
    "Haha.." as this laughter faded, the man slowly turned to ashes, his death being followed by the destruction of this entire realm... 
    A single word drifted amongst the spatial cracks, before disappearing from this forgotten prison..

Title: Mana of Heaven
Synopsis:
After years of training magic, The boy named Abel finally has a chance to go to see the world for the first time, not knowing what will await him, the boy decided to embark on his adventures.
Note :
