Title: NUMB
Synopsis:
Andre is a normal boy, he has a normal life and a loving family. He is a bit of a nerd, but who isn't in this day and age.
His life changes on prom night
A group of unknown men kidnap his girl and crash into him with an SUV in one single night.The accident sends him into a coma for three years, he wakes up to find out that he lost his emotions.
He feels no anger or sadness at what happened. He loses the ability to feel any emotions.
What will he do next?
He tries to live a normal life, tries to take care of his mother, but some things... he just can't let go.

Title: Dropped
Synopsis: Dropped

Title: Deity: The Beginning
Synopsis:
A world where hope warps reality.
A newborn god must find their way in the world while guiding a young tribe.
Will the god's choices harm or benefit the tribe?
Will the tribe survive and grow into something greater?
Will the god be good or evil?
What will the future hold?
In a world full of hope, anything is possible.

Title: Let's Dig Some Holes
Synopsis: Compilation of random short stories with unsatisfying ends. Maybe they'll actually become an actual story one day but that day is not today.

Title: Between the Worlds
Synopsis:
Long ago - or maybe not long ago at all,, depending how you look at the concept of time - when the existence of other worlds was not yet forgotten, a secret society was formed. A society to protect humanity from unwanted "visitors", and yet help those who are in need.
Formed and agreed upon by the governments of all the most important European countries, it has managed to protect humanity for hundreds of years, while keeping it's existence a secret. Overtime it has grown bigger and stronger, and now the PISF - Paranormal Investigation Special Force - covers the entire planet, with over 50 departments and nearly a thousand officers protecting the planet.
But now, from whatever reasons, the Creatures are getting more and more brush and dangerous, and more and more start appearing all over the planet, seemingly without an reason, and now the existence of oth PISF and humanity itself is threatened.
So, what do you do, when you are still a teenager and in a dramatic turn of events get involved in one of PISF investigations?
This is a - based on true story and the witnesses' reports* - selection of Paranormal Investigation Task Force investigations as told by a group of rookies from all over the world and one young man who wishes he never left to the History Museum of Toronto. And now it comes with free iPhone X for every reader!**
* There never were any reports from any witnesses of an PISF investigation scene - Most likely, the author of this book has made them all up.
** You can't really get an iPhone X just for reading this book.
 
ABOUT THIS BOOK
"Between The Worlds" is:
* A story with multiple genres, ranging from horror to humor (with the most prominent genres being action/adventure ) intended for everyone to read (although younger readers may feel uncomfortable or scared reading certain parts)
* Episodic -  Although the book has one long story, most chapters will primarily focus on a  single standalone adventure, so you can start reading on any episode you want. (The Titles of Episodes focusing primarily on the main story, will be marked with a * symbol,so you can skip the spoilers,if you just want a simple read ;)  )
The episodes, due to their length, will be posted on 2-3 (sometimes more) parts.

Title: Ætla Verǫld
Synopsis:
AV Online was just a flash in the pan—a harsh, experimental land which lost most of its players in mere weeks. Only the dedicated few remained, carving out their destinies in corners of the vast abandoned world. 
Lily Quinn wasn't one of them. With a career worth millions in the esports world, she didn't have time for a game like Avo—but when an exclusive beta test for the new version showed up on her doorstep, she couldn't say no… as much as she wanted to. Literally hooked into the simulation, Lily reluctantly entered a world beyond anything she'd ever dreamed of. 
Accompanied by seven other beta testers desperate to save their beloved game, Lily dives into a vibrant, beautiful world, where mystery and adventure waits around every corner. Despite her reservations, Lily finds a joyful escape in Avo, shattering her cold, hollow reality. It was just a game though… until the group discovered they couldn't log out. Trapped in a game with no rules, and surrounded by cutthroat players eager to kill for a quick windfall, Lily and her ragged band have no choice but to fight their way out, or die in a game that has turned all too real.
 

 
Hi there! I'm setting off on yet another adventure, come join me :3
Unusually for me, there's only one perspective this time, and it's quite a bit more action-oriented than I usually write. Don't worry, though: everything's still as character-driven as always, and I never get tired of writing dialogue. Just to acknowledge it up front: this story is heavily inspired by EVE Online and the many stories generated by that world. However, since this is a fantasy setting, not sci-fi, don't expect any real parallels. 
Chapter publish rate for this one will be whenever I write them, as with Epilogue. I don't expect to move as fast here though, since it's not for NaNo. The plan is chapters somewhere in the 4k-5k range, and hopefully frequently. The Last Science takes priority as always though.
Special thanks to Reaver and Ace Arriande for pushing me to get this going, and to all my fellow writers whom I've stolen from been inspired by. You're all wonderful people and I love you <3
Quick reminder: Patrons get to read ahead of what's published! Also, try my other works:
The Last Science — A Tale of Modern Magic
Epilogue — A Post-Fantasy Psychodrama
What are you still doing on the synopsis? Get to reading!
 

Cover art (fullsize): Forgotten World Coliseum, by taenaron (Tobias Roetsch), modified by Etzoli. 

This story has not been posted or published anywhere else besides RoyalRoad.com, at this URL: https://www.royalroad.com/fiction/22103/atla-verold

Title: The Homeless Into Space Program
Synopsis: The homeless population is growing throughout the world. Where can they go? Why not into outerspace? This is a short read, and just something I want to throw out into the internet world: The Homeless Into Space Program.

Title: The Uneventful Life of Elaine
Synopsis:
Elaine Aleytia is a girl that was born into a wealthy household. 16 years of age and certainly a beauty. Although her life might be a luxury that is surely envied by others, they might think that it would be ironic when they see Elaine's true thoughts.
For a long time now Elaine has been thinking about what could be the outcome of her life if she was born as a simple girl? away from the attention of other rich and influential people. Where she could spend her life idly sitting in the vicinity in the forest and enjoying the setting sun. Nobody would really know except Elaine herself.
At the celebration of her older brother's engagement, a gathering was to be held within their palace like house. Little did Elaine know that a new chapter in her life was about to unfold.
Elaine drank a wine that was poisoned; she choked and fell to the ground. She thought to herself. "Ah... what a pitiful life this has been, I never asked to be an aristocrat's daughter, If only I could have been born simple, yet, happy...."
She closed her eyes, accepting her demise. Only to suddenly wake up in an unfamiliar location. She looked around and saw things that could have not existed in the modern era where she was living. "Where is this place? I... don't remember going out of the country"
Thus, bringing a new chapter to Elaine's Uneventful Life.

Title: Viridian Gate Online: Nomad Soul (Illusionist Book 1) by D.J. Bodden
Synopsis:
If you had to choose between your life and your dreams, would you ever wake up?
Alan Campbell thought he’d gotten his dream job working on a revolutionary VRMMORPG with Osmark Technologies, until the project was canceled. He has one weekend to dive into an untested world full of intrigue, violence, and corruption to prove that Viridian Gate Online works, but the AIs running the game have their own plans for his soul.
Set a year before the events of “Cataclysm,” The Illusionist: Nomad Soul takes you back to when VGO was just a game, or so it seemed.

Title: Viridian Gate Online: Vindication (The Alchemic Weaponeer - Book 1) by N.H. Paxton
Synopsis: A Russian Weapons Engineer thought that escaping into a VRMMO would free him from the chains of his past; but even in the virtual world, old grudges still burn true. He must use his intellect and unique skills to make a place for himself within the next 5 days, or be forcibly dragged back into the very life he fought so hard to escape.

Title: Viridian Gate Online: Firebrand (The Firebrand Series Book 1) by J.D. Astra
Synopsis: New worlds get new kings, and that’s exactly what Abby thinks she’s found in her boss’ hacked code. With a cataclysmic asteroid careening toward Earth, the VRMMORPG project, Viridian Gate Online, has become more than just a game, and Abby thinks her boss, Robert Osmark, wants to be more than just its founding father.Now, Abby holds a hacked key to the kingdom that could earn her a punishment worse than death. To uncover the secret that drug lords and corrupt politicians paid millions for, Abby must dive into the game she helped create and team up with one of its AI creations. It’s a race against the clock as she tries to discover what’s hidden in the secret code before Osmark can crown himself ruler over all that remains of humanity.

Title: Player Versus Player
Synopsis:
Otherverse, the most immersive VR game ever created.
 
Pete had heard all of the hype, and now he’s getting the chance to see what it’s all about. First he’s subjected to some bizarre psychological tests, and then his character is mysteriously hijacked, before he is finally pressured to become one of the most despised beings in the game: the player killer. Even as he forms new bonds and friendships, he comes to find that the game isn't the only place where people can die, as dangers in game lead to dangers out of it.
AIs created Otherverse, and IRCorp created the AIs.
Now, IRCorp wants more….

Title: A Shapeshifting ________!
Synopsis:
WARNING! SEMI-NOOB WRITER!

 
My name is, well, was Hiiro Aragon.
(If you have seen this name before, it's because it's used in my other fictions.)
Yeah, I was just an average man who people may have considered an otaku (otaku's for life!) and such. in the futuristic america where food deliveries were banned on sundays, and you have to buy a limited portion each day, I was just going to the grocery store on sunday. and trucks were attracted to me like a magnet, along with cars bikes and so on. luckily I wasn't THAT fat, and had once taken military combat classes. with that I managed to dodge all of them when something happened.
[How troublesome is it to kill someone these days?]
What? what the f? what was that? 
I had no time to think, and then spears were falling out of the sky! what is wrong with the world these day's? No matter, gotta run! all of a sudden I tripped on a tiny pebble, and ended up falling face up onto the ground while I was epicly doging everything! some falling spears literally made a human shape around me, immedietly restricting my movement.
[Don't worry, it'll be painless! and only 30 innocents were killed due to my actions! a new record!]
With that, I saw a huge spear falling towards me, and stabbed me through the heart. The last thing I saw was a tiny lil' girl smiling over me and laughing maniacally.

a tenth grader must face the  reality that their boring life is about to get a lot more interesting, and a whole lot more dangerous.
im keeping this vague because i don't know how to properly do Synopsis's, and im uploading on this site forgive the noobness of this.

Title: I don't want to be the Hive Queen
Synopsis:
Marcus is a young man that had a very bad day at work. First, he had a horrible customer during his shift. Then he got fired by his boss. And after that, he got shot to death during a robbery. And to top it all of, he awakened with the body of a weak and strange creature in a fantasy world full of deadly monsters. 
And that's just Monday!Now Marcus will have to find a way to survive as a Vex Queen, but to do so his bravery and determination are not enough. He needs to build a hive that will protect him, as it won't be just monsters that he'll have to face... -------------Wiki (thanks to Yulwei for making it)
Patreon (throw money at the writing monkey to make it write faster)Discord (drop in to have a chat or ask things about the story!)

Title: Navaska's Final Hour
Synopsis: a short story inspired by the image "The Wind Gambit" by Jakub Rozalski

Title: An Appendage of Zjeut'rek, Son of Olfhgns
Synopsis: Cosmic deities? Ha! They're far more than that. They are our universe and its masters, and the masters of all other worlds, their flesh being the space between. They are the creators, the destroyers, preservers. Alpha and Omega. Their immortal servants are mistaken for demons and angels on the world of plain and stupid mortals, and although we may call ourselves their descendants, our divine blood has been so diluted and our eyes have grown so rotten that we can no longer see them without going mad upon a mere glance at the outline of their shadows. No, instead we delude ourselves, thinking we can hurt them by battling with their ageless, yet barely killable abominations of children, just like the old Mad King, and just like me. Baron Arthur Grey of Oxfordshire. A fool and a coward, who's fear of losing his own world, led him to lose a free one.

Title: They left my lazy ass on earth
Synopsis:
Mason falls asleep on his last day of highschool and when he wakes up all of his classmates are mysteriously gone. When college starts up he gets thrown into the magic school program and learns about the world hidden away from the normal world that has both wizards and cultivators. Mason will explore the new world before him as well as search for his missing classmates.... eventually.
 
 
 
 
 
This is my first attempt at writing and would appreciate tips on how to improve.

Title: LAST FEAST
Synopsis:
The Red Dragon Empire has been the most powerful aggregate in the Burning Grasslands of the West. They summon talented individuals from another world. When passing through the summoning gate the beings will turn back into a child without memories.
 Sometimes they will make a mistake and the summoned being will have a defect. Blind, deaf, crippled, deformed, cannot manipulate mana and have unknown diseases. They can detect if the body isn’t in perfect condition.
 The discarded children wander around this unknown land until finally meeting their end.
When luck strikes two people will come out of a single gate.
 They performed the ritual again and two people came out, one was in splendid form, and the other was twitching his shoulders, neck and saying words that’s foreign to the summoners.
 “Cream puff tiddy licking!”
 They marked Rus as a defect. With no knowledge, money, home and friends he must reclaim what’s rightfully his.
 Being snatched away from his world he remembers the difficulties of his life.
The Red Dragon Empire just took away everything from the Boss of Tessaro Familia.
 With a smile that’s comparable to the ruler of hell, Rus whispered to himself.
 “Seventh rule of The Family: Always return favors.”

Title: Chronicler’s Tale
Synopsis: When two universes are merged together due to the betrayal of gods, chaos descends on the newly reborn universe. This is the story of one young man who is thrust into a new and dangerous world beyond his wildest imagination. He must learn how to navigate this unknown world and how to survive his encounters with its deadly inhabitants.

Title: Re:Eclipse
Synopsis:
Felix, an elite soldier, died in combat. He was one of the millions of people murdered every day by an unstoppable foe, who pushed mankind on the brink of extinction.
His consciousness was stored in a secret bunker, but, by mistake, the transfer into a new body took five hundred years more than expected. Sadly, the only one available was of a short and weak teenager who died many years before.
Many things changed in the meantime: magic, dragons, and other creatures that were once thought to be of fantasy are now common, and a new system rules on everyone and everything, allowing a person to enhance his body past human limits.
He'll start again from scratch, trying to master it, but his time isn't infinite: mankind's worst enemy is yet to be defeated, and it's getting ready to finish the job once and for all.

Title: Vampire Villainess
Synopsis:
When a dimensional parasite reincarnates into a new host after a bad sexual encounter, the monster gets more than they bargained for by becoming the villain of an otome game. 
-----
After her 'death' the vampire wakes up in the body of Aurelie dun Rhianon hal Rotthfuss zer Aventide, the villainess of 'Serenade Of The Doves' an 18+ otoge she had recently completed, and hijacked her body a day after the events of the game begins.
'What bullshit is this?! The female lead is as interesting as a limp noodle! She's even succeeded in balancing all the affairs with the capture targets?! I don't know if I should be impressed or disgusted at her time management skills.'
Watch as an immortal monster tries their hardest to not get embroiled in the love affairs of the holy maiden, and squeeze as many ass cheeks as she can in 'Vampire Villainess!'
 
-----
Release: Whenever I don't feel like shit

Title: The Rovaldan Lancers
Synopsis:
“Who stole my underwear? The Dark Lord is coming and I can’t ride to face him with my pecker hanging out!” - High Paladin Waltz “Small Pecker” Vonstein.
 
A series of shorts depicting the Rovaldan Lancers in their 2000 year struggle against the archenemy, The Dark Lord.
Follow this not so prestigious order which guards The Bastion, a not so formidable fortress which is the obstacle standing in The Dark Lord’s way from invading the realm of Rovaldan.
“Invasion? I just want to get an honest paying job and pay taxes. The Ruined Lands have terrible food and even worse entertainment. The standard of living here is truly terrible.” - An excerpt from an interview with The Dark Lord.
Chapters will be short, between 400-1200 words, with at least three release a week and more if I am able.
This is a serious attempt and writing not so serious fiction and thus should not be read by the faint-hearted. Controversial topics including current issues and politics may and shall be used along with tropes in a satirical manner. Read at your own risk as The Rovaldan Lancers deal with the everyday struggles of guarding a border no one want's guarded and their ongoing rivalry with The Dark Lord.

Title: Destiny (Follow or Change?)
Synopsis:
The story revolves around a young boy named Samuel who lives with his parents Daisy (Mother) , Cris (Father), Jane (eldest sister),Clair (second sister) and Niel (Elder brother). Jane eldest of all is a doctor working in a government hospital, travells around country alot. Clair studying in college aims to be a teacher while Niel few years older then Samuel plays around most of time.
Samuel have very high imagination, and intuition as compared to other kids of same age which makes his different then most. His questions make even adults question themselves. He can find the answers to his questions by himself but some questions are not easy to answer... .
This story revolves around his young days and how he tackles many difficult tasks while going through multiple emotional adventures. Was he right, or was he wrong? The readers can decide. But this novel will make the readers question themselves for sure.

Title: The Sleeping Immortal
Synopsis:
It's my first time writing, I'm going to try a mix up of LitRPG and Wuxia. God killed me while I was sleeping, and now I have the power to become a God myself just by well... sleeping. Ironic isn't it? Let's say it came as a surprise when I, Fiend Yuki, got killed by God. God, not wanting me to die as easily next time, reincarnated me with OP sleeping powers. Before this, I was just your average bum living in my parent's basement, sleeping and doing general otaku things. Now I have to worry about getting killed by Gods, kinda came full circle didn't it? Or I could just sleep and worry about it later... Yeah, I'll just sleep... Sleep sounds good. Yeah, it was until I woke up and found out I've become a toothpick and personal claw sharper of the world's strongest dragon while I was sleeping... I don't like being awake... 
Changes courtesy of cavo

Title: Focus
Synopsis:
Life can't get much worse for Michael. His bully Tucker is as relentless as ever, Papaw's behind on rent, and he's likely going to fail Sophomore year for the second time. Once the fleeting suicidal thoughts start building into plans, it'll take more than Meemaw to talk him down.
 
---
 
Constructive criticism is encouraged and appreciated.

Synopsis:
5 v 1
PC's v DM
The grand stories of the heroes of a new generation.
Join them as they embark on a epic quest, to save the kingdom, those they love, and those they don't know.
Once Complete Strangers, but now, something more

Title: Not my Hero, Not my Academia: Panacea
Synopsis:
U.A High, the forge of legends and where heros aren't born, but made. It is also here where a very different boy shall start his journey and down a very different road while pursuing the same goal.

Synopsis:
This is a young adult story taking place in a pure fictional world, filled with castles, knights and nobility as well as violence, sin and dark fantasy, clearly having nothing in common with our modern and civilized society.
 
...or so we would all like to think.

Title: Song of the Deep (Dropped)
Synopsis: Dropped.

Title: Magic & Love
Synopsis:
Welcome to a far off land of magic and wonder.
Nitri finds herself at the mercy of a group of roving ogres and who's to come to her aid but an aloof, wandering magician. Does he save her? Absolutely. Could it have been done more gracefully? You bet.
There's a whole lot of adventure on the road. Follow this pair as they journey through lands known and unknown, tied by the red strings of fate!
 
UPDATES: Every Tuesday!(hopefully haha)

Title: A Blighted World
Synopsis:
Mutasm, who was transmigrated into a dark world filled with a hidden blight, found himself without the ability to grow stronger. Given weak or passive abilities, he must navigate a world that wants him dead. More so considering he decided to raise Hope through it all. He was given multiple paths towards strength, but in order to move forward in them, he must forsake who he was taught to be. He would have to accept the darkness and blight that inhibited the people of this world. How will he survive? How will he raise Hope? Will he lose everything he ever loved once again? Will he forsake everything he fought so hard to keep?
Cover by MrZombie!

Title: The Last Breath
Synopsis:
"You're a jerk, Clay Cooper, a nasty human being" 
Clay Cooper is somewhat of a social pariah at his school, his former friends despise him and he doesn't know why. He doesn't care much either. But there's more to Clay Cooper than initially meets the eye, and following the sudden loss of his parent's, he is forced to confront a family past that threatens to destroy all Clay has ever known. 
Follow a cynical and reclusive MC as he struggles to piece together his fracturing life whilst struggling to face the problems as he explores a fantastic but dangerous new power.
Chapters will be posted twice weekly.

Title: World without sword and magic
Synopsis:
The mc was living his ordinary life, until one day, the fateful encounter with banana peel suddenly making him reincarnated into a different world.
In a world that closely resembles earth. It was a parallel world, a fantasy world, where magic existed.
And just when the mc was writing the soul immigration form, the Earth ruler came.
"How many times do I need to tell you guys?! stop kidnaping people from my realm!"
A moment after the Earth ruler said that, mc got thrown back to the Earth. A normal world, a world without sword and magic, a world where dungeons wouldn't appear and monsters didn't terrorise people...
Going back on Earth, mc was living his ordinary life, and because of the fateful encounter with banana peel, now he had incomprehensible power.
What would mc do with his newfound power?

Title: Before Her
Synopsis: A man betrayed by his own student and is sealed away for 8,000 years. He breaks out of the seal and returns to a whole new world; a world ruled by the very same person he taught.  BEING CHANGED AT THE MOMENT.

Title: Astral Land
Synopsis:
Astral Land is a fantasy novel that combines elements of the Indonesian archipelago with a fantasy life.
This novel itself is a series of recitations that tells the journey of a young man named Reno Prayuda adventuring in another dimension called "Astral Land".

Title: The Day My Life Turned Into Fantasy
Synopsis:
Reo Arai is your daily average teenager with a bit of an unusual past. Although this didn't hold him back but infact he made himself even tougher. He didn't want to repeat his past mistakes and hence gained knowledge and became exceptionally good at deductive, logical reasoning and a lot of other soft skills. This made him more interested in the thriller TV series which made him a nerd, again. Hence he always keeps a low profile without raising any suspicions, yet yearning for the thrill whenever he comes across one. But this got boring too and he wanted something more, something different, something more fun. Little did he know there was a thrill waiting for him, greater than anything he could fathom to imagine.
 
This is a story where our thrill loving little detective falls into a land where something that defies all logic exists :MAGIC. What will our hero do to survive this predicament. Will he survive this by seeing it through or will he give up. LET THE THRILL BEGIN.?

Title: Dragon Ball:RR
Synopsis: A regular office worker dies and reincarnates into the body of a baby Raditz. As he is stuck living as the character he hates most he decides to put Raditz's wasted potential to good use, whilst at the same time forming an organisation that will change the universe as he knows it.

Title: The Blue Tower
Synopsis:
When I heard a soft, and gentle voice, asking me if I'd like to go to a new world, far away from here... I didn't even think twice about it. My life on Earth could hardly have been any worse, right then - and the chance to start back over was more than I could have dreamed of.
But now that I'm here, I'm starting to discover that this new world is really nothing like what I had been expecting.
Right now, I'm all alone, in the middle of a huge, and darkened forest, with nobody to tell me where to go, or what to do next.
And somewhere, far off in the distance... I can hear something huge, and strong, moving slowly through the woods.
Before, I was hoping to get the chance to start my life up all over again.
But now, I'm just hoping to make it safely through the night.
Maybe once I achieve that, then I can finally start to think about what's going on...
... and then, maybe, I can figure out just why it was that I was brought here, exactly - and just what sort of a world it is that I've arrived in.

Title: D&D Adventure Story : Hoard of the Dragon Queen
Synopsis:
Hail and well met traveler!  Has thou heard of the latest news from Baldurs Gate?!
Rumor has it that the Cult of the Dragon has been active in the southern planes. Some say that dark days are ahead if they are true. However, there is another rumor,  a rumor within a rumor you see... a story. A gaggle of courageous, outrageous and infectious misfits whose very actions will leave you in disbelief and wonder.
Take a chair and sit by the fire. Order an ale and let this good ol’ bard weave you a tale of fantasy.

Title: Shatter the Heavens; Slaughter the Gods
Synopsis:
Arminius of the ancient era stood over mankind with the ability to perform magic. His ability allowed him to triumph over mortal armies and carve a domain for himself. 
Then, the martialists attacked. Their individual strength was lower than that of magicians, but the sheer number of them made them an unstoppable force. In the wake of tens of thousands of martialists and hundreds of thousands of mortal warriors, one lone magician was unable to stand against the tide.
But, the powers of a magician allowed Arminius to escape the cycle of reincarnation, landing him an eon into the future. In the new age, magicians are entirely extinct, and the martialists from the old era have perfected their martial way, allowing them to attain godly powers that far surpass what Arminius was ever capable of.
So, what else should Arminius do except learn their method and use it against them?!
Reincarnated as Andric, he seeks to gain the powers of the martialists and reclaim his position at the throne of the world!

A fossil of a bygone age where magic was rampant and he ruled with an iron fist, Arminius is reborn into a world in which magic is fading. The non-magical revolution successful and his rule long over, he must master the new ways of martial arts to rule anew.

Title: Supreme Truth of Chaos
Synopsis:
BOOK ON HOLD. FOR VARIOUS REASONS, I WILL NOT BE PUBLISHING ON THIS STORY UNTIL EDITS ARE PERFORMED AND A STOCKPILE OF CHAPTERS ARE AVAILABLE. I APOLOGIZE FOR THE ABRUPT PAUSE TO THIS NOVEL.
Although he was plagued by nightmares, David Knox was an everyday architect living life on Earth. Then one day he met a woman that introduced him to a whole different world. Then things went awry for David and he was tossed into a world where myth and legend rule. 
Join David as he tries to rise from his misfortune into one of the supremes of existence.

Title: Removed
Synopsis: Removed

Title: Sentry
Synopsis:
Who watches the watchmen? 
An interesting question in a world where magic lies just under the surface. Where sorcerers lurk among normal people, where vampires, demons, and ghosts lie just in the shadows. Where your local barista might be a cute crush by day and a horrifying creature of darkness by night. Here, sorcerers have formed some semblance of order among themselves, forming rules and laws that stop any of their own from falling ill to a bad case of crazy and sacrificing innocents to summon Cthulhu. 
But what if a sorcerer breaks the rules? What if they do try and conjure up an eldritch tentacled abomination? Who watches them? Who takes them down? 
The Sentries.
An elite group of sorcerers trained to eliminate their brethren and assigned to certain areas to keep the peace. Among them is Lai, the Sentry for a comfortable city where nothing has happened in over five years. Yet there are rumblings of the dark, little upwells of evil that signal the coming of a very real threat to the city he calls home.

Title: The Devil's Dealer
Synopsis:
A 14 year old male named "Shinji" has been maltreated throughout his entire life, leaving him with only hatred against the world. Until one fated day, the boy would encounter a man who would forever change him.
 Author's note: This is my first time writing a novel/story or whatever the fuck you want to call it. English is also not my first language; so if there's any errors please do tell me and I hope that I would be able to make a piece that you all will enjoy. (PS. I know that shit's edgy lmao.)

Title: Lost Soul Found Soul
Synopsis:
Chris was blamed for something he didn't do and now he has to face the consequences. Going to college is out  of the question, now his scholarship has been revoked. The church he attends, offer him a job in order to give him a chance to redeem himself in the eyes of the local townspeople. 
A mysterious man adresses the pastor, offering Chris a job. If he excels doing this job, he is guaranteed a scholarship at a wellknown christian college. The man represents an agency, which focuses on tracking  and recover missing people. Chris is offered to be his assistant, to drive the car, making flight and hotel-reservations and the like. Chris is not supposed to be a part of the actual investigations and capturing any people they do find.However, people aren't just "people" and the man is a part of a larger plan, where Chris also fit in, utilizing the powers that Chris is unaware of possessing.
 
---
Hello, dear reader
Welcome to my first attempt to be a  writer. The leap from "I want to do this" to actually doing this. The story is continous through the parts of the chapters. I plan on writing bits and then add. Please don't expect actual chapters for chapters. You might find it messy. On the other way around, you are next to my couldron, as I create this, every step of the way.This is the first raw draft, writing as the heart and mind conjure the story. Afterwards, we edit. Please join me on my path.
Peyton

Title: After School Nightmare.
Synopsis: It was supposed to be easy. Simple. Quick. With no regrets. Final goodbye's were to be said and from there he would never see the SPR team again as the plan was to go back to England. Plans are never to simple though are they? A final case takes the team to an excotic island that houses children with special abilities, but their investigations soon uncover that the school building has a dark secret. What abilities did these children have that's lead to bloodshed?

Title: Revenge Is Served
Synopsis: Dectective Grimm has worked many cases, it seems though, even when he tries to relax, that there's always a case to be solved.

Title: Melting the Ice to Reveal the Purest Jade
Synopsis:
The hero of the entire universe suddenly disappeared without leaving hints but after a few years, she is suddenly found in an unconscious state.It did not matter what people tried nothing seemed to work, not even gods were able to change that and gods decided to build something akin to a tomb to honor the hero who saved everyone humans, monsters, even gods worship her as their savior but the truth behind what happened remained unsolved until a certain goddess found her soul.(TAGS)Gender bender: just the prologue and a few chapters where she will dress as a male.Tragedy.Female lead.Strong lead (Overpowered)I will keep adding tags as the story continues.1-3 chapter per week (?)
Disclaimer: I just found the picture on google, please send a message if the creator... bla bla bla... and other things.

Title: A Clash of Two World
Synopsis:
On that day, a strange phenomenon happened in the world of Utsa. A new country emerges in the southern seas where the waves are told to be violent. 
They possess strange technologies that can't be described by words. A ship entirely made of iron that fires from miles away, a strange iron wyverns that flies so fast that you don't have enough time to react, and a strange weapon that shoots fire. 
They called themselves the country of Terra. A country that is stranded in a fantasy world. 
Watch as the country of Terra try to survive in the world where they thought only exist in stories. 
--
This is my first time writing a novel in English. English is not my first language, I'm sorry if there's a mistake in grammar. Any constructive criticism is very appreciated.

Title: The Lunar Cycles
Synopsis:
A girl got stranded on a lone isle. She struggles to survive in the wilderness. 
The isle will soon be visited by a variety of characters: 
 
A hunter who hunted for revenge.
A soldier who is sick of war.
A kind boy whose kindness is his biggest weakness.
A loyal beast who became a shady man. 
A girl who wants to have her own harem.
Two gods on vacation and a big tree.

Title: A Tail's Misfortune (1st Draft)
Synopsis: For years Sora has been viciously harassed by bullies, being subject to physical, psychological, and emotional torture from middle school to high school. This, however, is going to change as Sora’s sixteenth birthday draws near; reality begins to twist as myths and legends surround her. She starts to change from a demure teenage girl to something else as she struggles to come to terms with her new transformation.

Title: Creed
Synopsis:
What is a Creed? There have been many different definitions of the word over the years. They all have one thing in common though. You aren't supposed to break them. Breaking a Creed can have disaterous consiquences dependon on the circumstances. These range from anything such as loosing a finger... to complete annialation of you and those you love. Before you agree to a Creed just remember, think about the consiquences. Think about the ones you love. And if you ever decide to break your Creed. Be prepared for the possible hell you may have unleashed upon yourself and those you care for.
This is a story that has been plaguing my mind for the last couple of the past couple of months. It has been keeping me in a daydream a lot while at work and trying to go to sleep at home. The updates for this story will be just as sporadic as my others.
WARNING!! THERE WILL BE SEXUAL CONTENT IN THIS STORY! FOR THOSE THAT DON'T CARE FOR THAT YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!!

Title: the Outsiders
Synopsis:
No Ambrosian had ever been a visitor to the land of Elysia. Kirke though, had a want of adventure and a strive to meet eclectic cultures. To the family-oriented nomads of Ambrosia, it was a dream strangely discouraged.
Finding out that his father plans are against his wishes, Kirke abandons his duties to his family. Accompanied by his bestfriends, his aides and legions, Vincent and Reese - Kirke travels to Elysia where the very stories of his people are myths of their own.

Very Powerful MC, but colorfully flawed individual.
Soft Magic System, but it'll still be explored.
Multiple POVs.
This will be a character-driven story, where even though power plays a huge factor, it isn't the only factor in what happens in the story. Contradictions, extreme states of mind, and lighthearted banter can be expected in this novel.
I am writing this as I develop it, as I want this to also be a story of discovery and rediscovery. I hope I don't disappoint and that you guys enjoy!! :)

Title: Student Council Help Desk
Synopsis: Yuuta Nishimura, a Japanese exchange student studying in the Philippines as he started his life away from his comfort zone, he had a rather 'unwelcoming' beginnings in his few weeks of stay in Ecotec. But his dull life changed when he joined the Student Council Help Desk, a club that is dedicated to helping students on their affairs personal or academic.What shenanigans await in Yuuta's dull and boring life as each request unfolds each day!

Title: Qi and Other Diseases
Synopsis:
What is it like, to live as a mortal without memories in a land of demons, horrific beasts, and ancient powers?
Is there any hope for a man without cultivation, when the secrets he carries are worth more than his life?
What kind of world do immortal kings build?
 
Qi and Other Diseases can also be found on the main blog. Updates Sundays, near Midnight PST

Title: Force Magician in Another World
Synopsis:
Arden Bell is an unfotunate soul.
It's been fifty seven incarnations since the creation of his soul and yet has never made it to a natural death nor had a girlfriend.
The build up of potential in his soul has gotten so bad that the circle of reincarnation on earth keeps rejecting him.
It's at this point that the Goddess Aurora steps in with a unique solution:
"If you can't live a fulfilled life on earth, then how about in another world?"
Thus Arden is reborn in another world in the hopes of somehow living and long and fulfilling life.

Title: A "Living" Weapon Named Death
Synopsis:
The Hayven Corp. has created a new brand of biological weapon. Not one the that uses advanced diseases but, bares a more familiar look. The 'living" weapon. A mix of biological engineering, advanced electronics, and software. The earliest model both rudimentary in all fields. Though progression was fast and a breakthrough was made by making a artificial brain. Thus creating the current models of these "living" weapons. Therein lies our protagonist a custom ordered Mrk. III.
 
This story will be my first time writing like this, but I just wanted to get some of the thoughts in my head out on to the internet. I hope you enjoy my writing or at least my story. Thanks for viewing.

Title: Euterpe Online
Synopsis: Ambea Nighteve, an average 17 year old 2nd year highschool girl who is smart, nonchalant and elegant despite not being born in a rich family. Later that day, while performing library duties with her childhood friend named "Hina" who is an energetic girl. Hina asked if Ambea wanted to play a VRMMO game called "Euterpe Online" with her and telling her that it is good to get a change of pace once in a while.Ambea being confused, she agreed on playing the game with Hina but Ambea has a condition. "Do not let anyone know that I play this game! EVER!" "AYE AYE~!"When Ambea went home after school, she have finished everything that is needed to be done before playing the game. "Sigh,, Let's see, it's 6:30 pm.. I'm not even good at games... Hina, I sure hope that I don't die while playing this." In preparation of playing the game, Ambea carefully checked if she got everything in the right order and message Hina that she will be logging in. "Good, everything is prepared, time to play the game!" Logging in to the game "Euterpe Online", every class are decided by the player's first or third dream job in the real world and every appearance of the player's character are decided by the opposite of what they are like in the real world whether it's their personality or the way they look. But little does Ambea know that Hina is secretly the developer the game, 'tis the reason why her appearance are not altered.Author's note: Will Ambea have fun in the game or will this game turn into an isekai that most people might think will happen later on??~Also I may sound enthusiastic in this but, I'm still trying my best.

Title: The notes
Synopsis: drafts location :D

Title: Man from the Machine - The third Order
Synopsis:
Are you looking for a story?
One of struggle and pain, where triumph is not merely grasped from the maw of defeat, but fought over to within an inch of your life?
 
Actions have consequences. Victories have costs. These lessons and more are what Nathan have learned after reincarnating in a new world, one of magic and wonders, but without humans.
 
We start our story after Nathan takes an offer by an agent of the mysterious Order of the Dagger, leaving all he knows behind. An organization unknown to all but it’s members, dedicated to rooting out corruption and rot throughout the world. 
At any cost. 
 
Are you ready to begin?

Title: I'll Pay2Win in Another World!
Synopsis:
I won a Jackpot, and suddenly I've been flung into another world.Vacation? Pay Store?
Fuck it, I'll Pay2Win in this other world, even if it's cheating.

Title: The Lolicoknight
Synopsis:
On a Sunday like any other, a message appears for everyone, counting down two minutes. With the short warning given, an excited man mentally prepares for this new world. At the end of the countdown, an RPG system descends on the world, shoving everyone into an unknown location, with no directions or guidance.
[participant in the November 2021 Royal Road Writathon challenge]

Title: NOX
Synopsis:
After dying in a crash, a girl awakes to find herself trapped in a world of powerful super villains desperately seeking their own acclaim. Revival comes with more than just a fresh start, however, and from that dark place she now emerges with nothing short of a killing power - and a strange desire to use it.
Black Vine academy is a particularly harsh prep school, funded by the nefarious upper-echelons to unleash new generations of villainy upon the world. In order to rise through the years of training, one cannot take flight or teleport their way up, the path to such heights will be set atop the failings of those too timid, too uncertain of themselves - and the reward will be nothing short of eternity itself.

Title: Something who returned
Synopsis:
A man gets summoned, escapes and becomes a dragon and becomes a god. In the end, he does come back to the world he was taken from but not the same he is now the god of the world and he plans to have fun.
---
I am fairly new at this so if things don't seem right then please tell me what I can do to fix it.
---

Title: How to become a Demon Lord
Synopsis:
This story is about a man who loses everything and everyone who is dear to him. In the end he died miserable. But then he got an offer from a suspicous person for a second chance in life. The strange person even offered a chance to get his old life back. But there is no free meal in this world. Will he be able to take back his life? And what will it cost?
 
This story is a hobby of mine and so I will update when I have time. There is no fixed schedule.

Title: Library of Knowledge - A tale across worlds
Synopsis:
This is a story of power and knowledge. El is a mysterious being living in the Library of Knowledge whose only purpose in life is to learn. Connected to many worlds she appears to help all she deems deserving in exchange for knowledge.Stories and knowledge of the past and future from many worlds, the library has it all. The doors to this library are hard to find, but reality is stranger than fiction.-*-*-*-*-Author: It's hard to categorize such novels properly, so I recommend my novel to those who like stories with many elements woven together to form an engaging world where things happen not because the author wills it, but because the story wills it from the author.
Even though I have quite a few chapters written already, if they aren't well received I will stop posting them.
The content of the story may be mentally traumatizing for some, please read at your own risk.

Title: Summoning Shenanigans
Synopsis:
Adding in  [participant in the Royal Road Writathon challenge]
Sean was a chemist on Earth with a lovely family life.  Everything was going well, until a group of gods decide to summon him to their world.  An unfortunate appearance by the trickster god derailed a normal summoning, and now Sean finds himself in a pickle.  
Content warning:  There will be profanity and quite probably some gore, though the point of the story will not revovle around any gory scenes.  I'm also including traumatising content as there will for sure be slavery and rape.  The rape will be alluded to and not described, there are other places for that.  I think this also explains the grimdark tag.

Title: The Hunter - Trilogy
Synopsis:
“Start talking.” Ullir said.“Go to hell.” The scaly alien spat.“You have always underestimated me.” Ullir said and touched the alien's arm with the Light sword and he screamed. “You believe that I hold your lives in high regard, and you couldn't be farther from the truth. You are scum. The worst of the worst.” He said and slowly moved the Light sword through the alien's arm, who screamed again.
I publish daily with occasional breaks between books. Preliminary cover by me.The first book (Star Wars like, 777 pages, part one) is done. A complete rewrite / retelling / massive expansion / using some of the ideas from Reborn Into Starwars, Summoned into Fantasy by TTT144. With permission, I made it my own. I've actually created a whole new universe for it.The second book (Fantasy, 1,348 pages, part two) is done, and characters from the first book are in it, crossing scifi and fantasy.The third book (Scifi, 1,983 pages, part three) is done, and characters from the first and possibly second books are in it.

Title: Maou Decides to Write a Shoujo
Synopsis:
The Human-Devil war at the Mytherion didn't end well for the demon race as the Maou Fredericus has finally been slain by the Yuusha Ingretta. But death didn't always mean an end to a journey. After dying, Maou finds himself on a complete void with the Irresponsible God. Maou Fredericus somehow made God upset and have him to sent to Earth as a perfectly normal human named Fred. There she met Ingrid, who's a landlady of an apartment complex. With her help, Fred strived to climb on his own way, to society. And when he was able to live on his own, Fred decided to have a new profession: a Shoujo Manga author!
 But just like in Mytherion, Fred's author life on earth won't be that easy too. Together with her two assistants, Ara and Kyrie, and Ingrid helping him, Fred manages himself to be get himself to the top charts and produce a shoujo manga he could be proud of.

Title: An Aircraft Carrier in a Fantasy World
Synopsis:
Luke gets killed by a school shooter. He then is thrown into a world he knows nothing about. As a Nimitz class aircraft.
Discord Permalink: https://discord.gg/jet3cCTNSE
(Revised Nov 25, 2020)

Title: Corrosion
Synopsis:
Going be slow paced uploads. No promise of completion. Typing to improve.
***
Description -
Story is going follow MC, Will. He's going to go exploring the new world after the cataclysm. Going to have some science, but is mostly going to focus on fantasy. Magic, monsters, etc.
Setting -
Two worlds smack each other, destroying Earth in the 22 century. All known settlements are in districts and are the verge of a breakthrough in genetics to improve humans beyond their limits. Technology doesn't work outside of the eletromagnetic fields, and magic is a toxin.
Plot -
Anything I can think of on the spot. I type as I think, which is what I'm the best at. No outlines nothing like that, but maybe a character/place worksheet to use as a reference.

Email me for any sugggested revisions, most likely to be seen btw.

Title: The Nowhere Nomad
Synopsis: For most being dead is easy, it's not something one usually has to try and do. Unfortunately that is not always the case. Kirin is no different, but she doesn't remember being alive in the first place. When an unknown relation brings her back from the dead, she begins her journey to discover who she was in life and where her family is.

Title: Hanging out with the Mutants
Synopsis: In a certain universe, there are humans who have developed superpowers called 'mutants'. A guy who can read minds; a guy who can bend metals with a thought; a guy with metal claws coming out of his hands; a woman who can control things with her mind; and so much more. There is one guy, who neither have superpowers or any mutations, but is hanging out with them. What they did not know is that he has something much stronger. This is his adventure.

Title: New dawn in the age of calamity
Synopsis:
Follow the melancholy adventure of a little girl, as she struggles to survive in this contemporary, dungeon-based wasteland; watch her growth from a weakling to the embodiment of death itself, enjoy her struggles, hardships, and minor insanity, as she wanders around, encountering dangerous monsters, running away from them, other humans, running away from them as well, her problems, and of course, running away from them, but tripping on a fallen branch, and slamming head first into trouble.
I am tired, don't ask anythig of me.
Will try to upload once a week, but that may vary, depending on how busy I am.
Enjoy.

Title: The Lotus Lake
Synopsis:
"Away from the river, hidden amnog the green fields, there was a lake. The Lotus Lake."
-Surrounding the Lotus Lake evolves a tragic story of love and loss.

Title: The Ancient Menace
Synopsis: In a Harsh world much larger than our own. Where monsters freely roam and being of darkness stalk just around every corner. Where dragons are the size of mountains and spells can destroy whole countries. Where armies, billions strong march and where gods play chess with all that lives. In such a place a being rose above all others, a being with such mite his power shook the heavens themselves and with ambition to conquer all things even the thrones of the gods, but on his eve of victory, he is betrayed by though he trusted most, locked away forgotten for thousand years. Waiting for his time to take revenge.

Title: Corruption of Legacy
Synopsis:
Imprisoned for months on months.... he sees no sight in end. Aurum recalls the tender moments he had experienced with his late comrades. These moments of courage, brotherhood and sisterhood he dwells on fondly... for that is the remanents of his past comradance. As long as he lives, Aurum will not forgot the duties and debts he owes his fellow patriots. He holds these thoughts near his heart and purse onwards, with the goal of ultimately returning where they all originated from.
Legacy.

Title: Jake's Day
Synopsis:
Jake is a good, hardworking man that just wants to get his sister out of the slums and his boss a cup of coffee, but the actions of those around him end up spelling a horrific ending for our protagonist.
This is a branch off from another series I write, The Helena Chronicles.  This takes place several books after the first.  I chose to write this to show the Butterfly Effect and the poor tragedy of Jake, which wouldn't be expanded upon in the series.  Just some random stranger that let a little girl use his phone.

Title: Dating Trials of a Vampire Queen
Synopsis:
Bonnie Stanford is a natural-born vampire, but she doesn't know it until her parents die and leave her a man-toy to eat, abuse, or torment at her whim.  Yay for inheritances.

Title: The Chance of a Lifetime
Synopsis:
An unlucky man gets his lucky break. Emphasis on the word break.
*Warning. Not only is this my first story, but also one I don't have a large significant attachment to. It may not: commonly update, continue, or finish. You have been warned.*

Title: The Survivor From Snowdrift
Synopsis: Emerencia grew up trained by her Uncle as a swordsman in a isolated village deep in the mountains called Snowdrift. Emerencia's father who successfully ran the Snowdrift Iron Mine suddenly started making low production of Iron Ore for the kingdom. After a third low production delivery of ore, a Vaesite general himself commanded his soldiers to burn the village to the ground along with killing all of the villagers. Emerencia wakes up in a puddle of melted snow just outside her uncle's house surprisingly alive. As Emma leaves her village to seek revenge, she also gets to see the world for the first time. She even makes new friends who start to feel like family. Most importantly, Emerencia learns how cruel the king and his soldiers really are.

Title: Alfarome: Volper
Synopsis:
What can you do when you only have two years left under the sun? You can, for instance, keep to yourself and lose all contact with reality. You can spend all this remaining time feeling sorry for yourself and crying… But I decided to act in a completely different way: if you have just a few years left to live, then why not enjoy yourself to the fullest? But how would I do that? It’s a piece of cake, since there is a virtual reality I can run to. And, as I’ve found out, there is a new project being launched pretty soon, about which only scarce info has been given by different sources.
 
"Are you fed up with elves, gnomes and other typical races from fantasy novels for teenagers? Sick and tired of reading about medieval battles and life in those dark times? Then, welcome to Alfarome! What’s in store for you here? It’s a brand new game, in the genre of post-apocalyptic cyberpunk, that tests your endurance! And what else can you hope for? That's top secret, because any information can bring you money and you could make loads of it in the game! "©
The only information available is on the official website of the game Alfarome.
Well, I’d love to go back to the old good days, when I was young and hale. Taking into account my past, this kind of virtual world will be just perfect for me!
 
The author would like to thank the translator and director of Liberty Language School Anton Raksha for translation and the teacher and TV presenter John King for proofreading the present book.  
Translate: Anton Raksha
Proof-reading: John King
Proof-reading: Damir Isovic

Title: Technology Enthusiast in an Another World
Synopsis: A tech lover dies because of a stupid goddess and reincarnates in another world with a really broken cheat.

Title: Space: Not the Rear!
Synopsis:
A man raised out of time who for the most part is screwed. A place into the distant future where magic and science collide, for the ultimate science will always appear as magic to those who don't understand it. Comedy ensues with 4th wall breaks, a V.I. and a game sponsor and other entertaining events as I make my character suffer.. *cough* 
Anyways this is for the entertainment and enjoyment of you the readers and me the author.
I would say that each chapter is roughly only 1k words long each or I could say that each is condenced comedy gold. You decide which.
Schedule = none. Will write as I feel inspired and will peter out at some point. So lets enjoy it while it lasts.

Title: The Infinite Cycle
Synopsis:
The birth and death of the universe repeats itself many times over for eternity. Those forces in control of the powers that govern existence will always battle against each other. The end of an era can begin with the smallest of events. One perfectly normal day on the prime planet of Veyir saw the fates of 3 individuals begin their stories.
 Those that had experienced this before expected this cycle of the universe to be the same as ever. It was impossible for them to know how much one small person could change the fate of all creation. The Dragon Festival of the year 2634 was the pivotal point in the fate of the universe and marked the start of a new era.

Title: Miseya Emersin: The Everything of the Gran Demon King
Synopsis:
She, a human priestess who decided to follow a demon.
She, the sword who helped him became the King of Demons.
She, the shield who doesn’t let anyone shake his position.
She, a gracious flower who will make all his wishes become true.
She is his everything…
She is Miseya Emersin.

Title: Apocalyptic Evolution
Synopsis:
Earth, housing a vast amount of resources and species of all kinds. Humanity being at the pinnacle of the Earth's heirarchy has been the status quo for centuries. However, things have been stagnating for Humanity for years. While there have been progress and developement in many fields including technology and medicine there has not been any signficant breakthroughs in decades. The population is reaching a tipping point while Earth's resources have been continually drained. Society has been in a state of stagnation, and in some places decline, since the current economic model's weaknesses have shown themselves. Jason, your average delivery driver, is suffering through a life of mediocrity in search of a "purpose" to his existence that every other person desires whether they recognize this or not. Soon Jason will be forced to make decisions and suffer consequences that he has not possible way of forseeing. The world will undergo an Evolution, how you react and what choices you make will determine your position in this Evolution.
 
*Hey readers, starting this journey as a hobby currently just to pass the time and put some of my ideas in writing. Very new to writing(this being my first attempt) so there will be heinous mistakes, misspellings, and I'm sure other things that irk you the wrong way. I have currently decided to write for fun and should that change in the future I will make sure to address these issues as they become relevant. My writing is being influenced by many different samples of the Literpg genre with my own flavor put in. I have thouroughly enjoyed my journey through many different sagas and am simply looking to start the journey of creating my own.

Title: The Interconnectedness of Knowledge
Synopsis: please don't expect this to be a coherent story because this is only a form of mental dump for me to destress the mind and heart for my healthy well being. If your interested in reading my ideas as a form of reference to your work, please put a shout out to my page,

Title: Survivors Game
Synopsis: A boy named Reo is reincarneted in a gaming world with millons of people now he has a mission to kill them all and get out from that game

Title: Lady Evelyn Can't Stop Interfering
Synopsis:
The shame of her family because of her many misdeeds, Evelyn von Kreutz is married off to the first nobleman in years who showed even a hint of interest in taking her hand.
As she arrived at his dilapidated country home, cursing the fate that had brought her here, she had a chance encounter with a boy who awakened something within her.
But, he's not quite what he seems at first glance.
 

First attempt at writing in quite a while, I'd deeply appreciate any feedback and I'll try to upload with some consistency.

Title: The Gam(bl)er
Synopsis:
Tim Campy, a newly graduated high school student, was accepted to the university but cannot afford the tuition.
For the sake of continuing his study, Tim started playing some games of chance in the nearby neighbourhood. After winning various games of chance, by the time Tim noticed, he was now referred to as the "Prince of Gamblers" from the local gambling dens in that area.
Tim would come with 20$ on his hands and going back home with 2,000 sometimes 20,000. Depending on the quality of the Taco he ate on his way.
And as usual, Tim was walking home from another satisfying night, and from out of nowhere the world shifted. All electronics in the world simply ceased to work, blue screens filled with information and monsters appeared before him.
Following the instructions on the screen, Tim needed to dance with his luck to access the ability to cast Majick, the reality-altering power.
Now with Earth completely back to the medieval, if not primitive era. What would a young man talented in gambling did?

Title: You Laugh You Get Isekai'd
Synopsis:
Welcome children, to an original content that has been made by a group of weirdos who doesn't have put their times into something else important.The rules are simple, You Laugh You Get Isekai'd !!Pardon my rudeness, I noticed that I haven't introduced myself to you yet. For now, please call me as Pew- Lugh, yes, call me Lugh the God of this realm.Hm? what's that? what if that you didn't laugh within the game?Well, Hell's doorways are always open for you. 
Please do fall in line in an orderly manner.
Now, my children, I hope you all entertain me in this endeavor. Ufufufufu

Title: How to Find Yourself
Synopsis: In today's society we often find that many people don't stand out. The fear of becoming one with the identity lacking crowd and the desire to stand out overwhelms our main character.

Title: Aether Hex and the shards of the demon king.
Synopsis:
In the Realm of Mysteries there existed a man named Aether Hex. Or rather he had been transported to this planet of which he knew nothing about. He meets people along his quest who aid and help him and he creates bonds along the way. Knowing that he had a mission on this planet, he strived hard day and night to improve himself and complete the mission as soon as possible to return to his own world but he doesn't even know what the mission is.
Will he truly be able to leave everything behind after his mission is done? Will he even complete his mission or die trying?
Join him in his amazingly interesting yet arduously dangerous adventures as he tries to complete his quests while finding the true meaning of life. 
Note: If you are the owner of the picture, please contact me, I will remove it.
 
Author: I would like some constructive critique and feedback!It fills my motivation gauge and increases that rate of chapters per week. Thanks?.

Title: Blink, A Dungeon Core Story Unlike Any Other (Because it's terrible beyond belief)
Synopsis:
Looking for epic tales? A heroic team of adventurers exploring the dungeon? Amazing plot? Incredible and witty banter? Cool kingdom building and an army of monster evolutions? Well, You've come to the...completely wrong place! Like 5,000 miles in the direct opposite direction!
How the heck did you get so lost to end up here?! 
There are only puns, terrible jokes, and horrible dialogue that will haunt your nights
Stupidity beyond reason lies ahead, you've been warned

Title: PRESIDENT GOERGE MASH
Synopsis:
President George Mash was the first president of the kingdom of Fremund during the year 001. During his time in office he brought prosperity and reforms throughout the kingdom. He ended the reign of the Fremund dynasty and created a government system called “constitutional republic.” He called it “the government for the people.” together with his loyal followers and ‘congress’ they’ve made many wonderful accomplishments.
But all things come to and end when all of the countries located at the continents of Ramand and Hamand have declared war to the kingdom of Fremund.
You might guess that President George have done immediate action to the upcoming war, but he didn’t.
“You might be ‘triggered’ if I told you this… Instead of doing something… He locked himself for one month, isolating himself throughout the world. Many have been wondering the absence of the president…But they didn’t know that during his isolation the president wrote a story… a story about himself… A story of hope for the future generation."
-Documentary by: Michael May, Institute of History Academics, Kingdom of Fremund.

Title: God listens to random wishes (but nothing is free) DISCONTINUED
Synopsis:
A man makes a wish for the world to be more interesting. The gods just happened to be listening 
Jonathan ( j-o-na-than) made a wish for the world to be more interesting, he made this wish countless times before so he wasn't expecting an answer. (???) If you could change it how would you. (jonathan) who's there (???) i'm god or goddess depending on what I feel like. So if you could change the world how would you do it. Title: Those Who Fear the Sun (Fledgling King)

There in Carsage, he faces the greatest terror he had ever met. When a demonic woman accepts him as his apprentice, he finds himself facing trails even the war could have never prepared him for. As he struggles to survive in an unfamiliar world, he struggles with memories of his old self slowly seeping back into his consciousness.Part of "Those Who Fear the Sun" Saga

Title: The Planes of Mil'Tish

The planes of Mil'Tish are plagued by the constant cycle of war, the gods who are supposed to guard the mortals are selfish, malicious, and greedy. entities in the chaos are constant threats who wish to enslave all life in the planes to do their bidding. James a denize of earth is reborn in this hopeless universe as a lowly goblin who are synonymous with the word cannon fodder. watch how james tries to break free from that cycle, how he elevates the goblin species, and more.

Title: Propellers

A speculative and surreal micro serial, updated sporadically.

Title: Hidden words
Synopsis:
When you're isolated, the nothingness within you grows. When you lack the strength to scream for help, the emptiness comes next. Fortunately, rescue arrives and saves Jade from herself. She's thrust into a world she never knew existed, and she has only one path left. In this new world, she's granted the powers that were stolen from her. To survive, she'll use her powers to make a new family and face the dangers that lurk in the darkness, but will she be strong enough?  ····························································This is my first book and any feedback and reviews are welcome :p
thanks to Danetello for help with the Synopsis.

Title: Hero Online Book I: Quest for Vengeance
Synopsis:
It's all fun and games til somebody hacks the game, locks you in, camps your spawn-point, and makes you their slave.
Gideon's a sad man. Middle-aged, over-educated and under-achieving, he's just lost his job and he's looking for some way to cope with the looming midlife crisis. When he sees his chance to connect with his kid-sister in the bleeding edge VRMMORPG Hero Online, he jumps at it. But all's not well in this game, as he very quickly finds out.
Hero Online Book I: Quest for Vengeance is my LitRPG debut. It's one-part homage to the classic fantasy-world LitRPG stories I've come to love, and one-part homage to any and all Comte-de-Monte-Cristo-type revenge narratives. Immerse yourself in the virtual world with Gideon to find yourself in a realm of elves and orcs, honor and deceit, heroes and villains, and, most importantly, revenge.

Sean Webb is a down on his luck drinking his days away when an apocalypse happens and more then half of the planet is iredicated as a system is initalised. With his friends they struggle with their morality trying to survive through amongst the trials and calamities that are used to temper them into what is required.

Title: I Am Nothing More Than A Mere God, Who Met a Human Woman While Searching For Peaceful Place
Synopsis:
Name of Novel - I Am Nothing More Than A Mere God, Who Met a Human Woman While Searching For Peaceful Place
This story revolve around Aoi Kichiro, A god. He had lost his title and now he is searching for a peaceful place to rest while enjoying his reaming life before he fade away
Call it fate or bad luck, He met a high school girl and at that first meeting, she mistook a god as a pervert. who wander around town searching for high school girls.
Thus story begin

Title: Black Belly Enchantress
Synopsis:
She was originally known as the genius doctor of one of the famous hospitals in 21st century. But this "genius doctor" title was just used to conceal her true identity as the most respected agent of a secret organization.
In the middle of her team's mission, she unexpectedly fainted and the moment she opened her eyes again... she discovered that she was transported into another world where mystical things existed.
The previously 26-year-old genius now possesses the body of a 12-year-old young miss of the Bonneville family. Perfect body and appearance.. After realizing that she is now a great beauty, she's naturally happy about it but... she's also aware that beauty could also bring disasters! She could only do her best to get stronger and survive in this mystical world!

Title: M O R T
Synopsis:
The war to end the apocalypse led to the destruction of the planet and the end of all lifeforms including humanity. Losing everything and everyone he held dear, and being the last of humanity remaining, the man succumbed to his fate and patiently waited to reunite with the rest in the afterlife.
 
But minutes after the death of the last creature of the apocalypse, a portal emerged from the void and he remembered his promise with his most treasured person. So, he decided to enter and live his life to the very moment of his inevitable death.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
-
 
Warning!- Viewer discretion is advised. The story contains adult content not suitable for children.
 
Disclaimer: This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events, locales, and incidents are either the products of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

Title: Origin: The Tale Of Isaac
Synopsis:
Finally freed of the asylum, ready to repent on his past actions, and follow the wishes of his late mother. Isaac's new goal in life is simply to bring his remaining family happiness as well as his own. 
The day of his release he wakes up, somewhere unknown, with flying car like objects streaking over his head and buildings with architectures he's never seen before.
A stunning redheaded woman look's at his face full of shock as Isaac looks at his own body. Specifically the body he had when he was 10 years old.
 
 
Authors Note - Essentially a space adventure that reads like a fantasy journey, with a dash of Xianxia. Just taking my favorite elements of these different types of eastern fictions and tossing them into a pot.

Title: Gingerbread Boys
Synopsis: Matt gets entangled with a beautiful and mysterious witch named Serena who runs a magical clinic.  Serena wants him to assist with her spells and even help her by supplying sperm for an enchantment she casts on her patients.  But what is she really doing? In fact, the witch has used his sperm to impregnate her clients, who include his friends and teachers! Will Matt realise this before the witch decides to impregnate his mother with his sperm?  Find out!

Title: I knew her

Title: Lost Girl: The beginning
Synopsis: The vampires have finally ruled , after centuries of discrimination by the humans, they finally got the power, building an impressive empire; ’’the Vampire Empire’’, but now, it is time for them to choose their new ruler within the vampire princes!     Yuka is an 18 years old high school girl, studying and working a part time job, plus living with her horrible aunt, her life hasn't been easy, but she is not the one who'll give up quickly!    A near accident will change her whole life! What can it be?

Title: Falling Dreams
Synopsis: The Kingdom of Gabrall is at war with a country they call "The Demonic Empire", and both countries have fought to a standstill.  Not because they are equally matched, but because Gabrall used all of its armies to defeet the one army sent to destroy them.  The King of Gabrall has decieded that the only way for them to survive is to assinate the "Demon King" and his generals before they can rallie a new army to atack Gabrall.  To keep his country happy with him he desided to call this assine a "Hero", and summoned all of the strongest fighters in the land.

Title: Ikari
Synopsis:
Ikari, the name of one of the greatest swordsman clans in all of Agnesia. Or it was, until one of the family members messed it up. This story isn’t about that guy, though, it’s about his brother, Hanzo.
Ikari Hanzo just kind of wanders Agnesia, hoping to find something great to do to restore his family’s honor. But he’s starting to worry what’s going to end up happening is that he will have to kill his brother.

Title: The misadventures of John Grey
Synopsis: Follow John Grey and his companion as he learns who he is and his purpose. Just because you can't remember your enemies, doesn't mean they have forgotten you.

Title: Omega A Legacy Reborn
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Richard and his friends as they enter the popular online virtual game of Omega as they battle against other players to become the best team in the world. As an addition to that, they must discover the history of the Legendary Pieces, legendary artifacts with unique powers. Some sentient, most of them even corrupted by previous owners. Throughout this journey to become the best team in the world, they will have to fight Black Hat and some Grey Hat Hackers, other owners, and even other entities that will try and destroy the game they love or even worse...The World. So, Hop in and watch as History unfolds in this Online adventure. Are You all Ready? Because Here...We...Go! Entering Omega NOW!!

Title: Sangreville
Synopsis:
A high school girl reluctantly moves with her desperate mother to a "Vampire Town", where the Living and Undead have agreed to a truce.  Once she's enrolled in her new school, she's told that she can "...get away with anything you want."
The "New Girl" tries to fit in.
While this novella is a "Supernatural/Suspense/Thriller", it is also a "Coming of Age" tale.  It concerns a "naughty" high school girls, who is doing things which she knows that she shouldn't.  By the end of the story, she has become a responsible young woman, who is forced to deal with responsibilities, which she would prefer to avoid, but is unable to do so.

Title: Jack the Sympathizer
Synopsis:
A collection of short stories about Jack.
Jack is a modern day practitioner of the magic of Sympathy.
Most people call it the law of contagion, or voodoo.
Like anyone in modern society, he has his problems, but unlike most he occasionally fixes them with magic.
 I have no idea how many stories I am going to end up with in this collection, so consider it complete at any given moment. The stories each stand on their own.

Title: Finley- The Lost Prince
Synopsis:
Life was okay for Finley. It wasn't great, wasn't bad but it was okay. He went to a prestigious school, had a couple of friends and a decent future awaiting him. Or he would have if the people who had abandoned him hadn't shown up with wings, horns and a proverbial wrench for his life plan. It makes for some strange days when you find out you weren't just an average guy all along.
Book one of the Universes Series.

Mia's life continues as it should be.However, was that truly all there was to her dealings with the shopkeeper? Or could Mia have found herself with more than she had bargained for?
