Title: Otherworldly Cultivator
Synopsis: What are the chances that not one, but two seemingly impossible coincidences happen?

Title: TENS: A blessing in disguise
Synopsis: 567 years after humanity received its gifts from the stars, one man wakes up in an unfamiliar place with jaw-dropping sights, strange creatures that want a taste of his succulent meat, quirky merchants out to scam the poor man, and a hungering lust for answers and adventure. Although, it's not always rainbows and butterflies for the journey ahead of him.

Title: The Helena Chronicles
Synopsis:
Espers are really no different than humans; they look like any normal human and in general behave like any normal human.  However, there are a few key differences.  The max life expectancy of espers ranges from forty-five to fifty.  They naturally have a knack for mathematics and are extremely intelligent in general, this is because their abilities rely on the subconscious and conscious calculations.  They also have a mysterious energy source they call Focus that is generated naturally by all espers.
The continent of Elestveeve is populated by three major factions, each a governing force.  On the west of the continent, there is the Noble Houses that subscribe to the Deity Faith.  The Houses ruling with the Deity Faith as council since the religion's founding four-hundred years previous.  Controlling most of the northeast is WITCH, an organization ruled by powerful espers; claiming the mysterious Genesis as their capital, they are a whispered myth among much of the continent's less technically advanced residents.  In the southeast you have Tech City, a towering monolith of a capital with four sky layers and metropolis' leveled deep underground; it is a city brimming with technical advancement and cyber integration.  Each faction contends with one another for their evolutionary ideology, by devout religious worship to receive miraculous gifts, unique genetic lineage to obtain ESP, and technological integration to become something more than human.
Helena, a young genius and esper, awakes in a dark room with only fuzzy memories and the company of seven other children.  She must determine how she got there and how to get back to where she came from.
Warning:  Due to time constraints, I don't have the time to keep up on my three stories; therefore, Helena will need to go in a stasis chamber until I can find more time to write between work and life.  I love my first girl so much!  however, it seems she is the least popular among the fans (the poor girl T_T).  This world is much bigger than my other two novels and I'm not giving up on it, but simply having to put her on ice.

Title: Kings: Immortals Amongst Us
Synopsis:
From all different walks of life, a handful of people had been chosen to be reborn in a new world without their consent. What purposes do they serve in the games of the gods? Kings they were in name, yet they felt like mere pawns to the whims of fate.
Each must carve out their own path with the powers they were given. To forge their own roads of sovereignty. 
Will their journey lead to greatness? An everlasting kingdom of prosperity?
Or a ruinous era of blood and death?
Who is right and who is wrong? 
In the end, does the answer even matter?

Title: Otto's Poke-adventure
Synopsis: This is a Pokemon fanfiction. Hope you like it. Synopsis and title are a work in progress.

Title: Monster Contractor
Synopsis:
Aeon is species of the eponymous organisms that have evolved and inhabited Earth with an innate connection to element-based magical powers.
They commonly captured and trained by humans, primarily for slavery and/or to be used as a weapon. Nearly all Aeon are able to manipulate energy or matter through supernatural means, with the specifics of these abilities determined for each Jurik largely by their elemental "type"
Most Aeon physically resembles animals, though some resemble plants or objects with animal-like facial and other features. It is not clear whether most Aeon classified as natural living things, though they are often treated as non-living organisms.
Nearly a century has been passed since the first generation Aeon coming to Earth. Now, there is a violent and bloody massive war called Great Aeon War where many people died along with Aeon by using them in the war to fight as well as using man-made weapons such as tanks, fighter planes, guns, etc.
Most of the kid become fatherless, and it is hard enough for their mother to raise a child alone in a war.
Therefore, once they reach become 10 years old, every child (the poor one) must make an important decision in their life; either join the school and prepare themselves for the war, or helping the professors and researchers to capture as many Aeon as they can, or simply living without any support either from the government or from their parent.

Title: Underworld
Synopsis: It is 2144, just a dozen years since the last (4th) world war, also known as the "Last War".  Now Earth is united under a global government.  All labor is automated, so humanity now lives a life of leasure.  With sporting events banned as uninclusive and discriminitory e-sports stars now stand at the peak of global celebrities just as sports stars used to.  Full body experience virtual reality or FBEVR (pronounced as fever in english), is now the main source of entertainment for most of humanity.  However society does have it's darker side, as the losers of the "Last War" have been pushed to the edges of human society, forced to work for the state as "punishment" for their sins.  One such "Sinner" is a former E-sports celebrity of an old style VRMMO called Underworld was now a nobody known as Mark Ulrich.  Mark, who now lives cut off from most of modern society with his teenage daughter and the ghosts of the Last War deep in Arizona's Sonoran Desert, is visited by an old friend Leo about a new FBEVRMMO which is to be released soon called Underworld-GOLD, with an offer to reprise his old glory.

Title: An Unexpected Christmas
Synopsis: Male adventurer goes on quest to save some girl's sisters.

Title: Tales of the Legendary Scholar
Synopsis:
They meet in the most unlikely moment and turned their life around.
Freidrech newly arrived in his own nation's capital city, which is so foreign to him compared to his village's idyllic and nondiscriminatory atmosphere, after he is forced to come. Now, he is facing a royal prince and tells him to bow.
This draws out one of his late father's teachings from the deepest recesses in his mind. "The blood of your great ancestors runs in your veins. Don't easily bow down to anyone, or accept suppression by any being, not even from a monarch, unless you pledge your allegiance to him. Also, giving in to oppression is directly telling the oppressor that you're easy prey and open for manipulation."
He is uncertain on how to face this oppression right now. Will he bows or not? What will he do to uphold his father's words while keeping his life safe?
As for the prince, Theodrech has nothing to do with Freidrech, so he wishes to let this slip, but the boy opens his mouth and proposes the most ludicrous challenge he ever heard and triggers his curiosity.
"I, Freidrech Goederf Gerboud, son of the late Village Chief Louvel Gerboud of Wrilon, will challenge you, Your Highness, to a battle of riddles… If you win, I will not only bow but be your servant for the rest of my life."
This amuses the prince. It is the first he met a boy of the same age who is not intimidated by the air of authority he projects. Rather, this boy challenges him.
"Why are you so headstrong? In fact, bowing to me is an honor. You saw the King's noble Knights. When they saw me, they bowed," says Theodrech, testing Freidrech.
"Allow me to be forward, Your Highness. For me, bowing to a monarch does not guarantee loyalty. If I were you, I rather have men who stand straight in my presence but who got my back, than bowing men who are dreaming of my death," replies Freidrech.
The prince’s curiosity increases. A huge smile is seen on his face. Prince Theodrech decides to take Freidrech under his wing.
Little did they know, this boy who Prince Theodrech takes in as his confidant and friend in the most ridiculous fashion is someone indispensable in his life and the one who can help him succeed the throne when he almost believes he has lost.
Thus, the Tales of the Legendary Scholar begins.
------ o ------
Old Synopsis:
 A famous ancient adage stated, behind a successful man is a woman BUT… In these lands, the monarchs are seeking not a woman to stand behind them but the man hailed as the Legendary Scholar. However, this legendary figure starts off in life as a youngster of humble birth, a newly orphaned lad named Freidrech, who courageously faces the high-strung aristocrats and big-bellied bureaucrats in the kingdom.He is held in contempt as unscholarly, ignorant, and a plebeian from the hinterlands.But he proved them wrong.Not with an iron-clad fist of which he has none, but with his studious nature, ingeniousness, courage, wit, and honesty. Also, with the assistance of two ousted beings: a  former aka 'great wizard', and a burly fairy.
Follow Freidrech’s adventures, on how he wins the heart of the future king of Xaeviel, befriends outlaws, prevents the people from being slaughtered from an unknown plague, rerouting the enemies’ attacks when reinforcements are denied, secures Prince Theodrech’s claim to the throne in the midst of utter despair, and many more.

Title: Rise of Dragons

The dragons reign the world as its overlords. They controlled the world, imprinting fear in the humans heart.
One day, the dragons vanished overnight thus allowing a greater tribulation to fall onto the world. The newly invader could rampage on the world without any difficulty thanks to disappearance of the overlords.
This was the reason why the last remaining human royalty embarked on a journey to find their missing overlord. Will she fail or not, only time will tell.

Synopsis:
A cultivator who dedicated his entire life to cultivation ends up failing at the last moment. His soul is thrown into the void, but he continued to cultivate his soul, allowing him to continue to survive. For an eternity, he wandered around the void, with only his memories to keep him company as he continuously fought off the dissipation of his soul.
That was until he chanced upon a goddess in a pure white room, giving him a second chance at life... as a sentient ball of slime.

Title: The Crippled Seed
Synopsis:
Even a small child in Adrias knows that everyone is born with some magic. It is common knowledge that magic blooms at around the age of 13, and even though the gift of magic varies from person to person, everyone possesses it.
When Nina is 14 years old, her magic tests report that she has no magic inside her. To hide that fact, she has to quit school against her wishes and live a sheltered life. That lifestyle, however, lasts for a mere two years as bandits strike her village and she has to move out, forced to survive and be something—anything—in this world full of magic...without possessing a single speck of it.

Title: A Boy's Wish
Synopsis:
Eloire lives in an orphanage under the tyranny of the wicked Mrs. Cranch, a woman of many jowls, and a rotten heart, whose only friend is a metal ruler, and who finds great pleasure in making the kids’ lives a living hell. That is until three magical creatures visit him at night, eager to trade a wish he unknowingly bears for worlds of magic and never-ending wonders. But Eloire has something else in mind: a magic school for the unloved children of the world. Come and find out how Eloire builds the Dreamery, what words the trees and the winds hide, how the light bends, and how he fights against the oldest evil of the many worlds.
But always remember, where light goes, a shadow follows.
Are you brave enough?

And with a company like that, the angel Uziel found her calling — a truck driving, plant-pot dropping and knife-toting entrepreneur of the highest order.

Title: The Flourishing Mind
Synopsis:
A genius with a twisted past he cannot remember.
A virtual prison from which he cannot escape. 
Dalton is a pawn who wants nothing more than to become a king. But he cannot do it alone. If he is to leave the virtual asylum into which he and the other hapless patients have been interned, he must use more than just his wits - he must use the people who call themselves his 'friends'.

Title: Re: Sword Emperor (old)
Synopsis:
In the largest virtual reality game in history, Mark was a king. His team? Unstoppable. They were heroes even among other pros. But the game changed. The government—for their own political gains—made a mess of everything Team Black Moon worked so hard to perfect. Ten years of their lives were spent playing Ashes of God. Still, Mark and his friends found themselves obsolete—forgotten.
Then time itself forgot. Mark wakes up, 10 years ago. 
He’s never met his lover. He’s never played Ashes of God. Mark’s friends don’t even know his face. But he’ll find them. With his knowledge and skills, they’ll rise higher than ever. Mark will not be forgotten.
This time, they’ll be the ones who change the game.
 
PS: This synopsis had been made by S.D. Mills, please check out his works.

Title: Shoujo Jyanai: A Closet Otaku's Fantasies Come To Life
Synopsis: Shoto, a 19 year old student and closet otaku, lives an uneventful yet peaceful life in one of the busiest cities in the world. Having no relationships, friends or whatsoever, he enjoys his privacy and keeps to himself as much as possible avoiding any social development. On a seeminlgy regular day, Shoto's peaceful life takes an unexpected turn towards his deepest desires and fantasies.

Title: Thus spoke Morpheus
Synopsis:
When we go to sleep we are transported into another world, another story, another character and another setting. It's all jumbled, messy and odd, but it doesn't have to stay that way.
All of these realities have one thing in common, namely the person creating them. Will you step up to the challenge of trying to understand the alternate universes you've been spawning for a third of your life?

Title: Ooze
Synopsis: An intelligent slime survives in an RPG world.

Title: Anti-Villain
Synopsis:
The fourth-generation VR was far better than its predecessor, almost entirely immersive within the digital world. The VR fully immerses the person even when one slept, and refreshed the next morning. And Jin Bertrand certainly enjoyed the worldly experience in the Vengeance of the Phoenix Lord game.
What he didn't expect...

Title: Where to princess?
Synopsis: Reincarnation into ship story and traveling.

Title: Adventure of Adventures
Synopsis: A teenage girl wakes up in a cathedral with no memories and no common sense. Follow Robin as she gains both while on her quest to figure out what is going on.

Title: Bringing Fire to Heaven
Synopsis:
This story is set in a world with technology roughly equivelent to perhaps the early 20th century, yet where powerful magic exists and there are no explosives. Rising human nations vie with huge steel airships armed with air rifles and naptha mortars, trains, telegraphs, electrical lighting, combined with plate armour and imperialistic monarchies clinging to power.
The gods are however very real and very mindful of the dangers of human progress whilst their power is, as it has always been, fed by blood sacrifice. This story will follow an immensely powerful and intently driven human mage as she seeks to reap the heavenly hosts with vengeful fire and slay the gods.

Title: [Data not Found]
Synopsis:
[ACC:Restarting ACC Program...
     Power:optimal...
     SEED Core: established...
     PRIME Principals: established...

Title: Immortals: The Eternal Kings
Synopsis:
12 humans granted by the Gods what their kind had been searching for since the dawn of time. Immortality. Each with their own powers and circumstances, how will they use these new abilities? Are they great blessings, or terrible curses? For what purpose were they chosen?
In this new world so similar yet different to our own, how will their future go?

Title: Reboot - Hiatus
Synopsis:
Raif is a young Officer in the Army National Guard who wants nothing more than to finish his degree and go active duty so he can pursue his true passion in life, his hobbies. To learn how to mine, smelt, and forge metals, or cut, mill, and craft lumber, anything and everything to do with medieval crafting. All he wanted was to be a medieval craftmaster with air conditioning... Well that and losing his virginity would be nice.
Fortunately his wish gets granted, when he falls asleep one night and dreams he's in a tutorial world to learn how to do everything he ever wanted. The only problem is he only has his boxer briefs on and isn't exactly dreaming.
Suddenly everything depends on his ability to learn what he always thought of as hobbies. With the entire world changing, the skills Raif learns could have real world life altering consequences. The worst part, there isn't any air-conditioning and he's still a virgin.

Title: Seven Hills 90210
Synopsis:
A Beverly Hills 90210 / Buffy: the Vampire Slayer fan fiction tale.
 Brenda and Kelly are feuding over Dylan, when Anya the Vengeance Demon, from Buffy: the Vampire Slayer, offers her help.
A comedy with euphemized expletives. (That means dirty words being covered over clumsily, for comic effect.)

Title: The Prophecy of seven
Synopsis: In the void in which nothing exist something unknown to anyone's knowledge or understanding, creating things form nothing ,awaits the time for the future to tell what its course is going to be. The Prophecy is about to begin its inital stage.

Title: Beast Cultivating System
Synopsis:
A woman felt her life didn't have meaning and was missing something, she envisioned a more exciting future in which she had a goal to achieve.Coincidentally, this came in the form a bolt of lighting which sent her into the newborn body of a spirit beast with True Dragon heritage, into the world of cultivation where the strong eats the weak. Whilst awakening inside an unfamiliar world and body, she was pondering her newfound situation a robotic noise interrupted her thoughts indicating that the beast cultivating system has activated.Bloodline purity? Legendary bloodlines? Talent?Her system can provide it all.Armed with the knowledge of being a race in which is hunted by other beasts for its bloodline or enslaved by other cultivators, she knew the only way to keep safe in this chaotic world is getting stronger.Dragon pic: https://lawrencemann.co.uk/portfolio_page/spitfyah/
I have posted this on web novel; https://www.webnovel.com/book/12432453405442605/Beast-Cultivating-System

Title: Black God of Lightning.
Synopsis:
Lucas is an orphan who worked hard to achieve good grades. But before he could realize his dream, he died... However, a God "invites" him to another world where magic is used and gives him a system!
Can Lucas reclaim his former dreams but in another world?
Can Lucas become the strongest despite being different from the rest of the population?
Adventure: CheckSystem: Check                                                                                                                                                                             
Follow: CheckFavourite: CheckAm I shameless: Check 
Join Lucas on his road to becoming the Black God of Lightning!

Title: Games of Reincarnation dropped
Synopsis:
David was a normal man. He had a wife 2 kids,and a job as an architect. One day he got a job to build a big fuck you sign, the client was a rich man and the job was paying a lot of money.
The job was going smoothly until the day it was finished and the neighbor caim to complain.
 
(this story is for fun and a learning experience for me so don't complain if it's bad)

Title: The Soulless
Synopsis: All most die and reincarnate, but what happens when a soul remembers and doesn't pass on, joining the endless throng of skeletons and zombies that await the time they turn to dust?

Title: Locke
Synopsis:
Follow Locke and Willum as they uncover plots against the Kingdom and fight to grow into men worthy of their fathers.
Set in a mideval fantasy world, magic is present as well as monsters and bloodlines with mystical powers abound. Numerous factions fight for control of not only the Kingdom of Greshun but the entire continent. 
There will be profanity, gore, and sexual content. The traumatising tag is there because I am not sure how exactly how dark some elements of this story will be but it will get dark at some points
(I'm not good at writing a synopsis, please read if you're interested)

Title: Re:World
Synopsis:
What would you wish for if you have one?
Power?
Wealth?
Immortality?
Yet he wished for something different.
In his entire life, he was mocked, humiliated, and backstabbed. But not this time.
He’s was born a human, But they say his worse than the devil.
His personality is twisted as it can be. One moment he beheaded someone next his smiling with blood all over him.
Why I am telling you this?
What is this all about?
Hahaha, you’ve done well to listen to me up until this point.
Let me tell you a story of a boy named Reiki.
Like any other name, it’s plain and simple but to others this name was special. To some, he was their Lover, Enemy, and Savior.
This is not a story about him being a saint and helping the entire world achieve world peace nor a story about him being a devil killing everything in sight like you he was only human.
But you don’t want to hear the story like this no let me start over.
One day Reiki killed his best friend for selling him out and on this day he tried to commit suicide.

Title: Grand Ancestor
Synopsis:
A great ancestor who died in battle collapsed in the body of a young man named Qin Huarang, the third prince of the Qin royal family, how a grand ancestor story that united the continent was trapped in the body of a flamboyant young man who was considered useless by everyone.
Watch where the great ancestor was born again in the world, androck the continent.
Watch him build troops for supremacy.

Title: Ascetic Usher
Synopsis:
ALERT :--
This is my First story and english is not my primary language. MC is not overpower or have any cheat like ability.  
 
This is the story of some people who Changed the world without being a part of IT .These people are called Usher who weave the fate of the world as a bystander.  You will be reading the story of each Usher as he wrote his work , origin and aspect of the society for the future Usher.

Title: Rise of New Olympus
Synopsis: Percy arrived in a dimension where Avenger from the movies are real. In this world there are no Olympians no Camp Half Blood. Now he has to raise the New Olympus with the help from Avengers and the remaining Greek Gods. This is a story where Percy becomes the God of Seas.

Title: Welcome To Dead City
Synopsis:
The world is crumbling, everyone knows the story, everyone's seen it happen a billion times on TV - But nothing prepares them for the real thing. Can you really shoot someone who you've known for your entire life if your life depends on it? Can you mercilessly ignore the cries of the weak, frail and old; do you have the heart to kill a person who you know is trouble, who threatens your survival? This is the lowest bar to survive in a new Earth and one girl hangs on by the skin of her teeth.
In a dog-eat-dog world, it is not an easy task for a child to survive. But Sen manages, she takes no risks and hides at the sight of other humans. No one can be trusted. But peace cannot last forever and it will not. News of Alaska opening its borders sweeps throughout a desolate America and millions begin a months-long trip to across the continent to what seems to be a new hope. Sen can't possibly hide forever and she knows this might be her one true chance at regaining a safe living, but she also knows the first rule of the new Earth.
No one can be trusted.

Title: The Wrong Hero
Synopsis:
The gods have been known, in times of great need, to summon a hero from another world. In ages past, they have summoned mighty warriors from other universes to fight as their champion and save the world from darkness.
Unfortunately, the gods are not all-knowing, and they can make mistakes. Sometimes what they get is not quite what they were expecting...

Title: [Short] behind your smile | 你的笑容 (COMPLETED ✓)
Synopsis:
COMPLETED: 01/02/2019
"The loneliest people are the kindest.""The most damaged people are the wisest.""The saddest people smile the brightest."  All because they do not wish to see anyone else suffer the way they do.

Title: Ventus, The Death God
Synopsis: No. 13 spent his entire life in the shadows. He is a killing machine forged from those that seeks more wealth and power; Blood is the coin that is traded. One day, a magical portal takes him and some others into a beautiful world on the outside, but filled with hidden dangers, intrigue, and war. Magical creatures also roam the land along with other intelligent races. Can a killer be a hero, find redemption, and harder yet, live a life of peace when his blades are not reaping the lives of others. Sometimes, there are no good guys, only the lesser of evils that man will commit.

Title: I Really Should've Paid More Attention in History Class!!!
Synopsis:
So, bet you're all familiar with the travel back in time trope. The hero who shall use his badass knowledge of the future to save humanity or become number one!
Well...Do I have a stupid and poorly written story for you!
Tired of overused and cliche tropes? Bored of OP know it all, super calm/emotionless and perfect MCs? I got you fam. 
Let's see where this absolute train wreck of a power fantasy gone wrong goes eh?
 

Spoiler: Spoiler


 What happens when a Support Class goes back in time and is tasked with saving the world?

Title: Imperfect Magic
Synopsis:
Valena very much wants to become a [Dracomancer] and Mana-bond a dragon. Unfortunately things don't go quite as planned.
 
A serial partially for me to vent but also to explore more out-there weird ideas in an unexpectedly serious manner, plus fun nuanced & detailed world building with illustrations.
 
 
?? ? ??
 
 
Seven silver serpents swimming in the sea.Several serpents sang a song and the sea did shiver see.Sole serpent slipped away and found our somber sands.Six Serpents sought the single serpent and it led them to our lands.
 
Flitting lives witnessed colours moon.Mortal thrives blood inopportune.Coloured cobalt, azure seams.Searing scarlet, ruby dreams.

Title: God of Evolution
Synopsis: A dream of many is to be a God, so what if when your steps away from achieving your life long dream you are suddenly in a new world, with a new body. Unmatched in his old world Lucius has been reborn as a child with special skills and a weird interface in an ancient tomb. However that won't stop him from fulfilling his lifelong goal, no matter what stands in his way. Whether it's in this world or the next I will become a God.

Title: TECCnology, a RWBY fanficton.
Synopsis: Team TECC: Talis Ebonmere, the mechanical giant. Standing 7'10 and weighing in at over 400 pounds, the armor is seen more than his own skin, as he rarely takes it off. Enyasi Gorestin, a Wolf Faunus with a carnivorous smile and extreme mood swings. With a machine-gun pike and shield on a cable, getting her angry is the last thing you want to do. Cappollo Helios, the amateur singer and guitarist who can reverse light and sound. Her guitar is her weapon, razor-sharp blades popping from the strings and twin drones taking to the sky from her backpack. Chromata Delsingh, the high-flying Gravity Dust user with Remnant's most destructive voice. Telescoping wings from his back, fire from his rocket-boots, he loves to show off. A first year team from Atlas, this fanfiction will follow team TECC, from the team's first moments to their first Semester at Atlas.

Title: Inconsecutive
Synopsis:
Baring a few disturbing exceptions, every time I sleep I dream. For as long as I can remember, I have had vivid dreams every time I sleep. Most dreams fade on waking, but if I make the attempt I can remember the dream long enough that it gets stored in long term memory or write it down in a dream journal and review it later. These are my dreams and nightmares... or at least the ones that I am willing to make myself remember. 
I have decided to start posting some of these so I can get feedback on my general writing style before I try to write anying that is more than a few chapters in length.

Title: The Call of Cerexia
Synopsis:
A good meal, a peaceful evening and a good fantasy book was Amelia's idea of a good time. Even so, that doesn't mean she wanted her life turned into a fantasy book! Sprinkle in a missing guardian, sudden surprises, and a few interesting characters and you've got one confused Amelia.
Call of Cerexia tells of the beginnings of Amelia Beckett's adventures including a whole new world, magical mishaps, and one very strange cat.

Title: A Hard  Game (Dropped)
Synopsis: All Von needed was a quiet holiday, a holiday where his dying brain could properly rehabilitate. Nothing more. Yet, life just decided to throw him into a rare occurrence that shouldn't even occur in one in 10 million cases.

Title: Timeless Love
Synopsis:
A tragic accident leads her to woke up into a new era she never knew before. Slowly learning about her new identity, she also learnt there was some connection between her former life and her current life. 
Woke up and found herself tied up and being kidnaped, no one believe her when she said she might be Jiang Xi Yu, the daughter of Duke Jiang from Luoyang. The two eunuchs, who saved her, brought her to served their sly, cunning wangye.
after being forced to spend a night full of lust with the first Prince of the kingdom, she got the offer to become his sex slave. She, who believe she was a daughter from noble family, against him, who believe she belong to him from that night forward. 
Their fate started that way. From a night full of lust to forever be tangled in love.

Title: Lost In A Universal Sandbox.
Synopsis: Ever Wonder what it would be like to live in a world of a sandbox a video game like Minecraft or Terraria? I don't mean cube heads and bodies or the limited view! I’m talking about the progression and style of living the crafting and expansion the path to power! Somehow being able to turn wood into a wooden pickaxe Magically. Mine chunks of stone that would usually need an excavating machine and eventually accomplishing something grand like building your own home within a day or two, you're town in a week, your city within a month, you're own Empire in a year….Become a Mighty Emperor who rules millions or a God who sweeps away the masses.No this isn't a world where handouts are given so easy, forget making a house even if you knew how to make a simple pickaxe on Earth it wouldn't happen here no..not without a recipe. And if you want that Recipe you better get foraging...why you're thinking right?... heh you'll see.

Title: Title of True God
Synopsis:
Every person tends to have an emotion inside them but not every single one of them can show them properly, 17-year-old Aoi Kichiro is sensitive but incapable of showing his emotions like normal people around him, because of this, his social skills are almost at zero. He is a high school student and has no friends. But one day something happens to him, a change to his life that changes everything for him. The way he looked at his life, They way he looked at other humans.
Updates On This Novel Are Slow, Really Slow!
Cover Art Credit - ???
Thank you for making this beautiful Art :)

Title: Records of Dystopia
Synopsis:
Eight hundred years later, the Earth has become a wasteland due to several unforseen variables. The Earth changed faster than mankind could adapt to, and before we knew it, it was too late. Could this be divine punishment? Who knows. The future of humanity is grim, but we won't go down without trying to upset fate.Anymore would be semi spoilers, so find out what truly happens on the next episode of Dragon Ball Z~~ not. Please read the short story to find out. Thank you. (Sorry, I watched too much stand up comedy)
Side note: This is my first time writing stories, so please go easy on me. Please rate my drawing too. He becomes pretty OP in my imagination story.

Title: The Three Realms
Synopsis:
Follow Aureus Astrea as he journeys across the three realms,
Gathering a Team, 
Building a Kingdom,
Fighting Demons while facing internal strife.
Join him, as he struggles through it all.

Title: The Wolf of The North
Synopsis:
John Scott wakes up in Winterfell 6 years before the plot for Game of Thrones begins
 
This is being dual-hosted here and on Webnovel

Title: The OP Ricegod system
Synopsis: This is a story of a Numb ass man(boy) named Tyrese , who one day, inexplicably gets to have five wishes grant to him...... Follow him and his perilous journey to get the top of the worlds.

Title: Dreams Come True
Synopsis:
In a futuristic world of superheroes and supervillains, the ability to dream of another world doesn’t seem that applicable nor useful. But for Demund, who has recently sent off his best friend to the superhero training grounds—the Preliminary Islands—it was nothing but life-changing. For him, a rejuvenating vacation to a world of magic is now only a good night’s rest away. 
As Demund explores his new world, reality around him begins to change. How will he manage to balance their existences together?

Author's Note: It's going to be a very long story. While it may be (very) unrefined in the beginning, stick around and enjoy as the story grows.
Cover by Sydorow.

Title: Hero Summoning Gone Wrong: The Kidnapped Demon Lord
Synopsis:
"911, Heaven's branch, what's your emergency?"
"Hello. Erms, my friends and I may have accidentally summoned A Demon Lord, What do we do?"
"Wait, what?"
"Oh God, he's laughing maniacally while building his castle! Plz, help."
"Have you tried turning the summoning circle on and off..?"
"OH GOD, THERE'S TWO OF THEM NOW!"
"Bltisz, W-wut? Sorry, you're breaking up!"
"I KNOW YOU'RE JUST CRUMPLING PAPER!...DAMNIT DON"T JUST HANG UP!"
In which incompetent goddesses randomly transmigrate people from other worlds. Wai- is that a goddamn robot?! 
WHY IS MY MAGIC POWER FANTASY STORY GOING WRONG?!

Title: The Novelist
Synopsis:
Whatever you do, don't accept the invitation. It could be a simple letter in your mailbox. A single document in your email. Even a seemingly harmless pop-up on your computer.
They'll be persistent, demanding horrid actions for you to committ. You'll try to quit, to go back to what used to be such a great, normal life. You'll fail.
The game has its hooks in all of us, and it's only a matter of time until you're next.
God help us all.

Title: (Rewritten) evolution of a turtle
Synopsis:
(Rewritten this because I was not happy how the first one was turning out so I made this one so I can improve my mistakes.)
guy gets reincarnated as a turtle after dying alone in a alleyway. He has the sole purpose to destroy and kill but before that he needs to evolve.

Title: Dangerous Magic
Synopsis:
Mortals believe witches are cruel, vicious, evil and ugly. You can’t deny that. But although some witches can be defined with these adjectives, some are the opposite and some are in the middle. Back in the year of hundreds the mortal folks knew of a legend, about a witch that was born. Born in a place that mortals also believed as a legend; The Legendary Daphne Garden.
Daphne is a flower that is dangerous and poisonous. It can cause coma or sudden death. That time, few people only knew about poisons. Ignorance was common.Celeste grew up to be a beautiful witch. Born with silver hair with pink tips (much like the pink water daphne), pale white skin, red lips and silver eyes. She was famous to anywhere she goes.
Anyone who had a mind knew about “The Wandering Silver Belle”Who would’ve know that this “silver belle” would be the witch in the legend of the witch born in “The Daphne Garden.”

Title: Golem core
Synopsis: Alex's life changed when it ended. Hit by a car and reincarnated into the core of a golem and then discarded he finds himself in a new world he needs to find his place in and figure out what life as a golem means. Starting small maybe one day he will be great.

Title: Changing the course of life
Synopsis: On January 1 2019 people of earth started feeling different inside their body. Sensation of a strong power that they could not explain were running through their whole bodies. They started gaining magical powers which were hard to control at first but gradually begun to learn to manipulate it willfully. The changes were caused by the unification of two earths into one. Exactly a year after, on January 1 2020, the extinction of everybody from earth came and it was caused by the inhabitants of the other earth. Alvin who was a 21 years old boy, fought bravely for his and others' survival just like many… but still ended up dying. His Death marked the extinction of all humans from the world but his life continues as his 12 years old self in year 2010. After suffering so much pain he promised to himself that he will prevent the horrific massacre and save the human race no matter what.

Title: Foundations of Magic
Synopsis:
An Educational Discussion of Magic with an Ancient Necromancer and the author on the structure on which Magic functions and is based upon.
Feel free to ask your own questions in the comments and confront the necromancer with your own answers and speculations.

Title: New International Defense Force|Hydra I Campaign
Synopsis:
This is the first story in a series, It will follow the daily lives, Missions, Hardships and deaths of the NIDF's 365th Brigade.
This series will be told mainly through the eyes of Rex Caprox. However, to get a full story you need to see it from different angles. This is the first book of the series and will follow the 365th on their Hydra I campaign, It will entail how they trained together, how they laughed together and how they fought together and with each other.
You will peer into the story of a newly formed unit with both seasoned and newbies alike, Each with their own tale to tell.

Title: Unlimited Blade Works
Synopsis: Ango's Third life, after having nothing in his first life, and losing everything in his second, how will he decide to live his third in the fate universe as Emiya Shirou. Harem with a couple of servants, and a new format for the holy grail war with just a tiny bit more servants than usual.

Title: An Atomic Choice (A Working Title)
Synopsis:
During the Third World War the internet was shut down, progress had been thrown away for the sake of humanity. After, humans had constructed a civilization underground. Epidemics of viruses and illnesses spread, which resulted in tremendous leaps in biotech. Virtually all parts of the human body could be replaced.
During his leisure, Ivard indulged in the virtual world.

Title: Celestial Cycle
Synopsis:
Life is a constant cycle but how would it look from the outside.
Two immortals will see the rise and fall of countless civilizations and religions.
This is the first of the cycles that led to the break down of everything that mortals knew.

Title: In Love With A Supervillainess
Synopsis:
Don't expect many chapters, I just make a bunch of one chapter stories so I don't have to wait days for it to get approved whenever the whim to write side stories hit me.
Richard Price. A big fat Nerd with a capital N. A high school loser who's only friends was online. And hopelessly in love.
Normally that'd be fine and dandy if it wasn't the target of his unrequited feelings.
The Infamous Sapphire. Cat Thief. Mercenary for hire. And as dangerous as she is beautiful. A rose with wicked thorns if there ever was one.
How will our awfully equipped Romeo catch the attention of such a woman? And better yet, would he even survive? He didn't know, but he's sure as hell going to give it his best shot! 
*A superhero story that follows the journey of a boy turned henchmen turned...who knows??*

Title: This Party has changed me! >:(
Synopsis:
Kota, a normal guy, got dragged to a party. That party had made some changes to his life. Of course, he himself didn’t notice the changes untill it was a week away from the party. What do those changes entail? Well, Kota was pretty shocked. Then he became enraged but after awhile, he gave up. He still wanted his body to go back to normal. However, that wasn’t achievable by any means.
Edit: I’ll add on to the genres and tags as I post this story.

Title: Goblin Rebirth
Synopsis:
Framed for the assassination of the King, the realm's most accomplished and famed knight is immediately under suspicion. With all his strength, he is unable to fight against the injustice. He is executed and thus his story ends there...Or so they believe.He still lives. Reborn. As. A...Goblin?Let's see how he will live to claim revenge against the assassin and learn how to live as one of the realm's weakest species.
An original series, please see my progress at https://tapas.io/series/Goblin-Rebirth

Title: Dragon Destiny
Synopsis: From Award winning Author Guy Lozier and Jimmy Rose and their days of Dungeons and Dragons comes this epic fantasy tale centering around two Knights who have been accused of crimes they did not commit. Banished from their lands they seek to regain their honor. But it is the mystery of one of the Knight's destiny which is the catalyst for it all.The Fire Islands, far to the North, holds the answers to the future. Slaying a dragon will give them their honor back. A suicide quest but their only hope.Yet a God of the Elves guides the outcome. The one God that no one likes. The one God that tricked all the other Elvin Gods into other dimensions. The only Elvin God left.

Title: The Last Beyul
Synopsis:
Everyone is on Beyul.
Beyul 2.0 is the next major leap in full-body mixed reality suits. Beyul 2.0 is the virtual world which houses thousands of newly designed games. Beyul 2.0 is the latest, fastest, and most versatile networking replacement for the defunct Internet. Beyul 2.0 is a new Artificial Intelligence to aid everyone on the planet to work, to play, to learn, to communicate, to shop, to create, to collaborate, to live.
After the Beyul 2.0 engineers die, players are promised prizes for solving the mystery at the heart of the new gaming world. Everyone who connects to Beyul 2.0 must surrender their perceptions of the external world, must sense only the virtual world … even as they move about the real world — a mode called: Zombie Mode.
Usually, there are plenty of safeguards to prevent injury to the players. But, Beyul 2.0 has been compromised by religious fanatics who believe that Beyul is an extension of God’s Will. And they have hit squads to hunt down and kill everyone who connects to the new version of Beyul.
Follow the first players to enter Beyul. Some are desperate to escape before time runs out; some seek to explore the depths of Beyul 2.0; some are hunters searching for other players; some are looking to solve the murders of the Beyul 2.0 engineers.
Beyul 2.0 was programmed to lie. 
 

While there is a very detailed character system running behind the scenes, none of the characters have access to their stats or skill screens. This information will sometimes be provided to the reader in the author notes.
Comments are welcomed.

Title: Welcome to the P2W System!
Synopsis:
It seems even in the multiverse, there was always some money grubbing jerks. My name is Anderson Wakefield, and I had woken up with superpowers. Normally that'd be great, if not for the fact that my powers had a mind of its own and seemed intent on stealing all of my money!
 
"AHHH! HELP ME!"
"Oh? Would you like to buy the temporary strength potion for 100 G?"
"GODDAMNIT, SHUDDUP AND HELP, I"M ABOUT TO GET EATEN!"
"Is that a yes..?"
"*%T%^&AGD YES, WHATEVER, JUST DO IT!"
"Ops! It appears you don't have enough for it in your balance, only a mere 12 G, would you like to take out a small loan? We have a special limited time offer! 88 G with only a 12% daily interest!"
"..."
"I suggest, dear customer, that you hurry and grab onto this most generous offer! Those manticores are getting awfully close :)"
 
 
What happens when the system is actually an unhelpful troll? Does this still count as a power fantasy? Hell if I know, but let's see where we'll end up?

Title: Rise of an Assassin
Synopsis:
A boy is reincarnated in a society based around strength, where big brutes are seen as the perfect human and people with weak bodies like the boy are trash, seen as nothing but something to abandon.
The boy, indignant about his circumstances, makes a deal and sets on his way to become strong.
 
 
(Author note: The character won't be physically weak for too long, it's just something that will be pretty big at the start.)

Title: A Dog's Loyalty
Synopsis:
So, Litrpg-ish story, but the MC is a dog, like, an actual dog, not someone reincarnated as a dog, not a giant shape-shifting monster pretending to be a dog. An honest to God dog.
Now, the apocalypse has begun. Animals are mutating into monsters, people are turning into zombies. Strange cults are starting to pop up. What's a loyal family dog to do, but to travel across this hellish landscape and find her cute little owner? Will the MC survive? Will she be reunited with her owner before both of their death? Who knows? One thing is for sure, nothing will ever be the same.

Title: The Light The Dark and What's In Between
Synopsis:
On a planet called Harth, every inhabitant eventually obtained basic magic, but only a few were chosen to use "True Magic". True Magic affects the few chosen individuals not only making them more magically powerful but also physically!
Grey, a teenage boy finds himself being forced to come out of his shell and fight against the darkness trying to take over the entire planet when the only precious thing to him is taken by the Darkness. 
He is determined to do all that he can to protect everyone...especially her, but will Grey be able to fight his inner demons in order to achieve his goal of saving her?

Title: Foreshadow
Synopsis:
It's was already over 200 years since the last Supernatural War. Due to the use of technology against humanity, it created a psychological trauma that leads to the slow advancement of technology. Throughout the years, the world was unbelievably silent and in peace. Many believed that the pact signed by humanity and Supernatural Species kept the two opposing forces on watch. Some thought that both sides are brewing something and kept their cards hidden. Even the rumors told that the peace wouldn't last long and the war would break out in a few years. Who would know the future and things it would tell. Maybe the war would break out of nowhere or the world would remain at ease.---Note:First, I don't own the picture and credits to its rightful owner. Second, English isn't my native language. So before hand, sorry for the wrong grammar, misspelled words and the redundancies. Last, enjoy!
---
Hiatus for the meantime while I'm retyping/reediting the first ARC. Thank YOU!

Title: ROT
Synopsis:
Ray Jones isn't like other tooth fairies.
He curses too much. Enjoys snorting fairy dust.
And recently, he's been tearing teeth out of kids' mouths for profit.
He'll tell you it's because of The Rot.
Then again, he'll tell you anything to avoid walking the plank.
This is his story.

Title: Monster Tamer In The Apocalypse
Synopsis:
Chen Qiang's life is perfect. He’s rich, young and set to inherit his father’s fortune and legacy. Truly, a fairy-tale. A life so perfect, nothing could ruin it; well, almost nothing…
 
In the blink of an eye, it all disappears into blazing fire and smoke and drags him from the heavens to hell overnight. His inheritance, his dear sisters and even himself. That was because of the sudden change, the craziest thing that should not have happened.
 
Not just him, but everyone all over the earth experienced it too, the feeling of great suffering, despair, grief, hate and regret that endlessly came to them.
 
But was it truly doomed from the start?
 
Is this the end of the world? Or just the beginning?
 
But, fate plays with him. After he has suffered enough in that world, he wakes up and finds that he goes back in time and has three years to face that fearful event again.
He gets all he has again, but is it enough to change the future?

Notice:
Hey guys. The new author here and English isn't my first language. Please forgive my mistakes as I grow as a writer!. The story would be into a dark theme so it would have a lot of offended things and I don't own the right of pictures that I have uploaded or will upload, all the pictures that I upload are from the Internet.
I warned you, the grammar of this story is very bad. Just look at the review. I also posted this in webnovel.

Title: (again)evolution of a turtle
Synopsis:
(due to some technical difficultys i had to start this again for the third time on a different account)
guy gets stabbed in an alleyway just for asking for the time and thats when he hears a strange voice in his head.

Title: The Wings of Storm
Synopsis:
Tahro Akagi shouldn't live in two worlds at once.
Yet, forced to spend his days studying by a no-nonsense mother, he longs for adventure. In a moment of desperation, Tahro's soul splits in two. While one of his selves remains in Japan, the other finds himself in Saishuu Riku, the lands of his favourite book. Engrossed in this world more than he ever thought possible, Tahro saves a character's life. 
But if a butterfly's wings can bring thunderstorms, then his every breath is another flap as it flies- his every heartbeat a danger to those around him.
Unwittingly, he becomes entangled in a web of conspiracies between ministers, a murderous witch and a kidnapper with butterfly-patterned knives. Tahro learns he's changed the plot too much. Events that should happen don't and his new friends are caught in a crossfire he wants no part in. 
And when his friend is kidnapped, saving her could put everyone else in danger. Yet Tahro can't stand by and watch. 
 
***
I update every Saturday.
(Blurb done with the help of catlegis of wattpad).

Title: Legends of Balance: Alaiah
Synopsis: The Heir to the Empire is in danger… A young princess' ambitions threaten the already fragile world peace. A heavily disenfranchised group of people slowly digs itself out of the mud and starts learning how to fight for its rights. The capital of the free alliance is burning. What can be done? Who will save the day? The innocent bystander, of course.

Title: World Chaos
Synopsis:
In 2031 the world fell into chaos.
Earth finally suffered its Great Tremor.
Monsters from myths, fiction and some monsters which never ever existed in either appear on earth.
And what stopped mankinds extinction?
The system's arrival.
But if the world is destroyed.
Will it be by the hands of monster or man?

Title: Bad Memory
Synopsis: A short story inspired by a recent event. Haven't written a story in a while, I apologize if its bad.

Title: Man and Beast
Synopsis: Can a man be a man even when he is no man anymore?

Title: The Shade on the Hill
Synopsis: A well-off man begins to see things. At first in his dreams but soon in the waking world. These are the pages of his journal leading up to the event.

Title: Deviant
Synopsis:
A newly dead spirit is caught on earth and is feeling angry and restless. It can get inside living person mind and body and use it  as a "handpuppet". By time it changes and I sense it will become more decent and might even find a purpose.
-
This is only meant to be a little diddy of fun and games. Let's see where it goes...

Title: The Infinity Principle
Synopsis:
A doctor has begun to explore the past lives of his hypnosis patients.  One of his patients awakes suddenly during his session as he remembers living a life as a monk in the mountains of China in years past.
But more importantly...an ancient lock has just been triggered.  A hidden memory designed to bring the past into the future...into the NOW...a master symbol has come to life to empower a line of symbols designed to be activated on this very day...
A hidden memory of past lives, future lives and lives between lives...
He knows that he must travel backwards in time as it is the year 2070.  He must go back to help himself in another life.
The controllers of reality are coming for him.  They sense his hand in the past and are waiting for him at his home.  Just as he arrives, his memories flood into his mind, freeing him of the present and opening his past.
He remembers now!!!...
They can only see in a linear line...they can only act in the frames of time in one direction.
Yet that is the illusion of it all as time but conditions matter and is the illusory path of mind.
He is a child of time...a man connected beyond time-space...he can move forward and backward in time...he can be in any time...yet he knows what he should and should not do...
He would put the pieces together that would fix things...free the human consciousness from the recycle program of those that control reality...
That was his purpose in the "NOW" as he could move the node of resistance to any point of the time-line and interact...his dominant reality would move with him as he had learned all those years ago in the very moment of sitting in the void as a monk in China far in the past...
Himself in the past...Author Guy Lozier...he would begin working with himself in the past...
This is book three of "The Disclosure Files" which can be stand alone stories or read in sequence...
Book One was released as "Assassinating Custer"...Book Two was released as "The Hybrid Anunnaki"...
This is the only place currently that Book Three is available...
Each book consists of a combination of Fiction and Non-Fiction...I leave it to my readers to attempt to figure out what is real and what is not......

Title: Untermensch
Synopsis:
Artificial life, created at the hands of man in an attempt to mimic god. The very notion is blasphemous and forbidden, yet one man cannot stop in his pursuit... And his pursuits bear fruit. The first artificial human, homunculus, golem - whatever it may be known as - is born in the basement of scientist Arnold Abts, in the plateau of Kirnstraadt, in the kingdom of Kerdt. Caught in the rhythm of create-fail-bury, he throws it out, never to be seen again as his creation wanders the ever-expanding horizons of the world.
 
AUTHOR'S NOTE

This story is subject to heavy editing, probably until completion. The story will more than likely change as it is written. If you are the type of reader to continuously read a story and not give enough fucks about small irregularities, welcome! If not, welcome anyway!
 
This story takes place in a world not unlike ours during the late 18th - 19 century. Technology such as telescopes and electricity have already been invented but are not generally found in wide use. Instead, most people use candles and gas fires. The steam engine has been in use for a long time and don't be surprised to see bridges powered by HUGE motors. And just cause I want it. Fantasy, there, done and said and no going back.

Title: Menazia Reborn
Synopsis:
Queen Hosnah, leader of the Valyric, has discovered a secret among the humans of Earth.  She must not allow any to know of her discovery lest the evil Darbless use it to wage war against her world and then rule Earth.  With the cycle ending, the contest to determine the new rulers of Earth will begin.  If the Valyric loose to the Darbless, Earth and all humans will perish under the destruction of the Darbless as they strip Earth of its treasures.  Hosnah's secret would assure the Darbless success.  It is only her decision and sacrifice which will save Earth this time.  Only her son can stand against a god.  Only her secret of human power given to her son will allow Earth a chance to survive.  
The Millennial Cycle is here. Only the Valyric Hero can save earth from the Darbless, Dragoons and the evil god Menazia.From Award winning Author Guy Lozier comes this exciting adventure through dimensional paths where we find Earth's protectors watching over us.  Proclaimed a genius by many of Guy's readers, he continues to mesmerize his fans with new worlds and new characters that keep us wanting more.

"Bringing a strong Lead Female Character to life was exciting to me!" Guy Lozier

The Queen of the Valyric has a secret. Her secret is all that stands between Earth and certain destruction of all humans.  She gives her son Hade special powers which no other has. Even he doesn't understand how it can be.Hade stands alone against the most evil of beings ever to exist. Is his magic powerful enough to survive and save earth?

Title: I died and I was sent on a Crusade
Synopsis: Hiromi Hazuku,18 years of age, died together with the girl she loves, Momi Mishirou. But they were ressurected in another world. What journey awaits? Why were they sent there?  Who sent them there? What mission were given to them? Come join their journey of laughs, epicness, cries and rage.

Title: The Alchemist
Synopsis: A young man is thrust into a world of blood, violence, magic, and science. Where his very humanity will be tested, can he be forged into something great, or will he melt away like impure materials.

Title: Mmorpg of the multiverse
Synopsis:
A young man on earth received the opportunity to enter a xianxia style mmorpg game, where he can learn how to unlock the potential deeply hidden inside his body.
He will earn permanent benefits which he will be able to retain after returning from the game dimension. And he will encounter all sorts of players and nonplayers, whom were chosen from all over the multiverse to seek their fortuitous encounters.
Never could he have imagined how toxic humble cultivators would become, once they are granted access to the future known as global chat, in a world supervised only by the strong and not by something as ridiciouless as a game master or game developer, to whom you could conveniently report these individuals to.
But no one would have expected that most of the strategies he learned in mmorp on earth, after experiencing them first hand including scamming and deceptive robbery could be applied here as well?
Dont be suprised after finding out how easily proud and esteemed players and cultivators can be turned into sobbing, toxic beggars full of saltiness.

Title: The Guide
Synopsis:
Leon Octavian Sirus was the head scientist of the Median Empire’s department of artificial intelligence.
He tried to play god by creating a world with true sentient life, though virtual. It is still a world with people that can learn, think, and feel and as always that action had consequences and one of them was his death by his own creations.
Despite commiting a grevious taboo, his world was succesful enough that instead of burning in the depths of hell, which is what this sociopath deserves, he is given the chance by his own world's guide to guide a race in a young world.
 
 
P.S. This awesome cover was made by the more awesome MikeWe.

Title: The Book of Conquest: Ouroboros
Synopsis:
A mysterious man tries his best to enjoy the stories he read by actually going into one. Things never go as planned though, does it?
These are the misadventures of a wandering womanizer and his attempts to be a 'hero'.

Title: The last Human
Synopsis:
Humanity, the ruler of the World, face the greatest threat yet. All before overcome by the superiority of the humans, however the latest calamity strikes by removing the pureblood. The last remain of it, shall it rise to the top, and destroy the calamity or be destroyed by it? As is know, Rome wasn’t built in a day, for the journey of the last shall not be of thousand but ten thousand steps. He must not defeat only his enemies, but the enemies searching his defeat and submission.
 
 
 
 
 
 
I always wanted to write a story, so I decided to try. Therefore, shall I be the grateful receiver of Feedback and suggestions. Also, my pursuit shall be quality and not quantity. Therefore, it may progress slowly.

Title: GIRL IN THE MIST I
Synopsis: A LA trauma surgeon is suspected of a gruesome murder.

Title: The Glyph Queen
Synopsis:
When Winnie was thirteen, her settlement taught her how to fire a rifle. Her school practiced drills in case raiders came, and the town grew crops in their greenhouse-adapted homes, which were the only places warm enough during the worldwide nuclear winter.
The Lakiran empire invades—a corporate-born nation overseen by their corporate-born queen, Victoria Paladino. They ride silent planes whose repulsion field veered bullets away.
Three years of occupation later, an exemplar visits—a member of Victoria’s oversight committee rumored to read minds. He tells Winnie that she may have a unique mental power, or a flair. At the empire’s capital, the queen herself tutors Winnie to help her reach the full potential of whatever power she may have.
Meanwhile, in post-war Nigeria, a streetwise teenager named Naema sees a different side of the empire. Between corruption and oppression, everyone lives in squaller. People fight over assembled food pastes. She too is told she has a unique flair, not by the empire, but by a fugitive woman who is the last vestige of an ancient witch coven, and she knows a dark secret about what the exemplars do to people like Winnie and Naema.
Updates every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday. The most recent chapters of The Glyph Queen are available on its main website.

Title: Magikind
Synopsis:
The third millennia, a time of change and evolution. An era where people, through countless generations, have evolved strange powers and abilities. These beings currently known as mages, have become the very foundations of society. However, some humans refused to change or adapt alongside them. Known as the manush, they soon became a rarity among society.
Now, in the fifth millennia, the manush are thought to be extinct. With magikind ruling the world, a three-way war grips society between Eurasia, Afro-Australian Alliance, and The Americas. In these uncertain times, a manush called Gin enters the Eurasian army. From there, our journey unfolds.
PS. I am also posting here: Creative Novels so don't worry, I'm not being stolen from.
PSS. Join the discord server for updates on the novel: Link to Server
PSSS: This is a rewrite of: Magikind [Original]

Title: Crimson Love(BL)
Synopsis: Mark is passionate and doesn't let his flaws hold him back.Akio is flawless on the surface.However,when they both cross paths,they are lead through a series of rape,drugs and even murder.Could these individuals be hiding more than there seems to be?*BL story*Four unrelated university students are leading normal lives until destiny plays a game and throws them in dark,twisted web of love and betrayal.All have equally important roles to untangle others and themselves.The question is will they succeed?

Title: True Monsters
Synopsis:
Many strings of fate come together
 
The hunters have existed in some form as long as the vampires. The current state of the order is a reflection of the current state of the vampire’s we face. A grim reflection brought about by needs. This land is as it always is in crisis When men have to be more monstrous than the beasts who is the true monster.
 
When the kingdoms could no longer afford a standing army and the guilds started to encroach on the nobility's power the free mercenary companies began who is better a man who fights for coin or a monster that fights for blood.
 
The mages submitted to the authority of the king and accepted his royal charter-ship with all that it entailed and so the inquisition passed them over for now.

Title: Ivory Crystal
Synopsis:
The nine Ilvistine Crystals are the most coveted jewels by crown and criminal across the land. Five crystals have been found, another remains unclaimed, and one is still unaccounted for.
Elody Bequette is a noble woman who wants something more than to marry a prince. She longs for travel and adventure, so much so that she is willing to give up her engagement, her family, and her homeland. Miles away in another city, being a prostitute is just what life threw at Milena Proper. Self-reliant and cynical, she scrapes by each day, content to have a roof over her head and money in her pocket. These two women, who would seemingly never cross paths, have one thing in common—they both possess the last two Ilvistine Crystals. When the prostitute and runaway bride-to-be meet by chance, they’re drawn into a web of deception among the royal families and a band of vagabonds. Their backgrounds create an unstable alliance, but to save their necks, Milena will need to rely on someone outside herself, and Elody will have to be able to stand on her own two feet in a world very unlike the reserved realm she’s used to.

Title: Dante
Synopsis:
From award winning Author Guy Lozier & Chris Pope comes this alternate time-lines saga where the heros are not born of Light but are drowning in Darkness.  As a protector of Earth steps forth from the Light, her influence along the time-line causes a Y of epic proportions.  It is only later as this new time-line corrects itself to rigid interaction and then flexs to become the only time-line do we find how Earth can be saved from an inevitable set of events called The Apocalypse...
The guardians of planet Earth have their hands full as the Apocalypse approaches.  One particular protector has found what appears to be the only hope of survival for planet Earth's population from the Demons that will threaten to over run the lands.  While many of them are considered of dark origins and evil intentions have ruled some of them their whole existence, it is the right moment along the time line that can change their future for the better.  At least that is her hope.
Book One of The Dark Heros Saga brings the origins of Dante to life.  From his lowly beginning of a park ranger, he will find a new purpose to his existence.  Once he encounters the evil ones of the night, his life will be transformed.  If not for the love of a woman and the guiding hand of Van Helsing himself, Dante would likely have stumbled his way into unending darkness and despair.
Book One holds the story before Van Helsing arrives to begin Dante's training as a protector.  As our story unfolds in later books we find new characters come to life with new origins and life lines from an alternate time-line of existence.  Dr. Frankenstein, Dracula, the Mummy, and many others are recreated in this future Apocalyptic Series where Hell will spill over into our Reality...

Title: The Light Maiden's Mark
Synopsis:
Gabrielle wakes up to the beautiful world of Elega after someone put markings on her finger, she must juggle fighting the forces of darkness with being a nurse at her new job. She meets up with an old friend she hadn't seen for ten years, but on top of him not being human anymore, he is supposed to be her enemy, as he is a Darkling. 
 
======
Author's note: This was written when I had barely any writing skills, so it will start out choppy but I promise you it gets better as it goes on. Also this is unedited, the edited version will be a paid version.

Title: Bastion of Light
Synopsis:
Giving her bully a piece of her mind? ?
Receiving a fatal head injury in retaliation? ?
Emilys day could decidedly have gone better. Graduation seemed like a great opportunity to give Alicia a piece of her mind. Afterall she'd never have to see her again afterwards. Turns out Alicia was a lot more unhinged and vengeful than Emily would've thought possibly, she should've known better.
Yet death turns out to not be the end of the road for Emily, merely a new beginning. Thrown into a strange world inhabitated by peope who are both familiar yet very strange Emily might have to little time to acclimate herself. Because her arrival and existence might upset plans long in the making, becoming the figurative the spanner in the works might just be the death of her, again. 
 
This is a LITRPG Dungeon Core story set in a real world based on RPG principles. Real people, real consequences. It is also a work in progress and might see retroactive changes at times.

Title: A Gatored Community
Synopsis: Global warming has raised the sea level by 30 feet. People live in floating communities which rise and fall with the tides. In the floating community of Shellfish, Shoals, A woman pearl thief, becomes involved with the owner of an oyster farm where cultured pearls are produced, and an alligator is used for security. In the meantime, she and her gang are planning to raid the facility.

Title: The Choice is Not Yours
Synopsis:
Author's Note: (As of November 20, 2021) I rewrote all the chapters perhaps more than a year ago, but haven't announced that I did so. Because that kind of announcement would include something along the lines of, "I'm working on the story so expect new chapters!" But the truth is, I lack motivation to do anything. And I would hate myself if I broke a promise. I'm extremely sorry if you have been patiently waiting for uploads. These days, I've been studying, not well, but studying somewhat. I will definitely bring more to show, with regular uploads. If not this story then there's another story I've been writing that's really exciting to me. It's not exactly similar to this story since it has a male lead and he is a baneful asshole with even less morals. I hope you'll like it when it comes to existence. And I'll leave my announcement off with the aforementioned promise. 

Meet Amber, a tomboyish, unstable, and cheeky lass who likes to keep to herself. According to her, she'll live the rest of her life on auto-pilot mode, awhile holding onto the few things that make her remotely happy. However, she forgot that people never really leave you alone, be it humans or even the Gods. 
And exactly that happens, ending her monotonous life on such the Gods' whim. But at what cost to her? Will she be able to hold onto the things she holds dear? Or will she fail miserably and lose herself in the process? That's what the Gods want to know. 

Disclaimer: I do not own the cover photo.Warning: If you are easily triggered, I am not writing this novel for you.

Title: Hellhound
Synopsis:
[Style:] First person, stream of consciousness.
A male acid attack victim loses his sight to the liquid hate splashed on his face. Locking himself away from the world, kept sane only by the companionship of his dog, Ria, he attempts to return to society after a week has passed. Only to find that the world has changed when he wasn't "looking".
The story of a boy and his dog during the apocalypse.

Title: The Sidekick
Synopsis: Derik White is the Chosen One. Brave, valiant and virtually flawless; he almost singlehandedly brought an end to the war with Darkness. Jason Nemin became his friend in childhood and has stood by him ever since. Frustrated with his friend's success and his own lacklustre life, Jason turns to a strange new magical creation. The Game of Life is a fully immersive magical reality game giving any who play the chance to be Hero. A chance Jason cannot wait to take.

Title: DarkBoi69's mediocre, rushed and badly-written aventure
Synopsis:
Follow DarkBoi69's edgy adventure as I move him through a shitty plot where he meets terribly-written characters like angry evil stupid villains and naive cute useless busty women. 
This story is not really an actual serious story but simply a writing exercise for me to focus on overall writing speed, forcefully insert some writing in my everyday life to increase productivity and most importantly help with turning ideas, thoughts or feelings into writing directly without feeling blocked, hopefully trying to achieve something as close as possible to writing unconsciously what i’m thinking about.
I'll probably try to do something like writing as much in 30 mins as I can, nearly every-day. So far I've only done this once and it already seems like a pretty good thing to do. I don’t have anything planned and that’s probably going to be a constant for every one of these exercises, so it’ll end up being not very good (although maybe better than it has any right to be? ) and nonsensical.

Title: New Year Buffet
Synopsis:
Manlio Viselli had waited an entire year for this day--the new year buffet lunch special at his local Italian restaurant. However, he learns the perils of gluttony. This is a 1,500 words short story.
This story is copyrighted (c) 2019 by Antony W.F. Chow. Book cover made with Canva by Antony W.F. Chow based on Dreamstime stock photo ID 50965444, Italian Old Restaurant, Venice, copyrighted (c) 2019 by Anna Hristova. All rights reserved.

Title: Sleeping Dragon Empire
Synopsis:
The Endless Primordial Chaos houses countless Domains. Some are strong, some are weak, however, there is no lack of ambition in any of them. 
Li Wu, a selfmade genius and monster of a prodigy has walked the path of Cultivation for dozens of millenia. However, he now faces his greatest Tribulation yet, starting all over from scratch, walking back to the top with one firm and resolute step at a time, however, will it be enough to stay himself or will he succumb to the Bloodline Pressure of his Clan? 
Only time will tell.

Title: One Step is All it Takes
Synopsis: Superheroes make problems. The best example is that every superhero has a supervillain. You can't have a hero without a villain, it's just not possible. This is all fine and dandy in a world where powerfull people existed since the beginning. What happens if they start popping up out of nowhere? In one word, pandemonium.

Title: The Laconic Tale of a Laconic Hero (Abridged)
Synopsis:
"Since brevity is the soul of Wit, (...) I will be brief." - Polonius, Hamlet Act 2-ii
A Hero goes on a Journey.

Title: Fire of a Dragons Heart
Synopsis:
Arcilion Pheonix, a Marine in the Terran Empire, is sent on a mission with his Platoon to an Imperial research base when things go wrong and he finds himself volunteering for a mission that could have causes and effects that will determine not only his future but the futures of millions of people. He's no stranger to stress and he's no longer human but he'll get the job done. No matter what the cost. Luckily he's got time.

This is most definitely my first work and I have to fight off all these other stories that I can't help but read because they're so good so please bear with unsteady release times and mediocre writing. I do appreciate any constructive criticism! This will be an OP character, a possible slow-built Harem and a story filled with mistakes because no one's perfect but I'll fix them as we go and everything will be in moderation including how OP the guy is and the Harem part. Thanks, everyone for taking a look at my version of fantasy! Did I mention Dragons?

Title: Rover
Synopsis:
The ritual was a success. Offering my life in exchange of a new opportunity, I find myself in a new world with a new body.
A forest filled with wonders. An Empire ruled by magic. Free of all the shackles of my previous life, this place is a dream come true. Or at least thats what I thought. I never expected the beautiful appearance and broken skills I always wished for to be my downfall.
This is the story of my days wandering in this nightmarish fantasy world.
 
WARNING: Although this story is more of a slice of life, it contains some elements of dark fantasy. The protagonist is not a nice guy and bad stuff will happen to and around him. If sexual, psychological or physical violence are not your thing you should not read it.

Title: Heaven's Lottery
Synopsis:
What would happen if God suddenly announced to the world that Heaven was almost full.
Not only that, but that future entrants would be randomly chosen in a lottery system?

Title: Moonlit journey in another world
Synopsis:
I was reincarnated into another world as Lucas Lleuad, son of a chieftain. On my fourth birthday, I got two nice presents. From whom? Well, that's a bit complicated, but one from the world, I guess? And one from my ancestors, of course.
'ding' You have received the class Druid!'ding' Slight modifications to your class due to being a werewolf.

The cover picture is not mine, found it ages ago.

Title: As Luck Would Have It
Synopsis:
Felix Sanchez loves nature and hiking. It was a past time that filled him with joy. But it was a hobby, not a lifestyle for Felix.
So when Felix wakes up in a strange new world, surrounded by nothing but predatory foreign animals, a thick jungle with no sign of civilization, and nothing but the clothes off his back and the few tools on hand, he'll have to learn how to survive with only the bare minimum of knowledge.
As Luck Would Have It is a survival story told from the perspective of a 17 year old boy who has no idea what he's doing. There is no LitRPG elements, no powers, and possibly no magic. It's inspired by the works of Hatchet, Julie of the Wolves, Breath of the Wild, and other countless survival stories, shows, movies, and games my dumb gay brain consumed as a kid. Don't expect the same amount of art as my other novel, but there will be some!

Title: Goodbye Earth, Hello Hell
Synopsis: In the 21st century, humanity now faces the greatest crisis ever posed to mankind. An invasion by unknown entities. In the wake of this crisis, everyone has been presented with a decision. To become prey or predator. To kill or be killed. All to hold on to the slim chance of survival. Amidst this crisis, we follow a 16-year-old high schooler, called Alistair.

Title: Magical Item Creator
Synopsis:
After being killed by a truck, Joshua Daniel Fitzgerald finds himself in another world with a quest to kill the Demon King. Oh, and with a completely overpowered ability.
Hello! This is my first fiction, and I'm trying to do the classic 'OP MC transported to another world' trope, so I hope you enjoy!

Title: The Union
Synopsis: He enjoyed the city's splendor from the balcony of the palace. It was dazzling, worthy of the Gods' envy- if they even exist. He felt something soft and warm embrace him from behind. Arms wrapped around his belly. "What are you thinking about?" she asked while sniffing his back. "Would you believe me if I said that I was thinking about you?" he turned around and feasted his eyes upon her pretty face. "I wouldn't" she shook her head and grinned. "Why?""Because I've fallen for your sweet words many times before and I will not fall into your trap again" He whispered to her ears, "What if I say that I'll give you the world?""Cliché" she smirked"What if I say, that I'll give my life for you?""Too tragic" she laughed"What if I say that" he rubbed his nose against hers "I will love you with all my heart"She smiled "Then I'll have no choice but to fall for your sweet words again"*****************Hello readers. Hopefully this tells you what the novel is all about. - Romance (Early romance and no harem)- Power Couple- War, Politics, Kingdom building (because of this, the main demographics of this novel are male readers. But female readers can also read this because I will make sure that the romance will not degrade over time)- Medieval setting- A touch of gore and violence (not so much)Release rate - one chapter/dayMap of Western Castonia -https://imgur.com/5ZsaoCgMap of Eastern Castonia- https://imgur.com/kST4PiAMore maps to come as the story progresses. Note: The cover is of course not mine

Title: Altera
Synopsis:
