Title: High Skies Piracy
Synopsis:
On Solam, pirates raid the skies armed with deadly magic.
Stephan has lived a quiet, sheltered life of hard work and academic pursuits. He married for business, not for love.
Truth be told, he's a pansy.
Now he's on a pirate ship held aloft with arcane energies. Trapped in a steel box with criminals of the worst sort.
How does a reasonable man survive in a place such as this? Will he return home, or will he be seduced by the wild vices of freedom and open air?
Cover illustrated by Rude Rubicante:
https://twitter.com/RRubicante

Title: The CEO's Woman
Synopsis: I was reborn 10 years before my death.I was given a second chance. A second chance to right the wrongs.A new beginning.I am Jiang YueI am the CEO's Woman....I was a coward.I watched her ruin her life.I watched her die from poor choices.I vow not to let it happen again.Not in this lifetime.For I am Fu Jin.And She is my Woman

Title: Reincarnated! The Blind and Deaf Boy
Synopsis: The boy never needed, never wanted anything with his life. He is unlike "normal people." Not that he knew what his life, nor what his world really was.He couldn't see, he knew not of beauty, nor of atrocities. He couldn't hear, he knew not of spite, nor words of tongue. He needn't think much, for he knew no words or images to think with.He only knew desire, sensations, and pain.What would he do when he had the ability to see, hear, and do much more than "normal people"?Would he even understand it?

Title: Your Soul!My Pen
Synopsis:
Jake and Samantha have just found out that their now--goddess mother is back from her long journey to kill the Volcano Dragon, the ultimate evil. Not only has she failed in her quest, but she expects her offspring to take up the quest themselves...To Samantha's surprise and Jake's dismay, they must take up this task if they intend to win her affection. To help them in their quest, Jake is given a pen that can create anything with enough thought. Samantha meanwhile obtains an eraser that can destroy anything with enough confidence. Though, rather quickly, Jake and Samantha quickly get tied up in family issues, a ruthless bandit leaders, their bickering friends, and several gods named after...office supplies!?
 
Also hosted on honeyfeed: https://www.honeyfeed.fm/u/2138

Title: Rise
Synopsis: 20 years have passed since the Chaos Energy Quake rippled through the Milky Way Galaxy. During the year-long Quake, Chaos Energy became unusable, rendering much of the galaxy’s technology useless, and preventing Chaotics – beings who possess supernatural abilities – from using their powers. The galaxy has since moved on from the Quake, but to this day no one knows what could have caused it. The only broadly possible hints lie with the woefully few Chaotics born during the Quake, such as the seven Chaotics born on the world of Nimalia, homeworld of the Nimalian Territories. The other galactic civilizations see little correlation between the Quake and those born during it, but now that the seven have reached the age of 20, some Nimalians think they may be able to finally learn exactly what caused the galactic disruption two decades ago…

Title: Voices of the Wind
Synopsis: A story I'm currently crafting on my free time (which is not much). Just posting if someone wants to enjoy it, but I won't be interacting much other than writing and posting. It will probably go haitus, just letting you know.

Title: Corin Academy
Synopsis: The Ubermind. The Holy Grail of telepathy. Jessie is on a mission to kill his master's greatest adversary. His first attempt fails because he's not strong enough. But maybe he would be, if he conquered the Ubermind.

Title: Seeker: Demon Killers
Synopsis: There is literally nothing better than a fist full of demon guts, as far as Tora is concerned. The gory task of killing demons to keep humans safe falls to Tora, a 16-year-old supernatural gifted with telekinesis. When a mysterious entity causes increasing demon attacks, forgotten memories and a frightening power stir within Tora, and soon she isn't sure who the real enemy is any more: the demons - or herself.

Title: Shaking the world
Synopsis: Crossing from one universe to another should be an exciting adventure right? Well for Daelos it's nothing but a bother. Losing his hi-tech lifestyle and having to a adapt to a magical fantasy world is only the start of his problems.

Title: Miracle Match Making App (MMMA)
Synopsis:
As soon as he reached his room after getting rejected by his crush, the main protagonist was cowering under the blanket, eating ice cream straight from the bucket while watching some drama movie on the streaming service... little did he knew, his phone vibrated and he found a mysterious app installed on his phone.
As soon as he finished the registration, he heard the ghostly robotic voice inside his head. <<Registration complete, swipe left to decline, swipe right to accept. Tap once to see your partner status, tap the top right corner icon to speak with your partner, tap the top left corner icon to see and edit your own status.>>
"..." He wanted to say the newly installed app was a dating app and he didn't know what kind of cruel being installed a dating app right after he got rejected. But he couldn't help but scratched his head when he opened their profile, of course, there was your usual self-introduction but there was another thing that weirded him out. It was the game like stats, skills and jobs.

Title: Reincarnated As Pain's Secret Weapon (Naruto OP OC AU FF)
Synopsis:
What would you do if you reincarnated in the narutoverse with a rpg system after dying when you were 14, me? I'd abuse the shit out of it.
May take slight inspiration from other FF's such as the village choices at the beginning of chapter 1 which is stolen from Elder Scrolls: Naruto
What you'd call a loose upload schedule at best
Grammar mistakes no doubt
Maybe slight immaturity (I'm quite young IRL)
And a but load of ideas which I'm not sure how to flesh out
To me this seems like the perfect cocktail for a FF on this site

Title: Post Human
Synopsis: What do you do when you find yourself the sole survivor of the complete destruction of Earth?  Nikola winds up in that position, disembodied in a half-built asteroid outpost, the last remnant and only hope of the human race.  Nikola exists now only in digital form, controlling drones and cameras to interact with the world.  But Nikola's memories are fractured, and there are endless obstacles between awakening as a glorified computer program and saving the species.  Is Nikola even human anymore?  Is it even possible to resurrect humanity?

Title: Support Hero's Abuse
Synopsis:
Isaac wanted to be normal and take care of his farm in the 12th century, but no one let him do so. They took his reason for living and now called him of a Hero after imprisoning him for years, the System after taking his Attributes from him even called him of 'Party Slave'.
Thankfully, he didn't have to save the world against the invader as The Hero among the Heroes would do that in his place, he was just an extra and was tasked with a minor mission since he didn't have anything more to do beyond reading books in the prison.
The problem was that he had to do it within the enemy lines and even his summoned beings that he had to use because the System didn't let him fight the way he wanted, abused of him-
"That's a lie! Don't believe him! He's the one always abusing me!" A certain golden boy shouted, but please ignore him. He was just inflicted by a Mental attack from the hundred of Demons chasing him down.
Anyway, Isaac's abuse as the Support Hero will never end and he will struggle to fight these invaders without his normal weapons that gave him fame in the Empire.
"Save me! You assho-" The Demons finally reached the golden boy to end the annoying shouting.

Title: Reaching for One's Desire: Kane's Ascension
Synopsis:
After living most of his life as a worthless orphan, Michael Kane only desired for the chance to make something of himself in this world of monsters and magic. In a world where only wealth and power mattered, he was literally at the bottom of the food chain. He fucking hated it.
Always having felt that he was destined for something greater than what was essentially a beggar’s life, Michael held hope that things would change with the arrival of the Day of Gaia’s Gift, which happened exactly halfway through the year. It was the day in which everyone that was fifteen years old was given access to the System and was given a ‘Class’ depending on your aptitude, two if you were exceptional and lucky.
It was his hope that he was given at least one class worthy of becoming an Adventurer, which would help him start his path to a life of wealth, fame, luxury and pleasure. Being an orphan that never knew his parents and having no one that he cared for nor that cared for him, it was not surprising that these were Michael’s goals.
Little does he know, that he is destined for even greater things.

Title: Divine Fall
Synopsis:
Lux’s To Do List:
1. Regain lost divinity and demigod status
2. Build kickass base to withstand the end of the world
3. Convince two best friends not to destroy the world
4. Kill the strongest and oldest god of them all
5. Lose virginity… again…

[The cover image does not belong to me and it will be taken down immedieatly at the artest's request]

Title: A Time for Leisure
Synopsis:
A world of cultivation is always a brutal one for people and beasts alike, a world owned by royalties, powerful sects, and monstrous powerhouses. For people trying to make their way to the top, only a handful ever get past even the first few levels. This is the story of a young Devil who is tired after forcing his way to the top, now he just wants to live a carefree life, eat many different types of food, and maybe look up the skirts of a few beautiful maidens?
 
 
 
 
-DISCLAIMER- This is my first novel on any site, but please do NOT be gentle with reviews. If you think you even have the *tiniest* idea as to what could make the novel even a tad better, please do not hesitate to tell me. 
MC is very OP, apologies if you don't like that, it's just one of my preferences. Once I am experienced, I will most likely do weak to strong or fantasy style novels.

Title: How I became op.
Synopsis:
Hey, this is my first story and it's about a high-school kid being reincarnated to another world overpowered and has a fun time gaining more strength.
Please let me know when I screw up.
 
(??????)ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!???????
(?????)look Lydia it is a boy.
(mc)(Ummm why can I hear people talking I thought I died?)
(Lydia)I can see that honey, aren't you the cutest thing alive hmmm. 
(mc)(huh? I can feel someone touching my face.)unhand me, you vile creature!
(goo goo gaa gaa.)
(mc)(It seems I can't use my tongue properly.)
(Lydia)what should we name him Chris?
(Chris)hmmm...I think we should name him Adam.
(Adam)(wait, hold on why did he just say my name?!)
 
 I plan on changing a lot of the prologue because it wasn't working with me so yah look out for that. I should start this process after my tenth chapter. ANd no the apology chapter doesn't count.

Title: The Horrors of Astoria
Synopsis:
A novel following the Ezra and a stranger initially, on their mission to exterminate horrors all across the kingdom of Astoria.
Along the way they will encounter many friends, many enemies, many horrors and atrocities.

Title: It can't be helped.
Synopsis:
Spring 2018.
The weather is great, Cherry blossoms have bloomed and are spread across everywhere.
And here we have our first MC, a guy named Haruki Tsubaki. A somewhat-dull looking, almost carefree, and a so-so attitu-
"Oy! OY!! Author! What's kind of character description are you going for?! that's more of an insult than a normal kind of description!!"
[Author: Hey it's not easy to make a male character you know. So be quiet and just get use to it.]
"Eh?! W-wait!"
Sleeping beneath a Cherry blossom tree, hoping that it will last long until our second MC came by. Her name is Rose a.k.a Rosea Natsuki, Haruki's childhood friend since pre-school. 
Haruki, who wanted a normal life, didn't really get that "normal" life that he wanted.
"Really? sighhh..."
[Author: Yeah, really. man-up!]

Title: Amenonuhoko: Spear of Heaven
Synopsis: Nayari, being an ex-pharmacist, after his two years long journey, he decided to go to school.He'd only hoped for a normal school life, but people who he knew and who he will know will start coming into his life once more. Will he be able to smile alongside his friends, or be dragged down by the thing he had once caused?

Title: Reincarnated as a Demonic Entity
Synopsis: I was roused to my senses by the smell of rancid meat, and met with an endless nothingness. The only thing I could use to know I was conscious was the smell, and the strong desire to instill fear unto others. ---------------------- I've always thought I was haunted. Ever since I turned six, things began to move around on their own, but this usually only happened when I was alone.  However, when I turned eighteen, whatever it was got violent. It threw things at me, rather than around me, and it began to whisper to me when my loved ones would die. It never told me to end my own life, it just kept forcing me to live in fear, threatening to kill my family, until one day it must've been satisfied with its fill of fear.  I died, only to be given a rude awakening.  I had no stairway to salvation, only a highway to damnation.

Title: Unwieldy
Synopsis: Maximilian, brought into a God's rat race to fill the numbers, was transported into another world. Nothing like the brilliant contestants that fill the other spots, Maximilian was an afterthought in the God's game. Confronted with the frustrating reality of being boiled down to three statistics, Maximilian needs to get his act together, or the worlds might very well suffer for it.

Title: Core
Synopsis:
When the good wishes on coming in contact with a pioneer vessel , result in a giant crater covering half of Asia..... A treambling race and a falling world put off the centuries of divided peace , to fend off the unknown horrors and awaiting catastrophes.
With the invasion dying out and extraterrestrial forms emerging all over the world, a Weapon Unit must stand between humanity and reason crumbling to the core.

Title: Galaxy Wars & Clichés
Synopsis:
This is a story about a boy born with a golden spoon from a great warrior clan but with a weakened body, but what happens if his sickness improves? After 9 years in hibernation, he stands again with his clan, but what the hell happened while he was asleep? Why is his clan losing the war?
Extra tags: Low grammar, noob author, space opera (space warfare). Some POW's.

Title: Splashdown Barsoom
Synopsis:
Walt D. Odell was born in the belt. Like many other Jovean workers, he does 'the long haul'. Moving the most valuable substance in Sol... Water.
It isn't a bad life. Pays well. AI companionship. Excellent healthcare benefits. After 100000 years struggling in the mud the human race got its shit together.
Everything was going great until Walt tries to make a splashdown in the Heinlein Sea. Routine drop and some R&R planned to build up some muscle mass before going back into microgravity.
But the great domed cities of Promethei Terra aren't there.
He can't establish contact with the belt or Earth.
And there's green along the Lowell Canals?
-----
Hello,
I am a professional copywriter who has mainly worked in soul-crushing corporate positions.  Inside sales operations, CRM database administration, and email lead gen... yuck.
And I read terrible, escapest sci-fi.  Sometimes to get through the day.  But, mostly I like it.  Alway have.  Always will.
For a while now I have commented on other stories here on RRL.  I wanted to contribute more.  To share my love for and experience with old school science fiction and fantasy.
Not just Heinlein, Asimov, and Clarke.  But Haggard, Burroughs, Wells, Norton, DeCamp, Howard, Lovecraft, Leiber... all the giants from the golden age. The guys who inspired the modern space program and a million pages of pulp.
I'm currently reading Mother Of Learning (here on RRL) and The Deathworlders (off-site and don't care, HFY all day).
And I suddenly had a question
THIS IS A HUGE SPOILER

Spoiler: Spoiler


What if the entire surface of Mars was an intelligent Von Neumann Machine bent on 'perfecting' all life?



I will be exploring some of my favorite tropes sprinkled with my favorite references once a month as the MC tries to organize himself against the biggest bad I could think of.
Hopefully, I will become a better writer in the process... This is my first effort to write something marketable outside of business academia or the corporate marketing neighborhood.
If it is too technical, verbose, or if the dialogue sucks more donkey dicks than a Tijuana sex show - Please let me know in the comments.

Title: The Power of Authority
Synopsis:
Loosely based on the game Tyranny
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The description has to be at least 50 characters long

Title: After Moses
Synopsis: The Solar System is in a state of decline. The benevolent AI Moses disappeared decades ago taking mankind's future with him. The dream of the stars is dead. Freelancer Matthew Cole struggles to find a way to pay the bills and keep his ship flying. He's always been a bit of a loner but the time is coming that he may have to find a crew. When the specters of the past come back to haunt him, it'll take everything he has to keep his wits about him and not be swallowed by the uncaring vacuum of space...

Title: Nereid
Synopsis:
What's on the other side of space? No one knows. Not even those living out on Nereid. Everyone here has a screw loose somewhere, but perhaps that's what it takes to survive out here.
As mundane as he prefers life to be, living out in a space station puts Oliver far from that ideal. Ranging from dealing with everyday spatial disasters to figuring out the secrets of the universe, he lives a pretty interesting life. Now, if only the doctor lady next door would, you know, look at him.
At least bi-weekly updates, and at most weekly updates on Monday.

Title: Misfentures
Synopsis:
Gabriel, the Mage Mouse, realizes that his moment for glory and heroism has arrived. His home of Rodentia falls under the heel of a brutal warlord. Not only can he prove himself as the town's soul mage, but he can also win the heart of the lovely Maria! But there is a problem...
No mouse wants him to be the hero!
Undeterred, Gabriel strikes out in the underworld of the sewers, looking for the powers and heroes Rodentia needs to free itself. Unfortunately, all he can find are misfits. Follow Gabriel as his odd friends band together for a journey none of them could have imagined in this tongue and cheek, dark adventure.

Title: The Portrait of a Mad Scientist as a Young Man
Synopsis: Real men, alone in the dark, always carry the one...

Title: NPC
Synopsis:
Erin longed for adventure, Maya new better. Erin wanted to be a Hero, Maya would never trust them. Maya also knew a simple truth; Erin could never be a Hero.
She had two sharp horns poking from her hair.
A cheerful smile with cute fangs that sparkled just so in the light.
And lived in a world that would not smile in return.
So, Maya smiled and hugged Erin when she spoke of her dreams with such boundless enthusiasm. They were best friends, and best friends did not shatter each other’s dreams.
Heroes have arrived in Cairn village, one of which is Aiden; a 20-year-old-runaway who's just excited to play a super awesome VRMMORPG and maybe rekindle the eternal war without thinking...


I added the tramtising tag since the whole demon lord thing isn't entirely moral and I guess that's what that tag means, better safe than sorry I guess.
This is a rewrite and I still do small edits on earlier chapters for grammar and style every now and then so let me know any critiques you have or even if you just think something is stupid. The whole point of writing this is so I can improve while (hopefully) entertaining some people. My update schedule can be erratic but I will finish this eventually. Eventually being in a few years... I decided to take a break from this while I finish a separate project sorry about that.
There are also puppy pictures...you have been warned.

Title: Nite Errant
Synopsis:
Former Marine Lucas Nite lived a lonely life wandering human space as a fixer of sorts, until one day something in him thawed and he rescued a war waif from the battletorn streets of New Pittsburgh. Together they start a journey filled with pirates, secret societies, and corrupt nobles that shakes the human Empire to its very core. 
Warning: This story contains scenes of graphic: violence, sexual assault, and adult situations. Reader discretion is advised.

Title: I Became A Vampire In Another World
Synopsis: Negis Yuuta is your average 18 year old kid until he dies and gets reincarnated as a vampire.

Title: Soul Forger
Synopsis: Young Solana's life has gone the wrong way since the beginning. As soon as he was born, the demon moved into his body, so he lost his hand, then a "happy" childhood with daily injuries... The only thing left to do is to lose the family forge because of the many debts. Will he let that happen? Oh, yeah, of course. He doesn't really care about the forge. He doesn't care about anyone but himself. He is looking for the power to wrap the world around his feet and to do nothing in a small port town with such desires.

Title: Dreagen Century
Synopsis:
There is a silent melody, above the sky. whose archangel proud for.
There is a loud melody, beetween continent and kingdom. whose hope will fade.
There is a chaotic melody, under earth and calmness. whose will arise lurking in the shadow.
This is an era, where the strong race rules over anything. when the god war over others. and bring stars into collapse.
This is the begining of an end, fate that will came over the brave warriors, searching the truth within shadow, and forcing fear within the gods. a world with mysteries, wonderful, and delightful destiny under blessing of the sun. this is Dreagen Century , when all starts over in here.

Title: Yep, I really hate this world
Synopsis: So this guy gets teleported to another world and he doesn't like it so he gets a gun that can kill anyone in one hit so he can kill everyone in one hit so he can kill the demon lord in one hit so he can go back to his own world.

Title: Dreams
Synopsis: A boy promised a girl to become a astronout so he set on adventure to become an astronaut

Title: WW1 in an alternate Universe
Synopsis:
The Mirror Earth
The mirror earth is an alternate World to our own.
There exists no other intelligent race other than humnity like on our own planet.
They are currently sitting in a crisis like we had been sitting in before.
Their planet is sitting in the crisis that will bring them their own first World War and will change the face of the planet forever!!!!
And in this world our main protagonist sits, as a prince of the nation with the biggest military might and thinks about what the century will bring and what hardships he has to face.
He doesn´t know that one day he will be called “the Kaiser that dictated the future of the world”
(This story shifts to other characters as well. It will not be told only by using one individual. But the actions of the main protagonist change the expiriences of the others.)

Title: Resurgence
Synopsis:
Deep in the mountains, a frail man lies on a plain bedroll, in a simple hand-made temple,idly pondering where things might go from here. Even as his final breaths escape him, the man seems more alive than most.
[Congratulations! As the first Sapient to reach minimal necessary understanding of The Ways, The Lives, and The Fates, you have been chosen to guide this solar system as it's Shepard!]
With a final sigh, the man's life fades away and is lost to the gentle rain and whistling wind flowing through the mountains.
It is this sigh which heralds the dawn of a new age for earth and its denizens.

Title: HOPE Engine
Synopsis:
A world on the brink of war, absent parents, and no friends sounds like a disaster unless all you ever wanted was to live inside your virtual reality pod. 
Meet Severo, a fresh-eyed graduate, as he joins the ranks of new players in the HOPE engine, but quickly finds out that everything isn’t as advertised. An unnatural enemy is rising, more glitch than feature, that not even the highest level players can stop. A noob like Severo doesn’t stand a chance! Right?
But with his starter village in the enemy’s warpath, he better figure something out! Before that, he needs to learn that NPCs are sentient, friends are needed, and food in fantasy games sucks! Oh yeah, and pick a class! 
As if all that wasn’t enough to worry about, outside of the VR pod, real life is starting to have its own technical difficulties...

Title: The Luckless Mage of Greidwhen Academy
Synopsis:
A TOURNAMENT OF SORCERERS…
AND THE MISFIT WHO ENTERED IT.




Ever since she was a little girl, Lucy Hardtvelt has wanted to attend the same academy of magic her mother had graduated from, as well as compete in the same, famous Sorcerers Tournament hosted there every year. And finally, after having her application accepted, Lucy is jubilant to begin her first year at the prestigious Greidwhen Academy for Mages.
Unfortunately, Lucy soon finds that, unlike her mother, she herself has little to no aptitude in the magical arts—struggling to keep even the most basic of spells from blowing up in her face.
Now, having been given a harsh dose of reality, Lucy must find out if she has what it takes not only to survive at Greidwhen, but also the Sorcerer’s Tournament and its one-thousand contestants where the winner will be given the title of Champion Sorcerer, as well as the right to challenge the Celestial Mages—who are known to have been defeated only a handful of times…

Title: Future and Current of Battle
Synopsis:
(I'm really getting writers block...)
A vr story following a person who has a dark side.
Fantasy and scfi

Title: The Bloody Baroness
Synopsis:
Whats worse? Being transmigrated to another world, or being transformed into a wolf girl? 
In my personal opinon I would love to be transmigrated to a diffrent world.
But the turning into a wolf girl I could have done without.
But I dont really get to choose, so heres my story. A young man (Aka. me) finds himself in another world as a wolf girl. Watch as this crazy bloodthirsty wolf girl gets into all kinds of mischief, and somehow ends up with a harem with a thing for a nice furry wolf tail and soft wolf ears.
Things might just get kinky.

Title: How to Break an Evil Curse
Synopsis:
Curse is a fairytale-flavored fantasy that challenges its characters to step outside their comfort zone and defy their archetypal roles.  It centers on the life of Princess Julianna. She may be cursed to live in darkness, but she’s no damsel in distress.  Tired of living in a dungeon with her criminally-minded ghost friends, she risks sunburn, social-awkwardness, and revolutionaries to save herself from the monotony of boring princess stereotypes.
 
Our intrepid and intelligent heroine sallies forth into a world of hyper-masculine pirates,  sensitive-dude types, travelling theater troupes, asparagus, secret tunnels, banjos, concussions, outlaws, revolutionaries, magic, women’s rights crusaders, curses, and difficult life choices. Faced with the realities outside her castle walls, Julianna begins to suspect that the real world is far more complicated than the black-and-white fairy tale she and her family occupied.

Title: A Shadow of a Boy
Synopsis: We are in a world where magic has seemingly come out of nowhere and the government and many others form laws and each type of magic is viewed in society different. The main character is a boy not concerned with any of that. He just stays at home with his sister and somewhat eccentric father. He seems to have trauma relating to lightning. What could have caused this trauma? Why doesn't he go to school? What is the odd shadow below his feet?

Title: Fan Fiction Wars!
Synopsis:
Yarnists vs. Inkslingers in an epic battle to decide whose history of the future will dominate all mankind.
Let this thrilling tale of action, adventure, romance and comedy start now!

Title: Ember in the Ashes
Synopsis:
During the Fall of the Kingdoms, two royal siblings torn apart. Kale and Melody Lione were stolen from their futures as keepers of the Lione Kingdom and split down two different paths.
 
Kael finds himself hurried away across the AlBlu Sea to a remote place hidden by mountains where men and women dedicate themselves to murder for the “greater good.” A new destiny is forced upon him by his saviors/captors and he is trained to use his blade to unmake rulers rather than become one himself. After a fiery betrayal from a man he trusted that cost him a second home and a second chance at stability, Kael becomes lost once more without a future so he clings to the only thing he knows; vengeance against the one responsible for his misfortune.
 
Melody is raised in a remote village by people loyal to her lost parents. It is from these people that she learns to see the beauty that lies within every part of existence, especially in music. Music becomes her escape and her happiness. After a dear friend and mentor is taken from her by the ignorance of the same people from whom she once learned kindness, she leaves to find something more and to share her love for music on the other side of the Alblu Sea. With kingdoms becoming obsolete to the modern world of Embre, her choice to be a musician over trying to get back the royal life stolen from her leads her to dark places in a big and dangerous city.
When they meet again, Kael has the chance to learn forgiveness from his long-lost sister and Melody has the chance to be corrupted by Kael’s need for revenge. Kael has the army Melody needs and Melody had the home Kael needs, but they cannot both have what they want. For Melody to surive a dark threat, she would have to accept the path of violence. For Kael return to the life he lost, he’d have to abandon the strength to keep his sister safe.

Title: Demon Blood: Book I The Arrival
Synopsis: Ethan falls to his death while trying to save a child. He is transmigrated into a world full of magical beasts and dark secrets. Ethan is destined to find the secrets behind the creation of this world and to integrate it into the world from where he has come. In the process he also discovers the powers hidden in him and uses them to change the two worlds.

Title: The Chronicles of Fey: Lost in Illusion
Synopsis:
Join Catriona Ames, a mouthy bartender in her early twenties, as she fights to maintain her grip on reality while deciphering visions of the Fey Realm in The Chronicles of Fey: Lost in Illusion.
Our young heroine meets a wealthy young man--William Morgan--in the bar where she works in the midwestern United States. She does not trust him and can barely stand him, but he may be one of the only allies she has against what is to come. 
This rich businessman has a mysterious connection with a couple other key figures in her life. She soon finds out that getting to the bottom of their past is the key to unraveling her own.

Title: A family of killers.
Synopsis:
Do you wish to hear a tale.
Its a tale about a mad man named Jax. A man rob of his ability to feel.
It's set in a time were fairy tales have long since past. We’re powerful mega corporations, idealistic fanatics and crime rule a world of blood and wealth. The hate of magic is at an all time high as the world repairs itself from a war with a powerful A.I join a crime family that is simply known as the family of wrath as they attempt to thrive in this world of theirs.
A world ruled by greed, hate, lies, hope and faith.
But come let's speak more of Jax. He starts this story as a simply uni student in one of the most prestigious schools in the highest level of the free city of Mania. A place meant for only the highest of birth and blood and watch as Jax choses a path of crime to further his goal of feeling something again and believes that the people responsible for his sistuation my be the only ones who can help him over come it.

Title: Grand Magus
Synopsis:
Someone transmigrated into the body of a noble that was on his way to become a Magi. His only keepsake, an AI-Chip that had the ability to calculate and store information. Thus, follow the journey of Fraser Rosethorn. 


Author Note:

Title: Who Cares about an Isekai? Surely not me!
Synopsis:
Ran just wanted to be left alone. She just wanted a nap. She suddenly woke up on her way to an Isekai and told she was now a Hero who would fight the Demon Race alongside 11 others.
 
So what if she could design her skills and body? 
So what if she was the last hope of humanity?
Nobody asked her if she wanted this, so why should she care about their world?
___________________________________________________________________

Title: Blood Merchant Empire
Synopsis:
Tired of being part of a Guild that won't let her take any chances, Millicent VanGard quits, along with a few close friends, and tries to make her vision a reality.
Meanwhile, her decision begins a ripple effect that changes the lives of many.

Title: The Titleist
Synopsis:
After the world is turned into a real life video game, lazy IT guy John is left alone in an office building with a bunch of women that are no longer human and way out of their depth in this new video game based world.  With 3 of the women having difficulty with their new bodies and with random class assignments landing him with a seeminly useless class, him angering the goddess who was sent to tell him the details of his class and most technology inert this may be one starting zone he never gets out of.
 
Features:
Genre trope inversion:  John has no interest in building a harem, or being a leader full time.
A skill system that started off simple and evolved into a complicated mess.
A writer that doesn't take himself too seriously, or even really has any idea what he's doing.

Title: I am the Lightbringer!
Synopsis:
Planet Earth has absorbed mysterious energy which caused it to evolve. All inhabitants gained stronger physique and mind. 
Not only that, some of the inhabitants within gained abilities, which they call 'blessings', and caused utter chaos and disorder...
After hundreds of years, Planet Earth gained the peace they once had before the great change.
Astra Vorn Andromeda is the first-born son of Duke Andromeda. He received a 'blessing' from the world--he gained an ability!
It's the greatest gift he has ever received in his whole life.
However, due to unfortunate events, he ended up losing everything he had and became impoverished...
Unwilling to submit to his fate, he always believed that something will change...
Until finally...

Title: Old World Online: A Scholars Ambition
Synopsis:
Finally, the newest game that has been anticipated for two years is finally out, Old World Online. A place where ancient magic and hidden secrets lies within, waiting to be found. Demons of yesterday break free from their eternal prison able to roam the land once again. The gods, recognizing the danger these Demons of old represent, summon forth immortals from other realms to fight back against the evil army.
This is the story of one such immortal, by the name of Trix who changed the course of the world one fateful day.

Title: Azar
Synopsis:
She met with fortune through an unfortunate lifetime.
Now the race has been reversed and she will hunt those who hunted her.

Title: Tom the Dark Lord: A Lich's Tale
Synopsis:
Ever wondered what it would be like to be the bad guy?
Tom Gardner is your average sixteen year old. He likes burgers, plays video games, doesn't do too well in school - pretty typical. That all changes when he finds himself in another world - one of knights and nobles, of monsters and magic. A fantasy realm ripped straight from the digital pages of some lame web novel.
Except, Tom's not himself. He's a lich... an ancient sorceror with untold power. Not just any lich, either - he's Corvus, the Dark Lord. And everyone wants to kill him.
This is his tale. The tale of a lich. The tale of... Tom, the Dark Lord.
 
This is a rewrite of an old story of mine I had on an old account, which is now deleted. I'm hoping it'll last longer this time. For the best experience (I write shorter chapters) read in 50% width.

Title: Portgas D Ace and a Boy from Nowhere
Synopsis:
It was a normal day at The Moby Dick when it happened. Ace just finished his 'ritual' in 'trying to take Whitebeard's head' of the day, when The Boy appeared.
"Portgas D Ace?" He asked. At Ace's nods, he continues "You're going to die. But You will be happy, so don't worry about it, yeah!" he smiled innocently.
Ace only can blink in response. "What the hell?" Ace thinks.

Title: I'm the bad guy!?
Synopsis:
Do you wish you could wake up inside the mind of your favorite anime character? Well, our hero certainly did. From the moment he first laid eyes on (God's Favored Arcanist); An Isekai story centered around the adventures of sixteen-year-old Masato Yamajita as he traveled throughout the world of Echeron.
And Masato had it all; He was a once in a millenium genius known as the (SSS-class Arcanist), capable of wielding every element- and using them to their fullest potential- seemingly without effort. He could boil oceans, flip mountains, freeze volcanos, and as his power grew, so did his personal connections. He became a King, an Emperor, a God... And eventually stumbled into a harem of beautiful women who loved him.    
So, imagine our hero's surprise when he finds himself inside the body of a character from (God's Favored Arcanist).
There's just one problem. Our hero isn't Masato Yamajita, he's twelve-year-old Aren (The Devil's Duke) Ulvani: Childhood friend of Masato's first wife, Heir to the Ulvani Dukedom, and the secondary Antagonist of the first season of the anime. 
Our Hero isn't the Hero. He's the misunderstood Bad Guy with a tragic ending.
Armed with only his knowledge of the anime, the body of Aren Ulvani, and six years before the events of the anime begin. Can our hero turn his life around or will the future play out the same way no matter what he does? 
(Chapters 3-16 of the first book have been removed due to KDP publishing rules. Sorry for the inconvenience.)

Title: The summon Who Got Fleeced
Synopsis:
Jeff Trance, a 33 year old man who just got kicked out of service due to recieving a major injury to his head, gets summoned to a different world and was asked a cliche line: help us and fight the demon army.
Instead of doing as requested, he instead declines. Now he is off to fight a bigger war: married life in a land that wants nothing to do with humans nor Demonic creatures of any kind.
"Why the fuck am i here again?" Jeff asks in horror.
"Just say 'yes'. Your life literally depends on saying that" the person of whom Jeff has yet to have a name for.
"Easy for you to say! Your not the one with perverted thoughts aboutthe five women standing in front of you making the hottest women back home look bad!"

Title: The Mysterious Secret
Synopsis: This is the adventure story of Trey and Hannah, as they find their destiny throughout various decisions and time. It all starts when Trey went to school on another regular day, with not so regular events. A girl of his age and grade, Hannah, discover his only secret. The secret of shapeshifting... But throughout the time of a couple of days, they become good friends, mainly because they a much alike. Hannah happens to be a shapeshifter too. Soon curiosity takes charge and they both enter an abandoned barn, discover tracks, and follow it into a lab. A lab of unknown purpose. But the excitement does not last for long, as they are caught and tested on, until a message comes through. Escaping and once again knocked unconscious, they discover one thing that would change their lives forever. The fact that they are Kitsune, an ancient mythological creature of Japanese legends, who mostly live in a different dimension, an underground jungle, where the houses are carved into the rock walls, and the beauty is outstanding. This is the place where their true destiny begins...

Title: The Rupture
Synopsis:
The residents of Esmeria had enjoyed peace and quiet ever since the darkness was locked away, but darkness never sleeps for long...
When the darkness awakens and a great rift splits the continent in half it is up to the half-elven boy named Aren to with the help of his friends save the continent from the ensuing chaos and discover the truth about his past.

Title: Trinity Online: The Farside Chronicles *Rewrite*
Synopsis: When Andaros wins a contest and receives a special pod for the galaxy's greatest VR-MMORPG, Trinity Online, things go bad real fast. How will Andaros handle the loss of his only parent, and how will he handle things when he is forced to marry the sister of the man who caused her death, and almost cost him his life? When the founders of Trinity Online come to his rescue, how will everything that happened in real life color his experiences in the game? Find out as our hero makes small, but slowly building waves in Trinity Online.

Title: Kill the Joker: Survival Game
Synopsis:
Redemption is a fickle thing.
Nine detectives and nine serial killers find themselves playing a dangerous survival game of deductions, pretending, and - murder. With your life and alias on the line, what would you give up for a shot at redemption?
...
The main premise and kick of KtJ is that it is a guessing game of sorts. 18 high school students of various ages and backgrounds come together and are given aliases, such as "King", "Killer", or as the protagonist is aptly named - "Protagonist". They do not know each others' identities, and what's more - 9 of them are anonymous detectives, and 9 of them are serial killers.
The cast is given a list of their names, and a list of the identities of the serial killers and detectives they are being held hostage with, and are forced to interact to guess the identities. The people who are able to connect all identities will get "a special advantage" in the killing game, but it isn't specified what.
Alongside this, each cast member is given three secrets they are able to reveal at any point for an advantage in the killing game as well. However, one of these secrets is their name, and revealing that secret will result in a minor "punishment" as well.
[COVER ART DONE BY RILIE @kisikils]
[Illustrated]

Title: Collision: Dawn of a New Era
Synopsis: Elias Colvin is a lifetime criminal who awakens to a mysterious voice while serving time in prison. A "helpful" entity lets him know that his dimension and another have collided. Both dimensions are taking on characteristics of each other, so now everyone on earth has a character sheet though he can't access even half of his own. A work in progress Collision: Dawn of a New Era is my first attempt at writing, so feedback isn't just accepted it's encouraged, no matter how brual.

Title: Lichen Leech
Synopsis:
At the northern border of explored lands, the humans have once again built a settlement. The wilds are reluctant to give way for civilization. Many settlements before this one has fallen to its whims. Will Harwall be any different, or will it fall to yet another monster straying from the woods? Only time will tell, but the unusual gathering of changelings hiding among the people of this settlement just might tip the scales.
Will Rowan the werewolf keep his curse in check, or will he embrace the beast and lay waste to all that surrounds him in a fit of destructive glee?
For how long can the reincarnated soul survive in his new body, hearing the whispers only the green may know?
How long until Cain's instincts to trick and devour gets him caught and burned by those he preys on?
Come find out, but beware their lies, their promises, and their betrayals.
 
New chapters release during the weekend (or whenever they're ready). This novel contains violence and sexual content.

Title: Magic Takes Over
Synopsis: Sakujo nearly dies when a group of sadist sorcerers attack him, but then a giirl saves him, and gives him sorcerer abilites. She tells him that he is one of the only people that are compatible with magic, and that he needs to eliminate a Sadist group of magic users that like to do harm, and sacrifice for their rituals. But there is more...

Title: Crimson Crown
Synopsis:
Wouldnt you know it, playing a VRMMORPG when it closes it servers might send someone to another reality. Chris had to learn this little tidbit the hard way, by experience!
But its not all bad.
After all, being sent to another world as your way too op character sounds like great fun. As long as you are okay with being a woman when you used to be a man since you take up all the aspects of your character, even their gender.
........
And the wings......
 
JUST A WARNING!!!! THERE WILL BE ALOT OF GIRL ON GIRL SEXUAL CONTENT!! LESBIANS GALORE! DO NOT READ IF YOU DONT WANT TO READ ALL OF THAT!
Obligated warning aside I hope you enjoy. And I would appreciate any criticism on my writing to help me get better.

Title: Illyrian Blues
Synopsis:
Buffy: the Vampire Slayer/Angel Fan fiction.
To keep from losing the woman he loves, a distraught Wesley has Harmony turn the dying Winifred Berkel into a vampire.I do not own any of these characters. They belong to the producers of the TV Series “Angel”.

Title: Cursed World (LitRPG Fantasy Adventure)
Synopsis:
A new virual reality game.
Where the playing is virtual... and the dying is real.POSTING SCHEDULENew 2000+ word chapters will be posted every Monday, Wednesday and Friday.

Title: Rise of a Scarlet Devil (Regular+Draft Version)
Synopsis:
A young girl slain during a war was brought back to life by some unknown force millennia later. She could only remember a vague face within her memories, uncertain as to who it was but there was one thing she did know. She needed to kill that person. But she was too weak, she needed to hide, to grow. She needed to flee from the battlefield her enemy reigns over. And to do so, she needed to run eastward, towards Helios, a safe haven for those who have lost their homes in the war. And where she would grow to become the strongest Hunter under her own strength. What was it that brought her back? Only time will tell.
#Author's Note
The novel is organized like this:Regular Chapters (Act, Title, Part (ranging from 1 to 9))Draft Chapter DisclaimerDraft Chapters (Entry Number, Perspective, Title, Part (ranging from i to ii))
Regular chapters are edited chapters that reflect the story aspect more while Draft chapters reflect plot progression more. An occasional interactive chapter will appear in the drafts but nowhere in the regular chapters. Expect changes when reading between Regular and Draft chapters as some events in the story may change in length or entirely removed/changed. Only read the draft version if you want a future view and/or opinion on the story and design elements.
 The main character is a human from a fantasy world reincarnated as a devil. The story possesses Reincarnators, Transmigrators, and Summoned Persons. though mainly focusing on Magic and other abilities such as Aura and Skills. Wizards (those who prepare arcane spells) and Mages (those who use elemental magic) are separate but seen as the same by common inhabitants of the world but clearly defined as different by more influential persons and by the circles themselves. The main character WILL not be a Mage or Wizard but will incorporate mana into her attacks to aid her as does any high-rank combatants. The system in the novel quantifies a person's abilities and keeps record of them but does not define natural ability, occasionally granting special abilities as skills to a person once prerequisites are met. There is no leveling system and no occupational systems in the novel featuring only a stat based and skill based system.
Also, this novel is my first and will most likely be trash.

Title: Sovereign of the Gates
Synopsis: The peaceful world we once knew was no more. As if they appeared out of thin air, 'Gates' appeared around the world. Within the gates, monsters came out and invaded humanityHuman weapons could not hurt the monsters, until one day humans gained the power to resist the monsters. They were later known as 'Hunters'Decades later, a young man was known to be the weakest hunter. Upon entering a gate which is later known to be called a Ring, due to its shape. Everyone but he survived. His powers that were known to be the weakest evolved giving him the strength to one day become the strongestLike Solo Leveling? Well, this is for you

Title: Sovereign above the Heavens
Synopsis: A young man with mediocre talent sets his sights on becoming the greatest!Watch as the young man takes beauties and slaps the face of arrogant young masters

Title: Ocean Storm
Synopsis:
Prince William has been rescued, and many years of peace has settled over the land of Lilliath. The royal twins, Prince Theodore and Princess Elizabeth are growing up and beginning to think about what the future holds for them.
For Princess Elizabeth, a nice quiet life in the safety of Castle Town sounds perfect. But Prince Theodore yearns to set into the world and make his own adventure story. However the last thing they were expecting was to be spirited away by a band of ghastly pirates! Can their bond survive the thrashing seas and the brutal nature of the evil Captain Felix? Or will they crumble under the pressure?
A storm is coming.
This novel is completed! I'll be posting up to the first three chapters on here for you to enjoy for free, and if you like what you read, please consider purchasing a copy of the full book! It's available in hardcover, paperback and ebook.

Title: Manor on Server Seven
Synopsis: After losing his job as a cashier, Sid finds an abandoned building on the outskirt of town and opens an inn.

Title: Hiatus
Synopsis: There's nothing here.

Title: Numbers
Synopsis:
"Apa itu kehidupan? Bagiku kehidupan adalah sebuah panggung keironisan dimana kita melihat diri kita sendiri berubah menjadi apa yang kita benci"
William Philip, seorang karyawan swasta yang merasa tidak puas dengan kehidupannya selama ini. Ketika ia memutuskan untuk mengakhiri kehidupannya, usahanya itu dihalangi oleh seorang misterius yang berkata bahwa ia akan membuat kehidupan William jauh lebih menarik.
setelah usaha bunuh dirinya di gagalkan, pengelihatan William mulai berubah dengan aneh , ia bisa melihat nama seseorang melayang tepat di atas kepala mereka, namun ia menemukan hal yang menjanggalkan.
William menemukan dirinya di kelilingi oleh ratusan "manusia" yang mempunyai Angka sebagai nama mereka, jumlah mereka tidak terhingga, hingga mfembuat para manusia yang memiliki nama biasa bagaikan jarum ditengah rumput ilalang.

Title: My Life As A Fire Hero!
Synopsis: Hayato is an ordinary schoolboy.....Until he and his friends got summoned to another world! They now act as the guardians of that world and they must take down the 10 leaders of evil!

Title: Hero's Call
Synopsis:
A young man gets a second chance after a life altering injury. 
A chance to be more than he was.
A chance to answer the Hero's Call
 
 
*I'm scheduling initial releases Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday at 6:00 pm  PST; this will continue until I run out of chapters already written but will try and write far enough forward to keep up until the story is complete.

Title: A Happy City
Synopsis: A man by the name Ryou has been a detective for over 15 years, at the age of 28 he lost his wife to human trafficking. After his loss the case was dismissed, but he still carried on with the investigation without letting the police department know. Follow Ryou's case as he tries to uncover the man in charge of white human trafficking in Japan.

Title: Long War [Oldest]
Synopsis: It was a war. It was silent, so silent that few people ever noticed that it was happening, and long. So long that those who knew forgot why it ever started. Humanity had fought against itself... and lost. Prosperity, democracy and human rights were a thing of the past now, as the world fell into Sovereigns's hands - a handful of transnational corporations (and their CEOs) that monopolized the world economy. The resistance had been long silenced with the policy of bread and games. Now, over a hundred years later, something happened. One of the Sovereigns created a VRMMORPG like none other. A science fiction game, where players could explore the Galaxy... full of advanced technologies, bloodthirsty aliens and even magic. Was it a simple computer game, or... something else?

Title: The Heart of Nimble Woods
Synopsis:
Seeking Apprentice
Want adventure?Want fame?Want riches?Do you have what it takesto be the one with all the answers?
 
 
Jack's friends love him, but they know he can be trouble. Sure, it's all fun and games playing pranks in high school, but eventually, it's time to grow up and get a job.
They didn't expect that job to be located in another world, accessed through a fiery portal, which just opened up in Jack's bedroom. 
A cyborg emerges from that portal with an intriguing proposition. If they can complete a task set by the mysterious Alchemist, Jack will become the Alchemist's apprentice and they'll all have access to a whole world of science and magic.
All they have to do is find the castle in the middle of Nimble Woods.
For Jack, the stakes in this game are higher than he is willing to admit. And convincing his friends to step through the portal is only the beginning...

Title: For The Right Price
Synopsis: Follow the adventures of Jack, the aloof, carefree and highly sarcastic bounty hunter and his buddy, the all-serious, all knowing Spike, in their adventures as bounty hunters for The People's Federation, a multi-billion dollar corporation specializing in the finding and retrieval of the missing spouses and runaway mistresses of the 1%. If you have a problem, and the money to solve it, The People's Federation has the solution. Completely discreet, completely effective.

Title: Urasaria Academy [LGBT]
Synopsis:
After the end of the Cold War, superpowers taking the form of bacterial colonies on one's heart begin appearing around the world. A new class of law-enforcing "hosts" is established over the next decades, given legal immunity to deal with violent criminals however they choose.
In modern day, Mia Schultz is a young socially awkward lesbian. She's attacked by an unknown man and given the power to control a swarm of fire scarabs named Worldwide, and as she begins her new job at Urasaria Academy, she's soon pulled in to a mystery on Worldwide's true origins.
A strong focus on character development and superpowered fights.
This story is a first draft in the process of being finalized.
August 11th, 2020: Year One has been rewritten! You may need to restart your chapter; I apologize, but it's far better now. Optional Year 1 summer arc + Year 2 rewrite coming Soon (TM).

Title: The Red Lady
Synopsis: Myranda Rose was always known for being the ill-mannered and ugly daughter of King Rose. But on a stormy night a mysterious man calling himself a demon offers her three wishes. Tempted by this Myranda accepts and quickly uses her wishes making her life better than before. But good things come at a cost. Now the demon wants to call in her debts by claiming her soul. Admidst a war with Demi-Humans, she secretly hires a group of adventurers, pirates, and smugglers to help her find the demon and try put an end to her debt. But they soon become the prey of a blood-magic cult who worship the demon. Will they be able to find the demon before being hunted or before friends turn foe?

Title: Murder Hobo Society
Synopsis:
These are the grotesque tales of the flamboyant Murder Hobo.
Kendrik is the newest member of the Murder Hobo Society. First goal? Recruit a team of semi-competent adventurers. Second goal? Kill stuff. Third? Let's not think this through too much.
 -------------------------
 This is an Interactive Discovery Writing (IDW) work of fiction. That means that audience input helps drive the direction of the story. For this work new chapters are usually posted on Wednesdays and audience polls posted on Thursdays. Thanks for your input and interest!

Title: Rise Of Vasshar
Synopsis:
In the world of Hassil Dragons are mighty immortal creatures that even the gods fear. We follow Vasshar the being to come into exsistence in the world of hassil.

It's was beautiful in the beginning but after two weeks the beauty faded. my wife was pregnant with my child our first, we found out that before the   nanarie.

Title: Pivot
Synopsis: He may be a scary cat and really greedy, but he is someone you can trust. He may not be rich but he is someone that has a good heart. He may not be a hero but he also not a villain. He is a saint to his friends and a devil to his enemies. Follow Preston and his journey in this marvelous world!

Title: The No Names: Calforn Chronicles (Reborn)
Synopsis:
Can one man make a difference?
Digit 36589900 lives among the masses of other nameless and Forgotten humans under the thumb of the Government and Bankers.
After one abusive push too many, Digit 36589900 finds himself exiled to a frozen prison moon. Vowing to make a change, the wheels of war are put in motion.
With limited supplies, no shelter and constant threat of attack, a small band of newly christened humans fight to survive, even as repercussions spiral further than anyone could have imagined.
The only hope is constant evolution, but they aren't the only ones...
 
 **Now Available on AMAZON**

Title: Just another random summoning story
Synopsis:
Well you’ve heard it all before a school summoning yada yada nothing to special. A hero with a harem. A kingdom in dire need of help. So let’s get started 
quick note this is my first novel so opinions are welcome

Title: Story of a Turtle (W.I.P)
Synopsis:
Story of a young man by the name of Michael Jacobs who was killed in a hit n' run, then taken to another world by the God of Creation. 
Michael is then tasked to participate in a tournament held by the gods every millennium, and to become strong enough to compete in a span of a year.
The God of Creation sends Michael off to a fantasy world, far different than that of his own. Michael in his new body, experiences life all over again, but as a... turtle?

Title: The Futuristic Bard
Synopsis: Timothy Jadiy was tired of his day to day jobs, hunting them down to pay for his hobby and living expenses. He had been playing the new game, The Destruction of Sound. A game unlike any other, where the player uses anything that creates sound to destroy monsters. Of course it was in VR, what game wasn't these days? In the game, you could of course choose classes like other VR games, but the majority being sound based. Whether you were a Mechanical Engineer, where you created drones which use bursts of controlled air or a classic guitarist which uses an axe like guitar to slice and send slices of sound, splitting your foes. Tim wouldn't say that he was the best however, seeing that he was poor, had to spend a lot of time at jobs, and the fact that Tim actually in real life, learned every single instrument. He sometimes entered contests for money and won! None of that mattered now, stupid truck. Watch as the musician of another world, crosses into the next and becomes known as, The Futuristic Bard, by friends, and to the masses, The God of Sound.

Title: The Reclusive god and the Demon Bride
Synopsis: As one of the divine gods in the heavenly realm, Akanushi lived as an hermit, but was also envied and the most sought after in the god realm. The time to face trial as a divine being arrived, having lost power, was sent to live in the world of humans. Reincarnates as Ji Suk-kyu an ordinary salary man and secretary to one of the most prestigious corporation in Seoul, and has no memory of past life as a divine god.15 years after the Chaebol heir to the Haemin group took over as the new CEO, Hae Min-jae was known to be one of the most notorious playboy in K3B-Gangam’s night club for the very elite. From bickering to outrageous behaviors during and after office hours, the playboy slowly realizes that his secretary may mean more to him than just a subordinate.---------------------------------Disclaimer: The story is unedited. Warning: BL

Title: Sandshard Online
Synopsis: Dave is a simple 21 y.o. man, who has been yearning for a Fulldive VR system and an MMORPG that fully takes control of these, just like the kind he reads about online. Luckily for him, Fulldive systems have popped onto the market, With the launch of the Fulldive system known simply as 'Sand', Due to the sinking feeling you get when you lay in it, an MMORPG just for it arrives, titled Sandshard Online. Action? Check.Classes? Check.Multiple Races to choose from? Check.Romance? ...check...?A full open world? Definitely checked.Dave cant wait to start playing, and creates a character he simply calls Black Halo.(Author here, this is a story I'm doing in my free time, so i cant say i have a schedule. there might be random hiatuses, there might be multiple chapters in a week. It all just depends on inspiration, i guess. And my will to write. So keep this one in your thoughts, please.)

Title: Valentines Expedition - Mortal Engines Fan book
Synopsis:
This is my book about Valentines expedition to the dead continent to recover medusa and how it all went down.......
(Upload more soon...ish)

Title: World Fusion-When A Fantasy World And Earth Combine
Synopsis: Earth was dying, that was painstakingly clear to the God that ruled over it. In order to save his most precious creations, he had to fuse it with another planet going through hard times, Mystova. A planet ruled by Demi humans and monsters. It started with a simple text. God said he was changing everything. He was taking Fossil fuels, gun powder, and nuclear material to prevent man from destroying his new creation.In exchange, he offered unique skills to the lucky few who took his text seriously and responded. In a new world with a level system like an RPG game, how will man adapt?Jordan Cain will navigate this new world as he seeks to find something he has never had before. He will have to overcome obstacles and fight for survival as he grows.

Title: REINCARNATED AS A CREATED PLAYER
Synopsis: Joten Caru a young man age 18 who died from a fatal form of brain cancer. However, after death, he was faced with God that told him that particular form of cancer has a less than 1% survival rate should never have been created and was created by one of his underlings. He is then given the chance to create a new self for a new fantasy world similar to the MMORPG games and books he loved to read while was sick, which he fully takes advantage of.

Title: Towers of the Gods
Synopsis:
Nathan Vellenger is brought to a world of Wonder filled with magic and monsters, and he wants nothing more than to go home but life is not fair nor kind. The challenges he will face shall bring him to his knees and the power he gains shall have him soaring above the skies. What is the truth of this world and why is he there may never be known but the journey he shall take is one filled with hardship and woe but also hope and happiness for life is never fair nor kind but it is wonderful!
Join me as I write this story of adventure from deserts to plains and mountains high to the ocean low this story of might and magic.
 
 
 
 
 
I do not have a release schedule at this time so the first few months may be a bit sporadic but I have high hopes for this story as I have been wanting to write one for a long time and have many ideas to bring to the table that I hope you will all like. If things work out well I may work on making a release schedule but no promises.

Title: The Castle
Synopsis:
The universes were in doubt, fear and confusion when a Castle forcefully connected them all. The 108 realities and innumerable universes in them, were side by side, however had almost impenetrable barriers around them since time immemorial and now they're connected to a single Castle.
That Castle and its onwer decide to mess with fate, change densities and enjoy the themselves for the eternity to come.

Title: Soul Agent
Synopsis:
Some of them came for power, other for justice, others even for love. But what they all have in common is that they are now pawns in a bigger game where failure means death without a chance for an afterlife.
 
Valen is one of them, suffering at the whims of a superior being interested only in chaos.
------
the synopsis might be a little lacking, however, I want to give you an experience where you discover the story little by little, without knowing what to expect.
[mystery] [mental illness] [plague]

Title: Conttemptions of the consquence of the consciousnes one
Synopsis: His world fell under the overwhelming demons' invasion. Completely alien creatures could destroy the whole Egorold with all the inhabitans. The great magician Ur-Shattrien called one of his favourite disciples to give him the great power to rescue the Lorduce race. From now he becomes the bearer of the Great DNA Seed, able to release its true power. But it's not enough to fight the demons, so the only way is to bring the Seed through the other worlds in safe place, where it can revive the Egorold Nation....

Title: Chicken Out
Synopsis:
Content Warning: I marked everything because I have no idea where this story is going to go. I'm just writing this web novel for fun to take a break from my other web novel. 
I don't plan to write this web novel in a serious manner. Its just going to be for fun. so, if you have any ideas on what you would like to see our cast of main characters do let me know in the comments.
Brief Synopsis: Chicken main character > alien planet >Gain Sentience > Evolve into a dinosaur down the line
PROLOGUE:
My first coherent thought of my life was after eating a blue glowing bug that had hopped into my coop. My thought was “holy fuck that tasted good” I surprised myself because my thoughts had been purely based on emotion and need up until this point. You know, like hungry, thirsty, time to shit, or it’s time to fuck. But after this first thought, they came flowing in faster “where the fuck can I get more of those glowing bugs?!?” 
I looked around my coop and noticed that while I had known that I didn’t live alone in my coop I had never taken into account that I shared my coop with so many others. There had to be at least 25 others that looked like me. But I immediately disregarded this realization as I noticed that my main goal of finding more of the glowing bugs was about to be realized as more of the glowing bugs were headed straight for our coop. There had to be over forty of the little rainbow glowing fuckers. 
I let out an excited “BAWCOCK!” and immediately I was surrounded by my coop mates as we all noticed the coming bugs. I was the only one that had eaten one. But it was deeply ingrained into all of our brains that “bugs = good” so we waited excitedly as the different colored glowing bugs hopped closer and closer.

Title: adVerse Wishes
Synopsis: Rose Smith, living in a poor world struggles to get over her grandpa's suspicious death in South Carolina but soon finds it was a murder...by a piano! Strong willed, Rose displays her determination to avenge her grandpa's death by fighting the piano, but at the same time, she has another battle to face being the new girl. Rose happened to move into her grandpa's house from Ohio after he died  and with her old apartment she left all of her friends. With two negligent parents, Rose lacks in social interaction until she becomes best friends with a wealthy girl named Marylyn whom she meets at her new school. After breaking the traumatic news about the instrument in her grandpa's old house, Marylyn and Rose fight the piano with all the power they have.

Title: Running to Willow
Synopsis: In a country called Quinque, a plague breaks out leaving millions traumatized by death. With five states broken up in the country, one being wealthy few got medicine. Taking advantage of the country's weakness a government man named Robert Pollock takes over as dictator. Handing out medicine while serving out unjust laws Dictator Pollock becomes more and more of an alcoholic as his daughter discovers the jail in which her dad leaves those who disobey his rules. Seeing what horrible conditions they are suffering in Robert Pollock's daughter, Faith starts to feed the prisoners illegally.

Title: World of the Dead
Synopsis:
Greetings prospective reader! If you like:
- Hot blooded comradery!
- Training arcs!
- The P O W E R  O F  F R I E N D S H I P
- Tournament Arcs!
- Obligatory face slapping!
- Inconsistent power levels!
- Ten-Chapter long battles!
- Katanas!
- Good writing!
- Reincarnated into the trash son of a local lord
- Harem!
- FLAWLESS BEAUTIES WITH SKIN LIKE WHITE JADE—
—Then close the page immediately and never return. You are a long way from home.
Story Actually Contains: modern day Zombie apocalypse, superpowers, a newbie’s attempt at writing a plot, fantasy elements where convenient, 3rd person perspective, and a squinty-eyed SOB starring as main character.

Title: Chaos Godking (ReWrite)
Synopsis:
If you are the most powerful being in the world, what would you do?How about the galaxy?How about the universe?How about if even reality has to bow down to you?This is how the Godking (technicality aside) kills time.1. Pick a disciple2. Give instructions to said disciple3. Guide said disciple4.???5. Rinse and repeatJoin The godking on his adventures as he makes the people that will rule parts of reality. 
I'm also posting this on webnovels, but I think RR is better as comments would be easier to see.

Title: The Heroes Must Die
Synopsis:
Hey y'all. I wrote this during a sleepless night when I could have been doing something more productive, but here's hoping that it turns into something halfway decent. Before you dive in, you should know that this is a RWBY fanfiction featuring settings and characters from the show. That being said, please realize that this isn't going to focus on the main characters of that series. Updates will be pretty sporadic, unless there is a high volume of demand. If y'all want more, don't hesitate to bug me.
Enjoy.
 
Theodore Freedman has it all: money, cars, women, and vices of all variety. He lacks for nothing and has the world in the palm of his hand. Yet when his uncle dies under dubious circumstances, Theodore is forced to confront his past self, as well as inner demons he thought long-gone. At the footsteps of death, he is whisked away to an otherworldly reality, he must fight his own inner battles as well as find his way home.

Title: Unmei No Hito~Fated Person
Synopsis:
Because of accidental magic that he uses on his research, he brings along his three siblings to an alternate timeline. For his siblings, it is a strange world where everything is misplaced and wrong. But for him, it is a chance. After all, he remembers this world. For him, this is the past that been erased, yet still live in his memory. And The Perfect Prince and The Quiet Little Girl over there are the people that he wants to save most.
He won't fail this time!

Title: God/Game
Synopsis: This is a story about a badly designed torture game done a million times before.

Title: Journey West 5000
Synopsis:
With her parents murdered and her brother abducted, a trainee Monk of the Gun pursues the one responsible, the Bull Demon King, undefeated Warlord of the Crimson Army. Struggling to track down her enemy while braving the dangers of the wilds, she enlists the help of Sun Wukong, but 500 years under a mountain have taken its toll. Unstable and weakened, will he be more hindrance than help? Can he become the warrior he once was? A Monk and a Monkey journey across a world...... where the remnants of technology are seen as magic, while pockets of humanity strive to drag themselves out of ignorance.... where the descendants of animal-human hybrids, once created as instruments of war, now seek to dominate the world as demons.... where beings who call themselves Immortals and Gods preoccupy themselves with selfish pastimes, ignoring everything else. 
 
Among other things, a story about growth, grit, and being better than the person you were yesterday.
 
Here's my rambling on why I'm writing Journey West 5000.

Journey West 5000 is my crazy ambitious writing project to adapt a classic epic called "Journey to the West" for a global, modern audience. It's a sci-fi story disguised as fantasy, and has some road trip + monster of the week elements (as does the original Journey to the West).
No system, definitely no harem, gradual power progression. Hmm, what else can I put here so potential readers know what to expect?
My writing style for now is mostly "show don't tell", because I believe that readers don't need to have everything pointed out to them, and that they should be allowed to make up their own minds about characters based on the actions of those characters. I'm also trying to be less long-winded (a weakness pointed out by some friends) in order to write according to something Neil Gaiman said, which is to write as though I'm the one who has to pay for every word, not the reader. This will bring down my chapter word counts, and might drive away potential readers, but I believe there's value in learning to compress and be concise. All chapters posted here will have been edited.
Constructive criticism, comments, and feedback would be very much welcome and appreciated. Please, please help point out any typos or grammatical mistakes, I'm striving to minimize those as much as possible.
Above all, I hope you enjoy my story.

Title: Douluo Dalu Fanfiction: The Journey of Li Tian Tian
Synopsis:
A young boy met with a road accident on his way home to play the most waited game Sword Art Online. However, that accident marked the beginning of his new journey.
Follow Li Ming as he gets reincarnated into a whole new world known as the Douluo Continent where people with special abilities called soul masters exist. Will he be able to climb up to the top of the pyramid and ascend to a higher realm with the help of the memories he inherited?
Read on to find out.

Title: Veirlik
Synopsis: Veirlik is a world like any other, plagued by bloodshed and racial tensions. For thousands of years, the Gods held dominion over mortals. However, after a catastrophic war against one of their own kind, the Gods rescinded their rule over the world, allowing the people to reign as they saw fit. Erendus, the God of Darkness and Death, was slain, putting an end to the conflict. With the Gods no longer watching their every move, seven conquerors arose from the ranks of the various races, taking the world by storm. It was then that the Age of Gods came to an end, and the Adventurer’s Era arrived. Three centuries later, the story of Zyl and his companions begins to unfold...

Title: Rebirth of a broken demoness
Synopsis:
The greatest swindler, while committing a heist, unfortunately died of an explosion and crossed over to another world. In this world, he is the Dukes useless granddaughter and is immediately met with a broken engagement. In this world, he's an incompetent 'miss' and a bastard with a family that wouldn’t mind killing him. No matter how you looked at it, wasn’t it already [Story End]? Still, now that he had transcended over, he had to live with only his wits and the ghost of the original body. “Hmm, first let’s aim for world domination, shall we?”
-
I lost my old account, so this is a reupload.

Title: Aspire - From the Ashes
Synopsis: Kadin Banto is a member of the Aspire guild, the best guild in the kingdom of Kahlona. His current contract starts out as a simple missing child case but quickly escalates in to a in depth plot to bring back the demon lords of old, and a Necromancers desire to cover all the lands in flame.This story follows Kadin as he moves forwards to fulfil his contract and eliminate the Necromancer. A battle against time to stop the Necromancer from reaching the plains of ash and opening a portal to bring back the demon lords and the horde is a secondary objective - the Aspire guild will always complete the contract and Kadin will not be the exception.The world itself is a High Fantasy world with all sort of magical creatures, including Elfs, Orcs, Vampires, Demons, giant spiders, enchanted weapons, magical runes, and wizardry - almost every one in this world can use magic - but only a few specialise in it.The story is completely from the perspective of Kadin, so there is no jumping between characters. Plus I have purposely not described what Kadin looks like as since this is all from his view, I want each reader to picture him in their own way. Finally I am open to any feedback or criticism, I am writing this because I enjoy it - but I will always look to improve my skills. Thanks all

Title: Rise and Conquer
Synopsis:
I died
I was reborn
Now I will get everthing I want
But first I have to get past this huge problem.
 
This is my attempt at an original style novel. I hope to includesome commedic stints in it (Dad jokes alert).
It is my first attempt at a long term novel.
Constructive criticism is apperciated.

Indeed a wonder.

"Hey! It was perfectly fine until Role messed up!"

With his blood wielding Best Friend at his side, an angelic Stalker following him wherever he goes, a Glasses Kid as his know it all teacher and his psychotic Rival failing to surpass him, can Main Character harness the powers of anime genres and become the hero of the ancient futuristic world of Steam Punk?
The Main Character is a psychological action animestyle parody created to set a new standard for Shounen protagonists! Expect tons of anime refrences and unique abilities! This meta experience blends comedy and the epic action sequences SOC is known for!

Title: Another World's Homunculus
Synopsis:
Ellis Murrin died an unexpected death, but before he could experience the sweet bliss of eternal rest, a God-like being whisked him away. The God told a tale of another world in grave jeopardy and the need for a hero (or several heroes) to go there and save the people. It was looking to be a typical story of transmigration when suddenly, something unexpected happened.
Now, he finds himself standing in the middle of an ancient tomb, with a lineage that wasn’t exactly normal and a body that wasn’t entirely human.
