Title: Dracula: The First Vampire
Synopsis:
In the stone age, the humans lived on power. Young Vlades Tepes was a member of his father's warrior clan. He participated in many huntings and various activities until one day in the winter, his life changed forever
P.s. No stats

Title: We the People Are Good to Eat
Synopsis:
In a fatally overpopulated future Earth, all that the people have to eat is each other, and they thank God for every meal.
In this world, keeping the population trimmed and the meat quota filled is every citizen’s responsibility. Gladiator type combat games are now a high school team sport.  This is the students’ way of participating in both the population trimming and meat harvest.
A Cheerleader/Warrior Girl discovers that certain things in this world are not the way that everybody believes.  This leads to other discoveries, which might eventually turn their world upside down.

Title: Astral Connections
Synopsis:
A millennium ago, monsters invaded the World of Atera and brought forth the Cataclysmic Era. In Humanity’s dire times, Stars became their greatest hope. Through their endeavours, Humanity regained a small foothold - a mere shadow of their former grandeur. Now, a child born under a forgotten constellation would alter the world anew. Is he a calamity? Or the godsend that mankind requires to recover their throne over Atera? In a world of eternal bloodshed and evolution, would he be able to survive it at all? Witness the forging of a legend that began an everlasting Empire.
- Cover art done by ShiitakeHero (https://twitter.com/ichigowhiskey - NSFW twitter)

Well nothing, unless the street he takes step in isn't quite normal. It's too quiet there.
Dive into psychological horror with a bit of fantasy and mystery behind it.
Oh and there is also some comedy, tho it might get dark later so take your flashlights with you.

Title: Zero and King
Synopsis:
In a world where people are born with abilities and strength decides status, Norman, a 12-years-old boy was born without an ability. His life changed on the day of the ceremony when kids like him are awoken to their abilities. However, an incident will occur where he discovers a secret, changing his life around and view about being powerless. 
 
 
*Note from the author*
I will probably release a chapter once every two weeks and maybe once a week. It depends whether if I have the time to do so. But, I hope you will continue to support the story I produce and enjoy them as well. I'm quite new to this and my english are not that great. Even so, I will improve as I write this story. To those who reads this and continue to read my story, thank you. I appreciate the time you spared to read this story of mine.

Title: The Light Bridge
Synopsis:
Ever wondered where the seemingly solid bridge of light created by the setting sun across the water leads? I always wondered too, gazing across the sea near my home. Almost entranced, I lost myself in the beauty. 
I will not be updating this regularly, this is simply something I use to excercize my mind on boring days/whenever I feel like it.

Title: Wielder
Synopsis:
In a world where those without strength, wealth, or standing can only choose between a short and brutal life or a long, hard, and unfulfilling one. Fynn, a frail young boy raised in such circumstances is resigned to his fate of worthlessness and mere dreams. That is, however, until an unexpected and unique opportunity befalls him.
Fynn starts a journey that will change his life forever.  One where he begins to learn about the intriguing dynamics and complexities of the vast world around him and tries to piece together the mystery of his family's past.  With the odds stacked against him, he will need to dig deep to find the resolve and determination to grow, nurture, and develop his skills.  His one goal in life, to make this world acknowledge him.

Title: DemonLord_Floof - The lack of common sense isekai

A Demon Lord got bored of his own world because he couldn’t find a worthy enemy, thus decided to go meet the God of Reincarnation himself. He told the God that he wanted to be reborn in a different world as the member of the weakest race.
A BUNNY!

Title: Going For Gold
Synopsis:
Gild Smithson is a golden boy, literally. From his skin to his teeth, he has a golden hue. In his world, strange colors are the least unusual aspects of a person, because almost a third of the population have superpowers. Gild has gold manipulation, which could make him rich. However, Gild doesn't want to be rich. He wants to make a difference. 
In a world full of people with power vying for the top spot, will Gild become the superpowered golden boy he was born to be, or will he fail at his dream and become a rich corporate jerk?
Why am I even asking? You already know he's going to be a badass crimefighter! The real question is, how does he get there?

Synopsis: When Senior year student Claudia Wanders is found dead, her half-naked body hanging on the chalk board in room 404, everyone in that class is taken as a suspect including their faculty members. No one is innocent, each student has something to hide, pointing fingers at each other and Detective Silver finds this case getting even more interesting and complicated as he digs into the lives of all the students in room 404 trying to find the real killer but everyone just seems as guilty as the next.

Title: Hightailing It
Synopsis:
A simple story about a kobold, a dungeon, and making the best decisions ever.
 
Story is written in 1st Person PoV.

Title: A Tale of Sorrow and Love: Book I
Synopsis:
Turn pain into power
Everin Thornwood is a traumatized orphan in a small village who is struggling to recover from the violent murder of his parents when he’s given the ability to see others’ suffering. Not only that, but he can absorb others’ pain, experience what they’re feeling, and wield that pain as a supernatural weapon. Everin must come to terms with these abilities as he crosses the post-apocalyptic society of Allomoria to find the man who commands angels and stole his life from him.
His companions, Cora and Ford, must make sure he stays alive as they fight ghosts, angels, and Everin’s own demons along the way.
Easier said than done, right?
Please comment or review if you enjoy what you read! Feedback is always appreciated!
CW: some violence, brief sexual assault reference

Title: Out of Foxes to Give
Synopsis:
When you’re reincarnated as Naruto Uzumaki you do one of two things: cheer because you remember the story and are able to abuse your future knowledge, or realize that you’re in a world where they train child soldiers who throw fireballs and explosions around like candy and reasonably freak out. In a sense you’re either screwed or screwed but you know why.
 
I didn’t really read Naruto when I was a kid. However, had I known that it would be useful in death, I would have! And I’m certainly regretting it now!
 
————————————
A definite AU for Naruto. I’m going to remove some parts and add some others for the sake of plot holes(so if something doesn't seem quite right it's probably intended... maybe), but I’ll try to stick to as close to how the Naruto-verse works. Also, say goodbye to canon!
 
Also, disclaimer, I do not own Naruto as that belongs solely to Kishimoto. I do, however, own this story.

Title: Dead In Peace
Synopsis: Somethings are never meant to happen. Like falling into another world.

Title: Becoming a Demon Lord in another World!
Synopsis: Alex is a boy who was transported to another world filled with magic, demons, nobles and all the fantasy things. He will be gifted with power from a being he thought was a God of the Heavens but was a God of the Underworld. He will go on journeys, meet new people, and become a Demon Lord!

Title: Life of Numbers
Synopsis:
Everything in life can be measured, and everything in life is measured. Each person who has ever lived has five Numbers on their arm, defining the five primary attributes of that person. Throughout someone's life, these will increase with time and effort, and all of society revolves around these Numbers.
What happens when this natural system of Numbers, the basis of all of society for all of history...changes? 
 
My first fiction, so I appreciate all reviews and feedback!

Title: Event Horizon
Synopsis: It's the turn of the 20th century and countries war technologies are getting better than ever. Some are eager to test them. Some are not. Can a single spark set a whole world ablaze?

Title: I'm not that kind of hero
Synopsis:
Since a long, long time ago. The gods from another world have been taking people from Earth and turning them a Hero. But sometimes, the heroes succeed with their mission and went back to Earth with extraordinary, if not, supernatural powers.
The cycle repeat and those heroes breed, sometimes with a normal human, and sometimes with another hero.
But what's it like to be the son of the most famous heroes of all time?
I think I know, but as I begin my own adventures after my parent leaving me and my two little sisters just for the sake of defeating demon lord from another world, I discover just how much of a challenge it really is to live up to the legend of the great Ranger and Alchemist. To make matter worse, as if it isn't enough dealing with the delegates from the Hero Guild and making sure that I already give my sisters their lunch money, I somehow begin to uncover a secret plot that could pit the normal human and the hero against each other in an all-out war.
But how can I know if my efforts are only helping the cause or working right into the plans of his enemies? Before I can know for sure, I have to learn the difference between being a hero and being the son of a hero.

Title: Death God's Adventure in Another World [Dropped]
Synopsis:
Feeling tired of the continuous and repetitive work of reaping souls and sending them to be reincarnated for countless millenias, the Death God decided to take a vacation for a few centuries.
"We never knew when did his legacy start, nor how it ended, but one thing is for sure, he was regarded as a hero, a saint, a demon lord, and death incarnate." - Excerpt from 'Biology of Unforgotten Existences'

Title: Wreath of Lilies, Cauldron of Poison
Synopsis:
Wang Tian Gu, the Tyrant who had massacred countless warrior in Jiang Hu for 600 years had died
Taking with him the Soul Reversing Sutra, one the Eight Treasures of Jiang Hu.
 
Through a whim of fate, he transmigrated into the body of a misfortunate girl in a world far different from his own.
This new world is ruled by the law of levels, status, and skills. Where heroes and demon lords are born to fight each other. Where beautiful women and handsome men fought for dominance. Where swords and magic clash in a firework of blood and steel.
However, other transmigrators had also planted their roots in this world, bringing with them the blessings and cheats of the gods and goddesses who favors them.
For them, this is a "Game".
For him, this is "Reality".
 
And now watch as the Heavenly Poison King raise havoc upon this world!
All for the sake of his Dao.
And everything...for the sake of revenge.

Title: Writing test
Synopsis:
So... It has come to my knowledge that I need a proper synopsis to post/save this so here goes a thing:
Someone dies, and what comes after seems to be like one of those myths of old where you are brought to the afterlife, except, this particular soul's afterlife doesn't seem like it will be comfortable, will it?
WARNING: I am only writing this because I want to see how long I can keep writing from here and I am only posting it in RR because I like the display. I advise you do not start reading it but if you do, know that I PROMISE NOTHING.

Title: Grand ascent
Synopsis:
A man in pits of despair was chosen. The Creator is expiring. Multiverse needs balance, and the source of it is the "golden middle", the epitome of perfection, which begin to vanish. Two tests are initiated, those who pass them will be judged by their worth. Those who fail will perish. What is right? What is wrong? Whims of Creator change lives of ants below, but what gives him the right to do so?
 
I am not native speaker, this is new attempt at writing. I don't know how often I will post new chapters, but one a week is a minimum. I do hope it will be enjoyable, any critical reviews welcome, since I don't have an editor to help.

Title: Reincarnated as Sentient Mist (someone's messed up their job….)
Synopsis:
This story is about an old man who dies and is sent to reincarnation in another world.  But of course, something goes wrong... Most stories would be pretty boring if nothing ever went wrong...
This story was made because since no one else has made a story on sentient mist, I thought I would give it a try.  So if you read this and feel inspired to write a story with mist as the main character, feel free. Just don't plagiarize and all that...
And if you do like my story, feel free to comment on what you liked, things I can improve on, and ideas you had that you want to see put into the story.
My update schedule isn't really definitive due to work and all that, and I'm my own editor.  So don't expect each chapter immediately. Thanks.

Title: Reincarnator
Synopsis:
Jon has an existence unlike any other, he lives his life any way he wants and when he dies he gets reincarnated into different universes.
Jon is just a name he chose for himself, he can't remember his real name as he's had so many.
He's lived thirteen previous lives and experienced many things.
Over his existence and reincarnations, he has found out three important things.
First, he gets a new power for every new life while keeping all of his previous ones.
Second, He has a Status Screen that is similar to a game and he can use this to see his Levels, Powers, Abilities, Skills, etc.
Lastly, The [System] will always give him an objective to complete if he completes it he gets an additional power of his choosing but if he fails then nothing happens.
After dying in his 13th life at the clutches of a dragon, he awakens again in the humanoid body as a familiar orange screen pops in front of his face.
================================================================================================
World: Real life version of the Supernatural TV Series
Your Name: Tenebris
Your Race: Prince of Hell
Your Reincarnation: Azazel, Ramiel, Dagon, and Asmodeus are the four original Princes of Hell but time will be changed so that Lucifer creates you. 
Your 14th Power: Darkness Manipulation
================================================================================================

Title: Not the Hero
Synopsis: Not everyone in a story is the hero, or the villain. Sometimes, though, side characters may just surprise you.

Title: Broken Kaleidoscopes
Synopsis:
What if someone told you that there were dimensions alongside ours? Innumerable and impossible to even fathom. That no normal man could ever hope to understand, or even find a way to peer across the everdistant parallels that pervade the multiverse? 
Now, what if that same person told you that there existed a race that lived outside all dimensions? A race so powerful that, instead of being forced to play along with the rules of your own dimension, they could rewrite all aspects of reality with only a thought. 
Of course, you would laugh at them. 
I did too. Then I broke reality the next day. 
Pictures are not mine.
 
Man Silhouette: https://clipground.com/male-silhouette-clipart.html
 
Universe: https://www.gazeta.ru/science/2017/03/28_a_10598741.shtml

Title: God of lies
Synopsis:
Waking up in the world he created, Hai Jingyi, an affectionate idiot, finds himself an all-powerful being able to bend anything to his will, but many people are after his power so faking his identity and having his inexplicable gifts passed off as the secret techniques the dead master of a fallen sect taught him, he takes the identity of a lost disciple and with the help of his once asexual now cut sleave bodyguard the all-powerful Tai Qiang, Hai Jingyi must keep up the charade for as long as possible while looking for a way home and simultaneously defeating his other creation the antagonist Hua Fang, the Demon Lord hell-bent on world domination!
the web has been spun now let’s keep it from unravelling.

Title: The Fool
Synopsis: I will make a synopsis soon

Title: Born an Iron
Synopsis:
His origin unkown and his talent, one of a prodegy, Julius is brought up by his master, one of the seven great Overlord sages, the sage of the glaive. 
Since his memory began all he knew were two words 'Pain' and 'Training', and only to make it harder, the expectation of taking his masters place as one of the Sages, he, Julius the one person in the world who was born as an Iron, his body type unkown but special.
As Julius searches for his origin will he find it? And if so what Path will he take, the one of pure vengence, or will he continue his masters path and wander for justice?
And when his Master mysteriusly disapears, what will he choose to do?
 
(Takes place in The Cradle World from the Cradle series by will wight, I may have buchered some of the places and made up a new setting, however, it still incudes remnants, dreadgods, and the cultivation/cycling ways.)
(The cover is an online picture of a glaive)

Title: Immortals: The Curse of Samsara
Synopsis:
For as long as Jason can remember, he has been a killer. Raised as a child soldier, he was trained in the arts of murder as a mercenary, an assassin, and a bodyguard. In short, his life was anything but dull. Yet his greatest wish was to live a normal life. Go to school, date a normal girl, have a moment to breathe and relax. His wish was to be a normal boy, no, a real boy and not some weapon. But his thirst for strength led him to the path of both the scientifically psychic world and the mystically supernatural world.
  One day, he is entrusted to protect a young girl whose entire family was murdered. Taking her as his sister, Jason tries to lead a life that's as normal as possible in the most technologically advanced city in the world, Sanctuary. However his newfound freedom is threatened when his past comes to haunt him, and his hunger to join the extraordinary life once more begins to consume him. As enemies from both the worlds of supernatural and science come crashing down upon him, Jason must make a choice, and choose which life he'd rather have. An uneventful, normal life. Or the life of the impossible, where dog eats dog, and only the strongest survive.
 
All rights to cover belong to ArtofLariz. (Link to art: Here & Here)
 
Warning: Contains violence, mutilation, swearing, and sexual scenes.
 
Authors Note: This novel is tagged as a harem, so expect multiple love interests and several fangirls ogling the MC.
