Title: Dungeon Life
Synopsis:
Look I'll level with you I have never finished a story like this and this is probably not the exeption. By all means though if that doesn't bother you then read on. Since I have actualy made a decent start of this I will be trying to get a chapter of about the same length out each Friday.
This is the tale of a man who died and got a second chance, not at the life he would have picked but one that might turn out to be interesting none the less.

Title: Harvest Factory ~ a Farmer Life
Synopsis:
A story about a boy with talents in both farming and cooking. Follow him in his journey of cultivating rare and legendary fauna and flora while cultivating his strength in the side.
" little brother, what's that thing you're eating? "" Jade Crocodile sausage. "" isn't that a rare beast only found in Azure Swamp?! how did you get it?! "" I raised it. "" what's that you're drinking? "" Golden Snow Pear juice. "" ..... did you raise it too? "" un. "

Title: Legends Inc.
Synopsis: Five teams, twenty gamers, one prize, one arena, all in an epic battle of life and death. How would they have ever imagined that they would end up in a clash to save their lives? Kill or be killed. They thought it was just a game but now they have been summoned by the game masters. Will they survive this epic battle? One thing is for sure Legends Incorporated will never be the same again. Find out what happened IF YOU DARE!

Title: Descent
Synopsis:
November 20, 2019, humanity is faced with an unspeakable calamity heralded by origins unknown. Demoted to mere prey and faced with threats from all sides, humanity is forced to hide away in enclaves on the surface and a vast network of stations and tunnels underground. 
However, the dawn of the apocolaypse saw the humans given an unexpected boon: supernatural powers of unbounded potential, which are used to stave off the horrors knocking at their door step. Granted to them by mysterious, intangible entities only known as the "System" and the "Patrons", a powerful group whose intentions are unknown.
Admist the chaos, Justin, a university student with questionable social intelligence is kidnapped forced to fend for himself. And despite all the horrors that want to eat him for dessert occupying every corner of the planet earth, Justin knows that one thing is certain. The most dangerous, conniving, and volitile creature, is his fellow man.

Title: A D-rank Adventurer's Bizarre Reincarnation
Synopsis:
In the Farcol Wastelands of Estellia Kingdom, a D-rank adventurer Ezio Walhein was killed by an S-rank dragon after stealing its precious divine artifact.
And in the Golden Dragon Sect's herb garden, a level 3 Mortal Realm Cultivator named Zheng Jin is slowly dying from his mortal wounds.
A wish to the heavens was made, and the multiverse's reincarnation wheel was disrupted.
Ezio, now inhabiting Zheng Jin's body, must survive in a completely different and unforgiving world, where the weak are prey for the strong!
Follow Ezio as he fights and schemes his way to his and Zheng Jin's dream—being the one above all!
°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°
For questions regarding the fiction or if you're just bored, chill out with us at this Discord server.

Title: A World that Operates Off Belief
Synopsis: How do you know what's true and untrue, the difference between right and wrong, that the sun is going to rise in the east.

Title: Earth's Guardian
Synopsis:
Thaddeus Khan’s life is perfect; good grades, good friends, and budding football career. It’s Freshmen year in college, and he is an unexpected walk-on in a major D1 school. He coasts through his daily life, working hard to fit into a suffocating campus and working even harder to overcome his high metabolism to finally become a better player. Life had other plans though, selected as the first of five hundred “guardians” of Earth, Thaddeus has to not only protect his city but also guide new guardians. Life was so much easier when the only thing he had to worry about was playing time.
Disclaimer:
Earth's Guardian will be very different from my other works, which were frankly quite disgusting and basic in nature. Those were written when I was still a freshman in high school, and I hope ya'll don't judge this work because of it. There will still be sex and gore but much better written and not just because.

Title: The Life and (Un)Death of a Dark Elf
Synopsis: Travelling around the world, the dark elf Rikdah Dinorin faces incredible adventures. He's been exiled from his homelands and has become a warlock under the patronage of a powerful demon. This entity from another realm of existence gives him a task. And exactly this quest sets in motion events that change Rikdah and the world forever

Title: The Starborne Legacy
Synopsis:
Markovious Celestine, Former United States Marine Corps Staff Sergeant and now current Retiree is enjoying his much-earned retirement, after nearly two decades of service and multiple Combat Deployments, in the mountains of Maine when the unexpected happens.Now, after all his service to his country, he's forced to take up arms once again in an adventure that'll be out of this world. Follow him as he makes friends, enemies and of course lovers from places completely unexpected.

Probably the best Synopsis you'll get out of me at the moment. Not very good with these things.While this is technically my second fiction, they're both just recently started and nowhere near complete. I just so happened to be listening to an audiobook that took this same concept and then crapped on it when I had this idea.Same as always though, I'm open to CONSTRUCTIVE criticism if you have any, otherwise please let me know what's on your mind and enjoy!-Cookie

Title: A chaotic Flicker
Synopsis:
A simple introduction really, My name is Leon a human of Earth... Tragic events took place in my life, involving murder, violence, gangs, rape, and drugs. I was in the center of it all, forced to partake in my fathers so-called family. I've grown cold and numb, the power to make amends that power I will grasp if it shall come forth...
 
[Welcome Leon]
[Activating Godly Power]
[Unkown variable discoverd]
[Aquiring Upgraded divine spark]
[Aquired Primal Chaos]
[Welcome to the world of Holt]
[Would you like to see the tutorial Yes/No]
I selected yes...
 
[Authors note: A simple story to play around with if you wish to read it by all means enjoy, if you don't like it, by all means, drop the book and leave. This is a simple story to help improve my writing skills to ease my boredom and maybe entertain others in the process! The first chapter or the prologue/ tutorial chapter will not be, long by any means just a simple walkthrough of what this story will be about and the real chapters will be longer depending on how I feel and if I have the time. That is all for now Cya!]

Title: Welcome To Pangea
Synopsis:
A young man at the age of 17 ripped through space and time to an unkown world, filled with monsters and magic.
With piercing eyes with determination shining through he swears to not only himself, but even to the gods that he will do whatever it takes to get home.
This is a story adapted from a short story assignment im doing at school, stick in for the ride of a life time!

Title: Save Point: Reload (Book 2)
Synopsis:
Adam is right back where he started. The Citadel spat him out, and he's arrived at his first Save Point.
Are things better? Maybe. Maybe not. He's still got stage IV brain cancer, and once he makes it back into the litRPG world of the Citadel he has even more problems than he did the first time around. One of his companions broke the rules during the fight with the Evvex, and Adam's got to make things right. Doing so means mentoring another race in a dispute that will decide the fight of a planet he's never heard of and will never visit.
Can Adam forge a viable team from the two sides of his Faction and save someone else's world?
Maybe. Maybe not...
(Author Note: This is the second book, and the events immidiately follow on from the finale of book 1. If you're interested, Save Point: Upload is on Kindle Unlimited. Book 2 will remain on Royal Road for a short time. I'm posting it here to fulfill a promise I made to readers of the first one, many of whom discovered it here and were hoping to read the second book on RR as well. Read fast, because I'll probably have to take it down in a couple of weeks when it goes live on Amazon.
If you're interested in reading the final version, join my newsletter and I'll send you a free copy once it's been polished and sent to the editor!)

Title: Fate: New Game+
Synopsis:
The final bid for survival.
Humanity was pushed to its limits in the face of The Game.
Was it the will of the heavens? A sick form of amusement of the Gods? They didn't know, but they would not go down without a fight.
The greatest of humanity united.
A plan was crafted. Decades in the making. A trick against Divine Providence itself. If they were fated to lose, if the game was unfair, then they would just have to change that, won't they? 
A flipped board, a changed history, how things will go not even the Heavens knew anymore.
Only one thing was certain.
Humanity hasn't given up.
They will not go gently into the night

Title: The Pronoun game
Synopsis: A not-so daily life of a weird teenager with a bit of mental problems. Don't expect the most out of her since she will probably disapoint you.

Title: Camp Cadaver
Synopsis:
Smores, canoeing, games, and…death?
For over fifty years, Camp Courage has been a refuge for troubled teens. Hailing from ever corner of the United States, thousands of teens have had their lives changed for the better thanks to the efforts of Camp Courage. At least, that’s what the brochures say.
Carmina is the poster child of someone in need of Camp Courage. She’s a belligerent high-school dropout who’s only goal in life is to party as much as possible. But when Carmina attempts to rob a department store, her mother decides it’s the last straw. After much fruitless protesting, Carmina is shipped off to Camp Venture. She believes her summer is going to consist of strict counselors and lots of fake repentance for her sins.
She couldn’t be more wrong.
War changes everything. Unbeknownst to the campers and their families, Camp Courage has been warped into an experimental research lab run by an organization calling themselves the Greater Good. The ultimate goal of the Greater Good is to create human superweapons capable of winning the war for America. And the campers? They’re the test dummies.

Title: The Secrets of Jean-Baptiste
Synopsis:
Art's new job seems like a dream come true - until the suspicious behaviors and activities of his new boss make him question if he's in danger.
Amid deception, secrets, and a budding romance, there is one thing Art knows for certain.
Something wrong with Jean-Baptiste.

Title: Super Science & Fast Romance
Synopsis:
A super-intelligence is only limited by its ambition. If you could do anything, what would you do?
Megacles has a pretty good life. Also, she's horny, lonely, bored, anxious, and a bit of a drunk. She decides to fix all that with science. It works okay, until she accidentally builds a doomsday device. At least she’s not bored anymore.
This is a simple tale of love, hope, sex, rejection, revenge, secrets, extortion, thievery, dead billionaires, killer robots, space monkeys, mind control, superhot lasers, god-like power, and the destruction of the Earth.  And drugs. Almost forgot the drugs.
Check out the reviews - people like it, maybe you will too.  Or just read Chapter 1.  It's a good example of the book.  If you like it, you're good to go.
NOTE - There is a newer version of this book that can be found here - Very Yummy Poison 
Cover Photo by Jean Fan (JFotography.net)

Title: The Wolf's Progeny
Synopsis:
While the inheritor of a primordial power fights an endless war with the Elder, ancient beings whose origins predate existence itself, his children are sent out into the world in order to grow.
The sequel to The Void Wolf.
...
A/N: Reading The Void Wolf won't be necessary to understand the story but it may help.

Title: The Aligned Path
Synopsis:
Within the world of Aebros a higher being sees creation inevitably move toward some form of destruction, and from this greater sight a grand plan begins to unfold. Manipulating the natural cycle the being provided Aebros' residents a chance to not only wield but also fight against destiny, and the remaining forces of duality. 
This is a project that is subject to changes, which I will keep you updated on. 
Cover picture is not mine.

Title: Shadows Volume 1
Synopsis:
What is a shadow? According to science a shadow is a dark area or shape produced by a body coming between rays of light and a surface, but I believe shadows represent something much more. That brings you to my story, when I was 13 both sets of my grandparents died. By the next year one of my uncles, an aunt and 2 cousins had also passed away. When I had turned just barely turned 17 both my parents passed in a sudden car crash. This is the story of my Tragedy Life.
Join main protagonist Kirito Kawaguchi in his story of Life, Death, Love, Hate and most important Tregedy in Volume 1 of Shaows.

Title: Pangea: A New World
Synopsis:
What is the system? What is its purpose? Who made it? All three are questions that have been debated throughout the ages, and yet to date the answers remain unfound. However, some irrefutable fact exists. The system expands, grows and enables. The system seeks to expand its reach, grow its influence and enable those under it to flourish.
A Beginners Guide to the System, Germain Fitzgerald
This is a story not of the system but of an individual who suffers, flourishes and ultimately evolves under its influence. Follow the growth of Jacob Lockerby from a normal teenager granted access to a world of his dreams and watch as this previously ordinary individual becomes extraordinary. Herein lies the tale of he who would become a legend.
 
Update Scehdule:
Every Sunday 10pm GMT.
I appreciate this is a rather slow schedule but this is my first attempt writing and I am doing this for fun while trying to juggle my final university year workload with writing this. I hope you stick with the story and feel the chapters are worth the wait. Lastly just a shameless beg but please do rate and comment, feedback is always welcome and will help me improve my writing.

Title: A Super Robot Story
Synopsis: Betrayal is a bitter pill to swallow, especially from a friend. After the loss of his passionate career, Lyle turns to virtual entertainment for solace. But things get weird when an azure phenomenon turns the game from mere escapism to a true world of mech combat.Thrust into a body native to the new universe, there are no easy decisions on the path marred by secrets and an old personal conflict. Still, what kind of mecha fan would complain about details in a world where their dreams walk the earth?

Title: The otaku system
Synopsis: This is a simple story about a boy with an anime system

Title: RWBY: Rewritten
Synopsis:
Author´s Note: I've been a fan of the RWBY series for a long time now, and saw on how it changed thoughout the years. This story is just my little take of how I wanted things to turn out. This is more or less fanfiction, so bear with me.
Also I do not own any of the characters or artwork. All respective artwork I use belong to their owners. A lot of the characters, Lore, History, Locations, and Magic System will also be different from the original RWBY series.
The world of Remnant is not as it used to be, The great Empire of Vale had fallen into such a weakened state due to internal conflict. The three great neighboring kingdoms: Mystral, Atlas, and Mantle, saw the weakness behind the Empire's walls, and disaster soon fell. War broke, with the three great kingdoms forming an alliance to defeat the Empire of Vale. 
After the great war, the world was in ruin. Mysterious creatures known as the Grimm started to emerge, the once bountiful magic the world once had was now gone, and even the moon was shattered by some mystic force.
Generations after, Civilization had started to rebuild itself in the East, with the three great kingdoms as its foundation. But the lands to the West have become infested with Grimm, and no normal human would dare travel to those lands.
Civilization soon felt threat near the borders, new religions soon came about, new fighting styles, new power sources known as Dust became more prevalent, as well as the manifestation of Aura and Semblances. This was also the time in where mutations would occur in children from being exposed to the Grimm, and these children were called the Faun.
A promising huntress, the young Ruby Rose, after the death of her mother and graduating the Signal Combat School, she now heads off to Beacon Academy to become an official huntress and to explore the lands to the west.
Jaune Arc, a swordsman with a legacy to to uphold, enters Beacon Academy in order to gain power and reclaim the lands he lost to the creatures of Grimm long ago.
Their skills, as well as their friend's will be tested, as they will soon discover the secrets of the old world we now know as Remnant.
Another Note: This story was heavily inspired by This Video, go check it out!

Title: How to save the world in style
Synopsis: In modern society, one man wants to live his life with a sustainable livelihood, a nice apartment with a good view, and a never-ending supply of cup ramen. He first needs to graduate, though. And also, the world doesn't seem to allow it with all of the problems that it throws at him.

Title: Hall of Fame
Synopsis:
The ancient mages disappeared during a dreadful war, taking along with them their extensive knowledge of magic, therefore causing the whole world to experience a decline. The Dark Age continued for almost a thousand years before the civilisation was finally able to rise again. Alas, some things are never meant to be…
 
Rath Helenos, born into an aristocrat family, is sent to train at Prediaf Academy, a prestigious training ground in the Kingdom of Viltheous. Much to his family’s chagrin however, Rath harbours no ambition of becoming a mage, despite possessing a stunning aptitude for magic. However, a string of events force him to glimpse into the secrets of the past, leading him to question his own morality. As Rath treads between the line of good and evil, he’d find his friendships and loyalties being tested.**********************************
 
Desclaimer: I do not own the cover.

Title: Branch Adventurers Guild [Dropped]
Synopsis:
My life is but a code waiting to be decoded. With numbers and letters, I will protect earth with my creation...I will tame those that wish to oppose me, destroy those that hurt my family and erase anyone who angers me!
-
Dropped due to losing interest in this novel, I added too many things without any substance to support it.
Might update in the future but from now, I will work on a new novel.

Title: He Had To Let Go
Synopsis: Inspiration came from both the song "Without Her" by James Barbour" and James' version of the song "If Dreams Came True" from the soundtrack of the Broadway version of Charles Dickens' novel "A Tale Of Two Cities."

Title: I'm Just A Summoner
Synopsis:
What is the wish of all gamers? It's to live in an RPG world, where they can fight monsters and become the strongest. Conquer the lands and be a hero.
This wish comes true for our protagonist Dan Stryker. Dan a sixteen year old youth dies while saving a little girl. He meets God in the afterlife and gets to know he was being given a second chance. Not wanting to die again he chose to train to be the strongest, only then would he have a chance to reach the peak of the world and become immortal.
Follow Dan as he uses his God given abilities and walks on the path to be the strongest in Aria, a world of myth and magic. The land of fantasy, where levels and classes, monsters and dungeons are all common knowledge.

Title: I'll be happy as a monster
Synopsis:
The MC lived alone for 25 years. 
 
No family, no lover, no friend. 
He lived all alone in his abandoned apartment. 
 
But it all change when he died because of an accident.
 
His soul was reincarnated as a monster by a god and transferred to a different world.
 
The MC determined to live happily as a monster in the different world.

Title: Los
Synopsis:
Portals have opened throughout the world, their depths containing untold wonders. There are those who plumb the Deeps searching for treasure, Skills, or even Spells. These people are Delvers, the elite of Earth who come from the most common origins to the highest echlons of power. The world is witnessing the rise of those who are more than human, their actions, words, and deeds becoming legends that will be passed down through the Ages.

Unfortunately, Eve Smith missed out on all that fun since she was transported away from Earth right as the portals opened.

Title: The Mage of Calamities
Synopsis:
A young man was ripped out of his world and summoned to another one. Meeting with a god and Cheat-Ability included. Pretty standard to this point. However, do not despair, because this is not his story. This is the story of his summoner and his humorous quest to spell doom to the world.
 
I am German so do not expect perfect grammar. Commas and me loath each other especially. Tell me about the errors you find (I know there will be some) down in the comments of the chapter and I will do my best to correct them.
I need about double the time to write something in English, than I need to do it in German, so the releases will be slow. I got no schedule and will probably never create one.
Image is not mine.

Title: A Gun in a Dungeon
Synopsis:
Ashé Crow stumbles upon the City of Agartha, The City with a Dungeon filled with monsters, adventuring is a full-time job, and killing monsters earns you money.
Born with the peculiar trait of natural curiosity and his wits. He is borderline obsessed with creating a weapon that would help him uncover the dark mysteries of the Dungeon itself.
If there's no rules about how to kill the monstrosities that dwell on the bottom pits, then inventing a gun would be a good idea, right?

Title: One Sorry Calamarie
Synopsis:
A little squid is born into a cruel world.
Surviving in a world made out of water should be easy, right?
No, it isn't. But in a cruel world, chances exist, chances to survive and become stronger.

Title: Ring of Supremacy
Synopsis:
Long ago, twelve rings were made by the heavenly order of gods. The rings were entrusted to the human race. This caused uproar among the demon clans throughout lilara(their planet). The demon god forged one ring called the Ring of Supremacy. The Ring of Supremacy was said to be stronger than the twelve rings of power combined. 
This story starts out with a guy(Percy) and his friend(Emilia). After Emilia finds the ring of control she and Percy leaves the academy for their own safety.

Title: TAG Princess
Synopsis:
Follow a whimsical dungeon, pretending to be a human. It will live a not so ordinary life and will experience many situations that range from light-hearted and adventurous to serious and dramatic. 

+ Action tag, + Romance tag, + Horror tag, +  Tragedy, + more tags to come!
Gore warning is very mild~~been warned enough?~~

Writer here! Trying to write a light-hearted novel for march madness. I plan to hit as many tags on royal road as possible.
Try it out and enjoy! 
I'll add tags as I go, if you think I'm missing one, scream at me in the comments, please.

Title: Hunters Dream Online: Ascension
Synopsis: With his chance to join the world's first VR MMORPG, Robin takes the class of necromancer in a world of constant conflict. Facing off against gods, monsters and other players. Will he be able to stay the tide of destruction and save the village he swore to protect or will Ignis and his guild prevail and lay waste to the land? Join Robin, his undead companion Charon, and his friends as they take on the world and other players! Dungeons, pvp tournaments, large scale battles, and a deer leasing agent named Chester. This, is the Hunter’s Dream.

Title: A Mailman as a Superhero
Synopsis:
The world changed in less than an hour.
Across the world people, animals and plants changed, evolved. Some say for the better. Others say for the worse. Some are waiting for the other shoe to drop.
They will tell you "There's no such thing as a free lunch."
For Rene Wilder it's just another day delivering the mail in the world's coldest capital.

Title: The World of Drearie
Synopsis: As this is a story I am writing on a whim, I have not planned out most of it, no synopsis for now.

Title: Aberrant
Synopsis:
In a world torn apart by natural disasters, the human race now struggles to survive in a world where modern commodities have become non-existant. Strange and dangerous beasts roam the land. With no rule of law many have turned against each other, bringing about endless bloodshed. In this new world, the once persecuted metahumans, known commonly as aberrants, have become feared existances.
David, a young aberrant from a now annihilated people, lives his life constantly on the run, trying his best to protect what little he hold's dear. Even so, in a cruel world ruled by strength he is inevitably thrown into the middle of a struggle between unknown and terrifying powers. Accepting the invitation of one such individual, an odd and deadly aberrant named Feng, David sets out on a mission to take veangeance on those who destroyed everything he holds dear.
Caleb is a boy with no memory of his past. He has spent his life since waking up constantly at death door, doing his best to survive in a world that wants to kill him. just as he begins to accept his unending solitude, he meets a man who offers him the one thing he's always wished for, acceptance. However, the price of this is a dark path of blood and death, as well as a frightening feeling within himself. One that makes him believe he has secretly yearned for it.
Both boys have ventured onto dangerous paths. Paths that have the potential to shift the power balance in this new world. What kind of fate awaits them? What will happen when their fates collide?

Title: Token
Synopsis: Token is a web serial about four friends who find themselves playing through simulated board games in real life.  Whether they want to play or not, it is not their choice, and whoever loses a game gets… re-balanced.  Will they conquer this mystery before losing themselves completely?

Title: Great Ascension to Godhood
Synopsis:
To all readers, I will be taking a break to start up a new project. I may or may not continue this novel so just informing the loyal ones. Thank you for your support!
Living in the year 32xx, the Great Speech is a thing of the past. Using genetic manipulation to colonize on numerous planets, it's an era where the human race reigns supreme. But there is only one thing unknown and unexplored — the Oblivion Gates.Brigan Heartforce, who happens to be an average youth is soon forced to venture one of these strange portals. Within the gates, he will realize that the myth to become Ruler of Mortals was never false in the first place.Read as he takes the realms and planets by storm, all the while attaining a place above the masses — a throne fitting a god.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.WARNING!,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.[IF YOU ARE UNABLE TO HANDLE SUSPENSE, THIS IS NOT A STORY FOR YOU.],.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.Release Schedule - 6:00am Eastern Time (GMT-4)Release Frequency - 1 Chapter DailyWord Count Per Chapter - 1000~2000Story Support - https://paypal.me/Reading0Books,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.

Title: Tom Sawyer, Space Lawyer
Synopsis:
Can an invading alien armada navigate Earth's complex legal system?
Obviously. They have great big guns. Of course.
...Right?

Title: DISCONTINUED
Synopsis: probably not because I'm taking it down so I can publish it. :P

Title: The Records of Eternity: Inheritance of the Sage
Synopsis:
Ceceania von Rees, the once sickly girl now couldn't be healthier after having studied under the Great Sage Lan Yueliang. Now she begins her school life in the Capital of Coruve, the Royal Coruve Magic Academy. Unfortunately for Ceceania, she spent a little too much time obtaining her master's inheritance and not enough time learning proper conduct for a noble, her troubles don't end here though. The Kingdom of Coruve holds heavy importance on magic spending large portions of its budget training mages and Ceceania's master, Lan Yueliang, is not a mage but rather an expert cultivator from the east.
Join the two(one?) in their school life and other adventures they embark on.
 
This is the third instalment of the Records of Eternity series following The Traveller of Worlds (the first has yet to see public eye).
This will not get as frequent updates as Traveller as that is my main focus. This is however subject to change if this is popular enough, in which case I will switch focus from Traveller to Sage.

Title: Alpha King's Witch Queen
Synopsis:
Anuja(20 yrs old):Lost her parents.Abandoned by others.Living alone in this big world in a small cottage. Her only support to her loneliness are her few Mermaid friends.Her only mean of earning is through her medicinal herbs and by working as a helper to an old lady.Still she considers herself a happy person always thinking about the lives of people below her.
Ryan(22 yrs old):King of all Alpha's and supernatural beingsPopularly known as "The Devil Lord"Having half werewolf blood.Living in his own different world created by him through his constant hard work hidden in a completely different realm.He oozes confidence, elegance and power.He believes in treating anyone and everyone in the way they treat others , believing in equality.Waiting for his mate for last 200 yrs .Oblivious to the fact that she lives in a complete different world to his of extravagence, comfort and royalness.
Even after visiting the other realm to search her never being able to find her making him lose all hope and immersing himself in his work of welfare of his people.
What happen when one day by mistake Anuja finds this hidden realm???
Unknown of her true powersUnknown of true lineageUnknown of her other half her mate
Unknown to her destiny
Will independent but shy Anuja accept her all possessive Alpha King of all ???!!
Let's go together with Anuja to her journey to find her true identity through hardships and tough times , through life and death , through love and hatred.
Cover picture belongs to it's respective owners.It doesn't belong to me.

Title: The Hard Way
Synopsis: Felix BrightStar is an ambitious, aspiring adventurer who has only just begun his story. With little more than determination behind him, he is set on establishing a name for himself, a fact made harder by being the only child of a legendary hero.

Title: The Plan
Synopsis:
As Crystal is on the run with her two kids to protect them from the man she married. She finds out more about the man she thought she lost and is still deeply in love with. As Jonathan vows to protect her and his family from Lucas no matter what the cost is.
I do not own this picture if the owner of it wants me to remove it they should message me.

Title: Eternal Infinite Chaos – Three Calamities
Synopsis:
One day the one who sit on the summit of everything got bored, and since there was no good entertainment in the last millenniums, he decided to play a game while doing his job at the same time. He seriously prepared this game for a long time so that he could enjoy seeing the best results possible.
This how the game, that brought the destruction of countless realms, that brought Doomsday to the void, that created The Three calamities, began.
This is my first work and also the beginning of the “Eternal Infinite Chaos” series, so please take care of me. Also, this synopsis can change latter on. and please visit our site ” https://teamdreamless.com ” to suport us. And in the site there will be always more chapters. Thanks -Ouroboros Infeos

Title: Black Hope
Synopsis: A short story about Adam and the events that have changed his destiny ..

Title: Ouroboros Online  Book 1
Synopsis: After a car crash, Jim Roark has been placed on life-support assisted by a game interface.  In theory, to help him recover from the resulting coma.  He soon learns that his introduction to Ouroboros Online was no accident.  He doesn't have the luxury of respawning like most players, because the game owners have an agenda of their own.  With the help of the mysterious Oracle, Jim will have to beat the odds, because his enemies won't play by the rules.  Unfortunately for them, Jim isn't the average player...

Title: A Flip of a Coin
Synopsis: Three years ago, I wrote two chapters to a story I thought would never go anywhere. It didn't, but I recently talked about it with a friend. It was great to reminisce where I was then. I'm about to go off to college, and my schedule might get busy soon, but I love to write, so here we are.A world is in a perpetual state of balance, and the gods have turned it into a spectator sport while the universe behind them crumbles. The few not enamored with it hatch a plan to fix it. This is a story chosen by true randomness. A collection of dice and coins will be used to determine what happens, until the end.

Synopsis: In this world where the strong rule the weak, a man, betrayed by the person he trusted is reborn as an infant.

Title: Predetermined Power
Synopsis:
Power. 
The highest goal a person can seek. Something so vast, so vague, but at one time or another, everyone has wanted it. That nigh unattainable desire, which is forever reached for. When does one stop reaching for power, and more importantly, when have you gone too far?

Whether it be exploring dungeons dozens of miles deep into the earth, swindeling royalty, and hunting enormous beasts, they'll do what it takes to sleep another night. 
 
Updated weekly, with potential sporadic updates in between!

Title: Hive Evolution
Synopsis:
Eren, an ordinary college student, was simply trying to get finish his major and get out of the small town he lived in. Maybe find love while at it? Unfortunately, his plans come to a sudden stop from what he expected. It's all because of the truck isn't it...
He is transported to an alien world filled with monsters that would just as quickly take his life as they would take a nap on a rainy day. Fortunately, his... er rather her new body and powers might be what she needs for her and the hive to adapt and survive.
 
Note #1: This story is indeed gender bender, in case you missed the synopsis or the tags.
Note #2: Well, I really enjoyed another story on this site that inspired me to write this one. It's called "I don't want to be the Hive Queen" by ValetheHowl. While it might seem similar to ValetheHowl's story, I do plan to diverge in a significantly different direction. Well, this story is also kind of inspired by Starcraft 1 and 2 in case you happen to notice any similarites.
Note #3: The picture isn't mine either... If the original artist happens to see this and wants me to take it down, please pm me, and I'll remove it as soon as I can.

Title: I Was Reincarnated as Someone's Mana??
Synopsis:
My name is Magnus Karlsson, and by a series of rather unfortunate events that I had absolutely no say in, I was killed and reincarnated.
In this story, you will follow Magnus as he tries his very best to survive in a world that's been thrown into chaos, together with the man whose mana he is, Allan Woodsworth. Well, not a man per se, more of a little boy who has no idea what the fuck is going on, but, you know... I'm sure it'll be fine. Nothing bad will happen to the pair. Nope. No abandoned kids here.
Anyhow. 
The world that Magnus has been thrown into is one perversed by the will of a great mage who, three thousand years ago, decided that it would be a great idea to infuse all the people of the earth with so-called "orbs". These magical crystals allow their handler to control and generate mana, which they can then use to become mages. Most barely use them, since the mana cost of doing such a little thing as a fireball spell is absolutely ridiculous. Said mage, Theodore Cromwell, Magnus used his resources to infuse not only humans with orbs, but animals as well, giving rise to what the mage community calls "horrid perversions of nature", but what the common folk calls "monsters". Orbs can be used for much, and it is through orbs that people keep track on their level of mana and such, and destroying the orb of a monster is A, the only way to kill it and B, a good way to absorb extra mana and raise ones level. 
It is such an orb that Magnus has been tranformed into.
 
 
------
To those that care, I'm very sorry about the title, it's just that, well, it's very good to be blunt about isekais like this since people such as myself search precisely for this, so having super-serious names like "The Magnus of the World of Orbs" would turn people wanting a simple and fun isekai off. 
I hope you give this story a fair chance!
------
Edit: IWRASM now has a deviantart page!!!
https://www.deviantart.com/thefunartcorner

Title: I Own A Dungeon
Synopsis: This is the story of a youth named Alex, who owned a dungeon, becoming the frst ever 'Dungeon Master' from the human race. After this carefree young master decides to reach the peak of his world, along with the humanoid dungeon core, Lucy, who can keep him away from his destiny as he journeys forward uncovering the mysteries behind dungeons and enhances the strength of both his dungeon and himself. Watch the rise of a youth who only cares about things and people that could be described through the word 'My', as he conquers other dungeons and defeats dungeon masters and goes on to establish his own empire.

Title: To Know the Name We Lost (LitRPG/Fantasy)
Synopsis:
Immortality. Forging Abhorrent Weapons. Celestial Alchemy. The power to effortlessly destroy entire worlds. For a group of mortals, who died, being offered all of these at the low - basically free - price of their Name is like a dream come true. Until they figure out that they were right... if the dream was a nightmare. If they die they respawn, but do they really have to die every day? That is unreasonable! But when it turns out that their name was related to their entire mortal existence and their memories are fading, they begin to wonder if the only true death they will ever experience is ceasing to exist as the humans they once were. Unable to die and unable to remember what made them human, is this what remains of their afterlife?
Ae, the protagonist, is not ready to give up just yet; if he could just become more powerful then surely he would find the solution! However, that is where the End of All Things patiently waits for someone foolish enough to reach out to it.

Title: Assassination Highschool
Synopsis: An Ordinary Highschool Student, Mikazuki Subaru, was forced to go to an Assassination Highschool, by his father, which led to him meeting extraordinary friends and being able to get his motor skills back, and becoming much stronger than before.

Title: New life in AOT(Attack On Titan) World

Title: My Youth love is a HAREM!!

Title: This New World
Synopsis:
It all began on a dark and stormy night, with the clouds pitch black and the rain practically hail. This weather was quite unusual in the land of Bulwark, where the worst storms would only be light grey and the rain would be light and misty. It was on this day that the hero, called Doctor Magus, was born.
Join main protagonist Alexander Smith as he is thrown into a world of Magic, Monsters and Mayham in volume one of This New World.

Title: The General Core {The Sphere}
Synopsis:
The life cycle in the Sphere is on the brink of collapse because one of its elements, the Dungeons, have been exploited too much by the mortals.
The group who created the Sphere already tried and failed with several modifications, because the original computer-like dungeon cores are too inflexible to handle changing approaches. So they try another type of solution – taking souls from other worlds to try to find a solution before the Sphere Cycle breaks down completely.
The General was one of the best soldiers of his world, rising from the ranks of a private through Officer School to the highest command with honors. But when his world faced a zombie apocalypse, even that was not enough and he had to make the ultimate sacrifice.
Now he is asked for a repeat performance of planning and controlling a dungeon and its spawns in a world that he knows nothing about…
 
But what is the Sphere really? What is that [Xenotic conversion] he has to go through to even enter the Sphere? Something is really strange and he will have to find out what is going on to get to his promised rewards – whatever they will be.
 
Being a soul in a dungeon core means that the General has better chances of finding hints to the truth about the sphere – a knowledge that would help him survive. And no, the sphere is NOT a virtual reality – the key to its secrets is the place where it was physically constructed (Author’s hint).
 
This is a dungeon core story - but there are quite a number of things that I will do differently than common to those stories.
1) I will describe the floors when they are explored, NOT when they are build.
Yes, that will mean it will take longer to get to those parts - but I think describing floors both when they are build and when they are explored destroys quite a lot of chances for suspense when adventurers enter the dungeon. After all, if you as the reader already know where the traps are, then you can't really be surprised when the surfacers encounter them.
2) How the world works (and how not) is an integral part of the story, so it will be explained
I'm a world-builder first and the Sphere is NOT a regular world (as hinted in the synopsis above). Things will work differently than in your 08/15 default dungeon core stories - as the General and Gunny have already learned in the second arc (and more of that is already scheduled for the next weeks (July/Aug 2019) when the Sky Arrows continue to explore and evaluate that strange dungeon)
If you don't like these premises, then I'm sure you'll find a lot of other Dungeon Core stories more to your liking. But if you are interested in more than "Dungeon builds another room and corridor in medieval earth" and are not afraid of a longer and slower story, then go on.
 
I have two more stories in the Sphere, although they both have lower priority than this one:
Shaleen the Wanderer (Adventurer, NSFW) (currently on hold after some chapters)
Info's on the Sphere (System Docu and Short Stories) (irregular updates when needed)

Current Status reports have been moved to a new discord server:

Title: LIve
Synopsis:
The bell rang cutting our teacher off in mid-sentence, and I began stuffing my books and papers into my book bag. I moved with a sense of urgency, as if somehow the clock might change its hand if I dallied. “We’ll pick up where we left off on tuesday.” My psychology teacher Mr. Snell called out. “Everyone please read pages 240 to 280 in the text. Don't work too hard!” The last part he said with a smile, knowing the likelihood of anyone actually reading the pages was almost zero. Besides not working too hard was advice he planned on taking, he was headed into his backwoods to go fishing as soon as everyone left.  “So Nova are you going to come, or no?” My best friend Deku Midoriya asked me with a lopsided grin on his face. “You know you want to.” Me being a scrawny, white haired 10th grader who had little interest in magic and other fictional fantasies said “No, I really don't want to. The idea of playing a LARP(LIve Action Roleplaying game) while being dressing up as wizards, and sleeping out in the woods does not seem even remotely fun.” After further thought I said ¨Fine Deku I´ll go¨. That responce marked the beginning of a very long journey that would span through not just one world but two.
Join main protagonist Nova Sonic on his journey through Alfhiem the game of death in Volume 1 of Live.

Title: KING - HIATUS
Synopsis:
Valentia Academy for the Gifted; the top school in the country known for educating the strongest individuals to exist.
Gifteds are humans with combat powers in the form of spirit weapons. These individuals are rare in society, only ten percent meeting the criteria as powers are passed down by blood [upper-class] and luck. Among these individuals, less than zero point one percent pass the first stage. 
One day, to everyone's surprise, a non-gifted aces the admission test with perfect scores: both in combat and academics. With his charming looks, white hair, and childish personality, nobody could understand how he passed the firm doors. Who is this person? Where did they suddenly come from? And what is their purpose for coming into the school? 
And perhaps, there is more than what meets the eye.
 
The cover photo is not mine. All rights reserved to the anime. I found it on pinterest. Thank you.

Title: The Helmet Hero.../villian
Synopsis:
A man in a white tank top and blue jeans sits in his little shop waiting for his next customer. He inspects his wares, he usually sells submachine guns with other small handguns and weapons. Recently though he recieved some money from a friend. 2,000 dollars to be exact. He used it to make some bigger investments to his store, he was on his way to becoming one of the best gun stores in the U.S.A.! Thats when a local gangmember stormed into his shop with a handgun. The bastard had wanted to grab all his best guns and run for it! Prick! The man reaches for the handgun stored under his desk in case of emergencies, but the gangster notices and panics. He raises his gun and... Unfortunatley this was the end for a promising youth just starting on his road to fame. 
In this world.
I woke up to see an empty space as far as the eye can see in all directions. and a beefy (yet stubby) little man staring at me. 
"I like you. I think I'll revive you this time... Finally I get to revive someone I actually like!"
"what?"
Then he was gone, and so was the white space. Now there was only suffocating dark.
I start falling.
and falling
and falling
*crash!*
"oww!"
"wait why doesnt it hurt? ... And why do I feel so heavy?"

Synopsis:
Evolution-based StarCraft story with game-like elements.
Everyone gets a good cheat-like system with a well-designed UI and player-friendly AI companion. I get this broken piece of shit Alpha version. Not to mention, that starting at the very bottom is not that fun. Oh well, let's hope things get better later.
Warning - If you read this now, you will be essentially a beta tester.
The story will include biology and chemistry but will not focus on them too much. I aim to please both groups but will inevitably alienate both the people who dislike the subject and the ones who like it.

Title: Aytelia
Synopsis:
A magical world embracing chaos as powerful entities and worlds fight for survival or power, observed by the "universals", a sentient species no one can fathom or reason with. Their knowledge, comparable to the vast amounts of years they have existed for and their power feared by even some Gods, capable of destroying and creating entire universes, Aytelia being their proudest creation. Amongst all these the name of one of them is profound even amongst them, both feared and respected - Righteousness.
 
As a lone girl wakes up in a large strange fountain, filled with other individuals in the same position such as herself, she lifts her drowsy head to find her surreal surroundings. The civilians walking around said fountain are all weird creatures that could only come out of a fantasy - orcs, elves, dwarfs, dragonewts, all wearing all different kinds of medieval armor, weaponry and artifacts.
What will happen to her in this world? Will she be able to find a place in it and will the mysteries behind her current circumstances be revealed? Why is she so different than those around her?
 
Warning: Character is extremelly OP and the lore behind it doesn't get covered till chapter 14.
 
Updates once a week.
First time posting my writing on the internet so feedback would be appreciated.

Title: Forged in Fear and Fury - An Apocalyptic LitRPG
Synopsis:
In an attempt to prevent Earths ensuing demise, it is ripped from the void by an entity known as The Totality. It is then fused with a Lost Dungeon World to increase its inhabitants chances of survival in a new, system-enhanced universe. 
Cade Vale barely avoids death in the first second. 
Will he be able to overcome the rigors of this new world and survive? Will he be able to carve a new life out of the aether for himself and those whom he loves most?
...Will he be able to avoid becoming everything he hates in order to do so?
Artwork by Kayla Basciano - Instagram: vulpix1323

Inspired primarily by the systems in The Legend of Randidly Ghosthound, The Genesis System, and The New World as well as by Savage Divinity, Azarinth Healer, and Shovels in Spades in general. I haven't been able to get these worlds out of my head and I've been waiting for something to fill the void left by the hiatus of Genesis, but so far nothing has scratched that itch as much as ProfoundMagician was able to with the world he created. I figure if I'm going to be thinking about this stuff as much as I do I might as well get better at writing while playing with a number of those ideas that I love. I have a number of specifics and events I want to show in the story, but a lot of the fun is coming up with ways to branch those together cohesively. This is an attempt to alleviate my depression by channeling my creativity into a hobby. Hopefully it's as enjoyable to read as it is to write.

Title: Orivar: Deep Black
Synopsis:
Atara Korrell, a retired Navy captain, is called back into service after a gifted scientist loses everything.
Is she serving her country? Or is she just a pawn in a great game?
Orivar is a web novel series set in the distant future. Humanity has all but mastered the exotic material known as omnium, the most common of which is called orivar: the original variety. That clear crystal is a transmuter of mass and energy, and the very existence of contemporary Civilized Space depends on it.
Deep Black, the first book in the series, begins a classic story of light versus darkness. A novel variety of omnium–one with the potential of sending Civilized Space crashing down–is stolen from a research station just beyond the Federation border. Atara Korrell, a retired Navy captain, is called to command the fastest starship ever made to chase the thieves and retrieve the stolen sample. Meanwhile, enemies both near and far vie for the omnium sample and the advanced technology powering her ship. Can Atara remain loyal in the face of seeming betrayal?(Cover art by Loputon https://www.deviantart.com/loputon)

Title: AfterlifeRPG

Our classical RPG mechanics give you the power, but only our players can decide how the world will be shaped!

Title: Star Shepherd
Synopsis:
A pilot on the run. A cargo that’ll change the fate of the galaxy forever. And the might of the military working to stop Star Shepherd from delivering salvation to the people.
Star Shepherd knows a raw deal when he sees one. And he’s got the worst one in the galaxy: to deliver a mysterious package to a rebellion to change the scales of power in favor of the common man. As he meets with an old friend to seek much-needed help, he draws the attention of a genocidal admiral willing to destroy entire worlds if it means catching Star Shepherd.Will Star survive the chase and bring hope to the rebellion, or deliver a gift into the hands of a worse power, tipping the galaxy into further chaos?From two-time Dragon Award-finalist and Nebula-finalist, Star Shepherd is the first book in the  space western Shepherd of Light series.

Title: I Was a Teenage Necromancer
Synopsis: Craven Falls has a serial killer stalking the streets. Amber should know, she's the latest victim. Dead but not gone, her ghost settles in to haunt the cemetery when the literal chance of a lifetime comes by in the middle of the night: a classmate of hers, Scott Havenbrook. Showing up with a shovel, it turns out he's a practitioner of the mystical art of necromancy, and can revive her-for a price. But before he can, they must find the killer in order to put everything right, while a sinister plot takes shape in the darkness. Can they save her before it's too late?

Title: Vanisgard Chronicles #1 - Inception
Synopsis: This is the story of Oredal the first and last of the Khellaphine line who rule Vanisgard, the world that existed before the start of our universe.  This story is translated from ancient texts created before the start of time itself.  However before you delve into this ancient legend you must first hear Oredal's prophecy.  "When the warrior with the arm of stone, has come to claim the beholden throne. He shall shatter the crown of bone. With the power of gods, he shall make Vanisgard his own."  This is what the prophecy roughly translates to in our tongue from Oredal's native Lamarhi Language. However this is only the first of the three ancient books. Enjoy this Tome as I have enjoyed it.

Title: The Queensguard: An Isekai Love Story
Synopsis:
Hundreds of years ago, the Empire of Asgardia ruled all of the Frostlands with an iron fist. The dark elves subjugated the high elves and the dwarves, enslaving them and abusing them to bring further prosperity to the Empire of Asgardia and the dark elf race. One day a high elf warrior led a rebellion to liberate her people from their dark elven oppressors. She was aided by a small group of elite warriors with unyielding loyalty. That warrior would be crowned as the First Queen of the newly established Kingdom of Alfheim, and her loyal band of warriors would come to be known as the Queensguard. 
Today, the Kingdom of Alfheim is now the most powerful nation in the world, and the tradition of the Queensguard has continued on. Warriors from all over the land aspire to join the ranks, but only a select few will have the honor to be chosen. 
Tetsuya Miyazaki is an eighteen year old high school boy from another world. A social outcast searching for a purpose to fight for. Chelsea the Fierce is a half-orc orphan, cast aside by the world and saved only by the kindness of a stranger. 
This is the story of the monster and the hero. An unlikely pair of underdogs and their extraordinary journey into the world of the Queensguard.

Title: Project Pegasus
Synopsis: Amidst having almost everything he wants, Hiiro Akira, a grade 12 student is still caged by the death of his first love, Haruka. As he was remembering her again, a strange loud noise disturbed him.  It came from a burning airplane falling towards him. Waking up, he found himself in an unknown, desolated place. The worst thing is that he became a skeleton of a familiar necromancer. Who is this girl who looks exactly like his first love?author's note: this is the revised version of "An airplane crashed into me so I've been reincarnated as a skeleton"

Title: One Nation. One People. One Tribe.
Synopsis:
The third world war has been going on for 30 plus years. The ONE has seen the age of destruction us humans have brought on our selves. We are rash, untamed and lost in sin. The only answer is to create order and give us a purpose big enough to unite the world once more. That purpose is survival and the order to our chaos shall be the SYSTEM.
 
Hi guys this is going to be my attempt at the system apocalypse. hope you enjoy

Title: Incandescents
Synopsis:
Peace is a veneer which the powerful use to hide their own agenda and bide their time - an ephemeral dream of tired souls to be capitalized upon by the vigorous. Stability is another such thin illusion.
When one of the most famous kings disappear from his kingdom in the wake of treachery within his court, ripples spread out throughout the world. Be it social, political or merely concerning the psyche of the collective consciousness, changes follow in the wake of his disappearance.Trailblazing one such ripple, a young man and woman cross the ocean looking for something they are not even sure of, meeting some brightly burning lives along the way and bit by bit beginning to understand what they had left in search of. Ripples never remain stationary, and thus new wavelets spread out and away from them, all creating their own waves.
Amidst all this chaos of destruction, introspection and construction, all the rising stars share just one definite common consensus - a war is looming on the horizon. But the answers to questions like where will it strike from, what will they do - those are the answers no one is sure of. In the midst of war, they must find their own place in the world.

Title: Project Real=ty: Thrill Online
Synopsis:
In 20XX, the world rapidly advanced and to the society it is a praiseworthy event. 
But not to ArkDue to rapid advancement of the society, the long tradition of his family would end in his generation.
"I would not let this happen. I won't be a disgrace to my family become the best hunter in the world!! Even if it is in the virtual world."
Let us unfold the story of the wanna-be-hunter as he tread the path of the greatest hunter and unravel the secrets of Thrill Online.

Title: Magician's Circle
Synopsis: A magician became an adpoted father to his best friends' son while he finds the culprit that force the death of his friend. Witness as the father and son relationship goes.

Title: god of destruction
Synopsis: A normal guy gets killed and reincarnated as a god of destruction tasked with destroying planets and keeping the balance in the universe he must jug which planet must be destroyed or what he wants to destroy will he rule the universe with an iron fist or will he not interfere with the affairs of mortals

Title: Dualism
Synopsis:
Dr. Hal Ramsey is secretly working on a unique technology which would enhance the unaffected brain functions of those who have brain damage or trauma. The morality of his experiments does not assuage him; he will soon, however, become legally blind.
A young girl in a small town in the most daunting case Hal has ever encountered. He brings her to his makeshift operating room, but trouble follows, as does someone unexpected, offering him a new option for his research.
Desperate, Hal considers the unthinkable. But time is running out, and the secret to his "enhancements" could fade with his eyesight if he doesn't make a breakthrough. The way is clear.
Do the ends truly justify the means?

Title: Arcadias Moon (Edited)
Synopsis: This is just a rewrite I'll only post after I rewrite an arc.

Title: I Was Reincarnated Into Another World As A Fish
Synopsis: Reincarnated as a fish in a coral reef, what will I do?

Title: New Moon
Synopsis:
Think post-apocolyptic dystopia. Communities secluded from the outside world, strange religions for the moon, aliens living among the abandoned world, non-human humanoids;like shapeshifter and magiks; and not much human progression for some reason. That's the world that Creme, Acacia, and Violetta have come to know. The year is 4018, and a nuclear reactor has exploded in a city near a desert, then the story begins.
 
Next Release - 5-24-19(at least) or 8-23-19(at most)

Title: Rebellion Against Time
Synopsis: A man is in search for the truth, as he uses his philosphies and writings to connect with others as they can support him on his quest for absolute knowledge, however right before his epicdemic begins, he is killed by a greedy man who takes his writings and works as his own. Though he is resurrected with what he was in search of, he becomes corrupt, knowing all there is to know about this world, he sees it as unpure, and he does all he can to rewrite history with an army of his own to take down enemies, and stop history as we know it from taking place, to create the world in his perfect image.

Title: Dreams of Creation and Destruction
Synopsis:
Zenith is a promising student who has recently passed her first year at Soul Academy and now must undergo the ‘Ritual of Awakening’. A ceremony which works to unlock the ability to physically summon the power that slumbers in a person’s soul for the first time. Only around twenty percent of the population ever get to wield magic, so while not legendarily rare, it is still uncommon for mundane supernatural phenomenons to happen in everyday life. 
After the ceremony ends in disaster, Zenith has no choice but to accept the guidance of a mysterious new professor, Terminus, or face certain expulsion from the academy. Least happy with the circumstances, Terminus is obligated to train Zenith in the ways of control, though he would prefer to palm her off then risk being in the center of the utter destruction and chaos that his student’s abilities cause. 
Midst the training, unknown forces make moves within Lisonar, causing discord and strain within the relatively peaceful kingdoms. When the trouble begins to hit too close to home, Zenith and Terminus are inevitably drawn into the thick of it and must get to the bottom of the problem before it is too late.

Title: Dead Earth Online
Synopsis: Peter gets an offer he can’t refuse - lose his high-level account to be part of the Beta for some amazing new content in Dead Earth Online. In return he has a chance to do something he thought was impossible; to get his real life back again. There are only a few things he needs to do in-game to make it happen. He needs to survive and grow strong, build an army to terrorize the players and decimate their lands, and become God King of the Desolate Horde.Or at least that’s what they told him.

Title: RESTART
Synopsis:
"The game was called RESTART, and everything about it fascinated her …. "
Welcome dear reader. Oh boy, do I have something new and unusual that I hope will tempt you to read further.
The LitRPG Forum is playing a 'Continue The Story' game! Who are we? We are neophytes and veterans making magic and mayhem wielding the written word. We are fans of LitRPG and we are here to play a game wherein the process, we hope to entertain you with a good story. Now about the adventure you have stumbled upon ....
Participants from the LitRPG Forum are each to write a single chapter in a continuous narrative that follows the LitRPG genre roadmap. We don't know where our imaginations will take us, but we one and all want to contribute and play this storytelling game to the best of our ability. Each entry will be concluded with an introduction to the author who wrote the chapter, some of whom have been published, others who have yet to be published as well as offerings from the minds of hobbyists.
I entreat you to visit LitRPGForum.com and we hope you have fun along this ride with us.

Title: Six of Misfortune
Synopsis:
When Thomas moves in with his aunt, he wishes to forget about his past, and start his life with a clean slate in the new city. Soon he learns that there's more to the city than meets the eye, and the people around him may not be people at all...
 
~This story is "bxb" therefore there are gay characters. In this case, a lot of gay characters~

Title: The Darkest Star
Synopsis: Katie Wilson was driving with her friend’s daughter in the back, when bombs went off in the nearby nuclear plant. She should’ve died, but she didn’t. She recovered and began to work for S.H.I.E.L.D. Then she noticed what she could do. She could use the energy of movement to fight. Even when she walked, she gained energy, and could let it out in a sort of shockwave. Soon enough she joined the Avengers and fought alongside. She got captured by CERBERUS during a battle and they amplified her powers x100. Eventually, though, her powers become unstable and dangerous. (A/N: it gets wayyy better after chapter 8 or so)

Title: Buffy's New World Order
Synopsis:
Fan Fiction:
Buffy the Vampire Slayer becomes a vampire.

Title: Modern World Reformation
Synopsis:
{Additional Tag: Weak to Strong} Might add more in the next chapters... 
During the year 20XX, portals of unknown sources began popping up around the Earth. Within it, were dozens and countless of monsters which referred to as “Monstra.”
At the same time, dozens of people were able to attain something which was then called “Abilities,” while the people themselves were referred to as “Awakens.”
These Awakens were able to retaliate against the Monstra trying to invade the Earth by using the Abilities given to them. Some were blessed with superhuman strength, others with magical abilities, and some with keen insight.
Bert Coli, a Senior High School student that had been in a car accident, costing him his two legs, was shocked to see that one day his amputated legs were grown back as if there wasn’t such an injury, along with a message…
[Congratulations!!! You have been selected as a participant of the “World Reformation” Event!!!]
?•?•?•?•?•?
Author Note: This fiction still doesn't have a scheduled release for the next chapter as I am super busy with school now. Just wanted to pre-release the prologue to get feedback on how to set up the next chapter. I think by April, I can start writing continuously so that I can release chapters faster.
Might also change title depending on the feedback. Please help me think of a name... :D
I do not own the cover picture... Only the text...

Title: Ancient Fangs: HOUSE AMULIUS (Book 2)
Synopsis:
SYNOPSIS
 
Vampires don’t exist. That’s what Jake knew. Until that fateful night in a dark alley. Now a rogue half-breed, he will know more than he wanted about the hidden world of the inhuman predators who changed his life. And he will have his mortality back, even if he has to destroy them all.
With the suspect assistance of a mysterious benefactor, his desperate journey for salvation will take him to the demonic myths of the distant past, lead to war with various vampire clans, deadly battles with different species of their kind, and test his unique skills as never before.
Cover image used under license/All Rights Reserved.2019
 
Warning:
Violence, gore, nudity, bad language, and some scenes of a sexual nature (not graphic, but still...). Non-twinkling vampires. FOR MATURE READERS ONLY.
 
NOTICE TO READERS (30 May 2019):
 
ANCIENT FANGS: Birth (Book One) is available at Amazon.

 

 ANCIENT FANGS: House Amulius (Book Two)

 Jake was a hunted man. 
Though he was able to eliminate Darius, a lord of one of the domains of House Amulius, the shocking deed had dangerously attracted the enmity of its rulers. Across the Atlantic, the sisters of the succubus pet of Darius are coming, intent on avenging their fallen sibling. Nor was House de Rais content to leave the matter of revenge to the succubae. Finally, Markus. The moroi who had lost his honor when Darius was killed.
With a twenty-five million dollar bounty on his head, would the rogue survive? Humans, vampires, succubae, and one powerful moroi want to ensure he does not.
But House Amulius forgot that sometimes, a house needs some renovation to let in the sun.

Title: Girls Of The Wild's
Synopsis:
HaJoon is a rich boy and heir to one of the largest companies in the world, being sent by his father to Korea to establish a branch in it, he was enrolled into the wild's high school, the previous all-girls school is now open for boys too
what will happen when he meets the queen of the school? will they be on peaceful tears or will something unexpected happen?
Follow his life in his new school and his new friends

Title: Ring Hero (Parody of Hero Genre)
Synopsis:
